fc87c634-9513-4c08-913b-9fb0db8f55c5.name: Beef Pasta
fc87c634-9513-4c08-913b-9fb0db8f55c5.description: A savory beef and pasta dish with vibrant vegetables and rich flavors.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and onion until golden.
Add turmeric, cumin, soy sauce, and beef; stir and cover to cook on low heat.
If needed, add a little water.
Once the beef is cooked and oily, add the remaining ingredients and mix well.
After five minutes, the dish is ready to serve.

76a0615d-a049-4360-82bb-0a44fdb3ba53.name: Pasta Salad
76a0615d-a049-4360-82bb-0a44fdb3ba53.description: A colorful and refreshing pasta salad perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Boil the pasta until soft, then drain and rinse with cold water.
Add olive oil to prevent sticking, mix in chopped ingredients, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and serve.

e451a55f-5e67-432b-b0d0-aed72a7e3128.name: Cheesy Pasta
e451a55f-5e67-432b-b0d0-aed72a7e3128.description: A creamy and flavorful pasta dish with fresh tomatoes and basil.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions and drain.
In a large bowl, crumble the cheese until soft and creamy.
Add tomatoes, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper to the cheese and mix well.
Stir in the olive oil and adjust seasoning if necessary.
Combine the cooked pasta with the cheese and tomato mixture and mix thoroughly.
Serve in a suitable dish, garnish with basil, and sprinkle with black pepper.

6447a891-36d0-49af-810e-525e9574a32d.name: Spaghetti Matriciana
6447a891-36d0-49af-810e-525e9574a32d.description: A delicious spaghetti dish with mushrooms, peppers, and a savory tomato sauce.
instructions: Thinly slice the onion, bell pepper, and ham; slice the mushrooms; finely chop the garlic and hot peppers.
Sauté the onion in a pan, then add garlic and hot peppers after a few minutes.
Add mushrooms, ham, olives, and bell pepper to the pan and sauté for a few minutes.
Mix tomato paste with half a cup of boiling water and add to the pan, stirring for three minutes before reducing heat.
In another pot, boil salted water and cook spaghetti for six minutes, then drain and add to the mixture.
Serve the spaghetti in a deep dish, garnished with fresh chopped parsley.

193994bb-3e49-4547-8722-cb0120c0a8f3.name: Macaroni with Cheese
193994bb-3e49-4547-8722-cb0120c0a8f3.description: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish that's perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Drain the macaroni.
Melt butter and cheese over low heat until combined.
Reduce heat, add beaten eggs, yogurt, milk, salt, pepper, and drained macaroni, cooking until slightly thickened.

3071eb89-b26c-4cbb-9e51-147bd7d8aeac.name: Lasagna 2
3071eb89-b26c-4cbb-9e51-147bd7d8aeac.description: A delicious layered pasta dish with meat, cheese, and creamy sauce.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion in oil, then add ground meat and cook.
Add mushrooms and bell pepper, sauté briefly.
Stir in tomato paste, salt, pepper, and thyme; remove from heat before thickening.
If desired, add cream at this stage.
Soak lasagna sheets in boiling water for 10 seconds, then rinse with cold water.
Grease a baking dish, add a layer of white sauce, then lasagna sheets, meat mixture, more sauce, and cheese.
Repeat layers, finishing with sauce and cheese on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for one hour.

7c5c38c3-c2f3-4f3b-bd37-57ed8f3125ae.name: Toast Lasagna
7c5c38c3-c2f3-4f3b-bd37-57ed8f3125ae.description: A delicious layered dish of toast, meat, and creamy béchamel sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: For béchamel sauce, melt butter in a pan over medium heat, add chopped onion and sauté until golden.
Stir in flour and cook briefly, then gradually add milk while stirring until smooth.
For meat filling, sauté onion in oil, add ground meat and spices, cook for 20 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and bell pepper, stir, then add boiling water and tomato paste, simmer for 30 minutes.
In a baking dish, spread some béchamel sauce, layer toast, cover with cheese, then meat filling.
Repeat layers, finishing with toast, pour béchamel on top, and sprinkle with grated cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 30 minutes until the cheese is golden.

878ebb63-4be0-43c5-90bc-e26069ad83a7.name: Pasta with Walnut Sauce
878ebb63-4be0-43c5-90bc-e26069ad83a7.description: A creamy and nutty pasta dish that's rich in flavor.
instructions: Blend walnuts and toast in a mixer.
Add chopped purslane (or parsley) and mix well with remaining ingredients.
Drain cooked pasta, combine in a large bowl, and serve.

53f9e063-d159-4cd1-b4e7-b0e171b8b881.name: Spaghetti with Chicken Sauce
53f9e063-d159-4cd1-b4e7-b0e171b8b881.description: A delicious spaghetti dish topped with a savory chicken and tomato sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Sauté oil with onion and garlic for 3 minutes.
Cook spaghetti in another pot, then drain.
In a microwave-safe dish, sauté chicken with spices for 2 minutes (covered).
Add tomato paste, puree, lemon juice, sugar, and parsley; microwave on high for 6 minutes (covered).
Sauté spaghetti with butter, salt, and pepper, then serve with the sauce on top.

bb3776cb-a304-4e7d-ac91-b7a9fcce681b.name: Tuna Spaghetti
bb3776cb-a304-4e7d-ac91-b7a9fcce681b.description: A delicious spaghetti dish with savory tuna and rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Sauté the grated onion in a bit of olive oil.
Add the canned tuna, then the tomato puree and tomato paste for color.
Cook on low heat until the oil separates.
Boil spaghetti in salted water until cooked, then drain and mix with the sauce.

d433c205-191e-464a-826a-0201002f6c39.name: Pasta with Shrimp and Bread
d433c205-191e-464a-826a-0201002f6c39.description: A delicious pasta dish with shrimp, sautéed bread, and fresh cabbage.
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped bread with garlic, salt, and pepper for 5 minutes.
Sauté shrimp in a bit of oil, add lemon juice, then add chopped cabbage after a few minutes.
After 6 minutes, combine the first pan's contents with the shrimp and cabbage mixture.
Cook pasta in boiling water, drain, and mix with the shrimp mixture, adding grated Parmesan cheese.

92859f99-e38f-4dd6-9c08-3d6d5f36de5d.name: Cold Pasta with Cheese
92859f99-e38f-4dd6-9c08-3d6d5f36de5d.description: A refreshing pasta dish with cheese, herbs, and savory ingredients.
instructions: Boil water in a pot with 1 tablespoon of salt until it reaches a boil.
Add the pasta and cook for 15-20 minutes, then drain.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions for 4 minutes.
Chop salami and add to the pan, sautéing for 3 minutes with thyme and garlic until golden.
Add chopped cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Mix the prepared mixture with the shaped pasta and stir well.

9017469b-d4f7-41bd-8cac-1d98b12a938d.name: Pasta with Meat and Special Sauce
9017469b-d4f7-41bd-8cac-1d98b12a938d.description: Delicious pasta combined with savory meat and a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, add salt, and then add pasta until cooked.
In a pan, heat oil, add onions, then garlic and spices, sauté with tomato sauce.
Add ground meat and cook until browned, then mix in cooked pasta.
Add sugar, parsley, and basil, let simmer for 15 minutes, then serve.

a7effe35-2927-410e-8585-06daf5298fce.name: Colorful Pasta
a7effe35-2927-410e-8585-06daf5298fce.description: A vibrant pasta dish packed with fresh vegetables and zesty flavors.
instructions: Wash and chop the green and red bell peppers after removing seeds.
Mix corn with bell peppers and sauté briefly.
In a bowl, mix lemon juice, salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
Cook pasta in a pot over medium heat for 15 minutes until soft.
Drain pasta and add the prepared mixture.
Halve cherry tomatoes and mix with chopped onion, cilantro, and avocado.
Add the prepared sauce to the mixture.

9cef0eeb-028c-40c1-b6e8-2d97e0183eaa.name: Cheesy Pasta
9cef0eeb-028c-40c1-b6e8-2d97e0183eaa.description: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish that’s comforting and delicious.
instructions: In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with cheese thoroughly.
In a pot, bring water with salt to a boil, then add pasta.
Add the cheese mixture, milk, lemon juice, and chopped meat to the pasta.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

527b24a2-be0b-4786-96e5-57792aaef6c6.name: Instant Pasta with Special Sauce
527b24a2-be0b-4786-96e5-57792aaef6c6.description: A quick and delicious pasta dish with chicken and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and add chopped onion.
After 4 minutes, add celery and carrot, then after 5 minutes, add chicken and sauté gently.
Add chopped tomatoes and sauté for 3 minutes, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
Cook pasta in boiling water for 15 minutes, then drain.
Serve the mixture over the pasta and sprinkle with thyme.

50798aa0-b372-4092-99a2-d717d299165d.name: Pasta with Pomegranate Sauce
50798aa0-b372-4092-99a2-d717d299165d.description: A delicious pasta dish topped with a rich pomegranate sauce and walnuts.
instructions: Chop the onion finely and sauté it in oil.
Cut the chicken breast into julienne strips and add to the onion, frying until cooked.
Season with salt and pepper, allowing the moisture to evaporate.
Toast the chopped walnuts in a dry pan.
Add walnuts and pomegranate paste to the chicken and cook on low heat for about 10 minutes.
Serve the pasta topped with the sauce and garnish with whole walnuts and pomegranate seeds.

71966c80-46e6-4c8b-ae7f-85c7aa2e5cd8.name: Pasta with Tuna
71966c80-46e6-4c8b-ae7f-85c7aa2e5cd8.description: A delicious pasta dish with tuna and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, drain, and set aside.
Sauté sliced onion and garlic in a pot with some olive oil.
Add grated carrot, cilantro, parsley, green chili, and tomatoes, and sauté until vegetables change color.
Add spices, lemon juice, and tomato paste dissolved in 1/2 cup of boiling water, and stir.
Finally, add the canned tuna and peas, cover, and simmer on low heat for 15 minutes.
Mix the pasta with the sauce, then let it steam on low heat for 30 minutes.
Serve the pasta in a dish with Shirazi salad.

cbbeb883-69c2-4e6a-9791-a6138e177a00.name: Cold Macaroni Dish
cbbeb883-69c2-4e6a-9791-a6138e177a00.description: A refreshing cold macaroni dish with cheddar cheese and chicken.
instructions: Mix cheddar cheese with cornstarch in a bowl until well combined.
Boil water in a pot, add salt, and cook the macaroni until done.
Drain the cooked macaroni and rinse with cold water to cool.
Blend half of the butter with the cheese mixture, milk, and lemon juice, then pour over the macaroni and mix well.
Sauté the chopped chicken in the remaining butter until fully cooked and tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve with cucumber, tomato, and lettuce.

64d70a4b-a0a9-44cc-9646-107141344624.name: Broccoli Pasta
64d70a4b-a0a9-44cc-9646-107141344624.description: A delicious pasta dish with broccoli, cheese, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Chop large broccoli stems and boil in water for 10 minutes.
Add broccoli florets and cook for another 5 minutes, then drain and reserve the water.
Cook the pasta in the reserved broccoli water until al dente.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil and butter, then add minced garlic, chili pepper, and ginger.
Add the broccoli and sauté briefly, then mix in the pasta.
After 2 minutes, add cheese and remove from heat.
Serve in a desired dish.

2f4ca54d-8feb-49f9-9ff9-e8bb6856edd5.name: Pasta with Cream and Tomato
2f4ca54d-8feb-49f9-9ff9-e8bb6856edd5.description: A creamy and tangy pasta dish with fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, add pasta and salt, then drain without rinsing.
In a pan, heat some oil, sauté the drained pasta, then in another pan, sauté diced tomatoes with butter or oil, remove from heat, add cream, mix with pasta, and serve warm.

ea925d5e-e48f-4166-adc6-a23506fda57f.name: Fettuccine with Ratatouille Sauce
ea925d5e-e48f-4166-adc6-a23506fda57f.description: Delicious fettuccine topped with a rich ratatouille sauce bursting with flavors.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil fettuccine for 12 to 15 minutes, then drain.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté onion until translucent. Add eggplant and cook until softened.
Stir in crushed garlic, green pepper, and bell pepper. Add pureed tomatoes, salt, pepper, and thyme.
Mix in vinegar and let the sauce thicken for about 20 minutes.
Pour the sauce over fettuccine and garnish with mozzarella cheese if desired.

6b59133a-db57-411e-8d47-0ebea0a65d01.name: Tomato and Zucchini Pasta
6b59133a-db57-411e-8d47-0ebea0a65d01.description: A vibrant pasta dish with fresh vegetables and a hint of Parmesan.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add zucchini, bell peppers, garlic, salt, and pepper; sauté briefly.
Stir in tomatoes and steam for 15 minutes.
Boil water in a pot and add pasta with desired salt; cook for 15 minutes.
Drain pasta and mix with the sautéed vegetables and Parmesan cheese before serving.

173e9f2e-ac1c-43cb-875f-47dc356cb8c6.name: Spinach and Cheese Roll
173e9f2e-ac1c-43cb-875f-47dc356cb8c6.description: Delicious spinach and cheese rolls baked to perfection.
ingredients: 1.5 teaspoons chopped fresh basil or 0.5 teaspoons dried basil
3/4 cup low-fat or fat-free white cheese
2 tablespoons grated or powdered parmesan cheese
2 teaspoons chopped fresh basil or 0.5 teaspoons Italian seasoning
instructions: Heat olive oil in a medium pan, add onion and garlic, sauté until soft.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, sugar, salt, and pepper, bring to a boil, then simmer for 5 minutes.
Cook lasagna sheets according to package instructions, rinse with cold water, and drain.
In a bowl, mix spinach, cheeses, and basil, then add spinach water and egg white, mix well.
Preheat oven to 350°F (176°C), spread spinach mixture on lasagna sheets, roll them up.
Place rolls in small baking dishes, pour some sauce on top, and bake for about 25 minutes.

00fa3409-9be9-4cfb-8d8b-80056abc83a7.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
00fa3409-9be9-4cfb-8d8b-80056abc83a7.description: Creamy pasta with tender chicken and aromatic spices, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Cook the pasta and drain it.
Sauté onion and garlic in butter until golden, add chicken pieces and sauté.
Add water and boil until reduced by half.
Lower the heat, add cream, and stir well.
Mix in parsley, nutmeg, salt, pepper, and pasta until heated through.
Serve in a suitable dish.

031760da-49b3-4e1e-a58c-35204a4cf035.name: Lasagna
031760da-49b3-4e1e-a58c-35204a4cf035.description: A delicious layered pasta dish with savory fillings and rich cheese.
ingredients: Oregano and black pepper to taste
Grated and sliced pizza cheese to taste
instructions: Boil water with salt and oil, then cook lasagna noodles for 8-10 minutes.
Sauté onions, then add sausage, soy mixture, mushrooms, ham, bell peppers, and blended tomatoes.
Layer cooked noodles, tomato sauce, filling, oregano, and cheese in a greased dish.
Top with special white sauce and cheese, then bake or microwave until heated through.

29a38434-6091-40bb-8c4f-1541c4f4a7a6.name: Pasta
29a38434-6091-40bb-8c4f-1541c4f4a7a6.description: Delicious pasta with a savory meat and vegetable sauce.
instructions: Blend soaked soy and ground meat with one onion until smooth.
Sauté chopped onion in oil until golden, then add meat mixture until water evaporates.
Add salt and turmeric, then mix in half of the blended tomatoes.
Sauté mushrooms separately over high heat, then add to the mixture.
Chop bell pepper and add to the pan, adding herbs if desired.
Stir in remaining blended tomatoes, season, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Boil water in a pot with salt, turmeric, and oil, then break pasta in half and add.
Cook for 5-10 minutes, then drain and rinse with cold water.
Layer oil and optional lavash or potato slices in the pot for the bottom layer.
Serve pasta separately with sauce mixed in, or layer pasta and sauce in the pot.

11e4e0f9-f07c-4aa5-a01a-dab9ca378200.name: Pasta with Grona Sauce
11e4e0f9-f07c-4aa5-a01a-dab9ca378200.description: A creamy and flavorful sauce perfect for pasta lovers.
instructions: Mix the chopped vegetables and set aside.
Chop mushrooms and cook with vinegar for 5 minutes, then drain and cool.
Mix cream, mayonnaise, and yogurt until smooth, then add vegetables.
Whisk all ingredients together and refrigerate for an hour.
After an hour, add mushrooms, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and stir well.
Serve the sauce over pasta.

11f770a5-2a46-4cc7-8b83-2f1136059081.name: Italian Cheese Spaghetti
11f770a5-2a46-4cc7-8b83-2f1136059081.description: A creamy spaghetti dish with Gorgonzola cheese and fresh tomato puree.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, add salt, and cook pasta for 7-8 minutes.
In another pan, heat olive oil, sauté pureed tomatoes with salt and pepper, then add cheese.
Mix cooked pasta with the sauce over low heat for 2-5 minutes.
Serve garnished with fresh herbs and cherry tomatoes.

45af799a-14bb-48fd-bfd7-4e5f1f486b0a.name: Noodles with Soy and Peppers
45af799a-14bb-48fd-bfd7-4e5f1f486b0a.description: A delightful mix of noodles, soy, and fresh vegetables for a quick meal.
instructions: Boil water in a pot and add the noodles, cooking for 3-5 minutes.
Drain the noodles and set aside. Drain the soaked soy and let it dry.
Chop 1 tomato and onion, blend them, then mix in the soy for 2-3 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan, add the soy mixture, and cook until moisture evaporates.
Finely chop the bell pepper and green chilies, add to the pan, and stir.
Sauté mushrooms separately with butter and lemon juice, then add to the mixture.
Mix everything gently, then add 1 cup of boiling water and cover, simmer for 10 minutes.
Chop the remaining tomato and add it to the mixture, stirring well.
Wait for the mixture to thicken, then set aside some for garnish.
Add the noodles to the pan, mix gently, and season with salt and pepper.
Stir on low heat for 5 minutes until everything is combined and ready to serve.

77a0281d-443f-4caa-9246-7de8b0ac523f.name: Pasta with Pepper Sauce
77a0281d-443f-4caa-9246-7de8b0ac523f.description: A vibrant pasta dish with a spicy pepper sauce and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, red pepper, turmeric to taste
instructions: Boil peas for 20 minutes until partially cooked, then drain and set aside.
Soak soy in warm milk or water for an hour, then drain and let it dry.
Heat oil in a pan, add chopped onion and turmeric, sauté until soft.
Add soy and sauté for 6-8 minutes until it changes color.
Chop tomato and add it with peas, diced potato, grated ginger, chopped chili, salt, and pepper.
Sauté for a few minutes, then add 2 cups of boiling water, cover, and cook for 15 minutes on low heat.
Boil the pasta, drain, and let it cool.
After 15 minutes, julienne the bell peppers and add them with spicy ketchup to the pan.
Mix well and sauté on high heat for a few minutes.
Adjust seasoning, turn off the heat, and let it cool.
In a pot, add some oil, heat it, and layer the bottom with desired crispy base.
Add some drained pasta, pour some pepper sauce, and gently mix.
Sprinkle thyme powder and layer the pasta and sauce until finished.
Cover the last layer with plain pasta and sprinkle thyme on top.
Mix boiling water and hot oil (about half a teacup) and pour over the ingredients.
Wait for steam, then cover with a lid and set to low heat for 1 to 1.5 hours.

b17036f7-a072-40ac-9215-f916c882895d.name: Special Noodles or Spaghetti Dish
b17036f7-a072-40ac-9215-f916c882895d.description: A creamy and savory noodle dish with chicken and mushrooms.
ingredients: 3 cups of shredded cooked chicken or turkey
instructions: Cook the noodles in boiling water until fully cooked, then drain and rinse with cold water.
Sauté mushrooms in 3 tablespoons of butter for 10 minutes.
Mix remaining butter with flour in a suitable dish and sauté over low heat for 3 minutes.
Combine milk, cream, and chicken broth, heat until thickened for 5 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix noodles with mushrooms, butter-flour sauce, milk mixture, peas, and chicken, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add one third of the Parmesan cheese.
In another bowl, mix breadcrumbs with 1 teaspoon of butter and one third of the cheese, then sprinkle over the mixture.
Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 to 40 minutes until cooked and golden.

f833685a-6330-401d-90cf-cc98a62e66f9.name: Pasta with Cheese and Walnuts
f833685a-6330-401d-90cf-cc98a62e66f9.description: A delightful pasta dish topped with cheese, walnuts, and fresh greens.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until cooked, then drain and rinse under cold water.
Mix walnut oil, sunflower oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Place washed greens in a dish, top with cooked pasta, cheese, and walnuts, then drizzle with the oil mixture.

2a5a1ab1-8638-4250-a776-d8be8be1b354.name: Pasta with Fish
2a5a1ab1-8638-4250-a776-d8be8be1b354.description: A delightful pasta dish topped with smoked fish and a fresh tomato sauce.
ingredients: Zest and juice of half an orange
instructions: Prepare the sauce by halving the tomatoes and removing the seeds, then chop the flesh.
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, shallots, tarragon, peas, orange zest, orange juice, and olive oil.
Season with salt and black pepper, mix well, and let sit for 1-2 hours at room temperature.
Cook the pasta in boiling water until soft, then rinse with cold water.
Mix the pasta with the sauce and let it absorb the flavors.
Serve the pasta with sauce, flake the smoked fish on top, and sprinkle with grated boiled eggs.
Optionally, serve with half a lemon on the side.

80692a22-6ad2-4355-92ab-a7396670e2a1.name: Pasta with Beans
80692a22-6ad2-4355-92ab-a7396670e2a1.description: A delightful pasta dish with green beans, bacon, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until fully cooked, then drain and let it dry.
Cook green beans in water for 5 to 10 minutes until soft, then drain and keep warm.
Sauté bacon for 2 to 3 minutes, chop into small pieces, and add to green beans.
Chop green onions and halve cherry tomatoes, then mix with chickpeas.
In a separate bowl, mix tomato juice, vinegar, spices, and fresh coriander, then add to the vegetable mixture.
Combine all ingredients with the pasta and add cooked green beans and bacon, mixing well.
Serve the salad warm or cold.

46bfa7dc-fe87-4c22-be28-e6fb127d1755.name: Spicy Macaroni Dish
46bfa7dc-fe87-4c22-be28-e6fb127d1755.description: A delicious and spicy macaroni dish with tropical flavors.
instructions: Cook the macaroni in boiling water until soft, then drain with cold water.
Place the pineapples in a baking dish, sprinkle with sugar, and bake for 5 minutes until golden.
Once cooled, cut the pineapples into small pieces.
Mix lemon juice and coconut milk in a bowl.
Combine the remaining ginger with garlic and black pepper, then add to the macaroni and pineapples.
Add the mango and finally garnish the salad with chopped green onions, red hot peppers, and mint.

1fe847e5-ed58-4711-bdf7-dade835a7e10.name: Pasta with Broccoli
1fe847e5-ed58-4711-bdf7-dade835a7e10.description: A delicious pasta dish with broccoli, garlic, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, add salt and oil, then add the pasta until soft.
Drain the pasta and rinse with cold water to prevent sticking.
In another pot, combine the pasta with chicken broth and cook for 8 minutes.
Heat a pan, add olive oil and chopped garlic, then add salt, broccoli, pepper, parmesan, and tomato paste.
Mix well and sauté the ingredients.
Add the pasta to the pan and stir thoroughly.

3c06ee72-edd2-40fe-9e78-a819ac4b08e0.name: Pasta with Pineapple
3c06ee72-edd2-40fe-9e78-a819ac4b08e0.description: A delightful pasta dish with a sweet and savory twist from pineapple.
instructions: Cook the pasta in salted boiling water until soft, then drain and rinse with cold water.
In a bowl, mix yogurt with vinegar, mustard, and sugar, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Pour the mixture over the pasta and stir well.
Chop the sausage, finely dice the celery and bell pepper, then add to the pasta and mix again.
Sprinkle chopped pineapple on top and garnish with chopped almonds.

b2556831-ab16-498c-8cca-489d2a6e7dba.name: Pasta with Yogurt and Garlic
b2556831-ab16-498c-8cca-489d2a6e7dba.description: A creamy and savory pasta dish topped with spiced ground meat.
ingredients: Yogurt and garlic (or yogurt with shallots)
Pine nuts or slivered almonds (for garnish)
Lemon zest, sumac, and salt (to taste)
instructions: Boil the pasta and steam it for 10 to 15 minutes.
Sauté the ground meat, then mix in lemon zest, sumac, and salt until the moisture evaporates.
Serve the pasta on a platter, pour yogurt and garlic on top, and add the sautéed meat.
Garnish with pine nuts or slivered almonds.

d082d57d-06f9-4810-80b8-2f35a1a5ad1a.name: Sicilian Island Spaghetti
d082d57d-06f9-4810-80b8-2f35a1a5ad1a.description: A delicious spaghetti dish with lamb, olives, and a medley of flavors.
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in butter.
Mix chopped garlic, lamb, mushrooms, parsley, anchovies, and olives.
Combine cooked spaghetti with olive oil and mix well.
Top the spaghetti with the mixture and sprinkle with cheese before serving.

52d0d2ff-620c-4633-aab3-57467ff85971.name: Spaghetti with Tuna
52d0d2ff-620c-4633-aab3-57467ff85971.description: A delightful spaghetti dish with tuna and fresh tomatoes.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
½ teaspoon hot red sauce or red pepper powder (optional)
instructions: Fill a pot halfway with water, add salt and oil, and bring to a boil.
Add spaghetti to boiling water and cook for 10-15 minutes over medium heat.
In a separate pot, combine garlic and tomatoes, and heat until tomatoes start to boil.
Cook without a lid for 3-5 minutes until water evaporates.
Add tuna, hot sauce or red pepper, salt, pepper, and halved olives to the cooked tomatoes and mix well.
Serve the cooked spaghetti topped with the tomato and tuna sauce.

61e3aa68-6e32-4e27-bf14-9141e9e23f16.name: Pasta with Sausage and Fresh Tomatoes
61e3aa68-6e32-4e27-bf14-9141e9e23f16.description: A delicious pasta dish with fresh tomatoes and savory sausage.
ingredients: Some sliced pizza cheese for serving
instructions: Boil water in a pot, wash tomatoes, and blanch them for 30 seconds before peeling and dicing.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add diced sausage, and sauté.
Chop the onion and add it to the sausage, cooking for 10 minutes.
Add diced tomatoes, salt, and pepper, and cook for another 10 minutes uncovered.
Boil water in another pot, add spaghetti with salt and oil, and cook until done, then drain.
Remove sauce from heat, stir in chopped parsley, and serve pasta topped with sauce, garnished with basil and cheese.

936ade13-c152-4971-ae54-ac2cc1cd3765.name: Pasta with Alfredo Sauce and Chicken
936ade13-c152-4971-ae54-ac2cc1cd3765.description: Creamy Alfredo pasta topped with tender chicken and fresh parsley.
instructions: Boil 5 cups of water in a pot and add salt when boiling.
Add pasta to boiling water and cook, stirring occasionally.
In a separate pan, melt butter and sauté chicken, adding salt, pepper, and Alfredo sauce.
Once pasta is cooked, drain and combine with chicken and Alfredo sauce in a warmed dish.
For Alfredo sauce, melt butter in a medium pan, add cream, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in parsley, garlic, and Parmesan cheese, mixing well before removing from heat.

dfbc414c-9205-42b4-87ff-b4f4082f0ca8.name: Sausage Pasta
dfbc414c-9205-42b4-87ff-b4f4082f0ca8.description: A delicious pasta dish with sausage and beans, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Sauté the onion and add grated sausage, cooking together.
In another pot, cook the black-eyed peas, then mix with tomato paste, salt, pepper, parsley, and garlic powder.
Boil pasta in water with turmeric and salt for 8 minutes, then drain and mix with the sausage mixture.
Let it simmer on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve the sausage pasta on a dish with a little butter on top.

210278d6-e920-4e21-90c0-1d6f07f617cf.name: Pasta with Green Sauce
210278d6-e920-4e21-90c0-1d6f07f617cf.description: A delicious pasta dish topped with a vibrant green sauce made from fresh herbs.
ingredients: Mixed fresh herbs (parsley, basil, cilantro) to taste
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
Blend the fresh herbs with olive oil in a blender.
Add walnuts, salt, pepper, and grated cheese to the mixture and blend again.
Sauté the pasta in a pan with a little olive oil.
Serve the pasta on a plate and garnish with the sauce.

dfe55aa3-f356-4dfd-aa10-865a9c9aea9c.name: Mushroom Lasagna
dfe55aa3-f356-4dfd-aa10-865a9c9aea9c.description: A delicious layered dish of pasta, meat, mushrooms, and creamy sauce.
instructions: Sauté ground meat with salt, pepper, and a little oil.
Add tomato paste and fried onions, then sauté again.
Add bell pepper and sauté briefly.
Slice green pepper and add it.
Clean and slice mushrooms, sauté with salt, lemon juice, and oil, then add to the mixture.
Mix in oregano and set aside.
Soften lasagna sheets in boiling salted water and grease the dish.
Layer lasagna sheets, then add mushroom and meat mixture, smoothing it out.
Repeat with half of the white sauce, some cheese, and tomato until the dish is full.
Preheat the oven and bake lasagna at 35 degrees for 45 minutes.

c7298cf6-07d2-4a0e-b7e3-f2843d280200.name: Pasta with Mushrooms and Shrimp
c7298cf6-07d2-4a0e-b7e3-f2843d280200.description: A delightful pasta dish with shrimp, mushrooms, and a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Boil water in a pot and add shrimp until tender, then drain and peel.
Sauté chopped mushrooms in 50 g butter, then mix with fried onions and tomato paste dissolved in water.
Add shrimp and mushrooms to the sauce, then add peeled and chopped tomatoes, salt, and pepper.
Cook pasta according to instructions, then mix with remaining butter and combine with the sauce.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

44d3e2dc-4f46-4dcc-acba-abdfad5c7a29.name: Pasta with Fish
44d3e2dc-4f46-4dcc-acba-abdfad5c7a29.description: A delightful pasta dish combined with tender fish and tangy tomato sauce.
instructions: Fill a large pot with water, add salt, and bring to a boil.
Add pasta and a bit of oil, cook until done, then drain.
Cut fish into small pieces, remove bones, and cook gently until water evaporates.
Layer pasta, tomato sauce, and fish in a dish, then cover with more pasta.
Pour tomato sauce on top and sprinkle with grated cheese if desired.

ffe5afc7-21eb-432b-a8a8-a66531da9276.name: Pasta
ffe5afc7-21eb-432b-a8a8-a66531da9276.description: A delicious pasta dish with lamb, olives, and a blend of flavors.
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in butter.
Add chopped garlic, lamb, mushrooms, parsley, anchovies, and olives.
In a separate bowl, mix cooked spaghetti with olive oil.
Pour the mixture over the spaghetti and top with grated cheese.
Serve warm and enjoy your pasta dish.

82a36905-ea20-4184-8c79-c628fcb1bdb8.name: Spaghetti with Ratatouille Sauce
82a36905-ea20-4184-8c79-c628fcb1bdb8.description: A flavorful spaghetti dish topped with a rich ratatouille sauce.
instructions: Boil spaghetti for 8 to 12 minutes and drain.
In a non-stick pan, combine all sauce ingredients and cook on low heat for 30 to 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour the prepared sauce over the spaghetti and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

7a868e86-c5ad-4edb-958c-6810648ff20e.name: Green Pasta with Meat
7a868e86-c5ad-4edb-958c-6810648ff20e.description: A delicious blend of green pasta and savory ground meat in a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Boil water with 2 tablespoons of salt, add green pasta and cook until tender.
Drain pasta, rinse with warm water to remove excess starch and salt.
Sauté fried onions in a pot, add ground meat and cook until browned.
Dissolve tomato juice in water, add to meat with salt and pepper, simmer until slightly thickened.
Combine pasta and butter in a pot, let butter melt, then remove from heat.
Serve pasta on one side of the dish, meat on the other, and sprinkle with parsley.

655553c8-c0d7-407a-a12a-ba2a17c95515.name: Pasta with Chickpeas and Red Pepper Broccoli
655553c8-c0d7-407a-a12a-ba2a17c95515.description: Delicious pasta dishes packed with nutritious ingredients for kids and teens.
ingredients: 200g small shell or elephant ear pasta
Curry powder and turmeric to taste
2 tablespoons olive oil for red pepper dish
instructions: Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 minutes.
Sauté chopped onion, then add minced garlic and spices.
Add chickpeas, corn, and tomato paste, cover, and simmer.
Drain pasta and mix with the prepared ingredients, heat for 10 minutes.
For the second dish, cook pasta until half done, add chopped broccoli for 2 minutes.
Sauté chopped red peppers in olive oil.
Combine all ingredients, simmer for 7 minutes, and serve.

73d15ab3-cd6f-4355-bf99-267ea128391b.name: Colorful Pasta
73d15ab3-cd6f-4355-bf99-267ea128391b.description: A vibrant and delicious pasta dish perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cook the pasta until al dente.
Add vegetable colors to create a colorful presentation.

d8441bcd-092b-4e99-aa95-7244edc28493.name: Spaghetti with Mixed Vegetables
d8441bcd-092b-4e99-aa95-7244edc28493.description: A vibrant spaghetti dish packed with fresh vegetables and topped with cheese.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water for 20 minutes.
Toss cooked spaghetti with olive oil to prevent sticking.
Sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil until slightly tender.
Add grated garlic and parsley, then one cup of water.
After boiling, add tomato juice and thyme, stirring gently.
Serve spaghetti topped with grated cheese and basil alongside the vegetable mix.

541f55b3-10ad-48b0-ab22-d479d02e4b1c.name: Twisted Pasta with Mushrooms and Basil
541f55b3-10ad-48b0-ab22-d479d02e4b1c.description: A savory pasta dish with mushrooms, ground meat, and fresh basil.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in hot oil, then add ground meat and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft, then stir in vinegar and tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes.
Add basil and prepare the pasta by boiling it for 10 minutes until soft.
Drain pasta, serve in a dish, and pour the prepared sauce over it.

939f7dbc-6fb1-490e-a52f-308ff1d1642a.name: Twisted Pasta with Sausage and Mushrooms
939f7dbc-6fb1-490e-a52f-308ff1d1642a.description: A savory dish combining pasta, sausage, and mushrooms with aromatic herbs.
instructions: Cook pasta in boiling salted water with a bit of oil according to package instructions, then drain and cool.
Chop celery, garlic, and mushrooms, and slice the sausages.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté celery and garlic for 5 minutes without browning.
Add sliced sausages and stir for 5 minutes until browned.
Add mushrooms and lemon juice, sauté for 4 minutes until mushrooms soften.
Stir in salt, pepper, and thyme.
Combine the mixture with the twisted pasta in a large bowl, garnish with parsley, and serve.

f6183a44-b691-42ff-873d-a6f34b85d1f7.name: Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce
f6183a44-b691-42ff-873d-a6f34b85d1f7.description: A delicious spaghetti dish topped with rich marinara sauce and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté the garlic.
Grate the tomatoes and add them, stirring well.
Once the tomatoes change color, add the remaining ingredients (except parsley, pasta, and pepper) and simmer for 35 minutes on low heat.
Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Drain the pasta and mix some with the sauce in the pot.
Combine the remaining pasta with the sauce and simmer for 45 minutes to 1 hour on low heat.

a3068844-89b2-40fe-9c05-1faec90f44ea.name: Lasagna
a3068844-89b2-40fe-9c05-1faec90f44ea.description: A delicious layered pasta dish with meat, cheese, and vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and thyme to taste
instructions: Chop the sausage or salami and sauté with fried onions, adding salt and pepper.
Sauté ground meat with cinnamon, salt, and pepper.
Boil water with oil and salt, add lasagna until soft, then rinse with cold water.
Grease a rectangular baking dish, layer with lasagna, tomato sauce, meat mixture, mushrooms, bell pepper, and cheese.
Repeat layers, ensuring to add tomato sauce on top of the last layer of lasagna.
Top with remaining cheese and butter pieces, sprinkle with thyme.
Bake at 400°F for 30-45 minutes until golden.

41f4684c-1ed0-4fd3-9642-a08117a10f1f.name: Pasta with Garlic and Vegetables
41f4684c-1ed0-4fd3-9642-a08117a10f1f.description: A flavorful pasta dish with garlic and fresh herbs.
ingredients: Spices and black pepper to taste
instructions: Chop the garlic and sauté in a pot with 6 tablespoons of olive oil until golden.
Add chopped parsley, basil, salt, pepper, and spices, and cook on low heat.
In another pot, combine boiling water, salt, and 1 teaspoon of oil, then add the pasta and cook until soft.
Drain the pasta and mix with the sautéed garlic and vegetables.
Serve on a platter, garnished with tomatoes and pickles.

a413289d-5954-4955-81c6-95144c833c3b.name: Spaghetti with Bolognese Sauce
a413289d-5954-4955-81c6-95144c833c3b.description: A delicious Italian-inspired spaghetti topped with savory Bolognese sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté it, then add the ground meat and cook thoroughly.
Chop the carrot, garlic, and hot pepper, then add to the meat mixture.
Season with salt and black pepper, then add tomato paste and a little water for a saucy consistency.
Add dried basil carefully to avoid bitterness and let the sauce simmer.
Boil water with salt in a pot and cook the spaghetti until al dente.
Serve the spaghetti on a plate, top with the sauce, and sprinkle grated cheese on top.

602e1403-b1a3-4284-877e-2ffee5199acb.name: Cheesy Tagliatelle with Broccoli and Ham
602e1403-b1a3-4284-877e-2ffee5199acb.description: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish with tender broccoli and savory ham.
instructions: Wash the broccoli and cut it into small florets, chopping the stems as well.
Chop the ham and grate the cheddar cheese.
Boil the milk in a saucepan, then add the tagliatelle and let it simmer for 5 minutes with the lid off.
Add the broccoli to the milk and cook for 10 minutes until soft.
Stir in the ham, cheddar cheese, and salt until the cheese melts.
Chop the mixture to your desired size or blend it, then serve in a bowl.
Check the temperature and cool if necessary before serving to a child.
Store any leftovers in a sealed container in the fridge and consume within 24 hours.

ad4d6a35-a29b-4a72-a5c5-3a737b98b9c4.name: Pasta with Béchamel Sauce
ad4d6a35-a29b-4a72-a5c5-3a737b98b9c4.description: A creamy and savory pasta dish with a rich béchamel sauce.
instructions: Sauté the chopped onion in oil until golden, then add mushrooms until soft.
Add ground meat and garlic powder, sauté, then add half a cup of water to cook.
After 15 minutes, add canned peas and corn if desired.
Stir in the béchamel sauce and simmer for 5 minutes.
Cook and drain the pasta, mix with the meat mixture, and heat for 15-20 minutes.
Serve immediately, optionally with a looser consistency.

68e6c849-124d-4356-a6d0-019c2bf66dd8.name: Vegetable Pasta with Mint and Curry Sauce
68e6c849-124d-4356-a6d0-019c2bf66dd8.description: A delightful pasta dish with fresh vegetables and aromatic mint sauce.
ingredients: A few drops of lemon juice
Salt, pepper, and saffron to taste
instructions: Sauté onions in oil until golden, add turmeric and bell peppers, cook for 5 minutes.
Add sliced carrots and cook for 10 minutes, then add mushrooms and zucchini with lemon juice.
Add corn, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook for another 10 minutes and remove from heat.
For the sauce, mix cold milk with flour in a small pot, add salt, pepper, and butter, stir until thickened.
Dissolve saffron in water and add to the sauce for color.
For the mint sauce, sauté olive oil and garlic, then add chopped mint until it changes color.
Cook the pasta, drain, and combine with vegetable mixture and mint sauce, sauté for 10 minutes.
Add the prepared pasta sauce, mix well, and serve, optionally garnished with black olives.

6e9ce692-9019-4dc4-abfa-f14de69fdbc5.name: Lasagna
6e9ce692-9019-4dc4-abfa-f14de69fdbc5.description: A delicious layered pasta dish with meat, cheese, and creamy white sauce.
instructions: Sauté ground meat with fried onions and oil until cooked, then add tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
Boil lasagna sheets in salted water, then drain and cool with cold water.
Layer lasagna sheets, meat mixture, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes until cheese is golden.

9e7ffc7c-bfc2-43a1-9bf5-39122e6e1b21.name: Spaghetti with Meat
9e7ffc7c-bfc2-43a1-9bf5-39122e6e1b21.description: A delicious spaghetti dish topped with savory meat sauce and garnished with fresh ingredients.
instructions: Combine ground meat and fried onion in a pot over low heat, stirring until moisture evaporates.
Add water, tomato paste, salt, and pepper; simmer until meat is tender and sauce thickens.
Boil water in a suitable pot, add oil and salt, then cook spaghetti until soft.
Drain spaghetti, return to pot, add butter, and heat until melted and absorbed.
Serve spaghetti on a plate, top with meat sauce, garnish with sliced pickles and parsley.
Pour boiling water over tomatoes, peel, and cut into segments to arrange around the meat.
Serve grated cheese on the side with spaghetti.

998ecaa1-ee3d-488c-ab83-07e15255f3dd.name: Cheese Pasta
998ecaa1-ee3d-488c-ab83-07e15255f3dd.description: A delightful pasta dish with cheese, olives, and a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Sauté the onion in olive oil, then add the garlic until golden.
Add tomatoes and vinegar, sauté for 2 more minutes.
Transfer the mixture to a dish, add olives, thyme, salt, and pepper, and bake for 20 minutes.
Cook the pasta, drain, mix with cheese and the tomato mixture.

f31c417d-6d64-4a79-b05d-db51663824a6.name: Pasta with Broad Bean Sauce
f31c417d-6d64-4a79-b05d-db51663824a6.description: A creamy pasta dish with tender broad beans and savory sausage.
ingredients: 4 slices of chicken or meat sausage
instructions: Cook the broad beans in water, then drain and cool before peeling.
Boil water in a large pot with salt and olive oil, add pasta and cook for 15 minutes.
Chop the sausage and slice the leeks.
Sauté leeks and sausage in olive oil for about 8 minutes until golden.
Add cream and lemon zest, heat for 2 minutes.
Mix in the peeled broad beans with salt and pepper.
Combine the sauce with the pasta and heat briefly if desired.

9198fd82-db90-4eb5-a019-132a131ee20a.name: Pasta with Tomato
9198fd82-db90-4eb5-a019-132a131ee20a.description: A delicious pasta dish with roasted tomatoes and olives, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Sauté onion in olive oil until soft, then add garlic.
After 2 minutes, add tomatoes and vinegar, cooking for another 2 minutes.
Boil pasta in water for 10 minutes, then mix with cheese and add tomato mixture.

f48e55e8-b40c-447c-b290-2c7d124dc7cb.name: Spaghetti with Cheese
f48e55e8-b40c-447c-b290-2c7d124dc7cb.description: Delicious spaghetti tossed with melted butter, cheese, and herbs.
ingredients: 1 cup grated Italian or Dutch cheese
instructions: Boil 8 cups of water in a pot and add 2 tablespoons of salt.
Add spaghetti to boiling water without breaking it, cook for 15-20 minutes.
Melt butter over low heat in a separate pan.
Warm a large bowl and add garlic powder, salt, and pepper to melted butter.
Pour the butter mixture into the bowl and add cheese and thyme.
Drain the cooked spaghetti and mix it with the butter and cheese mixture.

6b534cee-42f8-456c-ad56-fc86f46c5b5d.name: Spaghetti Pie
6b534cee-42f8-456c-ad56-fc86f46c5b5d.description: A delicious layered spaghetti dish with savory meat and cheese.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil, then add spices, bouillon, and meat, stirring well.
Add tomato paste, ketchup, and water; simmer on low heat for 15 minutes, then remove from heat.
Layer half the cheese in a baking dish, followed by half the spaghetti, half the eggs, and half the meat. Repeat layers.
Bake in the oven at 180°C for 35 minutes.

cfb0cfb6-5b3c-4379-ae69-6d93aa98d838.name: Zucchini Lasagna
cfb0cfb6-5b3c-4379-ae69-6d93aa98d838.description: A delicious layered dish with zucchini, cheese, and lasagna sheets.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix cream cheese, pizza cheese, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl.
In another bowl, mix sautéed zucchini, garlic, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
Grease a baking dish.
Boil the lasagna sheets like pasta.
Layer some mixture in the dish, cover with lasagna, and add cheese mixture.
Repeat the layers and top with grated mozzarella.
Cover with foil and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for another 15-20 minutes until golden.
Let it rest for 10 minutes before serving.

5c2e2d24-c377-43f1-a096-201349a891d1.name: Macaroni with White Sauce
5c2e2d24-c377-43f1-a096-201349a891d1.description: A creamy and cheesy macaroni dish baked to perfection.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°C.
Cook the macaroni and drain it.
Sauté the onion in butter for five minutes, then add flour.
Once the raw smell of flour is gone, gradually add milk to avoid lumps.
When the sauce thickens, add one cup of cheddar cheese and season with salt and pepper.
Mix the macaroni with the prepared sauce.
Sauté ground meat with some fried onion and add to the macaroni.
Chop the toast, season with cheddar cheese and a bit of salt, and sprinkle over the macaroni mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes until the cheese is melted and golden.

f65125bd-7a4e-4363-90ac-20b4fa6345fc.name: Pasta with Mushrooms and Basil
f65125bd-7a4e-4363-90ac-20b4fa6345fc.description: A delicious pasta dish with savory mushrooms and fresh basil.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add onion and garlic, and sauté until soft.
Add ground meat and cook until browned, then add mushrooms until soft.
Stir in vinegar and grated tomatoes, simmer uncovered for 10 minutes, then add basil.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in boiling water for 10 minutes until soft, drain, and serve with the sauce.

773d1538-a99d-4d99-bb4f-4c3c8264d287.name: Spaghetti with Mushrooms
773d1538-a99d-4d99-bb4f-4c3c8264d287.description: A delightful spaghetti dish with mushrooms and bell peppers, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Wash and slice the mushrooms, then sauté with onion and turmeric.
Slice the bell peppers, remove seeds, and add to the mixture; sauté again.
Add salt, pepper, cinnamon, and tomato paste, then cook with one cup of water until thick.
In a separate pot, boil water with one tablespoon of oil and salt, then cook the pasta.
After cooking, drain the pasta and rinse with warm water.
Optionally, add cooked ground meat to the sauce and mix well.
Serve the pasta separately with the sauce or layer them in a pot with lavash bread at the bottom.
Finish with oil on top and steam on low heat before serving.

2d1a7139-0942-45c7-b474-bab9279e3c9d.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
2d1a7139-0942-45c7-b474-bab9279e3c9d.description: A rich and savory meat sauce served over pasta, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Grate the cheese, peel and grate the onion, and finely chop the celery.
Peel and chop the tomatoes, then heat butter in a pan and add onion, carrot, and celery to sauté.
Add chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, and ground meat, stirring for 10 minutes until the meat turns brown.
Add broth and grape leaves or parsley, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer on low heat for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cook the pasta as usual.

159b8210-ebef-41cd-85cf-4790d767c584.name: Pasta with Mushrooms and Chicken Ham
159b8210-ebef-41cd-85cf-4790d767c584.description: A delicious pasta dish with mushrooms, chicken ham, and melted cheese.
instructions: Cook the pasta in a pot with water, oil, and salt until slightly tender.
Sauté chopped onions in oil until golden, then add chopped bell pepper and mushrooms.
Once sautéed, add tomato paste and finely chopped chicken ham, stirring well.
One minute before removing from heat, add pizza cheese and cooked peas.
Serve the mixture separately with the cooked pasta or mix together.

8cc637ea-eb0d-48e4-a5ea-c2a439a81ac6.name: Pasta in Tomato and Cheese Sauce
8cc637ea-eb0d-48e4-a5ea-c2a439a81ac6.description: A creamy and flavorful pasta dish with fresh tomatoes and cheese.
instructions: Chop the onion and garlic, then sauté in olive oil.
Add chopped tomatoes, pepper, and salt, then stir in the cheese and simmer.
Cook the pasta until al dente, then drain and let it steam.
Serve the pasta topped with the sauce and garnish with chopped parsley.

ab92bc31-216c-4302-b5c4-0f073ba531b4.name: Vegetable Lasagna
ab92bc31-216c-4302-b5c4-0f073ba531b4.description: A delicious vegetarian lasagna layered with fresh vegetables and creamy sauce.
instructions: Wash the eggplant and cut into 2.5 cm cubes.
Sauté onion and garlic in a pot with some oil, then add eggplant and mushrooms.
Add tomato paste, chopped tomatoes, vegetable broth, ginger, salt, pepper, and herbs; let simmer until thick.
For the sauce, melt butter in a pot, add flour, and sauté slightly.
Gradually add milk and nutmeg, stirring until thickened; add salt.
Cook lasagna sheets in boiling water and place on a clean kitchen towel.
Preheat oven to 200°C; grease a baking dish (about 20x30 cm).
Layer vegetables, lasagna sheets, and white sauce repeatedly.
On the top layer, add white sauce and sprinkle cheese mix; bake for 45 minutes until golden.

c89cdbea-3f92-432c-9f28-f8aa55f205c9.name: Greek Spaghetti
c89cdbea-3f92-432c-9f28-f8aa55f205c9.description: A delicious spaghetti dish with creamy cheese and savory sausage.
instructions: Boil water with a bit of oil and salt, then add spaghetti and cook until soft.
Sauté chopped garlic in remaining oil until golden, then add diced sausage and fry until fully cooked.
Combine cooked spaghetti with the sausage mixture.
Grate cheese and mix with eggs and cream, adding salt and pepper, then pour over spaghetti.
Cook on low heat, occasionally flipping the spaghetti until the eggs set slightly.
Serve in a warm dish.

6c139e7c-26fe-47aa-a857-6834333c2eec.name: Pasta with Raisins and Legumes
6c139e7c-26fe-47aa-a857-6834333c2eec.description: A delightful pasta dish with a blend of spices, raisins, and legumes.
ingredients: 1 piece cinnamon stick or 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and onions, and sauté until soft.
Add spices and cook until fragrant, then mix in chickpeas, tomatoes, raisins, and remaining oil.
Boil pasta in a large pot of water until soft, then drain.
Combine pasta with the chickpea mixture in a bowl and garnish with basil and peanuts.

54642ad1-cdc1-484a-8e44-3d30d3fb02ff.name: Pasta with Sausage and Olives
54642ad1-cdc1-484a-8e44-3d30d3fb02ff.description: A delicious pasta dish with savory sausage, olives, and creamy sauce.
instructions: Boil pasta in a large pot of water for 10 minutes until soft.
Cook sausages in a dry skillet over medium heat, turning until browned, then cut into 1 cm pieces.
Add olive oil to the skillet, then sauté mushrooms and garlic for 2 minutes until mushrooms soften.
Add sausage, olives, lemon juice, lemon zest, parsley, and cream; simmer for about 10 minutes until reduced by a third.
Stir in cooked pasta and heat for 3 minutes, then serve garnished with parsley.

9cd30a80-8007-4c24-8899-027882defdb6.name: Pasta with Mushrooms and Cream Sauce
9cd30a80-8007-4c24-8899-027882defdb6.description: A creamy mushroom pasta dish that's rich and satisfying.
instructions: Sauté the onion in oil until soft, then add garlic and mushrooms with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Mix cream with milk, add to the mushroom mixture, and stir until thickened. Add parsley and butter.
Cook pasta in salted boiling water, drain, and mix with the sauce. Serve garnished with sliced tomatoes.

1dbe41da-1586-4713-97ff-57eac29ba0d9.name: Macaroni Dish
1dbe41da-1586-4713-97ff-57eac29ba0d9.description: A creamy and savory macaroni dish with meat and cheese.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, then add salt and oil.
Add macaroni and stir to prevent sticking; boil for 5-10 minutes until soft.
Drain the macaroni and boil milk separately, adding peas for 3 minutes.
Chop meat and onion, grate cheese, and add chopped parsley.
Heat corn oil in a pot, add meat and onion, and sauté until browned.
Mix drained macaroni with sautéed ingredients and parsley in a dish.
Mix cream and eggs, add milk, salt, and pepper, and pour over macaroni.
Sprinkle cheese on top and add butter in pieces, then bake for 25 minutes.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

cb5c84f3-bb0f-456b-96c2-b6dd0607a295.name: Three Types of Pasta Salad
cb5c84f3-bb0f-456b-96c2-b6dd0607a295.description: Delicious pasta salads perfect as a side or main dish.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, drain, and rinse with cold water.
Cook green beans until tender but still crisp, then drain.
Mix pasta, green beans, bell pepper, and tuna in a bowl.
Combine vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl; pour over salad and mix well.
Cook spiral pasta, then grill or roast eggplant, slice it thinly after cooling.
Combine spiral pasta, eggplant, bell pepper, tomatoes, salami, and basil in a bowl.
Mix olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper; add to salad and toss to combine.
Cook thin pasta, sauté tuna with its oil, then add olives and tomatoes, heating briefly.
Mix vinegar, olive oil, and mustard with salt and pepper; add to salad and serve warm or cold.

866688e1-5b52-4c75-a34c-382b7783e1b7.name: Simple and Quick Pasta
866688e1-5b52-4c75-a34c-382b7783e1b7.description: Delicious and healthy pasta dishes ready in no time for you and your family.
instructions: Boil water with 1 tbsp salt in a large pot. Add pasta and cook until al dente, then drain.
In a pan, sauté onion, tomatoes, and garlic until tomatoes release their juice. Mix with olive oil, vinegar, basil, salt, and pepper, then combine with drained pasta and serve with Parmesan.

d4bd152f-42dc-4118-af17-c19fb8d3b455.name: Zucchini Pasta
d4bd152f-42dc-4118-af17-c19fb8d3b455.description: A creamy and flavorful pasta dish with fresh zucchini and herbs.
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté until soft and water evaporates.
Add some cream and mix to prevent curdling, then stir in garlic powder.
Add chopped zucchini, salt, black pepper, and remaining cream; heat slightly.
Mix in chopped parsley and turn off the heat.
Boil pasta in salted water with a bit of oil, then drain and cool.
Combine cooled pasta with the zucchini mixture and mix well.
Garnish with sliced tomato, bell pepper, corn, and olives before serving.

f06e3475-5ad4-4294-960c-9968660cd8f9.name: Meatballs with Spaghetti
f06e3475-5ad4-4294-960c-9968660cd8f9.description: Delicious meatballs served with a rich tomato sauce and spaghetti.
instructions: Mix ground meat with egg, onion, and tomato sauce; season with salt and pepper.
Shape the mixture into small balls and place them in a greased baking dish.
Bake in a medium oven for about 15 minutes until cooked through.
In a pot, heat grated tomatoes until boiling and slightly thickened; add meatballs and simmer for 2 minutes.
Boil water with salt in a large pot, add spaghetti, and cook until tender.
Drain spaghetti and rinse with cold water; serve with meatball sauce.

a4fc0101-a9c6-458f-ba4f-0304acd60091.name: Macaroni Gratin
a4fc0101-a9c6-458f-ba4f-0304acd60091.description: A creamy and cheesy baked macaroni dish that's irresistibly delicious.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot, adding 2 tablespoons of salt for each macaroni package.
Cook the macaroni until tender, then drain and rinse with warm water to remove excess starch.
Layer grated cheese, macaroni, béchamel sauce, and more cheese in a suitable baking dish.
Top with remaining cheese and melted butter, then bake at 350°F for 30 minutes until golden.

866caecf-ae5d-4353-9bd8-59471d926787.name: Ravioli Dough
866caecf-ae5d-4353-9bd8-59471d926787.description: Delicious homemade ravioli dough, perfect for your favorite fillings.
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, salt, and olive oil, then gradually add flour until a non-sticky dough forms.
Cover the dough and let it rest for 1-2 hours until it rises slightly. Roll out and shape as desired.

ba8c62ac-7819-448e-8c82-6b3b2e4306e7.name: Green Pasta with Meat
ba8c62ac-7819-448e-8c82-6b3b2e4306e7.description: A delicious green pasta dish topped with savory ground meat and cheese.
instructions: Boil water with salt, add green pasta and a bit of oil, cook until tender.
Drain pasta and rinse with warm water to remove excess starch.
Sauté fried onions, add ground meat, and cook until browned.
Mix tomato juice with water, add to meat, season with salt and pepper, and simmer.
Combine cooked pasta with butter, then serve with meat on top and sprinkle with parsley.

7f73a195-f033-4cb6-91ae-a4d49108bdef.name: Pasta with Sausage and Cream
7f73a195-f033-4cb6-91ae-a4d49108bdef.description: A creamy and savory pasta dish with sausage, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot, adding 2 tablespoons of salt per pasta package.
Add pasta and a couple of tablespoons of oil, cooking until tender but not mushy.
Drain pasta and rinse with warm water to remove excess starch and salt.
For pre-prepared spaghetti, cool in cold water after cooking to store for a day or two.
Cut sausage into strips and sauté in butter over heat.
Beat egg yolks and gradually mix into the sausage, adding salt and pepper.
Once the eggs are slightly cooked, remove from heat and mix in cream.
Combine sausage mixture with cooked pasta and serve on a platter.

2c407766-fcf5-4197-bc92-d34bd88dacea.name: First Type Lasagna
2c407766-fcf5-4197-bc92-d34bd88dacea.description: Delicious layers of pasta, meat, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Boil water with salt and oil, then cook lasagna sheets until soft.
Mix fried onions with ground meat, add diluted tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and simmer.
Layer lasagna sheets, meat mixture, tomato sauce, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake at 450°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

94bdb116-05de-458e-a38a-ce744edd7eb3.name: Second Type Lasagna
94bdb116-05de-458e-a38a-ce744edd7eb3.description: A delicious layered lasagna with sausage, mushrooms, and creamy cheese.
instructions: Chop mushrooms and sausage, sauté with caramelized onions, then add beef broth and tomato paste.
Boil until water evaporates, season with salt and pepper, mix in half a cup of mayonnaise.
Boil water with oil and salt, separate lasagna sheets, and cook until soft.
Layer lasagna sheets in a greased rectangular dish with meat mixture and cheese.
Cover with more sheets, pour remaining sauce and cheese on top, and bake at 400°F for 30-45 minutes.

e99896da-e279-4687-9d63-843a767f908e.name: Ravioli
e99896da-e279-4687-9d63-843a767f908e.description: Delicious stuffed pasta filled with seasoned meat and topped with creamy sauce.
instructions: Mix all ingredients and form small meatballs.
Roll out dough into a rectangle, place meatballs on half, cover with other half, and seal.
Cut into squares and boil in salted water until cooked.
Layer ravioli in a dish with white sauce and cheese, bake for 15-20 minutes.
Serve warm, optionally with red sauce or fried without boiling.

d1165223-c591-435e-b80f-e60ab1ef2bf5.name: Cannelloni
d1165223-c591-435e-b80f-e60ab1ef2bf5.description: Delicious stuffed pasta tubes filled with savory beef and topped with cheese.
instructions: Cut the beef into 2x2 cm cubes and mix with fried onions in a pot.
Cook on low heat until the meat's water evaporates, then add 2-3 cups of water and simmer until tender.
Sauté flour in butter, add chopped green pepper, then mix with the meat and add tomato paste and salt.
Allow to simmer until the sauce thickens.
Boil water with salt, separate cannelloni sheets, and cook until slightly tender.
Drain and rinse with cold water, then fill each sheet with the meat mixture and roll them up.
Arrange in a dish, pour the meat sauce over, and sprinkle with grated cheese.

6a2ab012-b003-40b0-8621-cdc29aeb6494.name: Spaghetti with Eggs
6a2ab012-b003-40b0-8621-cdc29aeb6494.description: A delicious layered spaghetti dish topped with eggs and cheese.
instructions: Grease a pot with oil and layer cooked spaghetti, chopped tomatoes, and chopped boiled eggs.
Pour béchamel sauce and grated cheese on top, cook on low heat until golden, then serve.

bfd72343-90c7-4c9c-8c14-cc22c5b53825.name: Spaghetti or Macaroni Tips
bfd72343-90c7-4c9c-8c14-cc22c5b53825.description: Perfectly cooked pasta, soft and non-sticky, ideal for any meal.
instructions: Fill a large pot with water and add 2 tablespoons of salt for each pasta package.
Bring the water to a boil, add the pasta, and a couple of tablespoons of oil.
Cook until the pasta is tender but not mushy, then drain and rinse with warm water.
For pre-preparation, cool the drained pasta in cold water to store for a day or two.
Serve with various sauces and grated cheese, preferably Dutch or Gruyere.

75eb4ea6-b852-4288-95df-079fe53c1b1b.name: Eggplant Lasagna
75eb4ea6-b852-4288-95df-079fe53c1b1b.description: A delicious layered dish with eggplant, mozzarella, and fresh herbs.
ingredients: 100 grams of chopped parsley and basil
Salt and olive oil to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the eggplants.
Finely chop the onion and sauté with tomatoes, basil, and parsley in olive oil.
Add salt and pepper to the mixture and fry with eggplants for five minutes.
Boil the lasagna in water for 10-15 minutes and drain.
Grease a baking tray, layer lasagna, and add the mixture and mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 180 degrees Celsius for thirty minutes.

c460e037-df65-4f75-93df-3628051148d9.name: Cauliflower Pilaf
c460e037-df65-4f75-93df-3628051148d9.description: A flavorful pilaf made with cauliflower and seasoned meat.
instructions: Drain the soaked rice and set aside.
Sauté the ground meat with fried onions, add tomato paste and fried cauliflower, mix well.
Layer the rice in a dish and add the cauliflower mixture in between.

42c9678e-f7e4-4eb0-9cde-1ff02096e177.name: Spinach and Chicken Tahchin with Plums
42c9678e-f7e4-4eb0-9cde-1ff02096e177.description: A delicious layered rice dish with chicken, spinach, and sweet plums.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Soak the rice. Cook the chicken with the onion.
Chop the spinach, cook until water evaporates, then sauté in oil.
Beat the eggs, add salt, black pepper, saffron, and melted butter, then mix in yogurt.
Soak the plums, remove the flesh from the pits, and set aside.
Separate the cooked chicken from the bones and chop into small pieces.
Drain the rice and set aside.
Divide the yogurt-egg mixture into three parts; mix one part with chopped chicken and another with drained rice.
Grease a baking dish, layer the rice mixture, press down, and smooth the surface.
Add spinach, then plums, and cover with some rice.
Place the chicken on top and arrange neatly, then add the remaining rice and press down.
Pour the last part of the yogurt mixture around the edges of the rice.
Cover with foil, make holes in the foil, and bake in a preheated oven at 190°C for 1 to 1.5 hours until the bottom is golden.
Invert onto a serving platter and slice with a sharp knife.

9145780a-b7f2-4400-891c-8c4fda19f587.name: Cabbage Rice
9145780a-b7f2-4400-891c-8c4fda19f587.description: A flavorful rice dish layered with chicken, tomatoes, and fresh cabbage.
instructions: Grease a non-stick pot and arrange the chicken pieces in it, placing the quartered tomatoes in between.
Layer some rice over the chicken, add a bit of saffron, and place the cabbage on top, repeating until all ingredients are used.
Pour the remaining saffron over the rice and let it steam for 45 minutes.
Add some oil to the rice, then invert it onto a serving dish, garnishing with cabbage around the edges.

12f3f8bd-f49d-41b9-a756-a78e1a7c5572.name: Sour Herb Rice with Chicken
12f3f8bd-f49d-41b9-a756-a78e1a7c5572.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender chicken and aromatic herbs.
ingredients: 1 kilogram herb rice (leek, parsley, coriander, dill)
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Soak the rice and chop the herbs, then set aside.
Cook the chicken with onions, celery, salt, and pepper until partially cooked.
Drain the rice and mix in the herbs.
Add sautéed tomato paste and saffron to the partially cooked chicken and set aside.
Layer the drained rice in a pot, place the chicken on top, and sprinkle with sliced raw onions.
Slice the tomato and place it on top, then sprinkle with sour grape juice and add the remaining rice.
Allow to steam until fully cooked.
At the end of cooking, pour hot oil or butter over the rice, serve with the chicken on top.

0b6e7302-972c-48c2-8317-c38c7782a2fe.name: Red Cabbage Rice
0b6e7302-972c-48c2-8317-c38c7782a2fe.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender chicken and vibrant red cabbage.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and saffron to taste
instructions: Soak the rice with some salt, and fry the chicken with oil, onion, and saffron.
Add 3 cups of water and let it cook until the water is absorbed.
Chop the cabbage and fry it with oil until soft, then add lemon juice and sugar.
Combine the cabbage mixture with the chicken and spices, layer it with the drained rice, and add water and oil.
Steam the rice, and garnish with fried cabbage, almonds, pistachios, and saffron.

7f642bd2-e00b-467e-a140-999218dbfce8.name: Special Lentil Rice
7f642bd2-e00b-467e-a140-999218dbfce8.description: A delicious blend of lentils, rice, and spices, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Soak the rice for four hours.
Cook the lentils in advance.
Fry the meat and potatoes.
Layer rice in a pot, then add the mixed ingredients.
After two minutes, add the saffron water.
Steam until cooked and garnish with almond slivers.

6de86d10-b760-4227-8bc3-6434a3ca66cc.name: Greek Rice
6de86d10-b760-4227-8bc3-6434a3ca66cc.description: A flavorful rice dish with chicken, vegetables, and saffron.
ingredients: 1 cup green and red bell peppers
instructions: Slice the onions and fry them in oil.
Sauté the soaked rice with the onions.
Add chicken broth, saffron, salt, and pepper to the rice and cook on low heat.
Once the water is absorbed, cover the rice for an hour.
After steaming, add all ingredients and pour melted butter over the rice.

714ecb08-1a1f-44a8-aae6-ddc83b47cc88.name: Pilaf
714ecb08-1a1f-44a8-aae6-ddc83b47cc88.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender beef and vibrant vegetables.
ingredients: Olive or canola oil as needed
Saffron, salt, spices, and black pepper to taste
instructions: Chop onions finely and sauté in oil.
Julienne the carrots and sauté with onions.
Add chopped beef to the onions and carrots and sauté.
Boil peas in a cup of water and add to the meat mixture.
Grate garlic and add it with two cups of water to the meat and carrots to cook.
Once the meat is cooked, season with salt and pepper.
Drain soaked rice and layer the meat mixture in a pot with the rice.
Add dissolved saffron and pilaf spices to color the rice.
Add some water and oil beside the rice and steam it.
Alternatively, steam the rice separately and mix the meat and carrot mixture when serving.

e8141719-dedb-4f98-8df5-d32e8eb69e56.name: Rice with Meat
e8141719-dedb-4f98-8df5-d32e8eb69e56.description: A flavorful dish of rice and meat, perfect for special occasions.
ingredients: Turmeric, pepper, cinnamon, and salt to taste
instructions: Soak the rice for one hour, then add it to boiling water.
Add the noodles to the boiling rice and cook briefly.
Drain the rice and noodles, then steam them.
Fry the meat with onions, add tomato paste and spices, and cook on low heat.
Once the meat is cooked and the rice is steamed, serve the meat on a platter and top with rice.
Garnish with saffron rice for decoration.

9809d3c1-85bb-431d-9897-24998e381336.name: Bulghur Pilaf
9809d3c1-85bb-431d-9897-24998e381336.description: A delicious and aromatic bulghur pilaf, perfect with pickles.
ingredients: Water, oil, salt, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and toast the bulgur until golden.
Prepare fried onions, add turmeric and salt, then add 4.5 cups of water.
Once boiling, add rice and bulgur, let it cook until water is absorbed.
Steam for 40 minutes, serve with tasty pickles.

4617be73-27ab-4d59-9e50-1c719b021903.name: Cilantro and Spinach Rice
4617be73-27ab-4d59-9e50-1c719b021903.description: A nutritious rice dish with fresh cilantro and spinach, perfect for recovery.
ingredients: 500g spinach and cilantro, cleaned and chopped
instructions: Cook chicken bones, wings, neck, and chopped onion with salt and water until well cooked, then strain the broth.
Combine rice with butter, chicken broth, and chopped greens, cooking until the rice absorbs the broth and becomes tender.

66375340-2536-4f97-97dd-f992e4a1a3e2.name: Shiraz Rice
66375340-2536-4f97-97dd-f992e4a1a3e2.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish with chicken, eggplant, and barberries.
instructions: Chop onions finely and sauté them.
Boil chicken in water, shred it, and remove bones.
Slice peeled eggplants and potatoes, then fry in oil.
Sauté barberries with sugar.
Mix saffron with warm water, place in a covered container in a warm spot for 30 minutes.
Drain rice and mix with egg yolk, yogurt, and some saffron.
Layer the mixture in a pot, starting with rice, then eggplants, chicken, and barberries with sautéed onions.
Top with remaining rice, smooth the surface, and drizzle with remaining saffron and oil.
Cook until the rice is steamed and a crust forms at the bottom.

fe3755b3-06c3-49ed-ac1d-66bc57b6a513.name: Pepper Rice with Eggs
fe3755b3-06c3-49ed-ac1d-66bc57b6a513.description: A colorful and flavorful rice dish topped with eggs.
ingredients: Oil, salt, and red pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pot, add bell peppers and sauté gently.
Add rice, stir, then add 4 cups of water and salt, optionally adding red pepper.
Cook until water is absorbed, then steam the rice.
Fry the eggs or poach them in boiling water, then serve on top of the rice.

6905a199-aec5-4095-b05d-c847382ad42b.name: Dampokhtak
6905a199-aec5-4095-b05d-c847382ad42b.description: A flavorful rice dish with yellow split peas and saffron.
instructions: Wash and soak the rice.
Cook the split peas with salt and water for 10 minutes.
Grate the onion and sauté with turmeric.
Drain the split peas and combine with rice in a pot.
Add the sautéed onion, oil, salt, and butter to the pot.
Once the water boils, add the saffron.
When the water is absorbed, cover and reduce heat to steam for 30-35 minutes.

5ed444e6-914b-43f1-8236-7a08b2d64880.name: Pea Rice
5ed444e6-914b-43f1-8236-7a08b2d64880.description: A flavorful rice dish with peas and aromatic spices.
instructions: Soak the rice in salt water for 45 minutes.
Grate the onions and sauté them with turmeric.
Add grated garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Stir in grated carrot, black pepper, and ground cardamom.
Once aromatic, add the peas and cinnamon, then turn off the heat.
Combine the mixture with the rice and cook until water is absorbed.
Cover with a lid to steam.
Optionally, add cauliflower or cook the rice separately.

377147fb-b1c8-4f16-a5b4-04e56729e3c1.name: Istanbul Rice
377147fb-b1c8-4f16-a5b4-04e56729e3c1.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender lamb and colorful vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Finely chop the lamb and cook it with 2 cups of water until tender.
Remove the meat from the broth and sauté finely chopped onion in butter for 5 minutes.
Add diced bell pepper, potato, cooked lamb, salt, and pepper, and sauté for another 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and rice, then add the broth and 2 cups of hot water.
Once the water is almost absorbed, steam the rice until fully cooked.

39bb65ee-c412-4415-ab75-fe2a2a2cf18b.name: Shushtari Rice
39bb65ee-c412-4415-ab75-fe2a2a2cf18b.description: A fragrant rice dish with chicken, fresh dill, and flavorful spices.
ingredients: Spices, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Soak and drain the rice, then set aside.
Sauté the fried onion with chopped chicken fillet, add saffron, spices, and a glass of water until evaporated.
Stir in chopped dill and cooked black-eyed peas, then layer with the drained rice and steam for 45 minutes.

6bb08aca-f436-44e1-ae1d-81e894f96b5a.name: Green Bean Rice with Chicken Fillet
6bb08aca-f436-44e1-ae1d-81e894f96b5a.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender chicken and green beans.
ingredients: Oil, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Chop the green beans and sauté them with the onion.
Add the chicken fillets and cook with two cups of water until the water evaporates.
Soak the rice beforehand and set aside.
Once the bean and chicken mixture is fully cooked, add saffron and stir over medium heat.
Optionally, add salt and spices, then layer the mixture with the rice and steam.
After 45 minutes, the dish is ready. You can reserve some meat for garnishing the rice platter.

25c445b9-e7f9-480b-82ee-a0484bae919e.name: Ardebil Raisin Rice
25c445b9-e7f9-480b-82ee-a0484bae919e.description: A delightful Persian rice dish with sweet raisins and creamy milk.
instructions: Wash the rice thoroughly.
In a pot, combine the rice, milk, water, salt, and oil, then heat until steam forms.
Before steaming the rice, sprinkle the raisins on top to cook with the steam.
Ensure low heat to prevent burning the milk and rice.

baba5bab-d721-4f21-9ad0-8e6af4026551.name: Rice with Vegetables
baba5bab-d721-4f21-9ad0-8e6af4026551.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender vegetables and saffron.
instructions: Rinse and steam the rice.
In a pot, combine boiled chicken, chicken broth, and vegetables with salt and pepper over low heat.
Add butter and saffron to the mixture.
When serving, layer rice, saffron rice, and then the vegetable mixture, finishing with a sprinkle of saffron rice on top.

eb2b2ae5-cd21-4db2-b78c-d7c015c9c8c1.name: Tahdig Tahchin
eb2b2ae5-cd21-4db2-b78c-d7c015c9c8c1.description: A delicious Persian rice dish with a crispy bottom layer.
ingredients: Saffron, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Rinse the rice and let it cool slightly.
Mix the egg, yogurt, salt, pepper, saffron, and oil in a bowl.
If using a non-stick pot, add oil and then the rice, leveling it with a spoon.
For aluminum pots, heat well, add oil, then pour in the egg-yogurt mixture.
Once the mixture is in the pot, add plain or mixed rice and steam.

93d97068-b186-4404-abd3-7462cc68734c.name: Two-Colored Tahchin
93d97068-b186-4404-abd3-7462cc68734c.description: A delicious layered rice dish with chicken and eggplant, baked to perfection.
instructions: Boil the cleaned chicken with onion, salt, and pepper.
Fry the eggplants and soak the rice like regular pilaf.
Mix eggs, yogurt, and saffron in a separate bowl and add to the cooked rice.
In a baking dish, layer rice, cooked chicken, barberries, walnuts, and fried eggplant.
Drizzle oil on top and bake at 300°F for 30 minutes.
If no oven, cover with foil and cook on low heat.
Once browned, flip onto a tray, add oil, and brown the other side.
Let cool and slice like a cake.

3e52502e-c4a1-43e9-a3b3-091d6dd37809.name: Yarma Pilaf
3e52502e-c4a1-43e9-a3b3-091d6dd37809.description: A nutritious and flavorful wheat bulgur dish with vegetables and ground meat.
instructions: Chop the onion coarsely and fry it in oil until golden.
Add turmeric, ground meat, and tomato paste, then add diced carrots and potatoes.
Reduce heat and cover for 10 minutes to cook slightly.
Add bulgur, water, and salt, then bring to heat.
Once all water has evaporated, let it steam.
This dish is beneficial for diabetic patients and can be made without meat.

69621ee8-4b43-488b-89a5-76e42397343c.name: Spicy Rice
69621ee8-4b43-488b-89a5-76e42397343c.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish with tender chicken and spices.
ingredients: Turmeric, salt, curry, pepper, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: In a pot, sauté the sliced onion in oil.
Add the boneless chicken pieces and sauté briefly.
Add rice and water along with sour grape juice, salt, butter, turmeric, curry, cinnamon, and plenty of pepper. Optionally, add mixed herbs.
Once the water is absorbed by the rice, cover and steam for 40 minutes until ready.

96692389-0776-4687-813a-e1fa2cf731c6.name: Rice with Chickpeas
96692389-0776-4687-813a-e1fa2cf731c6.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender meat and chickpeas, seasoned perfectly.
ingredients: spices (salt, black cumin, black pepper, cinnamon, red pepper, asparagus)
instructions: Sauté onion in oil, then add chopped meat, chickpeas, and spices.
After cooking, add unsalted rice and let it cook, then cover and steam.

89bc370f-384d-45f5-adf1-aea9e61d7e73.name: Mixed Rice
89bc370f-384d-45f5-adf1-aea9e61d7e73.description: A flavorful dish of rice layered with spiced ground meat and crispy potatoes.
ingredients: 1 bowl of yogurt for the bottom layer
Dill, pepper, curry powder, garlic powder, saffron for the bottom layer
instructions: Boil water and sauté chopped onion until golden.
Add ground meat to the onion and cook thoroughly.
Mix in curry powder, pepper, garlic powder, and diluted tomato paste.
Avoid adding salt to prevent bitterness from the tomato paste.
Once mixed and cooked, remove from heat.
Add saffron to yogurt and set aside to infuse.
Add soaked rice to boiling water with salt and pepper.
After 10 minutes, drain the rice.
Grease the bottom of the pot with oil.
Mix yogurt and saffron, adding a few tablespoons of rice to it.
Layer drained rice, meat mixture, and chopped potato in the pot.
Repeat layers until ingredients are used up.
Cook on low heat for 20-30 minutes, ensuring the bottom doesn't burn.

6a2e2e26-2af0-4d20-8d01-dbcd8414ca4a.name: Istanbul Rice
6a2e2e26-2af0-4d20-8d01-dbcd8414ca4a.description: A flavorful Persian rice dish with tender lamb and aromatic spices.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté the sliced onion until golden.
Cut the meat into small pieces, add to the onion, and sauté for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric, tomato paste, and chicken stock; sauté for another 5 minutes.
Pour in the tomato juice and simmer for an hour.
Add saffron, taste, and adjust salt if needed.
Soak the rice in 100°C water for 15 minutes, then drain and add to the mixture.
Ensure the tomato juice covers the rice; add water if necessary.
Peel and chop the potatoes, add to the mixture, and let it boil until the rice is soft.
Once the water evaporates, add butter and stir gently.
Cover the pot and cook on low heat for 45 minutes.

3a758eff-2344-485c-937a-13ef2321ff42.name: Istanbul Rice
3a758eff-2344-485c-937a-13ef2321ff42.description: A flavorful rice dish with minced meat and vegetables, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Finely chop the onions and sauté them.
Add the minced meat to the onions and cook until browned.
Chop the tomatoes and add them to the meat mixture, peeling them if desired.
Stir in a little sautéed tomato paste for color.
Dice the potatoes and fry them, then add to the mixture.
Add the rice and cook it in a pot, ensuring not to overcook.
Soak the rice in salted water for an hour before cooking.
Replace the water and rinse the rice before cooking.
Ensure there's just enough water above the rice for cooking.
Stir the mixture gently while boiling to prevent sticking.
Cook on low heat to avoid burning the bottom.

99e89490-1e7c-42e2-ad74-0a565676f9b9.name: Istanbul Rice
99e89490-1e7c-42e2-ad74-0a565676f9b9.description: A flavorful Persian rice dish with tender meat and rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Rinse the rice with warm water several times.
Blend fresh tomatoes with water and pour over the rice.
Add salt and oil, let the rice soak for an hour.
