Cut the meat into small pieces and mix with fried onions, cook until water evaporates.
Add water to the meat and let it cook, then add tomato paste and salt.
Bring the rice to a boil until water evaporates, adjust with more water if needed.
Create a well in the rice and add the meat mixture, cover with rice.
Seal the pot and cook on low heat or in the oven at 350°F for 30 minutes, then 300°F for 1 hour.

4d746196-213f-4126-a8b6-e05928788556.name: Green Rice
4d746196-213f-4126-a8b6-e05928788556.description: A vibrant and flavorful rice dish with fresh herbs and vegetables.
instructions: In a pot, combine rice and oil, then add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add onion, bell pepper, chili, and tomato. Once broth is absorbed, stir in cumin, salt, pepper, garlic, and cilantro. Steam for 20 minutes.

32fa59ec-0e28-41ac-b410-20436b3b5cd2.name: Chinese Style Vegetable Rice
32fa59ec-0e28-41ac-b410-20436b3b5cd2.description: A delightful rice dish with chicken and colorful vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Soak the rice in water for half an hour.
Chop the vegetables and chicken into strips.
Sauté the sliced onion in a pot with some oil, then add the rest of the vegetables, chicken, and spices.
Cover the pot for 5 minutes to cook the chicken with the vegetables, stirring occasionally.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot, then cover and let it steam for 40 minutes to 1 hour.

a2c36f4f-69fe-448f-b738-232c9505d039.name: Kashkesh Polow
a2c36f4f-69fe-448f-b738-232c9505d039.description: A delicious Persian rice dish with lamb and sweet raisins.
ingredients: 500 grams of lamb shoulder with ribs
Spices (turmeric, black and red pepper, garlic powder, saffron, sumac, and cumin) to taste
instructions: Rinse the rice and drain it.
Prepare fried onions and hot raisins.
Pour some oil in the bottom of the pot, place bread, and add the ribs.
Layer the rice over the ribs.
Place the meat with chopped onions, tomatoes, and spices on top of the rice.
Add the remaining rice and top with hot raisins.
Cook for 3 to 4 hours.

0c1daf91-5cea-4429-964a-eb6dc74ab54c.name: Saffron Chicken Rice
0c1daf91-5cea-4429-964a-eb6dc74ab54c.description: A fragrant saffron-infused rice dish with tender chicken and crispy potatoes.
instructions: Soak the rice in salted water, then drain.
Remove skin and bones from the chicken, cut into small pieces, and mix with other ingredients, curry powder, and saffron solution.
Heat oil in a pot, add the bottom layer mixture, and let it set slightly.
Layer some drained rice over the bottom layer, add the chicken mixture, and sprinkle with curry powder and saffron.
Repeat layering until all ingredients are used, then mix remaining curry powder and saffron with chicken broth and melted butter, and pour over the rice.
Steam the rice on low heat or bake at 350°F for one hour.
Serve the rice with melted butter and fried diced potatoes on top, garnished with the crispy bottom layer.

362bb132-1304-4328-bd84-d7d0e7804652.name: Nisar Polo
362bb132-1304-4328-bd84-d7d0e7804652.description: A fragrant rice dish layered with chicken, nuts, and sweet orange peel.
instructions: Wash and soak the rice.
Sauté marinated chicken fillets in 50g butter.
Drain the rice separately.
Soak pistachio and almond slivers in rose water.
Grease the pot with oil or butter, layer rice, and fill with sweetened orange peel, almond, and pistachio slivers.
Repeat layers until ingredients are finished.
Sprinkle cinnamon and cover to steam.
Use marmalade syrup, saffron, and remaining rose water instead of water.
Once cooked, serve with chicken fillets and garnish with nuts and sweetened orange peel.

b93684a4-020d-4f17-8f43-c99c114650bc.name: Chicken Rice with Vegetables
b93684a4-020d-4f17-8f43-c99c114650bc.description: A flavorful dish of chicken and mixed vegetables over fragrant rice.
instructions: Mix chicken, grated onion, salt, and black pepper; let it marinate for a few hours.
Sauté the marinated chicken in oil, then layer it with rice, bell pepper, mushrooms, peas, and corn, sprinkle with sesame seeds, and top with saffron and oil to steam.

7d71b937-41d8-424a-ace7-371f80a5fddf.name: Green Bean Rice
7d71b937-41d8-424a-ace7-371f80a5fddf.description: A fragrant rice dish layered with green beans, herbs, and tender chicken.
instructions: Rinse the rice and drain it.
In a pot, heat 2 tablespoons of oil, add some rice, then layer with green beans, herbs, and fried onions.
Cover the pot and let the rice steam.
In a pan, sauté the chicken in 3 tablespoons of oil.
Add saffron water, tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and sauté for 10 minutes.
Serve the steamed rice with a drizzle of saffron and top with the prepared chicken.

63a1705b-cb4b-46df-9dea-b9bc3a913cc1.name: Kalleh Pacheh Polow
63a1705b-cb4b-46df-9dea-b9bc3a913cc1.description: A rich and flavorful Persian rice dish with sheep head and dried fruits.
ingredients: 1 sheep head or 4 tongues and 4 feet
instructions: Cook the sheep head and drain the rice.
Sauté dried plums and apricots in butter and set aside.
Sauté garlic in butter, then add saffron, ground angelica, and sheep head broth.
Layer rice in a pot, adding some black curd water, then half the rice.
Add the sautéed fruits, more black curd water, and top with remaining rice.
Place the sheep head on top and steam the dish.

da1f55a2-1859-435e-a75a-163cbe2732e2.name: Shir Polow
da1f55a2-1859-435e-a75a-163cbe2732e2.description: A delightful rice dish cooked with milk, meat, and garnished with nuts.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil and butter in a pot, then add soaked rice and sauté briefly.
Add water, milk, and saffron, cook on high heat, then serve with sautéed meatballs, raisins, and pistachios.

71139268-8e0c-4132-bbfc-e9041dc45c23.name: Sardi Polo
71139268-8e0c-4132-bbfc-e9041dc45c23.description: A delicious rice dish with ground meat, carrots, and raisins.
ingredients: Spices: cinnamon, black cumin, green cumin, pepper, turmeric, and coriander seeds to taste
instructions: Sauté the ground meat in a little oil, then add fried onions, salt, pepper, turmeric, and spices.
In a separate pot, cook shredded carrots with half a cup of water until water evaporates, then sauté with oil and add raisins.
Drain the rice, then layer the meat and carrot mixture decoratively on top or mix it into the rice.

c2bad8ad-8e17-495f-8c6a-5772a9e796bf.name: Tomato Rice
c2bad8ad-8e17-495f-8c6a-5772a9e796bf.description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with tomatoes and spices, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: 2 meat stock cubes or 3 cups beef broth
instructions: Wash the rice with warm water and soak in boiling water for 15 minutes.
Bring water to a boil, add rice, and cook. Sauté tomato paste in 2 tbsp oil, add tomato juice, then mix with the cooking rice along with potato, salt, and oil. Let it steam for 30 minutes.

c62cf6bb-d4ab-400b-8cfc-232541998fc5.name: Chicken Pilaf
c62cf6bb-d4ab-400b-8cfc-232541998fc5.description: A flavorful chicken and rice dish with fresh herbs and spices.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion in oil and butter.
Add chopped chicken breast, followed by chopped tomato, green onion, hot pepper, and colored bell pepper.
Season with salt, pepper, and spices.
Finally, add cooked rice and garnish with chopped basil and lemon.

1785b696-ea13-4098-9a48-524aff70305c.name: Semenani Rice with Lamb
1785b696-ea13-4098-9a48-524aff70305c.description: A traditional Iranian dish featuring tender lamb cooked with fragrant spices and served over rice.
instructions: Chop and fry the onions until golden.
Add the lamb neck to the onions and sauté.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook briefly.
Add dissolved saffron and salt to the mixture.
Pour water into the pot and cook until the meat is tender.
Add cinnamon and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice.

5c344a10-94a0-4f05-869f-3613a0a67990.name: Shirazi Tahchin
5c344a10-94a0-4f05-869f-3613a0a67990.description: A delicious layered rice dish with chicken and saffron.
instructions: Soak the rice, then boil it.
Mix saffron water with yolks, white, and yogurt, adding some saffron.
Slice and fry the eggplants until one side is cooked.
Grease the bottom of a baking dish with oil and layer the uncooked side of eggplants.
Add a layer of rice mixed with yogurt and eggs, then cover with plain rice.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 200°C for 30 minutes, then at 160°C for 15 minutes.

7960de79-bfed-45ad-84d5-e23e511fd272.name: Simple Spinach Tahchin
7960de79-bfed-45ad-84d5-e23e511fd272.description: A delicious layered rice dish with spinach and tender meat.
ingredients: Oil, salt, and saffron to taste
instructions: Drain the rice and mix half with 2 eggs, half the yogurt, and half the saffron.
In a greased baking dish, layer the rice mixture, then top with barberries, pistachio slivers, sautéed sugar, and cooked meat.
Mix the remaining rice with the rest of the yogurt, 2 eggs, saffron, and spinach, and layer it on top.
Press down and bake at 360°F for 2 hours.
Serve with additional barberries and pistachio slivers on top.

de185238-d43d-4f36-b666-777f109768c3.name: Chicken and Eggplant Tahchin
de185238-d43d-4f36-b666-777f109768c3.description: A savory Persian rice dish layered with chicken and fried eggplant.
instructions: Drain the rice and beat the eggs with a fork.
Add yogurt, saffron, oil, and chicken broth to the eggs.
Mix the rice with the egg mixture.
In a mold, layer some of the rice mixture, then add eggplant and chicken.
Top with the remaining rice mixture and cover with foil.
Bake in the oven at 175°C for 1.5 hours, piercing the foil with a fork.

6c55a15d-7a13-4b53-8dee-943e98db1859.name: Saffron Barberry and Walnut Tahchin
6c55a15d-7a13-4b53-8dee-943e98db1859.description: A delicious Persian rice dish layered with barberries and walnuts.
ingredients: Spices, turmeric, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Sauté onion with ground lamb and vegetable oil in a pan.
Add spices, walnuts, barberries, salt, cinnamon, and saffron dissolved in water; cover for 10 minutes.
Mix yogurt, eggs, oil, and saffron in a bowl, then add rice.
Layer rice and meat mixture in a greased mold.
Bake in the oven at 350°F (175°C) for 1 to 1.5 hours, covered with silicone or foil.

2ac75cf1-5f96-4944-843d-1576b50ccbf6.name: Cherry Tahchin
2ac75cf1-5f96-4944-843d-1576b50ccbf6.description: A delicious Persian rice cake layered with cherries and a sweet syrup.
instructions: Rinse the rice and set aside.
Cook sugar with cherries over low heat until they release juice, then increase heat and add butter until thickened.
Mix rice with cherries and some syrup without making it too wet.
Grease plastic wrap and layer the rice mixture, pressing down slightly.
Fold the plastic wrap over the top and cover, then bake at 175°C for 30-40 minutes.
If needed, drizzle 2-3 tablespoons of oil on top before baking.
Remove the cover and plastic wrap before inverting onto a serving dish.

d94bb845-16a3-4fb2-aa60-6a5a1634d81d.name: Mushroom and Chicken Rice
d94bb845-16a3-4fb2-aa60-6a5a1634d81d.description: A flavorful dish of rice with chicken, mushrooms, and colorful peppers.
instructions: Rinse the rice and set aside.
In a pan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil (or butter) and sauté the seasoned chicken fillets until white.
Add crushed garlic, ginger, and curry powder; sauté for 1 minute.
Mix in fried onions and sautéed mushrooms; cook for 1 minute.
Add bell peppers and saffron water; sauté for 3 minutes.
Layer 3/4 of the rice in a pot, add 5 tablespoons of the mixture, then top with the remaining rice.
Once it steams, cover with a lid and let it cook.
Serve the rice on a platter and top with the remaining mixture; drizzle with oil if desired.

6cfe2c01-4c66-46cb-8a3a-c93dac4c38d1.name: Rashti Polo
6cfe2c01-4c66-46cb-8a3a-c93dac4c38d1.description: A fragrant Persian rice dish with noodles and tender lamb, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Cook lamb with one onion and bay leaf in water for 2 hours.
Boil water, add salt, then add soaked rice.
5 minutes before draining, add noodles to rice.
Drain rice and noodles, layer oil and desired base in pot.
Combine rice and noodles, create holes for steam.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and place on rice.
Mix boiling water with oil and pour over rice.
Increase heat to steam, cover, and reduce heat for 1 hour.
Discard onion and bay leaf from meat, sauté remaining onion until golden.
Add turmeric, cut meat into pieces, and sauté with onion.
Season meat with salt and saffron, layer half rice on serving dish.
Add meat, pour some broth over, then top with remaining rice.
Garnish with saffron and serve.

9dbf6aff-99f5-47e2-8e27-955f52b5c615.name: Pea Rice
9dbf6aff-99f5-47e2-8e27-955f52b5c615.description: A flavorful rice dish with peas, potatoes, and a hint of saffron.
instructions: Soak the rice with salt and cold water for a few hours.
Cook the peas with water and salt until semi-cooked, then drain.
Dice the potato, fry it in oil, and set aside.
Slice the onion and sauté it with turmeric until golden.
Puree the tomatoes and add to the pot after the onions are cooked.
Add water, salt, and oil, then mix well and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, add the semi-cooked peas and stir.
Pour the rice into the pot when the water boils again.
Add fried potatoes when the water reduces by half.
Once the water is fully absorbed, sprinkle saffron on top.
Cover and simmer on low heat for 1 hour, then serve.

83ae67a6-a360-4a8c-900c-748b7651ff60.name: Seasonal Vegetable Rice
83ae67a6-a360-4a8c-900c-748b7651ff60.description: A colorful and nutritious rice dish packed with seasonal vegetables.
ingredients: ¾ cup cooked or steamed corn
instructions: Soak rice in water and salt for a few hours.
Heat oil in a pan, add green beans, peas, diced potato, and corn, sauté until vegetables change color.
Add chopped tomato, salt, and spices, stir for 5 minutes.
Pour in 2 cups of boiling water, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
Drain the rice and let it cool slightly.
Separate a ladle of the vegetable mixture and set aside.
In a pot, add oil and layer with rice, spices, and the vegetable mixture, repeating layers.
Cover the last layer with plain rice, sprinkle saffron and spices on top.
Increase heat to steam the rice, add a mix of boiling water and oil, then lower heat and let it steam for 1.5 hours.
Gently mix the rice and serve, topping with the reserved vegetable mixture.

00a98056-1b58-4b68-910d-ad1d06ede64b.name: Rice with Broad Beans and Lamb Shank
00a98056-1b58-4b68-910d-ad1d06ede64b.description: A fragrant Persian rice dish with tender lamb and fresh herbs.
instructions: Soak rice overnight in water with 2 tablespoons of salt.
Cook meat with one onion, bay leaf, and water on high heat until boiling, then simmer for 2 hours.
Boil water in a pot, add salt, and cook broad beans based on freshness.
Drain rice and add it to the pot, cooking it with the broad beans.
Layer rice and broad beans in a pot with oil at the bottom, mixing in dill.
Add saffron water and oil, then steam the rice for 1 to 1.5 hours.
Remove meat from broth, season, and sauté with remaining onion and turmeric until golden.
Add tomato paste, then the meat, and sauté until browned, adding broth as needed.
Once rice is done, mix gently and serve with meat on top.

e0ce4c76-401d-45ef-a519-6b9c4d4b5230.name: Colorful Rice with Cheese
e0ce4c76-401d-45ef-a519-6b9c4d4b5230.description: A vibrant rice dish enriched with Parmesan cheese and aromatic saffron.
instructions: In a large pot, sauté the chopped onion in butter for 5 minutes until soft, without browning.
Add rinsed and soaked rice to the onions, season with salt and pepper, then pour in the broth and saffron.
Cover and simmer on low heat for 25 to 30 minutes until the rice is fully cooked.
Grate the cheese and gently stir it into the rice mixture.

b02de55e-36c4-49b1-94b4-25005933ac12.name: Indonesian Rice and Kebab
b02de55e-36c4-49b1-94b4-25005933ac12.description: A flavorful dish featuring spiced kebabs and aromatic Indonesian rice.
instructions: Mix ground beef with onion, chili, curry, salt, and egg white, then shape into small meatballs.
Fry meatballs in oil for 5 minutes until golden, then drain on a sieve.
For Indonesian rice, mix eggs and soy sauce in a bowl.
Heat peanut oil in a pan, pour in egg mixture, and cook without stirring.
Remove omelet, cut half and shred the other half, set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions, garlic, red and green chilies for 3-4 minutes until soft.
Add chicken and beef fillet, sprinkle with pepper, and cook for 8-10 minutes.
Add shrimp, bean sprouts, and rice, cooking for 5 minutes.
Stir in coriander, shredded omelet, and remaining soy sauce, heating for 1-2 minutes.
Serve rice in the center of a plate, topped with shredded omelet and kebab skewers.

8f7636cf-2736-49c9-8832-2dfeca81fdaf.name: Mexican Rice
8f7636cf-2736-49c9-8832-2dfeca81fdaf.description: A flavorful Mexican rice dish wrapped in tortillas, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Boil the rice briefly in water and drain.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté the onion until golden.
Add ground cloves and oregano, sauté briefly.
Mix in the rice and grated tomato, cook until rice is done and tomato water evaporates.
Cook the chicken, shred it, and mix with rice and cheddar cheese.
Preheat the oven to 160°C.
Wrap tortillas in foil and steam to soften.
Place the rice and chicken mixture in tortillas and fold them.
Place burritos in a baking dish, cover with foil, and keep warm in the oven.
Serve after preparing all burritos.

72035dfd-7d4e-4f7d-a03a-289e2c1aa83b.name: Mexican Chickpea Rice
72035dfd-7d4e-4f7d-a03a-289e2c1aa83b.description: A flavorful rice dish with chickpeas and a spicy tomato sauce.
instructions: Soak the rice in water and salt for a few hours. Blend the tomatoes into a sauce.

Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Cook peas in water. Combine tomato sauce, boiled water, broth cubes, and cooked peas with soaked rice. Add salt, red and black pepper, then cook until water is absorbed. Cover and let it steam for 30 minutes before serving.

f5f43834-f8a4-47bb-b8ef-2c9192a408c2.name: Simple Rice with Cardamom and Cloves
f5f43834-f8a4-47bb-b8ef-2c9192a408c2.description: A fragrant rice dish infused with cardamom and cloves, perfect for a light meal.
instructions: Soak the rice in water with some salt for a few hours; boil the chicken broth in a small pot.
Add cardamom and cloves to the boiling broth for one minute.
Combine soaked rice, 2 cups of water, saffron, spices, and salt in a pot, add some oil, and bring to a boil.
Cover the pot and steam the rice for one hour.

0ebda88b-c82e-4b11-9f23-662576c2c121.name: Shang Polow
0ebda88b-c82e-4b11-9f23-662576c2c121.description: A fragrant rice dish with tender meat and fresh greens.
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it in salted water for a few hours. Clean and chop the Shang finely.
Cut the meat into small cubes and rinse under cold water. Chop the onion into thin slices.
Heat oil in a deep pan, add the onion, and sauté until slightly colored. Add turmeric and cook for 3 more minutes.
Dissolve saffron in a little hot water and add to the onion mixture.
Add the meat and sauté until it changes color. Pour in a cup of boiling water and cover to cook the meat.
Fill a pot halfway with water and bring to a boil. Add the rice and chopped Shang, cooking until the rice is ready to drain.
Drain the rice and Shang mixture. In a pot, add some oil and layer with bread or potato slices for the bottom crust.
Layer the rice mixture on top and cook on low heat. Add melted butter or oil and a little water to steam.
Serve the rice topped with the warm meat mixture.

cbb1fb6c-b27d-49cb-b046-c689660a3f30.name: Pakistani and Indian Baghala Polo
cbb1fb6c-b27d-49cb-b046-c689660a3f30.description: A fragrant rice dish with fresh broad beans and aromatic spices.
instructions: Prepare a pot, add rice and water, and a little salt. Bring to a boil and cook for 10 minutes, then drain.
In another pot, melt one-third of the butter, layer with drained rice, and add a quarter of the broad beans and some dill.
Continue layering rice and remaining ingredients, finishing with rice. Add half a cup of water and cook for 8 minutes.
Melt the remaining butter over the rice, sprinkle with cinnamon, cumin, and red pepper, cover, and simmer for 25-30 minutes.

f2562881-64fd-4d46-9c2a-036ffd5446fa.name: Eyeball Bean Rice with Mini Meatballs
f2562881-64fd-4d46-9c2a-036ffd5446fa.description: A delicious and protein-rich rice dish with flavorful mini meatballs.
instructions: Soak soy for 10 minutes, drain, then boil for 5 minutes and drain again.
Soak and cook the eyeball beans briefly.
Fry 2 onions, add turmeric and cinnamon, then mix in the cooked beans.
Drain soaked rice and layer with the bean and onion mixture while steaming.
Heat saffron and butter, then pour over the rice.
Fry the prepared soy with 1 onion, adding salt, turmeric, black pepper, and lentil flour, then shape into small balls and fry.
Garnish the rice with mini meatballs when serving.

fd900b49-439e-417e-abb5-52b58c7bf0f3.name: Spinach Tahchin
fd900b49-439e-417e-abb5-52b58c7bf0f3.description: A delicious Persian rice dish layered with spinach and ground meat.
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it in salted water for at least 2 hours. Prepare the spinach and onions.
Sauté sliced onions in oil until golden, then add spinach and a pinch of salt.
Grate one onion into the ground meat, season, and cook until browned.
Boil water in a pot, add the soaked rice, and parboil it.
In a large bowl, mix egg yolks, yogurt, and saffron solution, then combine with drained rice.
In a non-stick pan, layer half the rice, then spinach mixture, followed by the ground meat, and top with remaining rice. Cook on medium heat for 2 hours.

02743279-b035-4be5-bfac-eee63fc59a66.name: Tahchin
02743279-b035-4be5-bfac-eee63fc59a66.description: A delicious Iranian rice dish layered with marinated chicken and saffron.
instructions: Cook the chicken with water, salt, and spices until tender.
Remove bones and cut chicken into smaller pieces.
Dissolve saffron in warm water and mix with yogurt, egg yolks, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken in the yogurt mixture for 3-4 hours in the fridge.
Boil soaked rice and drain.
Mix 2 egg yolks, melted oil, and half the yogurt mixture with rice.
Layer the rice mixture in a pot, add chicken, and cover with remaining rice.
Mix chicken broth with saffron and pour over rice.
Press down gently and pour remaining yogurt mixture on top.
Melt additional oil and drizzle over rice, then steam for 1.5 hours.
Invert pot onto a serving dish to serve.

a1398873-fcfc-47b4-b428-e90af7ec16d1.name: Lentil and Carrot Pilaf
a1398873-fcfc-47b4-b428-e90af7ec16d1.description: A hearty and flavorful dish combining lentils, rice, and carrots.
instructions: Wash and soak the rice.
In a pot, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and sauté turmeric, then add fried onions, lentils, and a pinch of salt.
Add diced carrots towards the end of cooking, then mix in tomato paste and rice.
Measure water based on the rice type, add pilaf spice, remaining oil, and steam the rice.
Serve with pickles, salad, or yogurt.

f51a4cad-4821-49ec-a6f9-6a68c32ca1fd.name: Pepper Rice with Chicken
f51a4cad-4821-49ec-a6f9-6a68c32ca1fd.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish cooked with chicken and black pepper.
instructions: Clean and soak the rice for a few hours, then chop the onions.
In a pot, boil the chicken with 4 cups of water, adding salt, turmeric, saffron, and onions.
If chicken smells unpleasant, add 2 peeled carrots while cooking.
Strain the chicken broth into a bowl.
In a suitable pot, add soaked rice without water and replace with strained chicken broth.
Add black pepper, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cover to steam.
Taste the broth and adjust salt if needed before serving with chicken.

60f61dab-330e-429c-a826-c2a35e710acc.name: Herbed Rice with Kebab
60f61dab-330e-429c-a826-c2a35e710acc.description: Delicious kebabs mixed with fresh tarragon, served with fragrant rice.
instructions: Clean and wash the tarragon leaves, then chop and set aside.
Peel and grate the onion.
In a bowl, mix ground meat with grated onion, salt, pepper, turmeric, and then add eggs.
Knead the mixture with your hands, adding yogurt and chopped tarragon.
Heat oil in a large pan, shape the meat mixture into patties, and fry until golden brown on both sides.

d48d1cbb-1a3b-4aea-a2bd-f73691c8a6ba.name: Lentil Rice with Chicken Sauce
d48d1cbb-1a3b-4aea-a2bd-f73691c8a6ba.description: A flavorful dish of lentils and rice topped with savory chicken sauce.
ingredients: salt, pepper, and saffron to taste
instructions: Soak the rice in salt, then boil water and cook the lentils.
Once boiling, add the rice and lentils to the water and let them cook.
Chop the onion for the chicken sauce and finely dice the chicken, sautéing them together.
Chop the bell pepper and add it to the chicken and onion mixture, then combine with the rice and let it steam.
Garnish with almond slivers.

b4b12576-6e71-4ef5-91cb-7849c22e2ca9.name: Spinach Rice
b4b12576-6e71-4ef5-91cb-7849c22e2ca9.description: A delightful blend of rice, spinach, and seasoned meatballs.
instructions: Soak the rice in water and salt after cleaning it.
Cook the cleaned spinach without water until it releases its juices.
Mix ground meat with grated onion, salt, pepper, and turmeric, then shape into small meatballs and fry.
Chop the spinach and sauté with some fried onions.
Add salt, pepper, turmeric, and vinegar to the spinach mixture and let it absorb the flavors.
Drain the rice as usual.
Place hot oil and bread at the bottom of the pot.
Layer rice, spinach, and meatballs, then continue layering until ingredients are used up.
Pour water and oil on top, then steam the rice.

4f74dfad-f4a8-4f91-91b1-98809da212ae.name: Red Bean Pilaf
4f74dfad-f4a8-4f91-91b1-98809da212ae.description: A hearty and flavorful pilaf with red beans and tender meat.
instructions: Soak the beans overnight in water.
Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil for 6 minutes until soft.
Add chopped meat, sausage, thyme, and red pepper; stir for 2 minutes.
Add beans and water, simmer for 1.5 hours until beans are tender.
Serve with rice.

1ad8e3e1-a673-4ee2-af68-fba5965efa28.name: Qabuli Pilaf
1ad8e3e1-a673-4ee2-af68-fba5965efa28.description: A fragrant rice dish with meat, chickpeas, and spices, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: Spices (including cardamom, coriander seeds, cloves, saffron, turmeric, cumin, salt, and pepper) to taste
instructions: Cook the meat, chickpeas, and raw onion together.
Soak the rice with a little salt, crush garlic with turmeric, and sauté.
Add cooked meat, rice, fried onions, chickpeas, and spices, then sauté briefly.
Measure the water for the rice, add oil after boiling, and steam until water is absorbed.
Remove the pits from the dates, sauté them, and serve with bitter oranges.
Sprinkle cumin on top of the rice before serving.

4ac4f9ce-e0e2-408b-8fee-7530b4a77f79.name: Eggplant Rice
4ac4f9ce-e0e2-408b-8fee-7530b4a77f79.description: A delicious rice dish with eggplant, potatoes, and ground meat.
instructions: Soak the rice in water and salt for two hours.
Chop the onions and sauté until golden, then add turmeric and ground meat to fry.
Chop the potatoes and eggplants, and sauté them separately.
Wash the rice and place it in a suitable pot.
Chop or grate the tomatoes and bell peppers, and add all ingredients to the rice.
Season with salt and pepper, then add enough water to cover all ingredients.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally to prevent settling.
Once the water is reduced, lower the heat and cover to steam the rice.

b00d7462-b897-4aad-b4e9-611e90a652ad.name: Indian Spinach Rice
b00d7462-b897-4aad-b4e9-611e90a652ad.description: A fragrant and colorful rice dish with spinach and spices.
ingredients: 50 grams or half a cup raw cashews
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a medium pot, heat oil and butter, add chopped onion and sauté until soft.
Add garlic and tomatoes, cook for another 3 minutes.
Drain soaked rice and add to the pot with coriander and cumin powder, heat for 1 minute.
Add carrots, water, salt, and pepper, cover, and cook for 1 hour.
After an hour, add spinach and cashews, cover, and cook for another 30 minutes.
Mix the ingredients before serving and transfer to a serving dish.

9ff04b6c-d2b4-4ac3-b0ca-bf54cfd97cdf.name: Rice with Black-eyed Peas
9ff04b6c-d2b4-4ac3-b0ca-bf54cfd97cdf.description: A flavorful rice dish layered with tender meat and sweet dates.
ingredients: 500 grams of meat (cut into small pieces)
instructions: Soak the rice in water and salt for a few hours. Boil water in a pot, add rice until slightly soft, then add noodles.
In another pot, boil water and add black-eyed peas. Cook until tender but not mushy, then drain.
In a large pot, add oil and layer with bread or potato slices. Add the rice and noodle mixture, then layer with black-eyed peas. Repeat until ingredients are finished and steam the rice.
Meanwhile, wash the meat and drain. Chop the onion and sauté in oil, then add the meat and cook.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and add to the meat mixture. Cook until the meat is done. Sauté dates and raisins in a small pan with oil.
Once the rice is ready, serve it on a platter and top with the meat, dates, and raisins.

d387c843-1667-4bb7-b744-403c7fd20dcd.name: Carrot Rice
d387c843-1667-4bb7-b744-403c7fd20dcd.description: A delightful rice dish with sweet carrots and aromatic spices.
instructions: Soak the cleaned rice in salted water. Peel and julienne the carrots.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté the carrots, then add dissolved sugar in hot water and saffron, simmer briefly.
Grate the onion into the ground meat, add salt and cinnamon, form into small meatballs, and fry.
Boil water, add soaked rice, drain, and layer in a pot with water and oil, alternating with carrot mixture. Cook rice until done, then garnish with fried pistachios.

35af6176-404a-4e48-a1b4-11277354c88a.name: Meat and Eggplant Tahchin
35af6176-404a-4e48-a1b4-11277354c88a.description: A delicious layered rice dish with spiced meat and fried eggplant.
instructions: Wash and peel the eggplants, then slice them and sprinkle with salt.
Fry the eggplants in oil until golden on both sides, then transfer to another dish.
Fry the sliced onion in a separate pan until golden, then add turmeric and sauté briefly.
Add ground meat, salt, and pepper to the onion mixture and cook until browned.
In a separate pot, boil water with salt, then add soaked rice and cook for a few minutes.
Drain the rice and set aside. In a large bowl, mix egg yolks, saffron, and yogurt.
Add the drained rice to the mixture and combine well.
In a non-stick pan, add some oil and half of the rice mixture.
Layer the fried eggplants on top, followed by the cooked ground meat.
Top with the remaining rice and smooth the surface.
Create holes in the rice with a spoon handle, pour melted butter on top, cover, and cook on medium heat.
After about 15 minutes, place a lid on the pan and let it steam completely.

78249a43-fb0f-48ec-bd58-af6d6373dd20.name: Wild Garlic Rice
78249a43-fb0f-48ec-bd58-af6d6373dd20.description: A fragrant rice dish with wild garlic, perfect for a flavorful meal.
instructions: Cook the rice like regular steamed rice.
Clean and chop the wild garlic, then mix it with the rice when it's partially cooked.
Steam the mixture like plain rice, adding melted butter when serving.
If no crispy bottom is desired, cook for one hour; if a crispy bottom is desired, cook for one and a half hours.
Remove the pot from the heat half an hour before serving to help the crispy bottom detach easily.
If cooking on the stove, keep the heat low and add some fire on top of the lid for better results.
For an enhanced crispy bottom, mix half a glass of yogurt, some dissolved saffron, 70g oil, half a glass of boiling water, and two egg yolks, and pour it at the bottom of the pot.

b919ed82-916f-4ec0-958b-b76107775de3.name: Cabbage Rice
b919ed82-916f-4ec0-958b-b76107775de3.description: A delicious Persian dish combining rice, ground meat, and sautéed cabbage.
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion, salt, and pepper to form small meatballs.
Fry meatballs in hot oil and set aside.
Chop cabbage and sauté in oil, then mix with meatballs.
Add water, saffron, salt, and pepper; simmer until water reduces by half.
Drain rice and layer one-third in a pot with oil and water for the base.
Add half of the cabbage and meat mixture, then cover with remaining rice.
Top with the rest of the cabbage and meat, then cover with remaining rice.
Steam the rice until cooked.

9e9a070d-746d-4523-8bd9-522c3d0b9e60.name: Shirazi Rice
9e9a070d-746d-4523-8bd9-522c3d0b9e60.description: A fragrant rice dish layered with chicken, nuts, and barberry.
instructions: Prepare the rice like tahchin. Mix two-thirds of the rice with yogurt, oil, saffron, and egg yolks.
Layer the mixture in a greased dish, add fried eggplant, sprinkle with almond, pistachio, and barberry, place chicken, and top with remaining plain rice.
Pour remaining mixture around the rice, cover with foil, and bake at 350°F for 1 to 1.5 hours until golden.
Invert onto a serving platter and garnish with almond, pistachio, and barberry.

1fd582f1-273c-4a5c-b933-0f55a4ae978a.name: Indian Spinach Rice
1fd582f1-273c-4a5c-b933-0f55a4ae978a.description: A fragrant and colorful rice dish with spinach and spices.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil and butter in a medium pot, add chopped onion and sauté for 6-7 minutes until soft. Add garlic and tomatoes, cook for another 3 minutes.
Rinse soaked rice and add to the pot along with coriander and cumin powders. Heat for 1 minute, then add grated carrots and water, seasoning with salt and pepper. Cover and cook for 1 hour.
After an hour, add spinach leaves and cashews on top of the rice, cover, and cook for another 30 minutes.
Mix the ingredients before serving and transfer to a serving dish.

2d5f7a92-0fd4-4d5a-a903-d08d5b9ce3c3.name: Chicken Tahchin in a Pan
2d5f7a92-0fd4-4d5a-a903-d08d5b9ce3c3.description: A delicious Persian rice cake layered with tender chicken and spices.
ingredients: Cinnamon, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the chicken breast with the onion and reserve 2 cups of chicken broth, then shred the chicken.
In a bowl, mix the eggs, yogurt, chicken broth, cinnamon, salt, and pepper.
Melt the butter and oil in a pan, then mix in the rice and pour it into the pan.
Wait for 4 to 5 minutes until it sets, then add the remaining rice.
Allow some water to evaporate, then press the shredded chicken into the rice, cover, and steam for 1.5 hours.

c171c171-cf5f-471f-bf16-3291fcb4b307.name: Stewed Dried Yellow Broad Beans
c171c171-cf5f-471f-bf16-3291fcb4b307.description: A hearty dish of stewed broad beans and rice, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Wash and clean the broad beans, then place them in a pot with water, pepper, and tomato paste.
Once the beans are partially cooked, add salt, washed rice, fried onions, and oil, then mix well.
Cover the pot to steam the rice until fully cooked.
For meatballs, mix ground meat with grated onion, salt, pepper, turmeric, rice flour, and an egg; shape into balls.
Fry the meatballs in oil, then add them to a pot with sautéed onions and diluted tomato paste.
Once boiling, cook until the water reduces to two tablespoons per serving, then turn off the heat.

7a7376c0-9d43-4676-9654-7c0a35b0c03a.name: Wedding Night Dish
7a7376c0-9d43-4676-9654-7c0a35b0c03a.description: A rich and fragrant rice dish perfect for celebrations.
instructions: Heat butter and sauté shredded carrots for 5 minutes.
Add saffron and sauté for another minute, then add water and simmer for 15 minutes.
Boil orange peel in water for 10 minutes, repeating 3-4 times with fresh water each time.
Add sweetened orange peel, pistachio, and almond slices to carrots and sauté for 2 minutes.
Mix in saffron and sauté for another minute.
Melt butter in another pan and sauté chicken breast with salt and saffron.
Drain soaked rice and place in a pot, cover with a lid, and cook for 30 minutes.
Layer rice and sweet mixture in the main dish, sprinkling sugar between layers.
Place chicken pieces on top of the rice and decorate with the mixture.

b37ede6d-e344-4cae-92db-89cbcd973639.name: Morasa Polow
b37ede6d-e344-4cae-92db-89cbcd973639.description: A fragrant saffron rice dish layered with chicken, nuts, and dried fruits.
instructions: Cook the chicken with onions and salt.
Shred the chicken and set aside.
Rinse the rice and drain.
In a pot, add some water and oil, then layer half the rice and some chicken.
Add the remaining rice and top with almond and orange peel, then steam.
Fry barberries and raisins with a bit of sugar in oil.
Soak almond slices in water and drain.
Boil orange peel twice, changing the water to reduce bitterness, then cook with sugar and water.
Reduce chicken broth until thick.
Mix saffron with a few scoops of rice before serving.
Combine fried nuts and dried fruits with saffron rice.
Serve rice topped with chicken and garnish with remaining fried nuts and fruits.
Pour thickened chicken broth over the rice and drizzle with melted butter.

fdc5d131-41ad-4759-8bb9-89c1d6c95afc.name: Herb Rice (Sabzi Polo)
fdc5d131-41ad-4759-8bb9-89c1d6c95afc.description: A fragrant rice dish mixed with fresh herbs and tender meat.
ingredients: 1.5 to 2 kg fresh herbs (leek, parsley, dill, coriander, a bit of fenugreek)
instructions: Soak the rice beforehand and wash the herbs thoroughly.
Cook the meat separately, ensuring it retains some broth.
Chop the herbs and drain the rice slightly undercooked.
In a pot, add 2-3 tablespoons of melted oil and half a cup of water for the base.
Layer the rice gradually in the pot, sprinkling the chopped herbs in between.
Place the meat among the rice layers.
Mix 3-4 tablespoons of melted oil with the broth and pour over the rice.
Cook the rice in the oven or on the stove until done.
When serving, mix the saffron dissolved in hot water with a bit of rice and pour over the dish.
Optionally, add a bunch of cleaned fresh garlic while steaming.

7da3f527-2b85-4e2e-8cd0-9cd271ef0063.name: Green Bean Rice
7da3f527-2b85-4e2e-8cd0-9cd271ef0063.description: A delicious layered rice dish with tender lamb and fresh green beans.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot, add meat, onion, and spices, and sauté.
Add half a cup of water, tomato paste, and green beans, and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Cook rice separately, then layer rice and meat mixture in the pot, adding a bit of water and oil.
Cover and let it steam. Finally, drizzle with a quarter cup of melted butter before serving.

c7d70660-f33a-473b-a006-a75378df315a.name: Lentil Rice
c7d70660-f33a-473b-a006-a75378df315a.description: A flavorful rice dish with lentils, meat, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Soak the rice. Cut the meat into pieces and cook with chopped onions and water until tender.
Add salt towards the end of cooking. Remove meat, add saffron and oil to the broth.
Prepare the raisins and dates. Boil water in a pot, add salt, and cook the rice until slightly soft.
Cook lentils separately. Drain the rice, grease the bottom of the pot, and layer with bread.
Add rice, sprinkle lentils, and place meat, dates, and raisins in layers. Steam the rice.
Once the steam is ready, pour saffron broth and some oil over the rice and let it cook.

d0dab295-ff82-4c46-bc33-e19e280d93f6.name: Sugar Rice
d0dab295-ff82-4c46-bc33-e19e280d93f6.description: A sweet and fragrant rice dish, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Mix sugar with water and boil until dissolved, then add saffron and set aside.
Boil water in a pot, rinse soaked rice, and add to boiling water with turmeric and salt. Boil for a few minutes.
Drain rice and rinse with cold water to stop cooking.
Heat oil in a pot, add rice, cover, and steam on low heat for 20-30 minutes.
Gradually mix the sugar water with the rice in a colander.
Return the rice to the pot, sprinkle remaining sugar water, cover, and steam for 45 minutes.
For garnish, sweeten tangerine peel and sauté with a bit of oil and sugar, then add pistachios.

e8d80bcf-90b4-4fb9-81df-e57bb02fffaf.name: Tahchin with Chicken or Lamb
e8d80bcf-90b4-4fb9-81df-e57bb02fffaf.description: A delicious layered rice dish with marinated meat and saffron.
instructions: Cook the meat until it retains some broth, then remove bones.
Mix yogurt with saffron, salt, pepper, and egg yolks, then marinate the meat.
Sauté barberries in butter, add lemon juice, sugar, and saffron, then simmer.
Drain the rice and layer egg yolks, oil, and yogurt mixture in a pot.
Add layers of rice, meat, and barberries, pressing gently.
Combine broth with saffron and oil, pour over rice, cover, and cook for 1.5 to 2 hours.

490dadd2-1001-461a-87e2-3669782b732e.name: Rice (Polow or Chelo)
490dadd2-1001-461a-87e2-3669782b732e.description: A fragrant and fluffy Persian rice dish, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Boil water in a suitable pot and add soaked rice with salt.
Once the rice is slightly soft, drain and rinse with warm water, then cook with oil and water until fluffy.

727f5bfd-8c7e-48aa-8537-b868c6482f42.name: Sooti Polo
727f5bfd-8c7e-48aa-8537-b868c6482f42.description: A creamy rice dish infused with saffron, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Wash the rice thoroughly, then add milk, water, saffron, salt, and butter.
Bring to a boil, partially cover, and stir occasionally to prevent sticking. Once absorbed, reduce heat to steam.

c3b32636-2f42-4f47-af71-565c48acd06b.name: Lentil Rice with Mushrooms
c3b32636-2f42-4f47-af71-565c48acd06b.description: A hearty dish of lentils, rice, and mushrooms, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it with salt.
Soak the lentils for 2-3 hours and cook with 3 cups of water until the water is absorbed.
Sauté the ground meat with oil and fried onions.
Slice the mushrooms and add them to the meat with tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
Add one cup of water to the meat and let it cook.
Mix the cooked lentils with the meat and mushrooms.
After cooking the rice, layer it with the lentil mixture.
Drizzle some oil on the rice and let it steam.

009c0dfc-d240-45b8-b8f2-e370801c3b52.name: Barberry Rice with Chicken
009c0dfc-d240-45b8-b8f2-e370801c3b52.description: A fragrant rice dish topped with tender chicken and tangy barberries.
instructions: Soak the rice.
Wash the chicken and boil with chopped onions, garlic, water, and salt until cooked.
Let the chicken cool, then remove bones and cut into pieces.
Strain the chicken broth, dissolve saffron in hot water, and mix half with the broth.
Wash the barberries and drain them.
Heat oil in a pan and lightly fry the barberries, then add sugar and stir until dissolved.
Gradually add rice to a pot, layering with chicken pieces, and cover.
Once steam forms, pour the chicken broth over the rice and let it steam.
When serving, mix a few scoops of rice with remaining saffron and half the barberries.
Melt oil and drizzle over the rice before serving.

4d389c23-2874-4e21-a7ba-54d0366565b8.name: Shiraz Cabbage Rice
4d389c23-2874-4e21-a7ba-54d0366565b8.description: A delightful blend of rice, cabbage, and spiced meatballs, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Soak the rice, then cook slightly before adding the herbs and draining like herb rice.
Mix the ground meat with grated onion, form small balls, coat in flour, and lightly fry.
In a pan, sauté chopped onion until translucent, then add cabbage and cook for 10-12 minutes.
Add salt, pepper, turmeric, and pilaf spice, stir well.
Pour some oil in the pot, layer rice, cabbage mixture, and meatballs, repeating until ingredients are used.
Place the pot on heat to steam the rice, cover with a cloth to let it cook.

671cb1d7-bd20-48b8-ade1-e5f1b42a7063.name: Fried Chicken Pilaf
671cb1d7-bd20-48b8-ade1-e5f1b42a7063.description: A flavorful rice dish with tender chicken, vegetables, and spices.
instructions: Wash the rice and boil with 4 cups of water and salt until water evaporates.
In a large pan, heat remaining oil, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger for 2 minutes.
Add diced chicken with salt, cook for 5 minutes until done.
Stir in cooled rice, cook for 3 minutes, then add bell pepper, corn, and curry powder.
Mix well, then pour beaten eggs over rice, stir for 1-2 minutes, and serve.

c36dd6c5-b7b6-4aee-b588-f46afb7c57cb.name: Shrimp Rice
c36dd6c5-b7b6-4aee-b588-f46afb7c57cb.description: A flavorful rice dish with shrimp and aromatic herbs.
ingredients: half a cup diced bell pepper
salt, pepper, lemon juice to taste
instructions: Soak the rice in water and salt for a few hours.
Boil water and salt in a pot, add the soaked rice, and cook until done.
In another pot, boil water with salt and vinegar, add shrimp until pink, then drain.
Sauté diced onion in oil until golden, add grated garlic and turmeric, then shrimp.
Mix in blended tomatoes, cook until thickened, then add zucchini, bell pepper, dill, and parsley.
Add half the saffron, simmer until cooked, season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Serve rice topped with shrimp sauce and garnish with shrimp.

dc842c0c-715c-48d0-850a-0009df70fa2c.name: Cherry Rice
dc842c0c-715c-48d0-850a-0009df70fa2c.description: A delightful rice dish with cherries and chicken, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Wash the cherries and remove the pits, then mix with sugar and let sit for 2-3 hours.
Cook and chop the chicken with onions, soak and drain the rice, then set aside some grains.
In a pot, layer oil, half the rice, the chicken, the cherries, and the remaining rice with saffron.
Drizzle oil on top and let the rice steam for half an hour.

ef9262e0-fcdf-4947-ad39-e1a2be6492cf.name: Herb Rice with Fish
ef9262e0-fcdf-4947-ad39-e1a2be6492cf.description: A delicious Persian dish featuring fragrant herb rice paired with crispy fish.
instructions: Soak rice in salted water for at least 24 hours, then boil and drain.
Prepare herb mixture by cleaning and chopping herbs, then layer with rice and garlic in a pot.
Cook on low heat for about an hour with a lid on.
For the fish, clean and cut it, then fry until golden brown.
Serve the herb rice topped with saffron rice, alongside the fish and lemon.

39ff80fe-259c-4967-91b6-33b2cbb906d9.name: Broad Bean Rice
39ff80fe-259c-4967-91b6-33b2cbb906d9.description: A fragrant rice dish with broad beans and herbs, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Soak the rice and shell the broad beans.
Cut and wash the meat, then cook with water and chopped onion until tender.
Clean, wash, and finely chop the dill.
Boil water in a pot, add salt, and drain the rice before adding it to the pot with broad beans.
Once the beans are slightly cooked and the rice is soft, add the dill and drain the rice.
Add warm water, taste for salt, then layer half the rice in the pot.
Place the meat on top, cover with the remaining rice, and shape into a cone.
Mix melted butter with meat broth and pour over the rice once it steams.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and add to one side of the pot, then steam the rice.

f9f8e78f-03f1-4c9c-84c5-6e80800147fc.name: Kateh
f9f8e78f-03f1-4c9c-84c5-6e80800147fc.description: A simple and delicious Persian rice dish, perfect with kebabs.
instructions: Wash the rice and drain the water.
In a pot, combine rice, 5 cups of water, 4 tablespoons of oil, and 2 tablespoons of salt. Stir and bring to a boil.
Once the water is gone, reduce heat and let it cook for 30 minutes.

69e11e73-5ea0-4f7b-b2cb-e9451d3111a4.name: Thai Style Rice with Shrimp
69e11e73-5ea0-4f7b-b2cb-e9451d3111a4.description: A flavorful Thai-inspired rice dish with shrimp and tomatoes.
instructions: Soak the rice and cook it according to simple rice instructions.
Sauté grated garlic with fried onion, mix in oil, and add beaten eggs.
Cook the mixture on low heat with a lid until set.
Boil cleaned shrimp and mix it into the egg mixture.
Dissolve tomato paste in water with salt and pepper, then mix into the egg mixture.
Layer this mixture over the drained rice and steam for one hour.
Pour boiling water over tomatoes, peel, and chop them.
Heat oil and lightly fry the tomatoes with salt and pepper.
Serve the rice on a platter, placing the shrimp and egg mixture in the center, topped with fried tomatoes.

81137e44-efc9-4289-9174-8833fc82601e.name: Lentil and Cabbage Stew
81137e44-efc9-4289-9174-8833fc82601e.description: A hearty stew with lentils, cabbage, and tender meat, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Remove the cabbage leaves and cut them into wedges.
In a pot, combine meat, lentils, cabbage, chopped onion, turmeric, salt, and pepper.
Add water and cook over heat until tender.
Before fully cooked, puncture dried limes and add to the pot.
Once cooked, reserve the broth and press the limes over the stew.
Mash the remaining ingredients and serve with rice.

1212328a-f5bc-4512-a4ea-22668f2958a2.name: Sweet Rice with Lentils and Raisins
1212328a-f5bc-4512-a4ea-22668f2958a2.description: A delightful sweet rice dish with lentils and raisins, perfect for celebrations.
instructions: Boil orange peel in water for 5 minutes to remove bitterness, then drain and boil again for 10 minutes.
Cook carrot sticks with sugar and orange peel until partially cooked, then add almond and pistachio slivers.
Sauté raisins for 1 minute and combine with lentils that have been boiled for 15 minutes.
Layer rice and the prepared mixture in a pot, adding spices, and steam until cooked.
Once cooked, pour saffron and hot oil over the rice. Optionally, mix in lentils and raisins.

a21c34ee-301b-414e-9163-85f689ae243b.name: Rice Pudding
a21c34ee-301b-414e-9163-85f689ae243b.description: A creamy and sweet rice pudding, perfect for dessert lovers.
instructions: Mix milk and vanilla with grape syrup, then add soaked rice and cook until rice is fully cooked.
Add butter and grated nutmeg, transfer to a baking dish, and bake at 175°C for one hour until golden brown.

da9c8bb4-5e29-4c3e-8f3b-29aba1564396.name: Poulomigo
da9c8bb4-5e29-4c3e-8f3b-29aba1564396.description: A flavorful shrimp and rice dish with aromatic herbs and spices.
instructions: Sauté cleaned shrimp with one chopped onion until the shrimp's water evaporates.
Add cinnamon to the shrimp and set aside.
Sauté another chopped onion with mixed herbs until fragrant.
Add minced garlic, pepper, turmeric, spice mix, and sautéed shrimp, mixing well with salt.
Layer rinsed rice and herb-shrimp mixture in a pot, alternating layers.
Cover and let it steam for 30 to 45 minutes.

7adf8804-1f78-46c2-bc98-d2c542919e6a.name: Saffron Sweet Rice
7adf8804-1f78-46c2-bc98-d2c542919e6a.description: A delightful sweet rice dish infused with saffron and spices.
instructions: Soak the rice in water for one hour before cooking.
In a pot, cook the rice with milk, sugar, saffron, cloves, cardamom, and raisins.
Once the rice is cooked, mix in the melted butter and transfer to a bowl.
Decorate the top with pistachio powder.

23841b65-2b73-4a8e-9d92-1bf238efd410.name: Rice with Mixed Vegetables
23841b65-2b73-4a8e-9d92-1bf238efd410.description: A delicious rice dish packed with flavorful vegetables and melted cheese.
instructions: Cook and drain the rice. Peel the eggplant and salt it to remove bitterness.
Grate the Gouda cheese and mix it with 15 tablespoons of butter and the rice.
In a greased baking dish, layer the rice and place it in the oven at 100°F.
Chop the onions, wash the eggplants, and finely chop the bell peppers and peeled tomatoes.
Sauté the onions in the remaining butter until golden, then add the other vegetables.
Add the remaining grated Gouda, chopped mozzarella, dried herbs, salt, and pepper.
Cover and cook for about 15 minutes, then add garlic powder.
Invert the rice onto a heatproof dish and decorate with the vegetables.
Bake for about 5 minutes at 400°F until the cheese melts.

6872ad46-b7c0-4adf-ba3b-dc64a2457ee8.name: Chinese Rice
6872ad46-b7c0-4adf-ba3b-dc64a2457ee8.description: A delicious and colorful rice dish with vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Soak the rice and then drain it. Once cooked, set aside.
Cube the cottage cheese and marinate it with soy sauce.
Sauté diced onions, carrots, and bell pepper.
Add cooked peas, cottage cheese, cashews, and sautéed mushrooms.
Mix all ingredients with the cooked rice.
Grease a mold and transfer the mixture, then serve warm.

fc0b251f-1248-4d3f-a25f-d42148f8e52a.name: Mixed Barberry Rice
fc0b251f-1248-4d3f-a25f-d42148f8e52a.description: A fragrant rice dish with tender chicken and tangy barberries.
ingredients: Saffron, salt, and oil to taste
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it with a bit of saffron and salt.
Clean and wash the chicken, then cook it with salt, onion, and saffron, removing the bones afterward.
Cook the soaked rice in the same water with some oil, adding saffron for color.
Once the water is absorbed, place the boneless chicken in the center and cover it with rice, then steam.
Use a non-stick pot for cooking the rice.
Sauté the cleaned barberries in a bit of oil or butter to taste.
After steaming, invert the rice onto a round dish, ensuring the crispy bottom is intact.
Cut the crispy layer into four and fill the cuts with barberries before serving.

873afe76-21fd-4f2a-895c-9db1b93c33de.name: Rice Balls
873afe76-21fd-4f2a-895c-9db1b93c33de.description: Delicious rice balls filled with cheese, perfect for a savory snack.
instructions: Mix cooked rice and chopped herbs with 2 eggs, saffron, salt, and pepper.
Form small balls, make a hole, fill with cheese, and reshape.
Roll the balls in the remaining egg, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry in oil.

5dc067d2-be8f-4473-bd51-400344070a6e.name: Simple Chelo
5dc067d2-be8f-4473-bd51-400344070a6e.description: A fluffy Persian rice dish, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: ½ cup yogurt for the crust
instructions: Boil water in a suitable pot.
Add a small piece of alum or yogurt to whiten the rice.
Remove salt from the rice, then add it to boiling water.
Stir gently and let it boil until slightly soft.
Skim off foam while boiling and add oil for transparency.
Drain the rice and rinse with warm water.
Add oil and water for the crust in the pot, then add the rice.
Shape the rice into a cone and cover with a lid.
Reduce heat to let it steam, adding hot oil and water on top.
If using an oven, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, then reduce to 300°F for another 30 minutes.
Let it cool for 30 minutes before serving to easily remove the crust.

b3fd2a3b-db55-4edb-96ee-0531c026560b.name: Mash Polo
b3fd2a3b-db55-4edb-96ee-0531c026560b.description: A flavorful Persian rice dish with mung beans and tender meat.
instructions: Soak the rice.
Cut the meat into small pieces.
Sauté sliced onions in 100 grams of oil until golden.
Add the meat to the onions, cover, and cook until the meat is browned.
Pour in 2 cups of water and simmer until the meat is tender.
Toast the mung beans in a pan and crush them slightly to remove the skins.
Add the mung bean pulp to the meat mixture and simmer without mashing the beans.
Dissolve tomato paste in a little water and add to the mixture.
Season with spices, salt, and pepper, and reduce the liquid to about half a cup.
Drain the rice and mix half of the remaining oil with half a cup of water in a suitable pot.
Bring to a boil, gradually add the rice, and layer the meat mixture with lime powder.
Combine the remaining liquid with the rest of the oil and pour over the rice.
Steam the rice in the oven or on low heat for one hour.

c8dba1c7-d951-41e1-9e16-9e4dd0826e3d.name: Lamb Pilaf
c8dba1c7-d951-41e1-9e16-9e4dd0826e3d.description: A flavorful lamb and rice dish with spices and nuts.
instructions: Render the fat in a pot and sauté the lamb pieces.
Remove the lamb, sauté chopped onions in the fat, then add crushed almonds and rice.
Cook for 5 minutes while stirring, then add spices, raisins, chopped tomatoes, and enough broth.
Once the water is absorbed, add lamb, sage, and parsley, and let it sit warm for 17-20 minutes.

67832196-e206-46b4-aa10-9e4ce33fd91e.name: Three Color Rice
67832196-e206-46b4-aa10-9e4ce33fd91e.description: A vibrant rice dish with colorful vegetables and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Chop the carrots, cabbage, potatoes, and peas. Cut the potatoes in half and fry them.
Chop some herb mix and set aside. Rinse the rice and boil it in water, then drain.
Mix the herb mix with half of the rice and combine the other half with some oil, placing it at the bottom of the pot.
Layer the fried carrots, cabbage, peas, and potatoes on top, then add more white rice over the vegetables.
When serving, first take the rice with vegetables, then the herb rice, and finally the plain rice. Sprinkle some ground saffron on top.

9066c798-d603-4641-9e70-a18b807d57fe.name: Rice with Chicken Liver Stew
9066c798-d603-4641-9e70-a18b807d57fe.description: A flavorful dish combining rice and sautéed chicken liver in a rich sauce.
instructions: Wash and lightly fry the rice, then prepare it as steamed rice.
Chop the chicken liver and sauté with fried onions until the liver's moisture evaporates.
Add half a cup of water, tomato paste, salt, pepper, and cheese to the liver and let it cook until the liquid is absorbed.
Cook the rice using the simple steaming method and serve with the prepared stew.

7ebaf894-4906-4628-ae17-2e69e27bad87.name: European Rice
7ebaf894-4906-4628-ae17-2e69e27bad87.description: A flavorful rice dish with shrimp and chicken, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Cook the rice according to simple steaming instructions or boil it.
Chop the bell peppers into cubes and peel the onions.
Sauté the peppers and onions in half of the oil.
Dissolve the tomato paste in a glass of water and add it to the sautéed mixture.
Add salt, pepper, and curry powder, and let it simmer.
Add the cooked chicken or shrimp and stir until the water reduces.
Shape the rice into a circle on a serving dish and place the pepper and chicken mixture in the center.

28fb215c-6f90-47b4-81b7-67e10712f026.name: Molded Rice with Chicken
28fb215c-6f90-47b4-81b7-67e10712f026.description: A delightful dish of molded rice topped with chicken and garnished with bananas and tomatoes.
instructions: Prepare the rice in a round mold with a hole in the center and steam for one hour.
Clean the chicken and cook with water, salt, and pepper until half a cup of water remains.
Blanch and peel some tomatoes, chop them, and add to the chicken to thicken the sauce.
Peel and chop the bananas, sauté them in butter.
Serve the rice on a platter, pour the chicken sauce in the center, and decorate with bananas and tomato halves.

df81bb2e-bcc0-4f82-8832-b0373d3148ce.name: Italian Mushroom Rice
df81bb2e-bcc0-4f82-8832-b0373d3148ce.description: A savory rice dish with tender beef and flavorful mushrooms.
instructions: Cut the beef into small pieces and sauté with fried onions.
Add 2 cups of water and let the beef cook.
Chop green onions and bell peppers, clean the mushrooms, and add to the beef.
Add tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and let simmer until the water evaporates.
Clean and wash the rice, sauté in oil, then add water according to simple rice cooking instructions.
Add salt and let the water evaporate.
Layer the beef and mushroom mixture over the rice and let it steam.
For optimal results, follow the specified ingredient amounts for 6 to 8 servings.

364a6327-c6ba-4632-8cb1-342927dadb18.name: Masaleh Polo
364a6327-c6ba-4632-8cb1-342927dadb18.description: A fragrant rice dish with spiced meatballs and saffron.
instructions: Rinse the rice and place it in a pot, sprinkling spices in between.
Prepare the rice like plain steamed rice.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and mix with broth or water and melted oil, then pour over the rice.
Grate onions and mix with ground meat, spices, salt, and pepper.
Shape the meat mixture into balls, fry them, and set aside.
Mix the rice with the meatballs and serve with saffron rice and melted butter on top.
Optionally, add fried eggs on top of the rice.

f000cc67-3004-48a1-b788-fd511cf51baf.name: Quail Rice
f000cc67-3004-48a1-b788-fd511cf51baf.description: A delightful rice dish featuring tender quail and aromatic spices.
instructions: Soak the rice and prepare the quails by plucking feathers without boiling them.
Burn off fine hairs, wash the quails, and cook with water, salt, and chopped onions until tender.
Remove excess bones and prepare the orange peel by boiling it with sugar and water until sweet.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and clean the cumin.
Drain the rice, layer it with orange peel and cumin, and mix half the saffron with oil and quail broth.
Cook the rice in the oven at 350°F for 1 to 1.5 hours.
Mix some rice with the remaining saffron, serve with quail pieces on top, and drizzle with hot oil.

7b6bb7fa-fd85-4448-8e2b-e31d3f0ac3df.name: Cabbage Rice
7b6bb7fa-fd85-4448-8e2b-e31d3f0ac3df.description: A flavorful rice dish with minced meat and sautéed cabbage.
instructions: Mix minced meat with grated onion, salt, and pepper to form small meatballs.
Fry meatballs in hot oil and set aside.
Chop cabbage, sauté in oil, then mix with meatballs.
Add water, saffron, salt, and pepper; simmer until water reduces by half.
Drain rice and layer one third in a pot with some oil and water.
Add half of the cabbage and meat mixture, then cover with remaining rice.
Top with the rest of the cabbage and meat, then cover with remaining rice.
Combine the cooking liquid with oil and pour over rice, then steam the rice.
Optionally, mix in dried lime powder or sour grape powder for extra flavor.

b431b755-8440-4052-be2a-ab451ff8234f.name: Curry Rice
b431b755-8440-4052-be2a-ab451ff8234f.description: A flavorful rice dish with chicken, peas, and crispy potatoes.
instructions: Cook the chicken and soak the rice, then drain it.
Mix chicken broth with curry powder and saffron dissolved in hot water.
Add hot oil to the broth, place chicken and peas in the rice, and steam.
Peel and wash potatoes, then shred them thinly.
Fry shredded potatoes in hot oil until golden, ensuring they don't stick together.
Drain excess oil, season with salt and curry powder, and serve over rice.
Optionally, top with fried potatoes and fried eggs.

bb4b0c9b-5e20-48a4-90f2-0c2d4cb8c032.name: Herbed Rice with Meat (Ghormeh Sabzi Polo)
bb4b0c9b-5e20-48a4-90f2-0c2d4cb8c032.description: A fragrant rice dish with tender meat and fresh herbs, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Soak the rice and cut the meat into pieces, cooking until it has one cup of water left.
Clean and wash the herbs, chop them, and sauté with oil before adding to the meat.
Add salt and dried lime to the meat and herbs, simmer until half a cup of water remains.
If using meatballs, fry them and combine with the sautéed herbs and water, simmer briefly.
Drain the rice, layer with the meat and herbs, sprinkle with dried lime, and mix with some meat broth and oil.
Once the rice is steamed, serve with hot oil and saffron rice on top.

033caa58-7c54-4d90-bf6a-8943e2ecbe19.name: Layered Rice with Hosseini Kebab
033caa58-7c54-4d90-bf6a-8943e2ecbe19.description: A delicious layered rice dish topped with flavorful Hosseini kebabs.
instructions: Prepare the rice in a round mold and cook the Hosseini kebabs as per the recipe.
Invert the rice onto a platter, place kebab skewers in the center, and garnish with parsley and lemon slices.

8ec67f89-3f68-44d9-a5ac-2b94ddc648ff.name: Qeymeh Polo
8ec67f89-3f68-44d9-a5ac-2b94ddc648ff.description: A savory Persian rice dish with tender beef and lentils, topped with fragrant spices.
instructions: Soak the rice and cut the beef into small pieces.
Fry sliced onions in oil until golden, then add washed beef and cook until water evaporates.
Add cleaned lentils, sauté briefly, then pour in 3-4 cups of water and simmer.
Dissolve tomato paste in a little water and add it to the meat, cooking for a few minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and spices, then remove from heat.
Drain the rice, mix with melted oil and a bit of water, and layer in a pot with the meat.
Cover and cook on low heat for 1 to 1.5 hours, or bake at 350°F.

cac61311-1bb0-49cc-bd0c-4bf435518b82.name: Portuguese Style Rice
cac61311-1bb0-49cc-bd0c-4bf435518b82.description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with vegetables and butter.
instructions: Sauté rice with chopped onion in 75g of butter.
Add chopped tomatoes and sweet bell peppers, then mix in meat broth and cook until rice absorbs all the liquid.

c8a8e088-2f87-4f97-9202-4bff21946b2e.name: Florentine Style Rice with Chicken Liver
c8a8e088-2f87-4f97-9202-4bff21946b2e.description: A savory Italian-inspired rice dish with chicken liver and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Soak rice in water with salt and boil for 15 minutes, then rinse with cold water.
Return rice to heat, grate cheese, and when rice is half-cooked, add fried chicken liver.
Add grated Parmigiano cheese and wait until rice is fully cooked.
Melt 100g butter in a pot, sauté chopped garlic and sage until golden, then pour over rice and serve.

b9d422f4-4e82-4235-8c2d-9cedeef7b81c.name: Persian Rice (Polow and Chelow)
b9d422f4-4e82-4235-8c2d-9cedeef7b81c.description: A traditional Persian rice dish, fluffy and aromatic, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Rinse the rice until the water is clear, then soak it in warm water with salt for several hours.
Boil water in a large pot, add the soaked rice, and cook until slightly soft.
Drain the rice and layer it back in the pot, adding oil and water, then cover and cook on low heat.
For added flavor, mix yogurt and saffron into the rice before steaming.
If using an oven, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, then reduce heat and bake for an additional 30 minutes.

27f34818-d5d1-4c48-aa39-d1ff50ee23d7.name: American Style Cabbage Rice
27f34818-d5d1-4c48-aa39-d1ff50ee23d7.description: A vibrant and flavorful rice dish with cabbage and raisins.
instructions: Remove the core of the cabbage and finely chop it.
In a pot, heat olive oil and add the chopped cabbage.
Mix in the rice and stir on low heat until well combined.
Add water, raisins, salt, and pepper, then cover and cook for about 30 minutes.

6bd23432-db17-4b1f-b4ba-257ea1be28a7.name: Sausage and Plum Dolma
6bd23432-db17-4b1f-b4ba-257ea1be28a7.description: Delicious stuffed sausages with plums and mustard, baked to perfection.
instructions: Make a lengthwise slit in each sausage with a sharp knife.
Spread mustard inside the slit and insert three plums into each sausage.
Wrap the stuffed sausages with ham slices and secure them tightly.
Preheat the oven to 180°C (260°F).
Grease the sausages with butter and place them in a baking tray.
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until golden brown.

a9a2ba79-a71b-4b0a-9e1c-d65ccb3eb304.name: Stuffed Eggplants
a9a2ba79-a71b-4b0a-9e1c-d65ccb3eb304.description: Delicious eggplants filled with savory minced meat and herbs.
instructions: Peel the eggplants, slice them in half, and sprinkle with salt for 2 hours to remove bitterness.
Sauté chopped onion in a little oil, then add minced meat and salt, followed by tomato paste.
Add chopped parsley and garlic at the end and remove from heat.
Fry the eggplants in oil and place them in a strainer.
Stuff the eggplants with the meat mixture and cook in a pan with fried tomato paste and one cup of water for 10 minutes.

11bb4b5f-a256-4696-9e5b-2024ec5cf240.name: Stuffed Eggplant
11bb4b5f-a256-4696-9e5b-2024ec5cf240.description: Delicious eggplants stuffed with spiced meat and topped with melted cheese.
ingredients: Spices: salt, pepper, turmeric, curry, lemon powder
Tomato paste, pizza cheese, garlic powder
instructions: Peel and slice the eggplants in half, then cook them in a pan with oil and water.
Sauté ground meat with onions, then add spices and chopped mushrooms with barberry.
Add tomato paste and cook well, then stuff the mixture into the eggplants.
Top with pizza cheese and bake in the oven or microwave for five minutes.
Avoid deep frying; use a little oil and cover to cook thoroughly.
Garnish with peas, corn, and dill.

7c3483b0-4997-4cb8-a7e0-7f60eff3e0ed.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
7c3483b0-4997-4cb8-a7e0-7f60eff3e0ed.description: Delicious bell peppers filled with savory meat and spices, topped with melted cheese.
ingredients: Water, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté until golden, then add ground meat and cook.
Add turmeric, salt, pepper, tomato paste, and 2 tablespoons of water.
Slice the eggplant and fry in another pan, then add to the meat mixture and cook on low heat for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat, stir in parsley, and hollow out the bell peppers.
Fill the peppers with the meat mixture, top with cheese, and cover.
Place the peppers in a pot with half a centimeter of water, cover, and cook on low heat or in the oven for 20 minutes.

cccdc024-e6c7-4236-96d7-4a77c2adc835.name: Stuffed Eggplant with Cheese Sauce
cccdc024-e6c7-4236-96d7-4a77c2adc835.description: Delicious stuffed eggplants topped with creamy cheese sauce, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: In a pan, sauté onion, turmeric, and garlic, then add chicken fillet and bell pepper.
Season with salt and pepper, add tomatoes, then fill the eggplants with this mixture.
In another pan, melt butter with flour until raw smell disappears, gradually add milk to avoid lumps.
Pour the sauce over the stuffed eggplants, cover with pizza cheese, and bake in preheated oven at 210°C for 15-20 minutes.
Alternatively, cook on the stovetop. Garnish with parsley before serving.

3ff56fc0-d11f-4826-a4a3-14179f53f9ce.name: Stuffed Eggplant Pouches
3ff56fc0-d11f-4826-a4a3-14179f53f9ce.description: Delicious eggplants stuffed with savory meat and herbs, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Chopped parsley, salt, black pepper, and tomato paste to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and let them release their bitter water.
Finely chop the onion and sauté in oil for five minutes, then add meat, salt, and black pepper, cooking on heat.
Finally, add tomato paste and chopped parsley.
Wash, dry, and fry the eggplants gently.
Layer the prepared eggplants, place meat mixture in the center, fold into pouches, and garnish with yogurt.

124d2c87-090e-4fab-8520-73e0c64ac821.name: Stuffed Onions
124d2c87-090e-4fab-8520-73e0c64ac821.description: Deliciously baked onions filled with rice and cheddar cheese.
ingredients: Sugar, salt, and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cut a horizontal slice from the top of each onion and hollow them out, leaving thick walls.
Mix the remaining ingredients well and fill the hollowed onions with the mixture.
Wrap each stuffed onion in foil and bake in a preheated oven at 175°C (350°F) for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top before serving.

2fbdceb9-7f0c-47a4-8605-27bc6ad18286.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
2fbdceb9-7f0c-47a4-8605-27bc6ad18286.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with seasoned ground meat and baked to perfection.
instructions: Soak the cabbage leaves in boiling salted water for 10 minutes until soft.
Carefully separate the leaves and drain them in a colander.
Sauté the ground meat with fried onions, adding salt and pepper.
Mix in the sandwich bread crumbs and season again.
Place 1-2 tablespoons of the meat mixture in each leaf and roll them up.
Arrange the rolls in a metal basket and place it in a pot.
Add meat broth and butter to the pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover tightly, and cook for 30 minutes until fully cooked.

fca92321-5528-4df3-8d03-7aefdf29cc82.name: Lentil Fritters
fca92321-5528-4df3-8d03-7aefdf29cc82.description: Crispy lentil fritters packed with herbs and spices.
instructions: Wash and soak lentils, then cook with salt for two hours.
Drain the lentils and let them cool, then mix with herbs, flour, spices, and salt.
Beat eggs separately and add to the mixture, stirring well.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and fry until golden on both sides.
Serve on a platter and garnish as desired.

86a01c73-0945-49aa-87cb-bd48929726f3.name: Oven-Baked Potato Kuku
86a01c73-0945-49aa-87cb-bd48929726f3.description: A delicious and crispy potato dish baked to perfection.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Peel and grate the potatoes, then mix with breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, and black pepper.
Add grated onions and 6 tablespoons of oil, mixing well.
Pour the remaining oil into a suitable baking dish, ensuring the thickness of the kuku is no more than 4 cm.
Heat the oiled dish in the oven until hot, then carefully spread the kuku mixture in it.
Bake for 45 to 60 minutes until cooked and dark golden.
Slice and serve immediately, optionally adding grated cheese like cheddar.

6f0f612f-7c38-46e1-b4a7-a0a3bda34886.name: Two-Colored Kuku
6f0f612f-7c38-46e1-b4a7-a0a3bda34886.description: A delicious Persian vegetable and potato dish, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix grated potatoes with 2 eggs, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan, pour in the potato mixture, and flatten with a spoon.
Combine herbs with flour, remaining 2 eggs, salt, and pepper, and pour over the potatoes.
Cover the pan and fry until one side is golden, then flip and fry the other side.
Alternatively, grease a dish, add the mixture, and bake in the oven at 200°C for 30 minutes.

8d2925aa-3546-4305-8cfe-e8e8ac39e269.name: Istanbul Kuku
8d2925aa-3546-4305-8cfe-e8e8ac39e269.description: A delicious Persian potato and bean dish topped with melted cheese.
instructions: Dice the potatoes into small cubes and fry them in oil.
In a bowl, mix the fried potatoes, fried onions, cooked beans, eggs, salt, pepper, and turmeric.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and place the cheese slices on top.
Cook on low heat until the bottom is golden and the cheese melts; no need to flip.

486babe4-2517-4707-9ec5-eb9975870446.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
486babe4-2517-4707-9ec5-eb9975870446.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with seasoned meat and rice, topped with sweet and sour sauce.
ingredients: 500g mixed herbs (leek, parsley, dill, tarragon, marjoram, and green onion)
Salt, black pepper, turmeric, cumin, and saffron to taste
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté it, then add the ground meat and spices.
Mix in pre-cooked rice and chopped herbs, then remove from heat.
Prepare the cabbage by trimming the base and blanching in boiling water for 4-5 minutes.
Separate the leaves and trim the tough ends, then fill with the meat mixture and roll or fold.
Layer cabbage leaves in a large pot, place the rolls inside, add water and soaked plums, and cook.
Mix sugar, vinegar, and water, pour over the rolls, and simmer for 20 minutes for a sweet and sour flavor.

dcdf3935-a107-4fb9-845b-993e2228672b.name: Stuffed Eggs
dcdf3935-a107-4fb9-845b-993e2228672b.description: Delicious boiled eggs filled with a creamy mustard and mayo mixture.
instructions: Cut the eggs in half and remove the yolks.
Mash the yolks in a bowl with a fork.
Mix in mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Fill the egg whites with the mixture and refrigerate for up to 24 hours.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

dc39a01b-593d-4f05-a2d0-3a902a04f406.name: Lavash Dolma
dc39a01b-593d-4f05-a2d0-3a902a04f406.description: Delicious stuffed lavash rolls filled with rice, beans, and meat.
instructions: Soak rice for 1 hour, then cook with 2 cups water, oil, parsley, salt, and grated tomato until fluffy.
Soak pinto beans for 12 hours, then cook with 1 cup water and mix with the rice.
Sauté ground meat with grated onion in oil, then add to the rice and bean mixture.
Cut lavash into 20x25 cm pieces, place 2 tablespoons of the mixture on each, and roll them up.
Arrange the rolls in a dish, cover with grated pizza cheese, and bake at 180°C for 20-30 minutes.

fafd5f8f-19c1-4be7-b938-133ab675d2fe.name: Corn Kuku
fafd5f8f-19c1-4be7-b938-133ab675d2fe.description: A delicious Persian corn fritter, crispy on the outside and soft inside.
instructions: Finely chop garlic and mix with corn and chopped green onions.
Add spices, salt, pepper, flour, and baking powder, then mix.
Add the egg and blend, then fry in oil.

ebee14c2-bdc0-44c7-90e6-de0385a9ce22.name: Stuffed Italian Zucchini
ebee14c2-bdc0-44c7-90e6-de0385a9ce22.description: Delicious zucchini stuffed with seasoned meat and topped with cheese.
instructions: Wash the zucchinis and boil them in salted water for 20 minutes, then halve and hollow them out.
Sauté the onion in olive oil, add the ground meat, season with salt and pepper, then add garlic and tomatoes.
Mix in oregano and tomato paste, then set aside.
Grease a baking dish, arrange the zucchini halves, fill them with the meat mixture, top with bread crusts, and sprinkle cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C (360°F) for 35 minutes.

f65462da-e865-4262-9945-786fa0cf2249.name: Chicken Kuku
f65462da-e865-4262-9945-786fa0cf2249.description: A delicious Persian chicken dish, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Cook the chicken with one onion, some water, and salt until tender.
Remove bones, grind the meat, and let it cool.
Dissolve saffron in hot water and baking soda in cold water.
Beat the eggs in a bowl until frothy, then mix in salt, pepper, baking soda, saffron, fried onions, and ground chicken.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and fry until both sides are golden.
Garnish with tomatoes and herbs if desired.

46360200-ea75-4a5f-a7be-8070319bc12f.name: Stuffed Chicken Breast with Celery and Mushrooms
46360200-ea75-4a5f-a7be-8070319bc12f.description: Delicious chicken breasts stuffed with mushrooms and celery, wrapped in ham.
instructions: Finely chop the mushrooms and celery, mix with breadcrumbs, and set aside.
Flatten each slice of ham with a knife.
Create a large slit in each chicken breast and fill with the mixture.
Wrap each chicken breast with a layer of ham.
Mix tomato sauce, soy sauce, and vegetable oil for glazing.
Grill the chicken breasts on a preheated grill for 5 minutes.
Brush some glazing mixture on the chicken and cook for another 5 minutes.
Flip the chicken breasts and repeat glazing after 5 minutes.

0d95c52b-3071-4c6c-9127-f1d3d17f05c0.name: Cheese and Meat Frittata
0d95c52b-3071-4c6c-9127-f1d3d17f05c0.description: A delicious frittata packed with cheese, meat, and vegetables.
instructions: Crack the eggs into a suitable bowl and whisk well.
Mix milk and cheese, add crumbled bread, and combine thoroughly.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Stir in corn, broccoli, mushrooms, green onions, and chopped chicken.
Grease a suitable baking dish and pour in the mixture to a height of 2 cm.
Sprinkle thyme or basil on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at low heat for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
Alternatively, cook gently on the stovetop until set.

5b5c08d4-fe65-4d1c-afad-834ee2e9f362.name: Sprout Frittata
5b5c08d4-fe65-4d1c-afad-834ee2e9f362.description: A delicious frittata packed with fresh vegetables and mung bean sprouts.
instructions: Wash and slice the mushrooms, then sauté them in a little oil.
Partially cook the carrots and sauté them with sliced eggplant.
Fry the onions until golden.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and add salt and spices.
Mix in the sautéed carrots, eggplant, onions, sliced mushrooms, diced bell pepper, and mung bean sprouts.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the mixture on both sides.
Garnish with tomatoes, pickles, and lemon.

a81fd8e2-d39b-4c09-9214-01b988eab988.name: Tomato Kofta
a81fd8e2-d39b-4c09-9214-01b988eab988.description: A savory and flavorful dish made with tomatoes and spices.
instructions: Mix chickpea flour, red pepper, special spice, turmeric, sugar, and salt in cold water with tomato puree, fresh coriander, diced bell pepper, sesame seeds, and vegetable stock until thick.

Heat oil in a non-stick pan, pour enough mixture to cover the bottom for a thin layer, and cook until golden underneath. Add oil around the edges to loosen, flip to cook the other side until golden, fold in half, decorate, and serve hot.

95c815a3-253d-4bf5-b4ac-32e1fe7bbcd9.name: Spinach Frittata
