95c815a3-253d-4bf5-b4ac-32e1fe7bbcd9.description: A delicious frittata packed with fresh spinach and herbs.
instructions: Wash and chop the leeks, clean and chop the spinach, and chop the green onions.
Mix all the chopped vegetables and walnuts with the eggs, add salt and pepper.
Heat the oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and fry until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with olives, tomatoes, and pickles.

9677955d-e4f3-4f79-9504-0cc121d6dc1d.name: Soybean Burger
9677955d-e4f3-4f79-9504-0cc121d6dc1d.description: Delicious vegetarian burgers made with soy and spices, perfect for a healthy meal.
instructions: Soak the soybeans in warm water for 10 minutes, then cook for 5 minutes.
Grind the cooked soybeans, mix with grated onion, eggs, and spices, form into patties, and fry in oil.

feebddfc-3776-4139-8327-77028a19e640.name: Zucchini and Carrot Frittata
feebddfc-3776-4139-8327-77028a19e640.description: A delicious frittata packed with zucchini, carrots, and feta cheese.
instructions: Grate the zucchini and carrot, then mix with grated onion, spices, flour, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Add grated feta cheese and beaten egg, combine well, and fry in oil.

7b7f3e5b-8144-4767-b555-26c976c252ab.name: Rice Paper Rolls
7b7f3e5b-8144-4767-b555-26c976c252ab.description: Delicious rice paper rolls filled with chicken and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Sauté garlic in olive oil, then add chicken and cook slightly.
Add bell peppers, then green onions, sprouts, and sauté.
Stir in oyster sauce and brown sugar.
Soak rice paper in warm water until soft, cut into triangles.
Place filling on rice paper and roll tightly.

d6db2ea0-edcc-4e65-9eab-2c5beb5ea1b1.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
d6db2ea0-edcc-4e65-9eab-2c5beb5ea1b1.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with seasoned meat and herbs, simmered to perfection.
ingredients: 1kg mixed herbs (leek, parsley, coriander, dill, tarragon, mint)
Salt, pepper, turmeric, saffron, and special spices to taste
instructions: Boil water with salt in a pot, then prepare the cabbage by cutting the stem into a cone shape.
Place the cabbage in boiling water until leaves soften, then separate the leaves gently.
Sauté ground meat with grated onion, salt, and turmeric, then add chopped herbs, drained rice, and cooked lentils.
Add about 50g of oil and sauté the mixture again, adjusting seasoning as needed.
Trim the thick vein on the back of cabbage leaves for easier rolling, then fill and roll them up.
Layer some cabbage leaves in a pot, place the rolls inside, and cook with about 2 cups of water.
Cover with a plate or heavy object to prevent rolls from opening during cooking.
For a sour taste, add 750ml of tomato juice or paste; for a sweet-sour taste, mix 1 cup of sugar with 1 cup of vinegar and pour over the rolls.

e89722eb-0f7d-4a9a-a736-7bceaa025a0d.name: Stuffed Peppers and Eggplants
e89722eb-0f7d-4a9a-a736-7bceaa025a0d.description: Delicious stuffed vegetables filled with a savory meat and rice mixture.
instructions: Chop two onions and sauté in oil, then add ground meat and cook.
Add tomato paste, saffron, salt, and pepper.
Cook rice partially and lentils separately, then combine with the meat mixture.
Add sugar and vinegar, then mix in the herbs.
Stuff the mixture into hollowed peppers and tomatoes.
Cook in a pot with a mixture of vinegar and water over low heat.

90ba701e-bea0-4d63-a080-0d70844697fc.name: Stuffed Green Peppers
90ba701e-bea0-4d63-a080-0d70844697fc.description: Delicious stuffed peppers filled with creamy potato and cheese mixture.
ingredients: Salt and red pepper to taste
instructions: Carefully cut the tops of the bell peppers and remove the seeds, boiling them in salted water for 2 minutes.
Fry the onions in oil, add mushrooms, then season with salt, turmeric, pepper, basil, and saffron.
Mash the boiled potatoes with milk and butter, then mix in grated cheese.
Combine all ingredients and fill the peppers, topping with remaining cheese.
Brush melted butter on the stuffed peppers and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

e721ec55-4a45-4496-b527-1c3fff775478.name: Three Color Stuffed Peppers
e721ec55-4a45-4496-b527-1c3fff775478.description: Deliciously baked stuffed peppers with a creamy filling and vibrant colors.
instructions: Chop the bell peppers and sauté them with a little butter.
Beat the eggs with yogurt, add butter, vinegar, and sugar, then mix in flour, baking powder, bell peppers, and corn.
Pour the mixture into muffin molds and bake at 170 degrees Celsius for 40 minutes.
Mix cheese and chopped parsley, and place in the center of the muffins.

ae24a502-4783-42ec-8e47-233237dc0d57.name: Grilled Eggplant Kuku
ae24a502-4783-42ec-8e47-233237dc0d57.description: A delicious Persian eggplant dish perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and pepper to taste
instructions: Peel and chop the onion in a blender, then add the grilled eggplants and mash well.
Add salt, turmeric, and pepper, then crack the eggs one by one into the mixture and stir until smooth.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and cook on low heat until one side is done.
Flip to cook the other side. Alternatively, bake in the oven with 2 tablespoons of oil.

2971ae06-fc7f-486e-872c-90db2ea6d3f2.name: Potato Cake
2971ae06-fc7f-486e-872c-90db2ea6d3f2.description: A delicious and crispy potato cake with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Peel and chop the potatoes into small pieces, then boil with water and salt for 20-30 minutes.
Mash the potatoes with milk and one beaten egg, then mix in tomatoes, green onions, chopped pepper, salt, and pepper.
Take a portion of the mixture, roll it in flour, then beaten egg, and finally breadcrumbs.
Flatten slightly in your palm and fry in hot oil until golden brown.

5cdd1dae-3b3e-45ca-b8f5-b8f50f5ce883.name: Stuffed Chicken and Rice
5cdd1dae-3b3e-45ca-b8f5-b8f50f5ce883.description: Delicious stuffed peppers or tomatoes filled with chicken and rice.
ingredients: A few spinach or lettuce leaves
A few tomatoes or bell peppers
instructions: Wash the rice and cook it until fluffy.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the chopped cooked chicken.
Hollow out the tomatoes and bell peppers.
Mix mayonnaise with the rice thoroughly.
Add mustard sauce, salt, and pepper to the chicken and sauté for another minute.
Combine all ingredients and vegetables, then stuff them into the hollowed tomatoes or bell peppers.

6e2c5878-15be-46a5-8dbd-700f4931c192.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
6e2c5878-15be-46a5-8dbd-700f4931c192.description: Delicious grape leaves stuffed with a savory mixture of meat and herbs.
ingredients: 500g dolmeh herbs (leeks, parsley, dill, mint, tarragon, green onions)
instructions: Sauté ground meat with fried onions until browned, then add diluted tomato paste.
Mix in herbs, pre-cooked rice, and optionally barberries.
Prepare grape leaves by boiling them briefly in salted water, then drain.
Combine lemon juice, sugar, salt, and pepper; mix half into the meat mixture.
Layer grape leaves in a pot, fill with meat mixture, and roll tightly.
Add water and oil, cover, and cook on low heat until done.

4f32c8ff-56a0-424d-8c2f-298b8dac80fa.name: Stuffed Artichokes
4f32c8ff-56a0-424d-8c2f-298b8dac80fa.description: Delicious artichokes filled with a creamy mushroom and ham mixture.
instructions: Boil artichokes in salted water until leaves come off easily.
Drain and prepare filling with chopped artichoke hearts, mushrooms, ham, cream, and béchamel.
Remove inner leaves of artichokes and fill with the mixture.
Place in a dish with butter and broth, season, and cook for 30 minutes.
Garnish with olives and parsley before serving.

0aa9273b-68c7-4c9d-9d54-69f104ad4002.name: Potato and Cheese Frittata
0aa9273b-68c7-4c9d-9d54-69f104ad4002.description: A delicious frittata packed with potatoes, bell peppers, and cheddar cheese.
instructions: Heat half of the olive oil in a small pan and sauté the chopped potatoes.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in hot sauce and salt. Add the sautéed potatoes, pour into the pan, top with cheddar cheese and parsley, and cook until set.

893e7fa9-bda2-4c9d-a1cc-4f218fb63577.name: Sausage Frittata
893e7fa9-bda2-4c9d-a1cc-4f218fb63577.description: A delicious and cheesy egg dish with sausage and vegetables.
instructions: Melt butter in a suitable non-stick pan over low heat, then add flour and cook until slightly golden.
Gradually add milk while stirring until thickened for 15-20 minutes. Add baking powder and salt.
In another bowl, whisk eggs and mix with cream cheese, local cheese, and Parmesan, then gently pour into the milk-flour mixture.
Pour the mixture into a pan and top with green onions, sausage, and cherry tomatoes. Sprinkle pizza cheese on top.
Cook until the mixture is set and cooked through.

db7c9f35-9137-4738-aa1b-fcae84a1590a.name: Zucchini Frittata
db7c9f35-9137-4738-aa1b-fcae84a1590a.description: A delicious and nutritious zucchini frittata, perfect for vegetarians.
instructions: Wash and slice the zucchinis into 1 cm rings, sprinkle with salt.
Sauté the zucchinis in oil until lightly cooked.
In a bowl, mix flour and milk, then add the eggs and whisk well.
Add the sautéed zucchinis, salt, pepper, and saffron to the mixture.
Pour the mixture into a hot pan and smooth the surface.
Cover the pan and let it cook until set, then flip to cook the other side.
Serve hot and enjoy your nutritious zucchini frittata.

949edd84-c11d-4b75-982b-dd41e56deb06.name: Shrimp Frittata with Cilantro and Chives
949edd84-c11d-4b75-982b-dd41e56deb06.description: A delicious shrimp frittata packed with fresh herbs and flavors.
instructions: Finely chop or grind the shrimp.
Grate the garlic into a bowl and add the chopped shrimp.
Chop the chives and cilantro with kitchen scissors and add to the mixture.
Add the eggs and corn flour, then mix well.
Fry the mixture in oil, ensuring it remains thick.
Cook on low heat until both sides are golden.
Slice into irregular shapes and serve, garnished with cilantro and chives.

d223bc82-4f57-4e44-a5cb-0b9e2bbd19f2.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves in Microwave
d223bc82-4f57-4e44-a5cb-0b9e2bbd19f2.description: Delicious stuffed grape leaves cooked quickly in a microwave.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper; to taste
Shallot for sauce; 1 (soaked and finely chopped)
instructions: In a large bowl, add 3 cups of water and the rice. Cover and cook on high for 20 minutes, then drain.
In another pot, melt butter, add shallot and raisins, and heat for 2 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook for another 6 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Combine rice, mushrooms, raisins, shallot, and parsley in a large bowl and mix well.
Wrap the mixture in grape leaves.
For the sauce, melt butter in a deep pot for 3 minutes, then add shallot and flour, cooking for 4 minutes while stirring.
Add beef broth, vinegar, garlic, tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and cook for another 4 minutes.
Arrange the wrapped grape leaves in the sauce and heat on high for 5 minutes.

78d4c442-5216-43a6-9c42-c873d769920a.name: Stuffed Zucchini
78d4c442-5216-43a6-9c42-c873d769920a.description: Delicious zucchini stuffed with rice, herbs, and spices, simmered to perfection.
instructions: Wash the zucchinis and cut off the tops, hollowing them out gently with a knife.
Mix the partially cooked rice with chopped tomatoes, onion, parsley, spices, and lemon juice, then fill the zucchinis.
Place the stuffed zucchinis in a pot and mix the seasoning ingredients, adding them gradually. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 1 to 1.5 hours until cooked.

ad620478-260d-446c-ba47-9008534ac0db.name: Vegetable Frittata
ad620478-260d-446c-ba47-9008534ac0db.description: A delicious and colorful vegetable frittata perfect for any meal.
instructions: Cook and finely chop all the vegetables, then mix them together.
Add eggs, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
Heat oil in a pan, then spread the mixture evenly in the pan.
Once one side is cooked, flip it to cook the other side.

38f6bb5c-4e2e-4e65-b12e-01961ad03a31.name: White Fish Caviar Frittata
38f6bb5c-4e2e-4e65-b12e-01961ad03a31.description: A delicious frittata made with fresh caviar and herbs.
instructions: Remove the caviar from the fish and carefully separate it with a fork.
Chop the garlic leaves evenly and mix with caviar, eggs, and spices, then pour into a pre-oiled frying pan.

51a61928-f3bb-4335-8c6c-db6aca38b7b9.name: Green Fava Bean Kukoo
51a61928-f3bb-4335-8c6c-db6aca38b7b9.description: A delicious Persian herb and fava bean omelette, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Shell and wash the fava beans, then boil them with salt in water. Sauté 2 chopped onions in oil.
In a large bowl, beat the eggs and mix in flour, pepper, turmeric, and salt. Add grated onion, fava beans, sautéed onions, dill, and ground meat.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, fry one side, then flip and fry the other side. Optionally, bake in the oven at 180°C for 30 minutes.

1f0ddcdc-8431-4288-a8c8-a47e4a14f47b.name: Potato and Tuna Frittata
1f0ddcdc-8431-4288-a8c8-a47e4a14f47b.description: A savory frittata with potatoes, tuna, and spices, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Grate the potatoes and onion and mix them together.
Mash the tuna with a fork and add it to the potato-onion mix along with eggs, salt, pepper, and saffron.
Heat oil in a pan and pour in the mixture.
Once one side is fried, cut it into pieces and flip to fry the other side.
The dish is ready to serve.

f017e07b-5dc2-474e-87f1-1dde3d253501.name: Stuffed Peppers
f017e07b-5dc2-474e-87f1-1dde3d253501.description: Delicious bell peppers filled with seasoned meat and rice, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Salt, black pepper, and sugar to taste
instructions: Sauté onions and mix with ground meat, cooking until moisture evaporates.
Dissolve tomato paste in water, add to meat, season, and simmer until thick.
Let the meat mixture cool, then prepare the peppers by removing seeds and boiling them briefly.
Combine meat mixture with herbs, sugar, and rice, then fill the peppers.
Arrange filled peppers in a pot, add water, and cook until done.
Serve on a platter, garnished with cooked peas and optionally with tomato sauce.

adf0bb84-7f2c-45b5-87a3-d89f3241c1ce.name: Mediterranean Stuffed Grape Leaves
adf0bb84-7f2c-45b5-87a3-d89f3241c1ce.description: Delicious grape leaves stuffed with rice, herbs, and spices, baked to perfection.
ingredients: Vinegar or lemon juice; two-thirds cup
Vegetable broth cube; half a cube
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Soak the raw grape leaves in cold water for 20 minutes, then drain. Boil in water for 2-3 minutes and drain again.
Heat oil in a pan, add onion, and sauté for 5-6 minutes, stirring regularly. Add grated garlic.
Mix in parboiled rice, tomatoes, mint, salt, and pepper with the sautéed onion and garlic.
Place each grape leaf flat, add a spoonful of the mixture, and roll it up tightly.
Arrange the rolled leaves in a ceramic or Pyrex dish, placing lemon slices between them. Pour vegetable broth and vinegar or lemon juice over the rolls.
Cover the dish and bake in a preheated oven at 200°C (400°F) for 30 minutes, then reduce to 160°C (325°F) and bake for another 30 minutes before serving.

11426b81-b149-4232-a70d-db036c618ea8.name: Dill Frittata
11426b81-b149-4232-a70d-db036c618ea8.description: A delicious herb frittata perfect for any meal.
instructions: Chop the dill and place it in a bowl.
Add eggs, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
Heat oil in a pan and pour in the mixture.
Fry until one side is golden, then flip to cook the other side.
Once cooled, cut into rectangles and serve, optionally with spicy sauce.

386d7c2f-c90a-431f-bda0-c3cbaf96f927.name: Colorful Kuku
386d7c2f-c90a-431f-bda0-c3cbaf96f927.description: A vibrant and flavorful Persian omelette packed with colorful peppers and cheese.
instructions: Roast the bell peppers for 8 to 10 minutes, then place them in a freezer bag to cool.
Chop the cooled peppers and mix with eggs, cheese, half the garlic, salt, and pepper. Pour into a greased dish and let sit for 15 to 20 minutes.
Chop the remaining peppers and mix with the rest of the garlic, vinegar, olive oil, parsley, and basil. Serve.

557df5b7-48cb-4ac0-bc5e-e2c662ca0916.name: Okra Frittata
557df5b7-48cb-4ac0-bc5e-e2c662ca0916.description: A delicious frittata featuring tender okra and spices, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Wash the okra and dry them with a cloth, then slice them thinly.
Chop the onion and sauté it in oil until translucent, then add the okra.
Add salt, pepper, and turmeric, and let it cool.
Beat the eggs in a bowl until fluffy, then mix in the sautéed ingredients and grated garlic.
Pour the mixture into a heated oil-coated pan.
Bake in the oven at 189°C for 20 minutes or cook on the stovetop, then slice and serve.

752064d0-ac96-42f0-8ec8-796ae745f993.name: Grilled Eggplant Kofta
752064d0-ac96-42f0-8ec8-796ae745f993.description: A flavorful eggplant dish, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Grill the eggplants, peel them, and wash with cold water.
Place the eggplants in a colander, sprinkle with salt, and let sit for 30 minutes.
Drain the eggplants and mash them using a meat grinder or blender.
In another bowl, mix eggs with salt, pepper, and grated garlic.
Add coriander powder, saffron, and potato flour to the egg mixture and combine with the mashed eggplant.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and cover.
Fry one side until golden, then flip and fry the other side uncovered.

ad2088b2-d747-4b26-b14a-788de27e52b4.name: Fish Kofta
ad2088b2-d747-4b26-b14a-788de27e52b4.description: Crispy fish patties infused with fresh herbs and spices.
ingredients: Fresh lemon slices and cilantro leaves for garnish
instructions: Boil the potatoes in salted water for 15 minutes, then let them cool.
Finely chop the fish fillet and mix with green onions, cilantro, ginger, and lemon juice, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Once cooled, peel and grate the potatoes, then add to the fish mixture and stir well.
Heat oil in a pan, form the mixture into small patties, and fry until golden brown on both sides. Garnish with cilantro and lemon slices.

de04db36-958d-4043-9645-df9a7d0eb551.name: Cauliflower Kofta
de04db36-958d-4043-9645-df9a7d0eb551.description: A delicious and golden cauliflower dish, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt and bring it to a boil.
Separate and wash the cauliflower florets, then soften them with a fork.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, and mix well.
Dissolve saffron in a little hot water and add to the eggs.
Dissolve baking soda in a tablespoon of cold water and mix with the eggs.
Add cooled onions and cauliflower to the egg mixture and combine thoroughly.
Heat oil in a round pan until hot, then pour in the mixture.
Bake in the oven at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden brown on the bottom.
Move the dish to the top rack for another 15-20 minutes to brown the top.
Remove from the oven, cut into desired shapes, and serve with the browned side up.

37878515-3259-4abf-a6b5-dc714690d5b6.name: Fish Kofta
37878515-3259-4abf-a6b5-dc714690d5b6.description: Delicious fish patties mixed with herbs and spices, perfect for a savory meal.
instructions: Clean the fish and cut into small rectangular pieces.
Mix the fish with grated garlic, salt, and pepper, and set aside.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix with green onions, salt, pepper, cold water, and flour until smooth.
Add the fish to the mixture and stir well.
Heat oil in a pan and drop spoonfuls of the mixture into the oil.
Fry until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with spicy sauce if desired.

9e9792f9-a2b4-4bfb-b12c-9d7fb1911b0c.name: Chicken Nuggets
9e9792f9-a2b4-4bfb-b12c-9d7fb1911b0c.description: Crispy and cheesy chicken nuggets, perfect for a tasty snack.
instructions: Combine chicken, cheese, onion, garlic powder, and bouillon in a food processor.
Form the mixture into shapes, roll in bread crumbs, and fry in oil.

d3043398-2488-4199-9eb7-af5932a3c59d.name: Spinach and Cheese Frittata
d3043398-2488-4199-9eb7-af5932a3c59d.description: A delicious frittata filled with spinach and melted cheese.
instructions: Wash the potatoes thoroughly and boil them in salted water for 20 to 30 minutes until soft.
Peel the potatoes and mix them well with the egg yolks.
In another bowl, mix half of the pizza cheese and flour with salt and pepper.
Whip the egg whites separately until they are completely white.
Combine all ingredients with spinach in a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the mixture into a suitable dish, sprinkle the remaining pizza cheese on top, and bake for 15 minutes at 300 degrees or on a non-stick pan on the stove until cooked.

40b16152-c7b1-4f6f-90b4-edb4c26b4602.name: Spinach and Herb Frittata
40b16152-c7b1-4f6f-90b4-edb4c26b4602.description: A delicious frittata packed with fresh spinach and aromatic herbs.
ingredients: 150 grams mixed herbs (cilantro, parsley, dill, chives, mint)
instructions: Heat about 1 tablespoon of oil in a skillet.
Sauté the leeks until soft, then add the spinach and cook for 3 minutes.
Beat the eggs and mix in the spinach, leeks, green onions, and herbs.
Add salt, pepper, and chopped walnuts.
Pour the mixture into a skillet with 3 tablespoons of hot oil, cover, and cook on low heat.
Flip the frittata and place it under the grill until golden.

6aad525f-0094-4a4a-9826-e768fd892379.name: Sesame Frittata
6aad525f-0094-4a4a-9826-e768fd892379.description: A delicious and savory frittata packed with potatoes and sesame seeds.
ingredients: Salt, cinnamon, and pepper to taste
instructions: Peel the potato and boil it in water until soft.
Grate the cooled potato and onion into a large bowl.
Add parsley, salt, pepper, saffron, sesame seeds, and green pepper to the mixture.
Dissolve potato flour in cold milk and add to the mixture.
Beat the eggs in a separate bowl and add to the mixture.
Heat the oil in a pan and pour in the mixture, smoothing the top with a spoon.
Cook on low heat with a lid until one side is golden, then cook the other side without a lid.

ed47cb39-6399-4e13-abe5-c35e0bef2c31.name: Chicken Kuku
ed47cb39-6399-4e13-abe5-c35e0bef2c31.description: A savory Persian chicken dish, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon saffron dissolved in hot water
instructions: Chop the chicken into 2-finger-sized pieces.
Wash the barberries and mix with flour, then combine with walnuts, yogurt, tomato paste, saffron, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Add the eggs to the mixture.
Heat oil in a frying pan and pour in the kuku mixture.
Cook until one side is done, then flip and cook the other side without covering.
Once slightly cooled, transfer to a serving dish.

b4c490ac-7c3a-4753-b6ed-09a1463c5d03.name: Leek Frittata
b4c490ac-7c3a-4753-b6ed-09a1463c5d03.description: A delicious frittata made with fresh leeks, eggs, and walnuts.
instructions: Wash the leeks several times and finely chop them after drying.
Mix the leeks with garlic, eggs, salt, and pepper thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan and pour half of the mixture, covering it until it sets.
Sprinkle chopped walnuts and barberries on top, then add the remaining mixture.
Place whole walnuts on top and press slightly.
Cover and cook until fully set, then flip to brown the other side.
Slice into desired shapes and serve.

868fb90f-88ab-471f-9d42-585523df4bbe.name: Stuffed Cabbage with Meat
868fb90f-88ab-471f-9d42-585523df4bbe.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with a savory mixture of chicken and mushrooms.
instructions: Fill a large pot with water and bring it to a boil, adding salt.
Blanch the cabbage leaves in boiling water for a few seconds, then transfer to cold water.
Chop the chicken, mushrooms, green onions, and boiled potatoes.
Mix the chopped ingredients with salt, pepper, ginger, and garlic.
Place a spoonful of the mixture in each cabbage leaf and roll it up.
Arrange the stuffed cabbage in a pot, cover, and steam for 2 hours on medium heat.
For the sauce, sauté chopped onion in oil, add mushrooms, then water and grated potato.
Season the sauce and thicken it, then stir in cream and heat briefly.
Blend the sauce and pour it over the cooked cabbage rolls.

55e9b496-e71d-4d7a-b416-40c3b852dc67.name: Walnut Kuku
55e9b496-e71d-4d7a-b416-40c3b852dc67.description: A delicious Persian omelette made with walnuts and spices.
ingredients: Parsley, tomato, and radish for garnish
instructions: Mix ground walnuts, grated onion, eggs, salt, pepper, saffron, sesame, and pomegranate paste until well combined.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the mixture over medium heat until cooked. Serve garnished with parsley, tomato, and radish.

0f020609-983d-4410-abac-7e3f8212c67b.name: Mixed Kuku
0f020609-983d-4410-abac-7e3f8212c67b.description: A delicious Persian dish made with vegetables and eggs, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Mix all the ingredients together.
Pour the mixture into hot oil and fry, flipping to cook both sides.

10301e23-1299-4f40-9fe8-d7498a40dc59.name: Yogurt Frittata
10301e23-1299-4f40-9fe8-d7498a40dc59.description: A delicious and savory yogurt frittata with fresh herbs and vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Beat eggs, flour, yogurt, salt, pepper, saffron, and turmeric together.
Add chopped carrots and chives, mix well, then fry in a heated mold until golden.

a2e88672-3a3f-4c7a-bab1-90e2dcb037b1.name: Winter Vegetable Frittata
a2e88672-3a3f-4c7a-bab1-90e2dcb037b1.description: A delicious frittata packed with seasonal vegetables and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat, add bell pepper, and sauté for 6-8 minutes.
Add sliced leeks, cover, and cook for 4-5 minutes until softened, then season with salt and pepper.
Add washed spinach with its water, cover, and cook for another 5 minutes until wilted.
In a separate bowl, beat eggs with salt, pepper, basil, parsley, and remaining cumin, then pour over the vegetables.
Once the bottom is set, place the skillet in the oven to brown the top, being careful not to burn it. Grate Parmesan on top before serving.

9fccd403-7a38-4b17-9b2e-4cd1e43ef613.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves with Pasta
9fccd403-7a38-4b17-9b2e-4cd1e43ef613.description: Delicious grape leaves stuffed with savory meat and pasta, baked to perfection.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in boiling water, chop before adding.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft, then add ground lamb until browned.
Add cumin, lemon zest, and water; let it boil and evaporate.
Mix in spaghetti, then stuff grape leaves with the meat mixture.
Arrange stuffed leaves in a baking dish.
Prepare tomato sauce by sautéing onion and garlic, then add tomatoes and mint.
Pour sauce over stuffed leaves, cover with aluminum foil, and bake for 30 minutes.

fab573ff-0db8-466b-9a67-68cb71017423.name: Homemade Falafel
fab573ff-0db8-466b-9a67-68cb71017423.description: Crispy and flavorful falafel made with chickpeas and spices.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and red pepper to taste
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight, changing the water several times until use.
Soak soy in warm water for an hour, then drain and rinse.
Grind onions, chopped potato, soy, and chickpeas together.
Add eggs, spices, salt, and pepper to the mixture.
If no falafel mold is available, take walnut-sized portions and fry both sides in vegetable oil.
For the sauce, mix tomato paste, vinegar, salt, and oil until slightly thickened.
Serve hot falafel with lettuce, fresh herbs, or pickles, preferably with baguette.

12ccb3b0-8754-4f1b-ada9-5b909b561717.name: Eggplant Kuku
12ccb3b0-8754-4f1b-ada9-5b909b561717.description: A delicious Persian eggplant dish, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Grate the onions and fry them in oil.
Peel and coarsely grate the eggplants, then add to the fried onions and sauté well.
Let the mixture cool, then mix the eggs with salt and pepper in a bowl.
Add the cooled eggplant and onion mixture to the eggs and stir.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan until hot but not smoking.
Pour the mixture into the hot oil and let one side fry until golden.
Flip the kuku, reduce heat, and cook until fully cooked through.

367f5fde-a075-4d3a-b243-6ffb3e1dfc96.name: Spinach Frittata
367f5fde-a075-4d3a-b243-6ffb3e1dfc96.description: A delicious spinach frittata with cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Grate the onion and sauté it in butter and olive oil.
Wash the spinach and cook it with one cup of water until tender.
Add the cooked spinach to the sautéed onion and stir until the water evaporates.
Remove from heat and let it cool. Grate the cheese and mix it with the eggs.
Once the spinach is cool, add it to the egg mixture, season with salt and pepper, and mix well.
Pour the mixture into a non-stick dish and bake for 20 minutes at 150°C or cook on low heat, flipping to brown both sides.

c7b624ab-1e90-43a2-9534-d3c46928d3fa.name: Potato Kuku
c7b624ab-1e90-43a2-9534-d3c46928d3fa.description: A delicious Persian potato dish, crispy on the outside and soft inside.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Boil the potatoes, peel them, and grate finely.
In a bowl, mix the grated potatoes with salt, pepper, and turmeric.
Add eggs one by one and mix well, adjusting the number based on potato type.
Add milk, garlic powder, butter, and chopped parsley, mixing until smooth.
Refrigerate the mixture for about 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a suitable pan, then scoop small amounts of the mixture and flatten them.
Fry on low heat until the kuku is fully cooked and golden brown.

fa63a7af-eb69-4eab-b1a7-fb438b1ec90f.name: Zucchini Frittata
fa63a7af-eb69-4eab-b1a7-fb438b1ec90f.description: A delicious and savory zucchini frittata, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: 1 cup finely chopped herbs (dill, parsley, green onion)
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Add eggs, salt, and spices, then fry in a pan until golden brown on both sides.

c47feb0f-6260-462b-acae-2a75c1705167.name: Stuffed Tomatoes
c47feb0f-6260-462b-acae-2a75c1705167.description: Delicious tomatoes filled with a savory mixture of meat, rice, and spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Sauté the ground meat with grated onion.
Cook the rice and lentils separately.
Mix the rice, lentils, meat, and sautéed onion, then add salt, pepper, and cinnamon.
Cut the tops off the tomatoes and hollow them out.
Fill the tomatoes with the prepared mixture and use the tops as lids.
Arrange them gently in a pot, drizzle with oil, tomato juice, and a little water, then cook on low heat until done.

51b33347-90ec-4810-916c-223e542fb7de.name: Three Color Potato Kuku
51b33347-90ec-4810-916c-223e542fb7de.description: A delightful layered potato dish with sausage, cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Mash the boiled potatoes and mix with butter and milk.
Divide the potato mixture into three parts.
Chop the sausage and sauté with tomatoes, then add hot sauce and mix with one part of the potato mixture.
Spread the sausage mixture in the bottom of a cake mold.
Grate feta cheese and mix with cheddar and parmesan, then combine with egg and another part of the potato mixture and layer over the sausage.
Blend basil leaves with peanuts, garlic, and cream, then mix with the last part of the potato mixture.
Pour the final mixture into the mold, top with pizza cheese, and bake at 200°C for 35 to 40 minutes, garnishing with basil.

11c24643-da97-4968-a70b-010a5840d770.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
11c24643-da97-4968-a70b-010a5840d770.description: Delicious bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of bulgur, cheese, and vegetables.
ingredients: 2 cups (400 ml) water with vegetable or chicken bouillon
2 tablespoons slivered almonds or chopped walnuts
instructions: Combine bouillon, carrots, and onions in a large pot and bring to a boil, then simmer for 5 minutes.
Add bulgur and raisins, remove from heat, cover, and let sit for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare the bell peppers by cutting off the tops and hollowing them out.
Mix grated cheese into the bulgur mixture and fill the peppers evenly.
Place the peppers in a suitable pot, add ½ cup water, bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until peppers are tender and heat penetrates the filling, garnish with almonds or walnuts.

7865285b-1396-4ce9-965f-dab7036ceece.name: Stuffed Eggplant
7865285b-1396-4ce9-965f-dab7036ceece.description: Delicious eggplants filled with a savory meat and rice mixture.
ingredients: 500 grams mixed herbs (leek, parsley, mint, tarragon, savory, green onion)
1 tablespoon tomato paste or 2 cups tomato juice
instructions: Finely chop and sauté onions until golden.
Add ground meat and cook until moisture reduces.
Mix in water and tomato paste with salt and pepper.
If using tomato juice, pour it over the meat and simmer.
Boil rice and lentils separately, then drain.
Wash and chop herbs, sauté in oil, then mix with rice and meat.
Peel eggplants, cut tops into cones, and hollow them out.
Salt the inside and fill with the mixture, then cap with the tops.
Sauté stuffed eggplants in oil until browned.
Arrange in a pot, add broth or tomato juice, season, and simmer gently.
Ensure they cook without breaking apart, adding water if necessary.
Serve with tomato sauce.

332542c5-ea6c-4a13-a0a6-d6f7c30dc8eb.name: Stuffed Chicken Fillet
332542c5-ea6c-4a13-a0a6-d6f7c30dc8eb.description: Delicious chicken fillets stuffed with fresh vegetables and served with a creamy yogurt sauce.
instructions: Julienne the bell pepper and zucchini.
Lay the chicken fillet flat and place the julienned vegetables in the center.
Roll the chicken fillet and secure it with toothpicks.
Cook the rolled fillets in 5 cups of unsalted water.
In a bowl, mix yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, and parsley until smooth.
Remove the chicken from water and pour the yogurt sauce over it.

93c2842d-99be-4507-a5c5-611328d1efe6.name: Tuna Kofta
93c2842d-99be-4507-a5c5-611328d1efe6.description: A delicious and savory tuna patty perfect for any meal.
instructions: Peel and grate the potatoes and onion.
Mash the tuna and add it to the grated potatoes and onion.
Add dried herbs, salt, and spices, then crack the eggs into the mixture and combine well.
Pour oil into a frying pan and fry the mixture on both sides like other patties.

a4da51b5-337d-470b-b77b-7c13239dd55c.name: Meat Kofta
a4da51b5-337d-470b-b77b-7c13239dd55c.description: A savory meat and herb dish, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: half a cup of herb mix
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in a little oil, then add turmeric.
Mix ground meat with grated onions and add to sautéed onions, cooking until moisture evaporates.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then add the herb mix, meat mixture, salt, pepper, cinnamon, and saffron, and mix well.
In a suitable pan, add enough oil, flatten the mixture with a spoon, and cook like vegetable kofta.

dc63e3e8-743f-4d39-8222-def672687b27.name: Stuffed Celery
dc63e3e8-743f-4d39-8222-def672687b27.description: Delicious stuffed celery with ham, cheese, and creamy goodness.
ingredients: Garlic powder, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Chop the celery and boil until just tender, then sauté in a little oil.
Slice the ham into rings and chop the leek.
Place sautéed celery inside the ham and roll it up.
Arrange the rolls in a baking dish and sprinkle with leek.
Pour whipped cream over the ham and top with grated cheese.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Bake until the ham is golden.

2728c5ee-7c61-400a-961d-a56b9cbdf0cf.name: Greek Stuffed Grape Leaves
2728c5ee-7c61-400a-961d-a56b9cbdf0cf.description: Delicious grape leaves filled with rice, herbs, and spices, steamed to perfection.
instructions: Cut the stems of the grape leaves and blanch them in boiling salted water until slightly softened.
Mix all filling ingredients in a bowl.
Place a leaf flat, add a spoonful of filling, fold the edges, and roll tightly.
Arrange the rolls in a metal steamer basket and drizzle with olive oil.
Steam for about an hour, adding water as needed, and serve with lemon and salad.

f888b0c5-234f-4f74-ac2d-9a7f52092411.name: Fish Dolmeh with Cheese Sauce
f888b0c5-234f-4f74-ac2d-9a7f52092411.description: Delicious fish rolls wrapped in spinach, topped with creamy cheese sauce.
ingredients: 1 tsp garlic powder or crushed garlic
instructions: Mix lemon juice, crushed garlic, salt, and pepper; marinate fish pieces for 2-3 hours.
Soak spinach leaves in warm water for 30 seconds, then rinse in cold water.
Lay spinach leaves flat, place fish fillet on top, roll them up, and steam for 20-25 minutes.
Heat fish stock with cream cheese and chopped green onions until warm.
Place fish rolls in a serving dish and pour cheese sauce over them.
Total cooking time is 30 minutes; serves 4.

ab2fa339-1023-4bf5-8512-f5ddf1eb8e1f.name: Mushroom Kuku
ab2fa339-1023-4bf5-8512-f5ddf1eb8e1f.description: A delicious Persian omelette packed with mushrooms and herbs.
instructions: Wash the mushrooms and sauté with half the butter and a tablespoon of lemon juice for 5 minutes on low heat.
Add chopped parsley, salt, and pepper to the mushrooms.
In another bowl, crack and beat the eggs after washing them.
Add the beaten eggs to the mushroom mixture.
Use the remaining butter and oil to fry the kuku.
Once one side is browned, flip it immediately to cook the other side.
This dish serves 4 to 6 people if measurements are followed.

acf1bbdd-c45e-4db3-8757-2b84c2db0ac1.name: Vegetable Kukoo
acf1bbdd-c45e-4db3-8757-2b84c2db0ac1.description: A delicious Persian vegetable frittata packed with fresh herbs and spices.
instructions: Thoroughly clean and wash the herbs, then chop finely.
Sauté the chopped herbs in a few tablespoons of oil and let cool.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and add baking soda, salt, and flour.
Mix in the barberry and chopped walnuts.
Add the cooled herbs to the egg mixture.
Heat the remaining oil in a round pan and pour in the mixture.
Smooth the top with a spoon and cover with a lid.
Cook on low heat until the bottom is golden brown.
Flip the kukoo to brown the other side.
Garnish with tomato slices if desired.

a1e3c7b0-6462-48d4-b6eb-eb62e5cb6713.name: Stuffed Peppers
a1e3c7b0-6462-48d4-b6eb-eb62e5cb6713.description: Delicious bell peppers filled with a savory meat and rice mixture.
instructions: Mix fried onions with ground meat and cook until the meat's moisture evaporates.
Dissolve tomato paste in half a cup of water and add to the meat, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Allow the meat to simmer until fully cooked, then let it cool.
Cut the tops off the peppers and remove the seeds, blanching them in salted water until slightly soft.
Combine the prepared meat, vegetables, sugar, and rice, adding a pinch of salt.
Stuff the peppers with the mixture and place the tops back on, arranging them in a pot.
Add a little broth or water and cook until done.
Serve the stuffed peppers on a round platter, garnished with cooked peas.

e96e40d4-22ab-4b0e-8fb7-d1f2a20e4b54.name: Two-Colored Kuku
e96e40d4-22ab-4b0e-8fb7-d1f2a20e4b54.description: A delicious Persian herb and potato frittata, baked to golden perfection.
instructions: Mix the herbs with 4 eggs and 1 tablespoon of flour thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the herb mixture, and flatten it.
Grate the cooked potatoes and mix with 4 eggs and spices.
Sprinkle barberries and walnut halves on the herb kuku.
Pour the potato mixture on top, flatten it, and bake at 175°C for 35-40 minutes until golden.

740add68-314f-49ad-b016-b02dd6f2d650.name: Stuffed Lavash (Dast Pich)
740add68-314f-49ad-b016-b02dd6f2d650.description: Delicious stuffed lavash filled with seasoned meat and herbs.
ingredients: Oil, salt, pepper, and lavash bread as needed
instructions: Clean and chop the herbs, crush the walnuts, and rinse the barberries.
In a pan, heat oil and add the ground meat and chopped onion.
Add the herbs, crushed walnuts, barberries, salt, pepper, chopped tomatoes, and two cups of water.
Cook on low heat until the mixture is cooked and the water evaporates.
Trim the edges of the lavash and cut it into squares or rectangles.
Place some meat mixture in the center of each piece of lavash and roll it up.
Grease a baking dish and arrange the rolls inside, cooking on low heat until the lavash is crispy.
Alternatively, fry each roll individually in a pan over low heat.
Once fried, place a washed lettuce leaf on a plate and arrange the rolls on top.
For decoration, drizzle some dissolved saffron on top or garnish with herbs.

5e5d965a-1ed2-4d4b-a950-19509413a931.name: Mrs. Jan's Kuku
5e5d965a-1ed2-4d4b-a950-19509413a931.description: A delicious Persian potato and herb frittata, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Boil the potatoes, peel them, and grate into a large bowl.
Sauté chopped onion in a tablespoon of oil, add ground meat and cook on high heat.
Add turmeric and spices to the meat mixture, then turn off the heat.
Pour the meat mixture over the grated potatoes and add the chopped herbs.
Add eggs, mix well, then add salt and baking powder.
Heat oil in a suitable pan, pour in the mixture, and flatten with a spoon.
Reduce heat, cover the pan, and cook until both sides are golden.
Serve and garnish as desired.

37682374-d1fe-42be-9f91-8bb90cc3a851.name: Green Bean Frittata
37682374-d1fe-42be-9f91-8bb90cc3a851.description: A delicious and colorful frittata packed with green beans and veggies.
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl and mix with salt and pepper.
Add the other ingredients, adding tomatoes last.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan until hot.
Pour the mixture into the oil and reduce heat to medium.
Fry until both sides are golden brown, then serve and garnish.

91c5df9b-4dc9-4f40-b8d1-2b74c77fc1ae.name: Scallion Frittata
91c5df9b-4dc9-4f40-b8d1-2b74c77fc1ae.description: A delicious frittata made with fresh scallions and potatoes.
ingredients: Spices (dried rose petals, turmeric, pepper) to taste
instructions: Chop the scallions with their green stems and wash them, then spread on a clean cloth to dry.
Grate the raw potato and soak it in water for 10 minutes to remove starch, then drain.
Mix the scallions, drained potato, salt, pepper, spices, barberries, chopped walnuts, eggs, and minced garlic.
Heat some oil in a frying pan and pour in the mixture.
Cover the pan with paper or cloth to trap steam.
Once one side is fried, flip the frittata to cook the other side.
Finally, garnish with tomatoes and serve.

c327676d-34bc-4697-af95-7280f10b37dc.name: Stuffed Vegetables and Frittata
c327676d-34bc-4697-af95-7280f10b37dc.description: Delicious stuffed vegetables and frittata, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Ensure the stuffing remains intact during cooking with gentle heat.
Gradually add water to the pot and allow it to evaporate completely.
Heat oil until hot before adding the frittata mixture.
Use a non-stick dish for easy removal, or cover with fire for even cooking.
For thinner frittatas, cover and reduce heat.

4c1811d2-ec0a-4a33-bd5a-09e5c32523e6.name: Turkish Stuffed Eggplant
4c1811d2-ec0a-4a33-bd5a-09e5c32523e6.description: Delicious stuffed eggplants filled with meat and cheese, baked to perfection.
instructions: Cut each eggplant lengthwise into 4 thin slices and fry them gently.
Finely chop the onion and sauté it, then add meat, spices, salt, and pepper.
Once browned, add tomato paste and chopped parsley, cooking until well done.
Layer two slices of eggplant in a plus shape, add meat and cheese, then cover with eggplant slices.
Insert a toothpick in the center and place a tomato slice on top.
Repeat for all eggplants, then arrange them in a greased dish.
Bake at 160 degrees for 15-20 minutes until cheese melts and tomatoes are cooked.

73302aac-44f0-4ae1-a1e1-e349b18e2071.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves without Meat
73302aac-44f0-4ae1-a1e1-e349b18e2071.description: Delicious vegetarian stuffed grape leaves filled with rice and herbs.
instructions: Heat half a cup of olive oil in a pot, mix in onion and rice, and sauté for 15 minutes on low heat, stirring regularly.
Add raisins, dill, salt, black pepper, and sweet bell pepper, cover, and cook on very low heat for 20 minutes, watching to prevent burning.
Wrap the mixture in forty grape leaves as usual, place them in a pot, pour lemon juice and tomato juice over them, and cook on low heat for 1 to 4 hours.

04b3fa3c-a2bf-4f3f-bd75-996d9fe97704.name: Stuffed Lamb
04b3fa3c-a2bf-4f3f-bd75-996d9fe97704.description: A deliciously stuffed lamb dish with aromatic spices and herbs.
instructions: Clean a relatively fatty small lamb and boil it in a pot of water.
Once boiling, sauté the liver, heart, and kidneys with plenty of onions.
Add some lamb broth to cook the mixture, then sprinkle chopped dill and spices before mixing in rice, raisins, and pistachios.
Stuff the mixture into the lamb, sew it up, rub yogurt on both sides, sprinkle with cinnamon, and cook in the pot with lamb broth until done.

0119ffc0-648d-4968-8bcf-15bc9b9f6ca7.name: Stuffed Onions
0119ffc0-648d-4968-8bcf-15bc9b9f6ca7.description: Delicious stuffed onions filled with a savory mixture of celery and tomatoes.
instructions: Peel the onions and hollow them out, leaving three wedges.
Finely chop the removed onion pieces and sauté with celery in oil until cooked.
Add crushed walnuts and tomato puree to the mixture.
Cook the mixture slightly, then fill the hollowed onions with it.
Arrange the stuffed onions in a heatproof dish and pour tomato juice over them.
Cook everything on low heat until done.

a460fe43-0591-4460-aee7-a27bd5ae0837.name: Potato and Cheddar Cheese Kuku
a460fe43-0591-4460-aee7-a27bd5ae0837.description: A delicious Persian potato dish with cheddar cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Peel and grate the potatoes.
Grate the onion.
Mix the potatoes, onion, egg, cheese, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and drop spoonfuls of the mixture.
Fry until golden, then flip to brown the other side.
Remove from oil and drain on a sieve.
Serve in a dish.

ea7ecb1b-dcb3-4fc9-9b59-30e4fdb276e2.name: Potato Kuku with Diced Potatoes
ea7ecb1b-dcb3-4fc9-9b59-30e4fdb276e2.description: A delicious Persian potato dish, crispy on the outside and fluffy inside.
instructions: Heat the oil in a non-stick pan.
Mix the onion with the diced potatoes, salt, and pepper.
Break the eggs in a small bowl and whisk slightly.
Add the eggs to the potato and onion mixture and pour into the hot oil.
Cover the pan to allow the kuku to set.
Once set, flip it to brown the other side.
Serve hot.

9a838c73-fdeb-44bb-ac9b-34c0aeea82c8.name: Potato and Cabbage Kuku
9a838c73-fdeb-44bb-ac9b-34c0aeea82c8.description: A delicious Persian omelette made with potatoes and cabbage.
instructions: Peel and mash the cooked potatoes, and finely chop the cooked cabbage.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat and sauté the onion until soft.
Spread the onion evenly in the pan, then mix the potatoes, cabbage, eggs, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture into the pan and flatten the top with the back of a spoon.
Cover the pan and reduce heat to allow the kuku to set.
Remove the lid, cut the kuku, and flip to brown the other side.
The kuku is ready to serve.

4e3e9413-ce9f-45d4-845e-f04451da16aa.name: Potato and Spinach Frittata
4e3e9413-ce9f-45d4-845e-f04451da16aa.description: A delicious frittata packed with potatoes, spinach, and creamy cheese.
ingredients: 50 grams of chopped fresh herbs (like dill and parsley)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease a 23 cm round cake pan lined with parchment paper.
Peel the potatoes, boil them in salted water for 10 minutes, then slice thinly.
Wash the spinach, steam it until soft, then drain and chop finely.
Beat the eggs and mix in the cream cheese, spinach, and herbs.
Layer the potato slices in the pan, cover with the spinach mixture, and add another layer of potatoes.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in a water bath for 45-50 minutes.
Invert the frittata, remove the paper, and serve with lettuce and tomato salad.

c5a2d500-4f12-4daf-9c75-ac47cab8d6c1.name: Stuffed Cabbage with Chicken
c5a2d500-4f12-4daf-9c75-ac47cab8d6c1.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with chicken and spices, steamed to perfection.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot and add 3 tablespoons of salt.
Separate the cabbage leaves and blanch them in boiling water for a few seconds.
Transfer the leaves to cold water, then lay them out on a clean cloth.
Finely chop the chicken, mushrooms, and green onions; grate the boiled potatoes.
Mix these ingredients with salt, pepper, ginger, and garlic in a bowl.
Take a cabbage leaf, place a spoonful of the mixture inside, and roll it up.
Place the rolled cabbage in a pot with water and steam for 2 hours on medium heat.
For the sauce, sauté a chopped onion in 2 tablespoons of oil, add mushrooms, and cook.
Add 1.5 to 2 cups of water and a grated small potato with salt and pepper.
Thicken the sauce, mix in 2 tablespoons of cream, and blend until smooth.
Pour the sauce over the cooked cabbage rolls.

9a432d58-bb86-48c8-b495-3586888d9639.name: Mushroom and Rice Frittata
9a432d58-bb86-48c8-b495-3586888d9639.description: A delicious frittata with mushrooms, rice, and cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the onions.
Add garlic and chopped bell pepper, sauté for 6 more minutes.
Cook washed rice in chicken broth and butter for 25 minutes.
Sauté mushrooms in another pan, then mix with rice and other ingredients.
Beat eggs in a blender and add cheese, then combine with the mixture.
Pour everything into the pan, fry like a frittata, and slice.

6be40d40-67f7-425e-86c9-6b15f9a5f4b5.name: Spinach Soup
6be40d40-67f7-425e-86c9-6b15f9a5f4b5.description: A creamy and flavorful spinach soup, perfect for a light meal.
instructions: Cook spinach with 1/2 cup of water, then strain and press to remove excess water.
Sauté flour until raw smell disappears, then add milk and stir until boiling.
Melt butter and sauté spinach, adding salt, pepper, and fried onion.
Pour in the milk and flour mixture, stir well, and garnish with cream.

072d48c3-2b0d-4b4c-9b59-cc2db4e99cef.name: Pumpkin Soup
072d48c3-2b0d-4b4c-9b59-cc2db4e99cef.description: A creamy and comforting pumpkin soup perfect for chilly days.
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot, then add chopped onion and cook until soft.
Add pumpkin and potatoes, cooking for five minutes, then add chicken broth and simmer for 20 minutes until soft.
Blend the soup until smooth and return to the pot, adding nutmeg.
Before serving, stir in cream and heat through. Serve with extra cream and chives if desired.

22178315-f926-463b-b803-c8fc71c01ec3.name: Minestrone
22178315-f926-463b-b803-c8fc71c01ec3.description: A hearty vegetable soup with chicken and pasta, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Bring chicken stock to a boil in a pot.
Sauté chicken pieces in oil until no longer pink, then add to the pot.
Cook for five minutes, then reduce heat.
Add carrots, celery, broccoli, and onion in order of firmness, cooking for 10 minutes.
Skim off any foam from the soup.
Add pasta, parsley, nutmeg, and ginger, and simmer for another 10 minutes.
Stir in butter, taste, and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Serve in a bowl, garnished with parsley.

f57e9755-48f2-4592-b579-49f6168f5ac7.name: Scallion Soup
f57e9755-48f2-4592-b579-49f6168f5ac7.description: A creamy and savory scallion soup with mushrooms and carrots.
ingredients: Lemon juice, salt, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Boil barley with chicken broth and several cups of water.
Grate the carrots and add them to the pot.
Add chopped mushrooms and scallions along with salt and turmeric.
Let it simmer on low heat.
After ten minutes, add milk, then cream after five more minutes.
Turn off the heat and serve with lemon juice.

c4893034-4b12-44d8-941b-eceb987b7d9d.name: Grain Soup
c4893034-4b12-44d8-941b-eceb987b7d9d.description: A hearty soup packed with grains and vegetables for a nutritious meal.
instructions: Soak the grains beforehand, then cook the wheat and add the rice until cooked.
Add the rolled barley, corn, and chopped carrots to the soup, season with salt, and add parsley. Boil until ready.

3c137821-907f-47d5-a584-d80fb78cb820.name: Milk Soup with Vegetables
3c137821-907f-47d5-a584-d80fb78cb820.description: A creamy and hearty soup filled with vegetables and chicken.
instructions: Soak barley beforehand, then cook with water, chicken, and onion until tender.
Add chopped bell pepper and carrots, simmer for 3-4 hours.
Finally, add milk, cream, mushrooms, and parsley, bring to a boil, and finish with lemon juice.

ab0e91e5-92d1-4945-b217-157d244912b5.name: Eggplant Soup
ab0e91e5-92d1-4945-b217-157d244912b5.description: A rich and flavorful soup made with eggplant and spices.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Peel and chop the eggplants, then sauté them in butter.
Add chopped onion and garlic, and cook until soft.
Grate the tomatoes into a puree and add to the pot with water.
Add the sautéed eggplant, garlic, onion, red pepper powder, black pepper, salt, and grated ginger.
Simmer on low heat for 20 minutes until the eggplants are fully cooked.

997b63c2-7e39-4c18-bf21-6be43fa4fb30.name: Zucchini Soup with Onion
997b63c2-7e39-4c18-bf21-6be43fa4fb30.description: A creamy and flavorful zucchini soup, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onions, olive oil, salt, and pepper over high heat for five minutes until soft.
Add curry powder and sauté for another two minutes, then add zucchini, chicken broth, and rice.
Once the soup boils, reduce heat and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes until ingredients are cooked.
Blend the soup until smooth and serve in bowls, garnished with yogurt and thin strips of zucchini.

0ea38d07-234a-48f3-8f12-67b42023057a.name: Lentil Soup
0ea38d07-234a-48f3-8f12-67b42023057a.description: A hearty and flavorful lentil soup packed with vegetables.
ingredients: Red pepper and hot sauce to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot and sauté onion for five minutes.
Add celery, carrots, half of the garlic, and all the potatoes; cook for a few more minutes.
Stir in lentils and chicken broth, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until soft.
Add bay leaves, remaining garlic, and half of the lemon juice; cook for another ten minutes.
Remove bay leaves, add remaining lemon juice, and puree the soup.
Stir in cumin, salt, pepper, and red pepper.
Serve garnished with lemon slices and parsley.

274018ce-b46d-486c-b6d2-80752e031122.name: Shaped Pasta Soup
274018ce-b46d-486c-b6d2-80752e031122.description: A comforting soup with shaped pasta and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Bring chicken broth with fried onion, salt, and pepper to a boil.
Add pasta and tomato paste, cooking until pasta is tender, then stir in dried mint.
Serve hot, adding lemon juice to taste.

d66746e7-f496-410a-ac3f-623f423ca9a3.name: Corn Soup
d66746e7-f496-410a-ac3f-623f423ca9a3.description: A creamy and flavorful corn soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Combine corn, celery, parsley, onion, water, salt, and pepper; cook for 30 minutes.
Strain the mixture, mix flour with milk, add to the soup, stir in cream, and heat until boiling.

d91a2cf0-87bc-4153-9c36-5cffe7fcbb81.name: Lentil and Pasta Soup
d91a2cf0-87bc-4153-9c36-5cffe7fcbb81.description: A hearty and flavorful soup with lentils and pasta, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Fresh basil and parsley, to taste
Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Crush one garlic clove and boil with lentils in water for 20 minutes, then drain and rinse.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil and 1 tablespoon of butter, sauté onion and celery for 5 minutes.
Crush the remaining garlic cloves and add with the rest of the olive oil to the pot.
Add tomato paste and lentils, stir, then add chopped herbs, salt, and pepper.
Once boiling, reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Increase heat, add pasta, and reduce heat once boiling again.
When pasta is cooked, add remaining butter, adjust seasoning, and serve garnished with herbs.

b889ec58-7647-4316-8d93-eb9edc0a3f4e.name: Mushroom Cream Soup
b889ec58-7647-4316-8d93-eb9edc0a3f4e.description: A creamy and savory mushroom soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot and add chopped mushrooms, cooking for 5 minutes.
Stir in flour until raw smell disappears, then add chicken broth and milk, bringing to a boil for 10 minutes.
Add parsley, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, then remove from heat.
Serve in a soup bowl, garnished with parsley, and enjoy.

9ed7cd5d-5936-4b83-a1f9-db635c9203bc.name: Leek Soup
9ed7cd5d-5936-4b83-a1f9-db635c9203bc.description: A creamy and flavorful leek soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Slice the white parts of the leeks and cook them in salted water until tender, about 20 minutes.
Sauté the flour in butter until golden, then gradually add the broth while stirring until fully dissolved.
Add the cooked leeks to the mixture and let it simmer until slightly thickened, then season with salt and pepper.
Whisk the egg yolks and mix with lemon juice, then gradually pour the hot soup over them while stirring.
Add cream to the soup, stir well, and optionally garnish with parsley before serving.

ebabc6aa-9b0f-4747-9943-c327267bb09c.name: Garlic Soup
ebabc6aa-9b0f-4747-9943-c327267bb09c.description: A creamy and flavorful garlic soup perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Peel garlic cloves and place them in a pot with some water, adding salt and pepper.
Simmer until the garlic is soft, then mash it into a puree.
Beat an egg in a bowl and mix in some water.
Add a portion of the garlic puree to the egg, then combine it with the rest of the puree.
Gradually add warm water, cover, and cook on low heat until done.

34b50357-df48-4ee1-8469-d06ded8c07fb.name: Minestrone
34b50357-df48-4ee1-8469-d06ded8c07fb.description: A hearty Italian soup filled with vegetables and pasta.
instructions: Cook green beans with chopped onion, carrots, and sliced zucchini in broth.
Once cooked, add red beans, chickpeas, pasta, tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
Finally, add butter and let the soup simmer.
Serve in a bowl and garnish with parsley.

d19f6adf-4159-4dba-af1f-2ce796edcf07.name: Russian Borscht Soup
d19f6adf-4159-4dba-af1f-2ce796edcf07.description: A hearty beet soup with meat and vegetables, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: 1.5 kg beef shank and shank meat
200 g cooked red or pinto beans
Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces and cook with chopped onion, turmeric, and water.
Once cooked, add beet and green beans, then add sautéed cabbage.
Add carrots, pinto beans, potatoes, salt, and pepper.
After the soup thickens, sauté tomato paste in a little oil and add it.
If the soup is too thin, add 2 cups of white sauce.
When serving, add cream and turn off the heat.
Garnish the prepared soup with a little cream.

129432f3-37a9-4388-a30e-f82f6e946818.name: Cabbage and Carrot Soup
129432f3-37a9-4388-a30e-f82f6e946818.description: A hearty soup with cabbage, carrots, and ground meat, perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil chopped cabbage in water until it softens, then drain to remove the smell.
Cook the drained cabbage with carrots, potatoes, and chopped onion.
Add rice to the soup.
Form ground meat into small meatballs and add to the boiling soup.
Season with salt, black pepper, and tomato paste, and let it simmer.
For added flavor, squeeze some lemon juice before serving.

1943e1c5-a0af-4be5-bf9a-2fb6b622dfc3.name: Rice Soup
1943e1c5-a0af-4be5-bf9a-2fb6b622dfc3.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with rice, meat, and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black/red pepper to taste
1/2 cup chopped parsley, cilantro, and celery
instructions: Fry the sliced onion in melted butter, then add the ground meat.
Add about 5 glasses of water and the remaining ingredients except the egg.
Cook on low heat until the soup is ready.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg and gradually add it to the soup while stirring.
Once the egg is cooked, the soup is ready to serve. Enjoy with your favorite seasoning.

0e9ec0dd-5dcc-4cc4-a219-f3dda04f5bd8.name: Leek Soup
0e9ec0dd-5dcc-4cc4-a219-f3dda04f5bd8.description: A creamy and comforting leek soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Sauté onion and leeks until soft, then add flour.
After 5 minutes, add to chicken broth, then stir in chicken and milk. Finish with cream before serving.

fe30eefd-50d9-48d2-acd6-f5dec3c76b2c.name: Egg Drop Soup
fe30eefd-50d9-48d2-acd6-f5dec3c76b2c.description: A light and savory soup with delicate egg ribbons.
instructions: Pour chicken broth into a pot and add chopped green onions; heat gently.
Mix sugar, soy sauce, cornstarch, and cold water in a bowl, then add to the pot and stir.
After one minute, reduce heat and beat eggs with water in a separate bowl; slowly pour into the soup while stirring with a fork.
After two minutes, the soup is ready.

2503d158-2cfd-4fde-928b-881b414e4dae.name: Pea Soup
2503d158-2cfd-4fde-928b-881b414e4dae.description: A creamy and flavorful pea soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: In a medium pot, melt the butter and sauté the shallots until soft.
Add chicken broth and chopped mint, bring to a boil, then season with salt and pepper.
Stir in the peas and cook for 10 minutes until tender.
Blend the mixture until smooth, then serve in a bowl garnished with mint leaves and cream.

b3635cb9-0e29-4a3f-9ade-299b4f1f984c.name: Sooz Soup
b3635cb9-0e29-4a3f-9ade-299b4f1f984c.description: A hearty soup filled with vegetables and flavorful meatballs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat and add chopped onion.
After five minutes, add minced garlic and sauté until golden.
Stir in tomato paste for one minute, then add chicken broth.
Once boiling, add carrots, green beans, and peas.
Mix ground meat with mint, parsley, egg, salt, and pepper, then form small meatballs.
After vegetables are cooked, add meatballs to the soup and let simmer for 30 minutes.
Finally, add vinegar, oregano, and chopped coriander before serving.

bbd18562-664a-4840-8745-544e3787c52d.name: Bean Soup
bbd18562-664a-4840-8745-544e3787c52d.description: A hearty and flavorful bean soup with chicken and fresh herbs.
instructions: Soak the beans in chicken broth, then add garlic and onion; let cook for several hours.
In a pan, heat olive oil, sauté green onions, add pepper and chicken; cook for 15 minutes.
Add cheese to the pot, then garnish with tomatoes and cilantro.

a87c9511-3128-4d03-a91d-6fc5e90bdcd4.name: Basil and Tomato Soup
a87c9511-3128-4d03-a91d-6fc5e90bdcd4.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with fresh basil and ripe tomatoes.
instructions: In a large pot, mix chicken broth and tomatoes and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes, then add basil and sugar, followed by cream and butter, stirring until melted.

db0a52a6-0275-4499-b000-1ed6adf0811c.name: Tomato and Eggplant Soup
db0a52a6-0275-4499-b000-1ed6adf0811c.description: A hearty soup with tomatoes, eggplant, and spices for a comforting meal.
instructions: In a suitable pot, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil, then add chopped garlic, carrots, tomatoes, salt, and pepper to sauté.

In another container, mix 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 1 tablespoon of salt, pepper, curry powder, cooked chickpeas, and eggplant, adding some water, and let it simmer for 45 minutes until soft. Combine all ingredients and cook for a few more minutes.

bd081b82-0acb-4232-9e07-8a2a3a7df763.name: Beef and Potato Soup
bd081b82-0acb-4232-9e07-8a2a3a7df763.description: A hearty soup with tender beef and creamy potatoes, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Peel and dice the potatoes into small pieces. Wash and chop the celery.
In a pot, combine potatoes, celery, onion, and beef with some water. Bring to a boil and cook for 15 minutes until soft.
In a separate pan over medium heat, melt the butter and sauté the flour for 1 minute.
Gradually add the milk, stirring well. After 4-5 minutes, when thickened, pour it into the soup and season with salt and pepper.

d6ba7073-28dc-4845-a996-ca5bad1783bc.name: Corn Soup with Chicken
d6ba7073-28dc-4845-a996-ca5bad1783bc.description: A creamy and flavorful corn soup enriched with tender chicken and spices.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot and add onions. Cook for 3 minutes until soft.
Add garlic and cook for another 30 seconds. Add chicken, cumin, parsley, red pepper, salt, and water. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir in beans, corn, and sour cream. Serve hot.

3f8f3973-875b-4b05-860e-a49c9f2837ae.name: Chinese Soup
3f8f3973-875b-4b05-860e-a49c9f2837ae.description: A creamy and flavorful soup packed with vegetables and chicken.
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and sauté the onion.
Add hard vegetables like carrots and celery, then sauté.
Add mushrooms and leek, sauté briefly.
Stir in cornstarch and milk, then add soy sauce.
Finally, add chicken stock and soup noodles, let it simmer.

2a2736ef-e90f-4af3-9dce-85d072a19a90.name: Broccoli Soup
2a2736ef-e90f-4af3-9dce-85d072a19a90.description: A creamy and flavorful broccoli soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Dice the potatoes. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter over heat and add the onion. Cook for 5 minutes on low heat.
Add chicken broth and potatoes, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the broccoli and cook for another 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, cut the toast and sauté in a mixture of butter, oil, and garlic. Blend the soup and return it to the pot, adjusting salt and pepper. Heat the soup and serve garnished with toasted bread.

fcc0f825-bc22-43d3-ab8d-43789bb00abf.name: Milk and Lentil Soup
fcc0f825-bc22-43d3-ab8d-43789bb00abf.description: A creamy and hearty soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Cook the lentils until the water is completely absorbed, then sauté them after cooling.
In a separate pot, sauté the onion in butter, add flour, and cook both together.
Gradually add chicken broth and milk, then stir in the lentils and heat.
Once boiling, add salt, pepper, and lemon juice, then reduce heat to let the soup thicken.
Serve garnished with cream and chopped parsley.

be7ca977-04d2-4600-9271-08d94c426aca.name: Spicy Vegetable Soup
be7ca977-04d2-4600-9271-08d94c426aca.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with fresh vegetables and spices.
instructions: Fry chopped eggplants in 2 tbsp olive oil, cover for 30 minutes, and set aside.
In another pan, heat 3 tbsp olive oil, sauté onions for 4 minutes, add garlic for 1 minute, then add bell peppers and oregano, cooking for 10 minutes.
Chop tomatoes and add to eggplants with fennel seeds, add several cups of water, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Mix cooked beans with lemon juice, sugar, cilantro, salt, pepper, and the remaining ingredients.

47b0d078-8218-43e3-b318-57cf9053c830.name: Broccoli and Chicken Soup
47b0d078-8218-43e3-b318-57cf9053c830.description: A creamy and hearty soup packed with chicken and broccoli flavors.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot.
Add chicken, potatoes, celery, and onion; cook for 30 minutes.
Blend the mixture until smooth, return to pot.
Add broccoli, sour cream, salt, and pepper; cook for 15 minutes over medium heat.

64b7c5e4-e0bd-49a9-ab62-169844fb9263.name: Pasta and Black-eyed Pea Soup
64b7c5e4-e0bd-49a9-ab62-169844fb9263.description: A hearty soup filled with pasta, black-eyed peas, and spinach.
ingredients: 4 rosemary leaves or 1 tablespoon dried rosemary
instructions: Combine chicken broth, garlic, rosemary, and red pepper; bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes to extract flavors.
In another pot, mash half of the black-eyed peas.
Remove garlic and rosemary, then add mashed and whole peas with tomatoes.
Add pasta and cook on low heat for 10-12 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve the soup garnished with olive oil and Parmesan cheese.

8fba347f-c7e3-4b8b-8681-b89abd45ba9e.name: Diet Soup
8fba347f-c7e3-4b8b-8681-b89abd45ba9e.description: A nutritious and hearty soup perfect for cold days.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, fresh lemon juice to taste
1 small glass chopped parsley and coriander
instructions: Boil carrots and half of the onions in chicken broth for 15 minutes.
Add potatoes and peas to the mixture.
Peel and finely chop the tomatoes, then add them without frying.
Reduce heat and let the soup simmer.
If using tomato paste, add 2 tablespoons and reduce salt.
Dissolve potato flour in a glass of hot water and add with remaining onions.
When the soup is nearly cooked, add noodles gently to avoid breaking.
Adjust salt, pepper, and add fresh lemon juice before serving.
Serve hot, garnished with remaining parsley and coriander.

3c484c56-2f2e-42e0-a29c-5e7f0a6612ac.name: Milk Soup
3c484c56-2f2e-42e0-a29c-5e7f0a6612ac.description: A creamy and nutritious soup perfect for cold days.
instructions: Soak barley and bulgur in cold water for 30 minutes.
Finely chop carrots and potatoes, set aside.
Chop onion and sauté with chicken in 4 glasses of water over low heat.
After an hour, add barley, bulgur, and carrots to the pot.
Wait another hour for the carrots to cook thoroughly.
Add potatoes, keeping the heat low and covered.
Once cooked, remove the lid and let some water evaporate.
If using bone-in chicken, remove bones now and return the meat to the soup.
Dissolve a tablespoon of flour in a glass of cold milk and stir into the soup.
Gradually add the remaining milk, stirring continuously.
Leave the lid off and increase heat slightly, stirring occasionally.
After an hour, the soup is ready; the longer it cooks, the thicker it gets.
Add parsley a few minutes before serving, then turn off the heat.
Add lemon juice and adjust salt before serving.

6db01fee-63dc-4b68-a83a-4e411d246c65.name: Lamb Shank Soup
6db01fee-63dc-4b68-a83a-4e411d246c65.description: A hearty and nutritious soup perfect for cold weather and seasonal illnesses.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and lemon juice to taste
instructions: Break the lamb shank bone in half, clean the shank, and remove excess fat.
In a pot, combine the shank, one onion, bay leaf, and 6-8 cups of water. Bring to a boil, skim off foam, reduce heat, and cover.
After 1.5 hours, remove the bay leaf and onion. Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pot.
Grate the remaining onion, peel and dice the carrots and potato, and add them along with the peas and pureed tomato after 30 minutes.
Mix chopped parsley, cilantro, and basil, adding half of the grated onion in the last 10 minutes of cooking.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice, then serve hot.

7856cb29-0d67-4db1-9f2f-0d0a66ecaa97.name: Zucchini Soup
7856cb29-0d67-4db1-9f2f-0d0a66ecaa97.description: A creamy and flavorful zucchini soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Heat the chicken broth over medium heat until warm.
Slice the zucchini and leeks, sauté in oil until slightly soft, then add to the broth.
Increase heat to boil, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Strain the soup, puree the vegetables, and return to the pot.
Adjust heat to low, stir well, and add grated carrots.
After 10 minutes, add cream and stir continuously.
In the last 5 minutes, add salt, pepper, and nutmeg to taste.
Serve the soup in a bowl.

4edba833-3467-488e-a73e-e502b336dd9d.name: Yogurt Soup
4edba833-3467-488e-a73e-e502b336dd9d.description: A creamy and flavorful yogurt soup with fresh herbs and spices.
instructions: Whisk the yogurt well and mix with flour, pepper, and salt in a pot.
After cooking for 10 minutes, add chopped green peppers and simmer.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté garlic, ginger, cumin, turmeric, and curry powder.
Add coriander leaves to the pan and sauté briefly, then mix with the pot.
Cover and cook for another 10 minutes, then serve the soup warm.

1b55a0c3-17b6-4391-89b0-4d9f8ced7dc2.name: Potato and Bell Pepper Soup
1b55a0c3-17b6-4391-89b0-4d9f8ced7dc2.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with potatoes and bell peppers, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Reserve a quarter of one bell pepper and chop the rest finely.
Peel and dice the potatoes, then add them to the pot with chopped onion and minced garlic.
Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes until everything is tender.
Blend the mixture until smooth in a food processor or blender.
Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste, serve warm, and garnish with chopped red bell pepper.

299cb7dc-627a-4203-a7b2-5d091fc4c988.name: Mushroom Soup with Meatballs
299cb7dc-627a-4203-a7b2-5d091fc4c988.description: A hearty soup with tender meatballs and fresh mushrooms.
instructions: Grate the onion and mix with ground meat, crushed garlic, and flour.
Add egg white and form small balls.
Heat oil in a pot and sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add chicken broth, bring to a boil, then add lemon juice and mushrooms.
Cook for 10 minutes, then add meatballs and chopped spinach.
After 15 minutes, season with salt and pepper.

807027c4-63fc-4da7-bb98-022d64edb3e5.name: Soup
807027c4-63fc-4da7-bb98-022d64edb3e5.description: A nourishing soup perfect for recovery, with vibrant flavors and a delightful appearance.
instructions: Avoid using tomato paste for a vibrant color; use tomato juice instead.
Add an eggshell to the soup and let it boil for 15 minutes for clarity.
Use minimal ingredients; for a delicious onion soup, combine potato, water, and onion.
Serve in a deep, single-colored bowl for an appealing presentation.
Decorate with complementary colors, like dark parsley on white cream soup.

ec02ced7-0171-4161-9784-194bf0e8bee0.name: Potato and Chickpea Soup
ec02ced7-0171-4161-9784-194bf0e8bee0.description: A hearty soup packed with chickpeas, potatoes, and spinach.
instructions: Drain the cooked chickpeas in a colander.
Peel and dice the potatoes, then combine with broth and olive oil in a large pot until soft.
Add spinach and cook for an additional five minutes.
Stir in the chickpeas and remaining ingredients.
Slice the sausages and add them to the pot until cooked through.
Serve the soup hot.

c4acce64-2ad0-41eb-a323-89487eb45403.name: Meat and Noodle Soup
c4acce64-2ad0-41eb-a323-89487eb45403.description: A hearty and flavorful soup with tender meat and noodles.
instructions: Melt butter in a large pan and sauté the meat.
Chop the tomatoes and add them with the chopped onion to the pan.
Sauté for 10 minutes, then add parsley, coriander, turmeric, cinnamon, and red pepper.
Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Add chicken broth, small onions, and water, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and let simmer for 30 minutes.
Add soup noodles and cook for 5 more minutes.
Garnish the soup with lemon and coriander before serving.

b3d6ef1e-6c0f-43ce-8300-e4d7f20f9cbf.name: Onion Soup 2
b3d6ef1e-6c0f-43ce-8300-e4d7f20f9cbf.description: A rich and flavorful onion soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onions in olive oil until soft, then add sugar and cook for 10 more minutes.
Add crushed garlic, then vinegar, chicken broth, bay leaf, and turmeric. Blend until smooth, return to pot, season with salt and pepper, and heat for another 30 minutes. Serve with toast.

7cd097d8-b351-4c6f-b8d5-108a9ce20998.name: Onion Soup
7cd097d8-b351-4c6f-b8d5-108a9ce20998.description: A rich and flavorful onion soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot over heat.
Chop onions and sauté in butter until golden.
Add flour and stir, then let it boil for a few seconds.
Pour in some water and let it simmer on medium heat for 30 minutes.
Add lemon juice and sugar, and cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Stir in cinnamon and mint, then remove from heat.
Add eggs to the soup and serve with bread and fresh vegetables.

e99ad002-41a9-4969-af2e-eef2fae312d8.name: Fish Soup
e99ad002-41a9-4969-af2e-eef2fae312d8.description: A rich and flavorful fish soup perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: Olive or sesame oil, as needed
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté the onion until soft.
Add the fish and sauté gently, then season with salt, pepper, and garam masala.
Pour in a cup of water and let the fish cook on low heat.
Remove the fish once cooked and let it cool.
Add chopped leek and celery to the pot to cook with a little water.
Mash the mixture with a blender, then add carrot and red pepper.
Shred the fish and add it back to the pot along with green onions.
Toast the flour in a separate pan, then add butter without browning it.
Pour in saffron and two cups of milk, stirring until thickened.
Add cheese on top and serve immediately once melted.
Garnish with cilantro and red pepper, serving with toasted bread.

1b131bda-ecff-4909-be17-ebbe7ec91597.name: Pumpkin Soup
1b131bda-ecff-4909-be17-ebbe7ec91597.description: A creamy and flavorful pumpkin soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Cut the peeled pumpkin into large pieces and cook in a pot with some water.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and chopped leeks, then reduce heat to cook gently.
Add ginger and cumin to the sautéed garlic and leeks, cook for a few minutes, then transfer to the pot with partially cooked pumpkin. Add chicken broth and season with salt and pepper.
Cover the pot and reduce heat. Cook the soup for about 4 to 5 hours.
Once cooked, blend the soup until smooth, return to the pot, and heat for another hour. Top with yogurt and garnish with cilantro.

9a85a55a-bdda-40c2-bd5e-a4773ed84642.name: Italian Vegetable Soup
9a85a55a-bdda-40c2-bd5e-a4773ed84642.description: A hearty and nutritious vegetable soup with pasta and herbs.
ingredients: 2 tbsp chopped mint, tarragon, and cilantro
instructions: Cook the beans in water (or use canned beans).
Pour broth into a pot and bring to a boil.
Add cloves, chopped green beans, and cook until slightly soft.
Slice onion and carrots, add them to the pot.
When beans soften, add sliced zucchini, peas, and pasta.
Ensure all ingredients are cooked but not mushy.
Add salt, pepper, and more water if needed.
Finish with butter and chopped herbs before serving hot.

c721245c-7d22-40f6-824d-e5a90523269d.name: French Soup
c721245c-7d22-40f6-824d-e5a90523269d.description: A hearty soup with barley, vegetables, and a rich flavor.
instructions: Place the beef bone in a pot, add water, and bring to a boil.
Remove the bone, rinse it, and return it to the pot with fresh water to eliminate scum.
Add two onions to remove any unpleasant odor.
Add barley, onion, and cabbage, and let cook for 2 hours.
Remove the bone, add a little salt if using a pressure cooker to prevent discoloration.
Stir in the tomato paste for color.
Add cilantro, pepper, and salt in the final cooking stage, simmering until the greens are tender but still vibrant.
Optionally garnish with fresh lemon.

ab7c8f75-0bc4-4b0d-b622-12c8bece914f.name: Corn Soup
ab7c8f75-0bc4-4b0d-b622-12c8bece914f.description: A creamy and flavorful corn soup with roasted peppers.
instructions: Roast the peppers in a pan until the skin blisters, then place them in a plastic bag and seal it for 10 minutes.
Peel the peppers, halve them, remove the seeds, and chop. Sauté the onions in butter until soft, then add the peppers and corn, cooking for 10 minutes.
Blend the mixture until smooth, return it to the pot, add reserved chopped peppers and some corn, and simmer for a few minutes.
Serve the soup garnished with pepper strips, corn kernels, and cream.

4f432fed-0560-4539-937d-6bb528e925b0.name: Bean Soup
4f432fed-0560-4539-937d-6bb528e925b0.description: A hearty and flavorful bean soup perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Soak the pinto beans overnight in cold water, then cook in a pot.
Add carrots, garlic, onion, dried pepper, and chicken broth, bring to a boil, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend half of the mixture with some soup water until smooth, then return to the pot.
Add tomatoes and celery, heat for 10-15 minutes until celery is tender, adding boiled water if needed.
