Cut toast into small cubes and fry with grated garlic in oil until golden, then drain excess oil.
Add salt, pepper, and chopped coriander to the soup, heat for a few minutes, then serve with fried bread on top.

427c71af-a07d-428c-a653-8ce4110ae669.name: Leek Soup
427c71af-a07d-428c-a653-8ce4110ae669.description: A creamy and flavorful leek soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Wash the leeks, remove the excess parts and roots, and slice them evenly.
Sauté the leeks in oil, dissolve the flour in cold water, pour over the leeks, add broth, and boil.
Add salt and pepper, mix egg yolks with sour cream and lemon juice, then stir into the soup.
Garnish the soup with fried croutons before serving.

31384685-3b86-40a0-8c23-8d32dd497633.name: Tomato Soup with Spiral Pasta
31384685-3b86-40a0-8c23-8d32dd497633.description: A delicious and hearty tomato soup with pasta, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Arrange the sausages on a plate and microwave for 2 minutes at 100% power until dried.
Combine olive oil, garlic, and onion in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 4 minutes at 100% power, stirring once.
Add chopped tomatoes, boiled water, and spiral pasta to the sautéed mixture and microwave for 15 minutes at 100% power, stirring twice.
If the pasta is not cooked, add an additional 5-10 minutes.
Stir in chopped basil or parsley and heat for another minute. Serve the soup in a bowl, garnished with basil leaves and chopped sausage.

6ad21f1a-71ba-467d-ad41-a69a9586e510.name: Winter Vegetable Soup
6ad21f1a-71ba-467d-ad41-a69a9586e510.description: A hearty and nutritious soup perfect for cold days.
instructions: Pour chicken broth into a large pot and add bay leaves, bringing it to a boil.
Chop carrots into small cubes, then add potato, celery, and leek to the boiling broth and cook well.
Add the rolled barley, tomato paste, and pepper to the broth, and wait for all vegetables to cook.
Serve with toasted bread and parsley.

594bd28b-aca2-4b98-891a-aadada7a6e21.name: White Soup
594bd28b-aca2-4b98-891a-aadada7a6e21.description: A creamy and comforting soup with vegetables and a rich white sauce.
instructions: Mix white sauce and beef broth in a pot.
Add chopped celery and grated carrots, bring to a boil.
Season with salt and pepper once vegetables are cooked.
Serve in a bowl and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
For white sauce, combine flour and milk gradually until smooth.
Cook over heat, stirring until thickened, then add butter and remove from heat.

e6011d53-f127-4ec8-91e5-8a26996a7825.name: Spinach and Cream Soup
e6011d53-f127-4ec8-91e5-8a26996a7825.description: A creamy and flavorful spinach soup, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: 2 small pieces of shredded red meat
instructions: Clean the spinach leaves and remove any excess stems.
Boil the diluted salted water and add the spinach, cooking for 5 to 6 minutes.
Remove the spinach and drain excess water.
Blend the spinach using a meat grinder or blender until smooth.
Sauté the chopped onions in butter until golden.
Remove from heat and sprinkle flour over the onions.
Return to heat and stir for 1 to 2 minutes until the flour is cooked.
Add the drained spinach water and stir until it becomes a smooth soup.
Return to heat and bring to a boil.
Add the blended spinach and cream, then season with spices.
Serve the soup in bowls, garnished with black pepper, sliced eggs, and pieces of meat.

8f75de08-b5cf-4912-a45d-3d67a46d078c.name: Mushroom and Chicken Soup
8f75de08-b5cf-4912-a45d-3d67a46d078c.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with mushrooms and tender chicken.
instructions: Wash and slice the mushrooms vertically, then sauté in a little oil.
Sauté chicken wings and neck with fried onion, chopped carrots, peas, bell pepper, salt, and turmeric in a pan with a little water until reduced.
Lightly sauté flour with butter, add salt and pepper, and gradually mix in milk to avoid lumps.
Remove chicken bones and add the mixture to the flour mix.
Add the sautéed mushrooms to the soup and stir continuously.
Add garlic powder and adjust thickness by cooking longer if needed, then stir in parsley.
Remove from heat and add cream before serving.

7bd356b4-4277-4ffc-ad3c-28d8ed53b41e.name: Creamy Barley Soup
7bd356b4-4277-4ffc-ad3c-28d8ed53b41e.description: A rich and creamy soup filled with barley, vegetables, and a hint of lemon.
instructions: Cook barley, grated potato, and grated carrot slowly, adding chicken broth to prevent sticking.
Add a small lamb trotter for flavor, then remove bones and blend the trotter into the soup.
Toast a spoon of flour until raw smell disappears, then mix with butter until smooth.
Add the flour mixture to the soup for thickness.
Pour in milk and bring to a boil, then add vinegar and lemon juice before serving.
Stir in canned peas just before serving, ensuring they are heated through.
Thin cream with milk for garnish and serve hot.

6f9c6391-5b32-448c-9a9a-72e436c122c2.name: Creamy Spinach Soup
6f9c6391-5b32-448c-9a9a-72e436c122c2.description: A rich and velvety soup packed with fresh spinach flavor.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Pour water into a pot and bring to a boil. Add spinach and cook for 5-6 minutes.
Remove cooked spinach and puree it in a food processor. Set aside the pot of water.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté the chopped onions until golden. Add flour and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the onion-flour mixture to the spinach cooking water and bring to a boil until slightly thickened.
Stir in the spinach puree and cream, heating until the soup thickens.
Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
Boil the eggs in a small pot. Serve the soup in a bowl and garnish with halved boiled eggs.

9fb3ec7b-f86a-4fa6-b745-6f12a3a323ba.name: Pepper Soup
9fb3ec7b-f86a-4fa6-b745-6f12a3a323ba.description: A delicious and nutritious soup packed with vegetables and spices.
ingredients: 1 cup milk mixed with 1 tablespoon cornstarch
instructions: Melt butter over low heat, sauté the pepper and onion.
Add cooked chickpeas and pour into the strained soup, stirring well.
Then add milk, cornstarch, salt, sugar, green onions, and hot sauces, simmering on low heat.
If too thick, add a little water.
Garnish with grated cheese and serve hot.

849f4628-0938-40a8-8eb1-1000e1f2180e.name: Delicious Soup
849f4628-0938-40a8-8eb1-1000e1f2180e.description: A hearty soup packed with vegetables and flavors, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a non-stick pot, add leeks and zucchini, and sauté for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add garlic, chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, bay leaf, chicken broth, and chickpeas; increase heat until broth boils, then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add chopped spinach and bring to a boil for 2 minutes; season with salt and black pepper.
Remove bay leaf, serve with Parmesan cheese on top, allowing it to melt into the soup.

c2a54e99-80ae-4165-929e-65744f6a184c.name: Mushroom and Potato Soup
c2a54e99-80ae-4165-929e-65744f6a184c.description: A creamy and flavorful soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Peel and finely chop the potatoes, then cook them with chicken broth for 20 minutes over low heat.
Wash the mushrooms, squeeze lemon juice on them, and chop. Sauté onions in butter for 5 minutes, then add mushrooms and stir until moisture evaporates.
Blend the cooked potatoes until smooth and mix with the onion and mushroom mixture, heating until boiling.
Add salt, pepper, and cream, then serve garnished with chopped basil and parsley.

224fade9-12f1-4177-97b7-d64a5c81d289.name: Red Lentil Soup (Dal)
224fade9-12f1-4177-97b7-d64a5c81d289.description: A hearty and flavorful red lentil soup, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pot and sauté chopped onions until they lose moisture.
Add diced potatoes and stir, then season with salt and pepper.
Pour in the broth and cook until potatoes and onions are tender.
Add tomato paste and red lentils, then let the soup simmer until cooked.
Serve in a bowl, garnished with dried mint and lemon juice if desired.

13194e8c-fbfd-4da3-acc6-3fb488c706ae.name: Mushroom Barley Soup
13194e8c-fbfd-4da3-acc6-3fb488c706ae.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with mushrooms and barley.
instructions: Sauté carrots, celery, and onion with salt and pepper in olive oil for 10 minutes over low heat.
Add thyme, barley, and vegetable broth; bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until barley is cooked.
Stir in mushrooms and simmer for 7 minutes.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper, serve, and garnish with parsley.

3ec06521-937c-41ad-bdd7-cf55ba9174d6.name: Tortilla Soup
3ec06521-937c-41ad-bdd7-cf55ba9174d6.description: A spicy and hearty soup with tortilla chips and tender chicken.
instructions: Boil 2.5 cups of water in a pot.
Add chicken, garlic, chili pepper, and half of the leeks; season with salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer until cooked and cooled, then shred the chicken.
Add tomatoes and corn; cook for about three minutes.
Stir in lemon juice and half of the tortilla chips.
For a thinner soup, use more water from the start.
Garnish with leeks and tortilla chips before serving.

d7adae3f-c736-45fa-a545-4880a07be4e6.name: Lentil and Garlic Soup for Type II Diabetics
d7adae3f-c736-45fa-a545-4880a07be4e6.description: A hearty and nutritious soup packed with lentils and vegetables.
instructions: Combine lentils, onions, garlic, carrot, olive oil, and chicken broth in a pot and bring to a boil over medium heat.
Reduce heat and simmer for 1.5 hours, stirring occasionally. Add vinegar, salt, and pepper. If too thick, add water. Serve garnished with celery leaves.

99bf4dd2-3569-452d-bcc0-904129cc943d.name: Lentil Soup
99bf4dd2-3569-452d-bcc0-904129cc943d.description: A hearty and flavorful lentil soup perfect for any meal.
instructions: In a large pot, cook the chopped meat.
Sauté the onion, then add carrots and garlic.
Mix in the tomato paste.
Add lentils, broth, thyme, and 2 cups of water.
Reduce heat and let simmer for 30 minutes.
Add salt, pepper, and vinegar. The soup is ready.

4e9d6f6e-222f-4906-9d0b-deaef8c24eef.name: Leek and Onion Soup
4e9d6f6e-222f-4906-9d0b-deaef8c24eef.description: A creamy and flavorful soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Melt 4 tablespoons of butter in a pot.
Add leeks, garlic, shallots, and half of the onions; sauté for about 10 minutes until softened.
Reduce heat and let cook for 25 minutes until golden.
Add water, chicken broth, and 1 teaspoon of salt; bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Remove from heat and let cool, then blend until smooth.
In another pot, melt the remaining butter and sauté the rest of the onions for garnish.
Pour the blended mixture back into the pot and add cream; heat gently to avoid curdling.
Garnish the soup with sautéed onions before serving.

959d2311-8b89-4159-af65-3a44412185c6.name: Celery Soup
959d2311-8b89-4159-af65-3a44412185c6.description: A creamy and flavorful soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot, add celery, onion, and potato, and sauté.
Season with salt and pepper, add 6 cups of water, bring to a boil, blend until smooth, reheat, season with lemon juice, and garnish with celery leaves.

af5613ef-eef2-4d38-a0c3-49dde09c173f.name: Creamy Corn Soup
af5613ef-eef2-4d38-a0c3-49dde09c173f.description: A rich and flavorful soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cook corn kernels in a pot with two cups of water, adding lemon juice if desired.
Blend the mixture until smooth, then melt butter in another pot and add the corn mixture along with leeks, salt, and pepper.
Cook until leeks are tender, adding more water if needed.
Serve garnished with tortilla chips, lemon slices, and leeks. Enjoy hot or cold.

b2d8e60c-03af-44a6-8a9a-0cabbcd20f52.name: Tomato Soup with Pasta and Meatballs
b2d8e60c-03af-44a6-8a9a-0cabbcd20f52.description: A hearty tomato soup enriched with pasta and flavorful meatballs.
instructions: For the meatballs, blend basil, egg yolk, onion, bread crumbs, and meat until well mixed. Form into small balls.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and fry the meatballs until browned. Set aside to drain excess oil.
In a large pot, heat oil and sauté garlic and onion until soft.
Add grated tomatoes and their juice, then stir in pasta, meatballs, water, and sugar.
Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally until pasta is tender.
Add basil just before serving.

244a3621-fe13-4045-ba46-83e4ccc48ebc.name: Mushroom Soup
244a3621-fe13-4045-ba46-83e4ccc48ebc.description: A creamy and savory mushroom soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Wash and dry the mushrooms, then slice them thinly.
Sauté the mushrooms in half the butter for a few minutes.
Add 2 cups of beef broth to the mushrooms and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes.
In another pot, sauté the flour for up to 3 minutes until it turns slightly creamy.
Slowly add the milk to the flour, heating for 10 minutes while stirring to achieve a smooth white sauce.
Once the mushrooms are cooked, chop them slightly with a wooden or metal spoon.
Add the white sauce to the mushrooms and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the remaining beef broth, chopped parsley, and salt, then heat for another 5-10 minutes.

c8a9688f-9b66-4360-984a-a286e1da9ffa.name: Tomato Soup
c8a9688f-9b66-4360-984a-a286e1da9ffa.description: A delicious and comforting tomato soup with a hint of sweetness.
ingredients: a few pieces of white bread
instructions: Chop the tomatoes and celery finely.
In a pot, combine onion, tomatoes, celery, and sugar; simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend the mixture with a stick blender.
Stir in the white sauce and add salt and pepper.
Toast small pieces of white bread in a pan until brown.
Add the toasted bread to the soup and mix in the chopped parsley.
Your delicious tomato soup is ready to serve.

081b3d67-117d-48e9-a13e-8cab78d77435.name: Parsley Soup
081b3d67-117d-48e9-a13e-8cab78d77435.description: A flavorful soup with meatballs and fresh parsley, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Grate the cheese and mix it with half of the parsley and ground meat, adding salt and pepper.
Refrigerate the meat mixture for about 30 minutes, then bring the beef broth to a boil.
Form small meatballs from the mixture and cook them in the broth.
Strain the broth, melt the butter, and add the remaining parsley.
Combine the parsley mixture with the meatballs in the broth and serve.

e82d7705-e710-43cc-bb07-8c31e88c6f0b.name: Spinach and Cream Soup
e82d7705-e710-43cc-bb07-8c31e88c6f0b.description: A creamy and flavorful spinach soup, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: 2 small pieces of shredded red meat
instructions: Clean the spinach leaves and remove any excess stems.
Boil the diluted salt water and add the spinach, cooking for 5 to 6 minutes.
Remove the spinach and drain excess water, then blend it until smooth.
Sauté the chopped onions in butter until golden, then sprinkle flour over them.
Return to heat and stir for 1 to 2 minutes until the flour is cooked.
Add the drained spinach water and stir until it becomes a smooth soup.
Return to heat and bring to a boil, then add the pureed spinach and cream.
Season with spices and heat slightly, then serve in bowls.
Garnish with additional pepper, sliced eggs, and pieces of meat.

94ca7a1e-b1b3-43e8-8881-95367ce6cd85.name: White Bean Soup
94ca7a1e-b1b3-43e8-8881-95367ce6cd85.description: A hearty and flavorful soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: First, cook the beans and grate the potato, adding it to the beans.
Once cooked, strain the mixture, ensuring you have about five cups of liquid.
Heat the liquid and add the chopped cabbage, cooking for five minutes.
Add olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and let it simmer for another ten minutes.
After this time, your soup is ready to serve.

eb8afac6-f153-469d-bcaa-d70c35aadbd4.name: Spinach Soup
eb8afac6-f153-469d-bcaa-d70c35aadbd4.description: A creamy and nutritious spinach soup, perfect for a light meal.
ingredients: 350 grams of washed and chopped spinach
instructions: Boil water in a large pot and dissolve the chicken bouillon cubes.
Add spinach and vermicelli, stirring for 10 minutes until it boils.
Turn off the heat and set aside.
Grease a non-stick pan, spread the egg yolks, and cook on low heat until set.
Cut the cooked yolk into desired shapes and serve on top of the soup.

0af41abe-4941-4aa5-84e8-fc4332de220b.name: Cucumber and Mint Soup
0af41abe-4941-4aa5-84e8-fc4332de220b.description: A refreshing soup with cucumber, mint, and a hint of lemon.
instructions: Cook cucumber, fresh mint, and chicken bouillon in water.
Blend the mixture, return to pot, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add strained yogurt and fresh lemon juice, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 5 more minutes.

283cc7eb-18b4-4641-8926-0bccaeafdba1.name: Salmon Soup Cream
283cc7eb-18b4-4641-8926-0bccaeafdba1.description: A creamy and flavorful salmon soup with aromatic herbs.
instructions: Remove the bones from the salmon and cook it with bay leaves, salt, and water.
In a pan, melt the butter, add onion and celery, and sauté until soft.
Add the sautéed mixture to the salmon and cook for another 10 minutes.
Remove the bay leaves and strain the mixture, then blend it.
Add milk and flour to the cooking liquid, stirring until the soup is hot.
Garnish the soup as desired.

cc892359-9901-41cd-b15f-7dc9a1994519.name: Barley Soup
cc892359-9901-41cd-b15f-7dc9a1994519.description: A creamy and hearty barley soup with carrots and a touch of white sauce.
instructions: Soak the barley for 1-2 hours after washing to cook faster.
Cook the barley in the meat broth until it becomes gelatinous, then add the grated carrots.
After a few boils, add the white sauce and let it simmer until slightly thickened.
Serve the soup in a bowl and top with cream, optionally sprinkle with chopped parsley.

e751e6c7-eef2-4929-9229-0064070cabac.name: Macaroni Soup with Peas
e751e6c7-eef2-4929-9229-0064070cabac.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with macaroni and tender peas.
instructions: Cook and drain the macaroni, then place it in a pot filled with cold water to cool.
In another pot, heat oil and sauté chopped green onions until soft, then add peas and chicken broth, cooking on low heat for 15-30 minutes.
Once peas are cooked, blend them until smooth and return to the pot. Add thinly sliced cooked beef and macaroni, heat for 2-3 minutes, season with salt and pepper, and stir in cream before serving.

719936ac-66d9-4fb4-8d46-839d9c0c2edb.name: Chicken Curry Soup
719936ac-66d9-4fb4-8d46-839d9c0c2edb.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken soup with a hint of curry and pineapple.
instructions: Chop the chicken and finely chop the onions.
Sauté the chicken in butter, add onions, then flour until golden.
Add curry powder, chicken broth, and pineapple juice; cook for 15-20 minutes.
Gradually stir in grated cheese and cream, then add salt and sugar.
Toast sliced almonds without oil and sprinkle on top before serving.

1b66b661-c31e-43a9-9481-d4f9b084d60b.name: Leek Soup
1b66b661-c31e-43a9-9481-d4f9b084d60b.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with tender chicken and leeks.
instructions: Cut the chicken thighs into small pieces, about 1 cm.
Melt butter in a suitable pot over medium heat.
Sauté leeks in butter until soft.
Add rice and chicken, sauté for another 2 minutes.
Pour in chicken broth, cover, and simmer for 20-30 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Cut toast into 1 cm squares, discarding the crusts.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add bread and garlic, sauté until golden.
Drain excess oil from the bread.
Add parsley and mint to the soup, season with salt and pepper.
Serve the soup in bowls, topped with bread pieces.

fc7fc457-88ff-4ed8-bafe-02cb32087840.name: Tomato and Basil Soup
fc7fc457-88ff-4ed8-bafe-02cb32087840.description: A creamy and fragrant soup perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: In a large pot, bring tomatoes and chicken broth to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes until tomatoes are fully cooked.
Add basil and sugar, then lower the heat further.
Stir in cream and butter until the butter melts.
Serve hot, enough for 9 people.

0b530f99-95b4-4005-b893-bc88da230406.name: Greek Lentil Soup
0b530f99-95b4-4005-b893-bc88da230406.description: A hearty and flavorful lentil soup perfect for any meal.
instructions: Rinse the lentils and place them in a pot with enough water.
After boiling, add the remaining ingredients and simmer for 30 minutes.

fa981d43-99d4-4c9e-8c1b-2459700a80f1.name: Special Lentil Soup
fa981d43-99d4-4c9e-8c1b-2459700a80f1.description: A creamy and flavorful lentil soup with a hint of coconut.
instructions: In a pot, combine onions, garlic, tomatoes, turmeric, and cinnamon, then add water.
Wash the lentils and add them to the pot. Once boiling, cover and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are soft.
Add chicken broth and let it boil briefly.
Blend the mixture until smooth, then stir in coconut milk and lemon juice, adjusting salt and pepper to taste.
After boiling again, serve hot, garnished with a little coconut milk.

2760a881-50fe-477b-bbc3-bddb58bf5c5c.name: Parsley Soup
2760a881-50fe-477b-bbc3-bddb58bf5c5c.description: A delicious and hearty soup with meatballs and fresh parsley.
instructions: Grate the cheese and mix it with half of the parsley and ground meat, adding salt and pepper.
Knead the mixture and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
In a pot, bring the beef broth to a boil.
Form small meatballs from the mixture and add them to the broth to cook.
Strain the broth, melt the butter, and add the remaining parsley.
Combine the parsley mixture with the meatballs and serve.

7ca5c1c8-8e12-44cc-bc34-7f451ed74f7c.name: Potato Soup
7ca5c1c8-8e12-44cc-bc34-7f451ed74f7c.description: A creamy and hearty potato soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cook 1 kg of lamb in 3 liters of water.
Boil 750g of potatoes in water, peel them, and mash.
Strain the meat broth and mix the potato puree into it, ensuring no lumps.
If the broth is too thick, add some warm water.
Melt 75g of butter, sauté 75g of thinly sliced onion for a few minutes.
Add the sautéed onion to the soup, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 30 minutes.

33f5885b-fcec-47f7-a8a1-af9656a83887.name: Spaghetti Soup
33f5885b-fcec-47f7-a8a1-af9656a83887.description: A hearty and flavorful soup with spaghetti and ground beef.
ingredients: 600g dry spaghetti, broken into small pieces
instructions: In a large pot over medium heat, cook beef, onion, bell pepper, celery, carrot, and garlic until vegetables are soft and meat changes color. Drain excess fat.

Add diced tomatoes with juice, water, spaghetti sauce, sugar, Italian seasoning, black pepper, and red pepper. Bring to a boil, then add spaghetti and reduce heat to simmer uncovered for 12-15 minutes until spaghetti is tender. Serve in bowls.

c1e8a474-14f5-48c4-b004-9e02c9fa7c60.name: Pasta Soup with Peas
c1e8a474-14f5-48c4-b004-9e02c9fa7c60.description: A creamy and hearty soup with pasta and fresh peas.
instructions: Cook the pasta, drain, and set aside to cool.
Sauté chopped green onions in vegetable oil, then add peas and chicken broth.
Reduce heat and let peas cook for 15 to 30 minutes.
Blend the cooked peas until smooth, then return to pot.
Add thinly sliced cooked beef and pasta, simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, then stir in cream and turn off heat.
Serve hot.

9f0b3316-b283-45b7-9bbd-6710d359c6d2.name: Colorful and Delicious Beetroot Soup
9f0b3316-b283-45b7-9bbd-6710d359c6d2.description: A vibrant and tasty beetroot soup perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: 2.5 cups chicken broth or a mix of water and bouillon cubes
instructions: Prepare a microwave-safe bowl and add onion, potatoes, apple, and water. Cook on high for 10 minutes.
After 10 minutes, sprinkle cumin over the mixture and heat for another minute.
Add cooked beetroot, bay leaf, thyme, lemon juice, and warmed chicken broth. Cover and heat for 12 minutes, stirring halfway through.
Remove from microwave and let sit for 5 minutes. Discard bay leaf and strain the vegetables, reserving the liquid.
Blend the strained vegetables until smooth and creamy. Combine with chicken broth, season with salt and pepper, and heat for 4-5 minutes until hot. Serve in a bowl, garnished with cream and dill.

3e00de00-9e1a-4de3-ac9c-f67a4917b237.name: Spanish Soup
3e00de00-9e1a-4de3-ac9c-f67a4917b237.description: A hearty soup packed with nutrients, perfect for cold winter nights.
instructions: Place the beef bone in a pot, add water, and bring to a boil.
Remove the bone, add fresh water to eliminate impurities, and add two onions to reduce odor.
Add barley, onion, and cabbage, and cook for 2 hours.
If using a pressure cooker, add a little salt to prevent discoloration.
Stir in the tomato paste for color.
Add cilantro, pepper, and salt at the end of cooking, and boil briefly to retain the green color.
Optionally, garnish with fresh lemon.

912512b0-8d21-4116-8a0e-eabe10f1892b.name: Leek and Pumpkin Soup
912512b0-8d21-4116-8a0e-eabe10f1892b.description: A creamy and comforting soup perfect for chilly days.
ingredients: 1 kilogram of pumpkin (cut into medium pieces)
4 cups or 1 liter of chicken broth
instructions: Prepare a microwave-safe bowl, add butter and chopped leek, cover, and microwave on high for 5 minutes, stirring once.
Add pumpkin, potatoes, and half a cup of chicken broth, cover, and microwave on high for 20 minutes, stirring twice during cooking.
If not cooked, increase cooking time at the same power.
Remove from microwave, add remaining chicken broth and milk, blend until smooth.
Return mixture to the bowl, cover, and microwave on high for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Transfer soup to a serving dish and drizzle with cream.

0ca0d715-7fa8-4438-8515-b9f3f85d7e3f.name: Moroccan Lamb Soup
0ca0d715-7fa8-4438-8515-b9f3f85d7e3f.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with nutritious ingredients.
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot and sauté lamb pieces until browned for 3-4 minutes.
Add tomatoes, celery, parsley, coriander, onion, and spices; season with salt and pepper, then add water, lentils, and soaked chickpeas.
Increase heat for 10 minutes to bring to a boil, then skim off foam; reduce heat and simmer for 2 hours until chickpeas and lamb are cooked.
Add vermicelli and cook for another 10 minutes until soft.
In another bowl, whisk egg yolks with lemon juice and stir into the soup; remove from heat after a couple of boils to thicken. Serve garnished with coriander and lemon.

2b0ae6c9-1fa8-4484-9f0c-e74972e5801c.name: Lentil Soup
2b0ae6c9-1fa8-4484-9f0c-e74972e5801c.description: A hearty and flavorful lentil soup, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Soak the lentils a day before cooking, then cook them in the same water over low heat.
Prepare a thick brown sauce with oil, flour, and onion, then add it to the pureed lentils.
Add the prepared broth to achieve about six cups of soup.
Season with salt and pepper, then cook a little more.
Fry white bread in a bit of oil, sprinkle on top of the soup, and serve.

27346ef5-d03f-44d0-811e-bd5905329441.name: Leek and Potato Soup
27346ef5-d03f-44d0-811e-bd5905329441.description: A creamy and flavorful soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Clean and chop the leeks, then soak in cold water and drain.
Peel, wash, and slice the onion thinly. Peel and thinly slice the potatoes, soaking them in cold water.
Melt the butter, add the onion and leeks, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 7-8 minutes without changing the color.
Drain the potatoes, then cook them with chicken broth over low heat.
Blend all ingredients together and let cool slightly, then puree in a food processor.
Pass the mixture through a sieve for a smooth texture, then add milk and cream, ensuring the soup does not boil after adding cream.

a24d418e-2aaf-450b-9e23-15d1c8f9de66.name: Chicken and Rice Soup
a24d418e-2aaf-450b-9e23-15d1c8f9de66.description: A comforting soup with tender chicken and rice, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cut the chicken into pieces, wash well, and place in a pot. Add water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 hours.
Remove skin and bones from the chicken and shred the meat.
Mix shredded chicken with the broth and heat on low.
Add rice and parsley.
Season with salt and pepper, and let the soup cook on low for 2 hours.
Finally, add butter, stir, and serve in a special bowl.

e9d166fd-5eeb-436c-a059-eb0562d1a2e4.name: Macaroni Soup
e9d166fd-5eeb-436c-a059-eb0562d1a2e4.description: A comforting soup with tender chicken and pasta in a savory broth.
instructions: Combine chicken broth, salt, pepper, carrot, and chopped celery in a pot and bring to a boil.
Add macaroni and chicken, cook for about 15 minutes until chicken and macaroni are done. Reduce heat to let the soup thicken.

04021d8e-22de-47ec-bc92-57db2a549b5a.name: Noodle Soup
04021d8e-22de-47ec-bc92-57db2a549b5a.description: A comforting noodle soup packed with chicken and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook chicken with onion, then add carrot.
Once partially cooked, add grated potato, tomato, and chopped parsley.
When everything is fully cooked and soft, add noodles to the soup.
Let the noodles cook thoroughly and thicken the soup, then add butter.
For flavor, use a few drops of fresh orange or lemon juice.

4f68b188-e676-427f-9b52-a459518b966c.name: Soup Bread
4f68b188-e676-427f-9b52-a459518b966c.description: Delicious bread perfect for serving with soups.
ingredients: Sesame seeds or black cumin for decoration
instructions: Mix warm milk, honey, and yeast in a bowl until yeast activates.
Combine all ingredients, knead the dough, cover, and let it rise until doubled.
Divide dough into 30-gram pieces, shape into cylinders, brush with egg or water, sprinkle seeds, and let rise for 15 minutes.
Bake in a preheated oven at 300°F (150°C) for 30 minutes until evenly cooked and dry.

69202f1b-cf6c-4e14-8731-20e0a8f99f65.name: Pea Soup, Seasonal Soup
69202f1b-cf6c-4e14-8731-20e0a8f99f65.description: A creamy and flavorful pea soup, perfect for any season.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
Fresh basil leaves and Parmesan cheese for garnish
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot. Add onions, celery, carrot, and garlic. Cover and cook on low for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add peas and chicken broth, bring to a boil. Reduce heat, add basil, salt, and pepper, and cook for another 10 minutes.
Blend the soup in a food processor until smooth. Return to pot and garnish with basil and Parmesan cheese.

a320aba6-d236-448a-a892-0e25328fbb3b.name: Mushroom and Barley Soup
a320aba6-d236-448a-a892-0e25328fbb3b.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with mushrooms and barley.
instructions: In a large pot, cook the chopped meat.
Sauté the onion and garlic, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add the mushrooms and cook until their moisture evaporates, then stir in the tomato paste.
Combine this mixture with the cooked meat, adding broth, barley, marjoram, and three cups of water until the barley cooks.
Finally, add salt, pepper, vinegar, and parsley. Use more water if needed for further cooking.

167e9469-106e-42e6-9077-22c9b3734947.name: Potato and Cheese Soup
167e9469-106e-42e6-9077-22c9b3734947.description: A creamy and comforting potato soup with melted cheddar cheese.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot and sauté chopped onion until translucent, then add garlic.
Add diced potatoes and water, bring to a boil, reduce heat, and cook until tender.
Mash the potatoes until creamy, then stir in milk and spices.
Once milk is heated, add cheese and stir until melted, ensuring it doesn't stick to the pot.
After a few minutes, your soup is ready.

a46cfb64-72a2-4d7a-bede-56c5a74b04c4.name: Chicken Soup
a46cfb64-72a2-4d7a-bede-56c5a74b04c4.description: A comforting chicken soup with fresh herbs and vegetables.
instructions: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a pot.
Add chopped carrots and cook until tender.
Stir in diced potatoes and then add pasta.
Once pasta is half-cooked, add dill, parsley, and shredded chicken.
Sauté tomato paste in oil until vibrant, then add to the pot.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

03721ac4-c1af-4e01-ac18-37c0d459ff74.name: Lentil and Celery Soup
03721ac4-c1af-4e01-ac18-37c0d459ff74.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with lentils, vegetables, and spices.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Wash the lentils thoroughly with cold water.
Bring water to a boil in a pot.
Sauté onions for 5 minutes until soft.
Add leek, carrots, celery, beef, and bay leaves.
Add lentils and pour the mixture into boiling water.
Skim the foam off the soup and partially cover.
Let it simmer for 45 to 50 minutes.
Remove meat, cut into small pieces, and discard fat.
Add meat, parsley, sausage, spices, salt, and pepper to the soup.
Simmer for 2 to 3 minutes, remove bay leaves, and serve garnished with fresh parsley.

437477f1-6f6a-4cc0-aff9-c52e989e0b58.name: Mushroom Soup with Milk
437477f1-6f6a-4cc0-aff9-c52e989e0b58.description: A creamy and rich mushroom soup perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Sauté flour in butter until golden, then gradually add milk while stirring to dissolve flour.
Add grated mushrooms and simmer until the soup thickens, then season with salt and pepper.
Stir in beaten egg yolks and cream before serving.

b0f52c38-0796-47e4-bb60-49a1b3b81a5d.name: Mexican Meatball Soup
b0f52c38-0796-47e4-bb60-49a1b3b81a5d.description: A hearty soup filled with flavorful meatballs and beans.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomatoes and beef broth, bring to a boil.
After 15 minutes, add parsley.
Mix meatball ingredients (except oil) and form into balls.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and fry meatballs until browned.
Add meatballs and beans to the soup, cover, and simmer until meatballs are cooked through.
Serve the soup with cream and chopped green onions.

623cc783-1141-480c-84b3-a71bb5c20705.name: Beef Broth
623cc783-1141-480c-84b3-a71bb5c20705.description: A rich and flavorful broth perfect for soups and stews.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (428°F) for 15 minutes.
Place the beef bones on a baking tray and roast for 20 minutes.
Add onion, carrots, leek, and celery to the tray and roast for another 20 minutes.
Transfer the roasted ingredients to a pot, discarding excess fat, and add bay leaf, pepper, basil, parsley, and cold water.
Simmer on low heat for 3 to 4 hours.
Strain the broth through a fine sieve into a bowl, pressing solids to extract liquid.
Refrigerate for 1 hour, then remove the fat that rises to the top.
You will have about 3 liters of broth suitable for various soups.

e2aff710-2fb2-482a-ba53-2a1601b6e130.name: French Soup
e2aff710-2fb2-482a-ba53-2a1601b6e130.description: A creamy and flavorful soup packed with fresh vegetables and herbs.
ingredients: 2 cups chopped celery stalks and leaves
Oil, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Sauté chopped onion in a little oil until golden brown.
Add all chopped ingredients to the beef broth with onion and garlic, bring to a boil.
Add noodles, salt, pepper, and saffron, stir gently.
Cover and let the soup simmer until thickened.
Finally, add cream or lemon juice to taste, serve in a suitable bowl, and enjoy.

fec01faa-22d9-401b-9360-b56a6c5731dd.name: Delicious Fish Soup
fec01faa-22d9-401b-9360-b56a6c5731dd.description: A flavorful fish soup with aromatic vegetables and spices.
instructions: Clean the fish, removing eyes, gills, and any bony protrusions.
Soak the large bones, tail, and head in salted water for 10 minutes.
Strain the contents and combine with onion, lemon juice, leek, celery, pepper, bay leaf, and water in a pot to boil, stirring regularly.
Strain the liquid from the pot and refrigerate to obtain 1.5 liters of fish stock.

563992a4-d9ff-44fb-be06-1b442f9a7180.name: Yogurt and Spinach Soup
563992a4-d9ff-44fb-be06-1b442f9a7180.description: A creamy and tangy soup with spinach and yogurt, perfect for a light meal.
instructions: In a large pot, bring chicken broth to a boil, then add rice and cook for 10 minutes.
In a small pot, mix water and flour until smooth, then add yogurt and heat gently while stirring.
Once yogurt mixture is hot, remove from heat and stir in egg yolks.
Combine yogurt mixture with chicken broth and add lemon juice, stirring gently.
In another pot, cook washed spinach in salted water for about 5 minutes, then add to the soup.

8974f3a0-bf04-4d60-9ebf-d3fd54396395.name: Corn Soup (Chinese)
8974f3a0-bf04-4d60-9ebf-d3fd54396395.description: A creamy and comforting corn soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Dissolve 1 tablespoon of flour in 1 cup of cold milk and pour into a pot, stirring continuously.
Once the milk thickens, add the cold chicken broth and stir until boiling.
Add the corn and beat the egg in a bowl, then add it to the boiling mixture.
Cook for 10 minutes and serve hot.

d64d1e49-9715-47c6-9701-f9462df26d20.name: Carrot and Apple Soup with Curry Powder
d64d1e49-9715-47c6-9701-f9462df26d20.description: A creamy and flavorful soup combining carrots, apples, and a hint of curry.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large metal pot.
Add curry powder and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the chopped carrots, onion, and apple.
Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Blend the mixture until smooth in a food processor.
Transfer to a suitable pot and add chicken broth, bringing to a boil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Ladle into bowls, gently swirl in yogurt, and garnish with carrot ribbons.

c24542e3-81c4-47da-968a-4d02f53dc5f7.name: Borsh
c24542e3-81c4-47da-968a-4d02f53dc5f7.description: A hearty Persian soup with lamb, vegetables, and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Cook the lamb, onion, and bay leaves with some salt until the lamb is half cooked.
Add chopped cabbage, beetroot, carrots, garlic, and rice.
Tie the parsley and dill together and hang it in the pot.
Once cooked, sauté tomato paste in 75g butter with a red chili.
Add potatoes and remove the meat and bones.
Serve the soup in a bowl and top with 255g sour cream.

efb44690-c74b-446c-9fff-53b48a75807c.name: Scottish Soup
efb44690-c74b-446c-9fff-53b48a75807c.description: A hearty beef and vegetable soup, perfect for warming up on cold days.
instructions: Place the beef in a pot, add water and salt, and let it simmer for an hour and a half.
Add chopped vegetables and crushed barley, simmer for another hour, then serve with parsley.

cec27359-eadc-4fdf-85b0-ec979dd5f73a.name: Julienne Soup
cec27359-eadc-4fdf-85b0-ec979dd5f73a.description: A hearty vegetable soup with a delightful mix of flavors.
instructions: Chop leeks, carrots, turnips, celery, and onion, then sprinkle with salt and sugar.
Melt butter in a pot, add the mixture, and sauté until slightly browned.
Add beef broth and let it boil for an hour and a half.
Chop lettuce and add it along with green peas, then boil for another hour.
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top before serving.

a36a7bcd-1aeb-46e3-9ebc-349db30a584c.name: Peanut Soup
a36a7bcd-1aeb-46e3-9ebc-349db30a584c.description: A creamy and flavorful peanut soup with a hint of lemon.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot, add onion and celery, and sauté for five minutes without browning.
Add flour and stir well, then gradually pour in hot chicken broth and cook for half an hour.
Remove from heat, strain the mixture, and add peanut oil, celery salt, lemon juice, and salt.
Before serving, sprinkle crushed peanuts on top of the soup.

4df0ac3f-27f1-4d93-a0a4-40d1766ae1d9.name: Borscht
4df0ac3f-27f1-4d93-a0a4-40d1766ae1d9.description: A vibrant beet soup with a tangy twist, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Sauté chopped onions in butter for 15 minutes, then add beetroot and beef broth.
Cook on low heat for 15 minutes, then add tomato paste, garlic, and green peppers.
Cook for an additional 15 to 20 minutes.
Stir in beet juice, lemon juice, sugar, and vinegar for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add salt to taste and serve with sour cream.

ca5a3b9c-c065-494c-8bcd-e460727a1514.name: Tips for Making Soups
ca5a3b9c-c065-494c-8bcd-e460727a1514.description: Delicious and nutritious soups that stimulate appetite and warm the soul.
instructions: Cook meat in water to create a flavorful broth.
Add various vegetables for taste and let simmer until cooked.

3797af06-b7d6-47ad-9014-89a74e8196db.name: Kashk-e Bademjan Soup
3797af06-b7d6-47ad-9014-89a74e8196db.description: A creamy and flavorful soup with corn and spices, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Cook onion and butter for five minutes, stirring constantly.
Add bay leaf, pepper, and flour; cook for two more minutes.
Stir in tomato paste, salt, pepper, and boiling water; cook for twenty minutes.
Add corn and cook for another ten minutes, then strain through a sieve.
Before serving, whisk egg yolk and cream together and pour on top.

992f12b2-c7c3-497f-9c77-3e1fdfd362b5.name: Cabbage Soup
992f12b2-c7c3-497f-9c77-3e1fdfd362b5.description: A hearty soup filled with tender cabbage and flavorful beef.
instructions: Remove the soft white leaves of the cabbage and boil for ten minutes.
Add the cabbage along with the other vegetables, beef, pepper, and salt to a pot and let it simmer for three hours.
For added flavor, sprinkle finely chopped white bread fried in butter on top when serving.

68452f22-d444-41cb-b7bf-abb53662c494.name: Indian Cold Soup
68452f22-d444-41cb-b7bf-abb53662c494.description: A refreshing cold soup with a blend of spices and coconut.
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in butter.
Add garlic, curry powder, and flour; cook for a few minutes.
Pour in chicken broth, then add apple, tomatoes, coconut, and lemon.
Cover and simmer on low heat.
Strain the mixture and let it cool.
Top with a bit of sweet cream before serving.

0b16d7fa-9c9b-4315-a1ad-d93fcf6da280.name: Majlisi Soup
0b16d7fa-9c9b-4315-a1ad-d93fcf6da280.description: A delightful and colorful soup packed with vegetables and flavors.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, fresh lemon juice to taste
instructions: Boil carrots and corn in chicken broth for 15 minutes.
Add potatoes and peas to the soup.
Peel and finely chop the tomatoes, then sauté in a little oil until cooked.
Add the sautéed tomatoes to the soup and simmer.
If using tomato paste, sauté 2 tablespoons in oil before adding.
Gradually add noodles 10-15 minutes before cooking is complete.
Once noodles soften, add two-thirds of the chopped parsley and coriander.
Adjust salt, pepper, and add lemon juice before serving.
Serve hot, garnished with remaining parsley and coriander.

bde082a3-88c2-4e62-a274-94bafa94faeb.name: Mushroom Soup with Pizza Cheese
bde082a3-88c2-4e62-a274-94bafa94faeb.description: A creamy and savory mushroom soup topped with melted pizza cheese.
instructions: Mix milk with flour and strain it.
Add water and chicken broth, then season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder, stirring until it boils.
Add mushrooms, reduce heat, and cook for about 20 minutes.
Stir in grated cheese and heat for another 5 minutes.
Turn off the heat, add lemon juice, and serve with a lemon slice and cream drizzled in the center.

ad267940-9131-4ca6-ac22-e4e5201172d4.name: Mushroom and Tomato Pâté
ad267940-9131-4ca6-ac22-e4e5201172d4.description: A creamy and flavorful soup perfect for special occasions.
ingredients: Black pepper, salt, and saffron to taste
instructions: Peel and blend the tomatoes until smooth.
Heat the tomato juice with broth and cover.
Grate the potato and carrot, add to the mixture.
Toast flour in a separate pan until fragrant, then mix with butter.
Add 2 cups of boiling broth and tomato paste to the flour mixture.
Slice mushrooms and sauté with butter, black pepper, saffron, and lemon juice.
Combine sautéed mushrooms with the main mixture and simmer for 15 minutes.
Transfer to a baking dish, add toast cubes and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 250°C for 15-20 minutes.
Season to taste and serve garnished.

46ebad5d-69be-4c06-b4d1-beb98b4f5d73.name: Green Broad Bean Pottage
46ebad5d-69be-4c06-b4d1-beb98b4f5d73.description: A creamy and flavorful pottage made with fresh green broad beans.
instructions: Peel the green broad beans and cook them.
Pass the cooked beans through a sieve and mix with meat broth.
Add fried onions and chopped celery, bring to a boil, then stir in butter.

bb8648af-c03c-44f9-a6ac-aca956150895.name: Asparagus Pâté
bb8648af-c03c-44f9-a6ac-aca956150895.description: A creamy and flavorful asparagus soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Sauté rice flour with butter over low heat, gradually adding beef broth until dissolved.
Chop tender asparagus parts, boil with water and salt, then strain.
Mix boiled milk with asparagus and add to the broth and rice mixture, simmer until thickened.
Whisk egg yolks with a pinch of salt, gradually stir into the soup, and serve immediately.
Top with cream and optionally add cooked asparagus tips for garnish.

f129a560-08be-43af-929a-4fa13a8be9ae.name: White Bean Pottage
f129a560-08be-43af-929a-4fa13a8be9ae.description: A creamy and hearty pottage made with white beans and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Soak the beans beforehand for quicker cooking, then boil with water and a pinch of salt until tender.
Strain the beans to remove the skins, then mix with meat broth, adding warm water if too thick.
Add chopped carrots, peas, green beans, and turnips to the pottage and let them cook.
Serve the pottage in a bowl, adding cream or butter, and sprinkle with chopped parsley or tarragon.

0c1e5961-5011-4857-a0dd-b7520680514f.name: Mushroom Pâté
0c1e5961-5011-4857-a0dd-b7520680514f.description: A creamy and flavorful mushroom soup perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Gradually mix the rice flour with the beef broth in a pot, stirring continuously over low heat until thickened.
Clean and chop the mushrooms, sauté them in butter or oil, then add to the thickened mixture and bring to a boil.
Whisk the egg yolks with a pinch of salt and lemon juice, then pour into a bowl.
Pour the hot mushroom mixture over the egg yolks, stir well, and serve with cream on top if desired.

b03aca5b-2892-454d-9608-19636af1a617.name: Tomato Pâté
b03aca5b-2892-454d-9608-19636af1a617.description: A creamy tomato soup perfect for dipping crusty bread.
instructions: Sauté the flour with butter until lightly browned.
Gradually add the beef broth, stirring until fully dissolved and slightly thickened.
Add tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and simmer until thick.
Serve in bowls, garnished with chopped parsley and optional cream.
For the bread, cut sandwich bread into small squares and toast in a pan or oven.

f99805db-c72c-4d81-9fb1-37069e561987.name: Lentil Pottage
f99805db-c72c-4d81-9fb1-37069e561987.description: A hearty lentil soup with fresh vegetables and a creamy finish.
instructions: Soak the lentils beforehand for quicker cooking.
Cook lentils with water and salt until tender, then strain.
Mix strained lentils with meat broth, adding warm water if too thick.
Add chopped carrots, peas, green beans, and turnip to the mixture.
Allow the vegetables to cook, then serve in a bowl.
Add cream or butter, and sprinkle with chopped parsley or tarragon.

db41015c-468a-40c0-8e0d-de0e782140ac.name: Potato Pottage
db41015c-468a-40c0-8e0d-de0e782140ac.description: A creamy and savory potato soup with a hint of celery.
instructions: Mash 500g of boiled potatoes and mix with 1 liter of beef broth.
Add 2-3 tablespoons of fried onions and chopped celery, then simmer for a few minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in a bit of butter.

973cfff7-83c3-4f63-b814-109ff4ca845b.name: Rice Porridge
973cfff7-83c3-4f63-b814-109ff4ca845b.description: A creamy and savory rice porridge with egg yolk and spices.
instructions: Melt butter in a pot, then lightly fry the rice flour in it.
Gradually add beef broth to the rice flour, stirring until dissolved, then simmer until slightly thickened.
Add milk, bring to a boil, then season with salt and pepper.
Whisk egg yolks and pour into a bowl, then pour the hot porridge over them and mix well.
Finally, add cream to the mixture.

fcce8979-a86f-46a9-8080-431f93ebd588.name: Green Broad Bean Pottage
fcce8979-a86f-46a9-8080-431f93ebd588.description: A creamy and flavorful pottage made with fresh green broad beans.
instructions: Remove the outer skin from 2 kg of green broad beans, cook them, and strain.
Mix with 1 liter of meat broth, add fried onions and chopped celery, simmer for a few minutes, then add butter.

49d26fe2-4632-44f6-96ba-d4b6324fcdbd.name: Barley Porridge
49d26fe2-4632-44f6-96ba-d4b6324fcdbd.description: A creamy and savory barley porridge perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Mix meat broth with 2 cups of milk and bring to a boil.
Dissolve barley flour in the remaining milk and gradually add to the broth, stirring to prevent lumps.
Allow the mixture to simmer until slightly thickened, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Optionally, place small pieces of toasted bread in a bowl, pour the porridge over, and add cream or butter.

a3755df9-4cd4-43cc-b0bb-17766796979f.name: Artichoke Pâté
a3755df9-4cd4-43cc-b0bb-17766796979f.description: A creamy and flavorful artichoke soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Boil water in a pot, wash the artichokes, and cook in salted boiling water until leaves come off easily.
Drain the artichokes, remove the leaves and the small thorns, and pass through a sieve.
Sauté flour in butter until golden, gradually add beef broth while stirring until boiling.
Mix prepared artichokes with milk and add to the mixture, allowing to boil and thicken.
Add salt and gradually stir in beaten egg yolks, then serve in bowls with cream on top.

b20fe8ce-d7f2-4be1-9c20-c83f17e34b5d.name: Mushroom and Feta Pâté
b20fe8ce-d7f2-4be1-9c20-c83f17e34b5d.description: A creamy and savory mushroom pâté topped with melted feta cheese.
instructions: Separate the strings from the celery stalks, chop finely, and cook with beef broth over low heat.
Toast the flour over heat until the raw smell disappears without changing color.
Remove from heat and gradually add milk, then mix into the soup.
Chop washed mushrooms and add to the soup, simmering until fully cooked.
Mix cream, egg yolk, and lemon juice, then add to the soup.
Pour the soup into a baking dish, place toasted bread on top, and sprinkle grated feta cheese.
Preheat the oven to 350°F and bake for 15 minutes.

87726270-0f71-4e72-92ba-d80a953928c5.name: Barley or Rice Porridge in Microwave
87726270-0f71-4e72-92ba-d80a953928c5.description: A creamy and savory porridge perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a small bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Add barley flour and microwave for 1 minute at 100% power.
Remove and mix with some meat broth until smooth.
Pour into a deep dish and add remaining broth and milk.
Microwave for 5-8 minutes at 100% power, stirring 2-3 times.
Add cream and parsley just before serving and stir well.

d188e7ab-f377-4211-b513-aa0be987470a.name: Tomato Soup
d188e7ab-f377-4211-b513-aa0be987470a.description: A rich and creamy tomato soup with a hint of parsley.
instructions: Mix tomato juice with beef broth and heat until it thickens slightly.
Whisk egg yolks and pour them with butter into a soup bowl.
Gradually add the hot soup to the yolks and butter while stirring.
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top before serving.

9eb6dde8-24ef-49b0-9f0d-ffa29bef6bab.name: Mushroom Casserole
9eb6dde8-24ef-49b0-9f0d-ffa29bef6bab.description: A creamy and savory mushroom casserole with tender chicken and potatoes.
instructions: Sauté flour in butter over low heat, gradually adding the meat broth while stirring.
After boiling, add chicken, mushrooms, and season with salt, then serve hot.

66fe566c-e004-4970-8f49-c44fb96bbd30.name: Vegetable Consomme
66fe566c-e004-4970-8f49-c44fb96bbd30.description: A flavorful vegetable soup enriched with egg yolks and spices.
instructions: Cook the vegetables with 1-2 cups of water and a little salt.
Add the meat broth and let it simmer, then mix in the beaten egg yolks gradually.

cb58e928-3301-4c8d-8927-1f5d032e05fa.name: Cheese Consomme
cb58e928-3301-4c8d-8927-1f5d032e05fa.description: A rich and creamy cheese soup topped with crispy bread.
instructions: Boil the beef broth with the béchamel sauce and stir in the cheese until melted.
Beat the egg yolks and pour into a soup bowl, then add the hot consomme and mix well, topping with toasted bread.

676116f8-e6a8-410e-8469-dfe4500455be.name: Rice Omelette
676116f8-e6a8-410e-8469-dfe4500455be.description: A delicious and creamy rice omelette topped with cheese.
instructions: Beat the 2 eggs well in a bowl.
Boil 2-3 tablespoons of cooked rice with 3-4 cups of meat broth.
Pour the hot rice mixture over the beaten eggs and stir.
Optional: Sprinkle grated Gruyère or Parmesan cheese on top.

a4b6aac6-3729-4196-a861-21639714d4d6.name: Vegetarian Lasagna
a4b6aac6-3729-4196-a861-21639714d4d6.description: A delicious layered dish with vegetables and creamy white sauce.
instructions: Prepare the white sauce by sautéing flour and butter, then adding milk until smooth.
Heat olive oil, sauté onions for 5-7 minutes, then add zucchini, mushrooms, and garlic for 10-12 minutes.
In a baking dish, layer 2 tablespoons of white sauce, lasagna sheets, 1/3 cheese, 1/3 vegetable mix, and 1/3 sauce. Repeat layers.
Top with pizza cheese and bake at 400°F for 30-40 minutes.

4e0deb31-96ed-47c0-9045-1d3ad9d7c3f6.name: Grilled Tomatoes with Basil Flavor
4e0deb31-96ed-47c0-9045-1d3ad9d7c3f6.description: Delicious grilled tomatoes topped with fresh basil for a delightful vegetarian dish.
instructions: Wash the tomatoes and cut them in half.
Carefully remove the seeds with a knife.
Preheat the oven and brush the tomatoes with olive oil, then sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Grill the tomatoes and top with chopped basil before serving.

1a335418-327c-4f59-9f8a-6c5832c04333.name: Vegetable Kebab
1a335418-327c-4f59-9f8a-6c5832c04333.description: Delicious and healthy kebabs made from a mix of vegetables and spices.
instructions: Boil potatoes, cauliflower, and onion, then mash them.
Add salt, turmeric, special spices, green peas, spinach, and chopped coriander.
Incorporate chickpea flour and knead well.
Grate garlic and mix it in.
Roll the mixture in flour or breadcrumbs and fry in vegetable oil.

37c78b70-da45-43f7-93e1-793ac065c348.name: Mushroom Stew with Wild Rice
37c78b70-da45-43f7-93e1-793ac065c348.description: A creamy mushroom stew served with wild and white rice.
instructions: Sauté the chopped onion in oil.
Add the chopped mushrooms and sauté until the moisture evaporates.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and sauté.
Gradually add milk while stirring continuously until the sauce thickens.
Stir in parsley and season with salt and pepper.
Serve alongside cooked wild and white rice.

34517927-9d98-4eb6-a82f-94639b64ea35.name: Raisin Carrot Salad
34517927-9d98-4eb6-a82f-94639b64ea35.description: A refreshing salad with carrots, raisins, and a zesty dressing.
instructions: Peel and grate the carrots coarsely.
Wash the raisins and let them dry in a colander.
In a suitable bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, honey, ginger, cinnamon, salt, and pepper well.
Add the mixture to the carrots and raisins, and combine with a fork.
Refrigerate the mixture for a few hours or overnight before serving.

c83e66e7-3462-4dbe-b508-45025595c04c.name: Pomegranate Stew
c83e66e7-3462-4dbe-b508-45025595c04c.description: A flavorful stew with eggplant, lentils, and a tangy pomegranate syrup.
instructions: Peel and chop the eggplants, then soak them in salted water.
Wash the lentils and cook them in water until soft but not mushy.
Fry the eggplants in a pan, then sauté chopped onion and garlic in another pan.
Add chopped tomatoes and hot peppers to the onion mixture, then stir in chopped mint leaves.
For the pomegranate syrup, mix pomegranate juice with some sugar and lemon juice, heating until thickened.
Combine all ingredients in a pot and cook until well blended and ready to serve.

b31b5bc7-fd3d-4ce0-a3fb-1db7a2efbcd9.name: Grilled Corn on the Cob
b31b5bc7-fd3d-4ce0-a3fb-1db7a2efbcd9.description: Delicious grilled corn with a flavorful garlic butter sauce.
instructions: Soak fresh corn in cold water for 30 minutes.
In a separate pan, heat butter, garlic, and salt on low heat; reserve 2 tablespoons of the sauce for serving.
Carefully peel back the corn husks without removing them completely.
Brush the corn with the prepared sauce, fold the husks back, and tie securely with string.
Grill for 20-25 minutes or until cooked through.
After grilling, peel back the husks and brush with reserved sauce; serve hot.
Optionally, serve with another sauce made of melted butter, parsley, basil, and salt.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on the corn before serving.

55fa02ee-2038-4ee2-ae4c-34a3ea1a24c4.name: Vegetable Stew
55fa02ee-2038-4ee2-ae4c-34a3ea1a24c4.description: A hearty and nutritious stew packed with vegetables and legumes.
ingredients: 1 cup chickpeas, kidney beans, and white beans
instructions: Soak all legumes and wheat beforehand to reduce gas.
Cook for 2 to 3 hours until fully cooked.
Prepare soybeans and sauté with butter, adding turmeric, black pepper, salt, cinnamon, saffron (optional), tomato paste, and two fried onions.
Add peeled potatoes, pureed tomatoes, 8 cups of water, and halved dried limes.
Simmer on low heat until well-cooked and flavors meld.
Strain the broth when serving, separate the contents, mash, and serve with fresh herbs and warm bread.

bbe4a743-7c1f-4296-b433-4294eeb054b6.name: Spinach and Sesame Stir-Fry
bbe4a743-7c1f-4296-b433-4294eeb054b6.description: A delicious stir-fry of fresh spinach with garlic and sesame.
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté the garlic for one minute.
Add the washed and chopped spinach to the pan and cook until tender.
Mix sugar and soy sauce in a bowl, add to the pan, stir, and after a few minutes, add the remaining oil.
Sprinkle sesame seeds on top and serve warm.

f7dfacbd-847d-48e3-87c3-6f341de3bed0.name: Broccoli Dish
f7dfacbd-847d-48e3-87c3-6f341de3bed0.description: A delicious and healthy broccoli dish with a tangy dressing.
ingredients: Olive oil, sesame oil, butter or mayonnaise
Almonds or sesame seeds for garnish
instructions: Wash the broccoli thoroughly and cut it into small pieces.
Boil some water in a pot, add the broccoli, cover, and cook for five minutes.
Gently remove the broccoli from the boiling water.
Drizzle with one of the mentioned oils, add lemon juice or vinegar, and top with almonds or sesame seeds.

ef14eb43-9974-44cd-b749-142b14b2e7a2.name: Spinach and Garlic Dish
ef14eb43-9974-44cd-b749-142b14b2e7a2.description: A flavorful sauté of spinach and garlic, perfect as a side dish.
instructions: Wash the spinach and let it drain until slightly dry.
Heat two tablespoons of olive oil in a pan and sauté the garlic over low heat.
Add the spinach to the pan and let it cook gently for three minutes, covering it for one minute.
Remove the lid, stir the contents, and let the spinach cook for another two minutes.

bee154b5-0250-45af-a421-af23f238a135.name: Mashed Potatoes
bee154b5-0250-45af-a421-af23f238a135.description: Creamy mashed potatoes with a hint of soy sauce and onions.
instructions: Place potatoes in a pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook for 10-12 minutes until tender.
Drain the pot and mash the potatoes with butter and soy sauce.
Top with chopped onions and serve.

ee366e78-e647-4bbd-815a-83b2276079e6.name: Zucchini and Garlic Dish
ee366e78-e647-4bbd-815a-83b2276079e6.description: A simple and flavorful zucchini dish perfect for a light snack.
instructions: Wash the zucchini with the skin on.
In a bowl, mix crushed garlic with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Coat the halved zucchinis with the mixture and sauté for five minutes until golden.
Transfer the zucchini to a serving dish and sprinkle with dried herbs.
Enjoy this simple snack with bread.

78e37c10-11ad-4276-9d51-cdb7a6245e0e.name: Marinated Mushrooms
78e37c10-11ad-4276-9d51-cdb7a6245e0e.description: Deliciously tangy marinated mushrooms, perfect as a snack or appetizer.
instructions: Combine vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, and onion in a pot and simmer until the onion softens.
Add oil and tomato puree, then season. Pour the mixture over the mushrooms and refrigerate overnight.
Remove bay leaves and garlic, then garnish with coriander before serving.

759dbdca-9d49-4e53-86e5-939de37ba5e0.name: Zucchini and Thyme Dish
759dbdca-9d49-4e53-86e5-939de37ba5e0.description: A savory zucchini dish infused with thyme and herbs, perfect for a light meal.
instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil and add butter.
Add chopped onion and parsley, sauté until softened.
Slice zucchini lengthwise and add to the skillet.
Add thyme, salt, and pepper to taste, cover, and cook for 10 to 20 minutes until tender.

48920714-8375-43be-a221-2c06cb53c344.name: Green Corn Dish
48920714-8375-43be-a221-2c06cb53c344.description: A vibrant and flavorful dish featuring zucchini and corn, perfect for a light meal.
instructions: Heat a pan and sauté the washed and sliced zucchinis.
Cover the pan and turn off the heat.
Warm the corn and drain it.
Add corn to the pan with olive oil and sauté.
Add lemon juice and then mix in the zucchinis.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer to a serving dish and garnish with basil leaves.

3640e234-3612-4e44-a7bf-0a511fc2add8.name: Beetroot with Special Mix
3640e234-3612-4e44-a7bf-0a511fc2add8.description: A refreshing salad with beets, feta, and walnuts, topped with a zesty dressing.
instructions: Wash the beetroots, cook them, peel, and chop finely.
In a bowl, combine feta cheese, spinach, and chopped beetroots, then add quartered walnuts.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, mustard powder, sugar, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and enjoy.

e4014f79-ed7e-4951-83fd-2e5e6f340351.name: Pumpkin Stew
e4014f79-ed7e-4951-83fd-2e5e6f340351.description: A delicious and hearty pumpkin stew with beans and spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
Walnuts and coconut powder as needed
instructions: Soak the red beans and mung beans overnight.
Cook the red beans until partially done, then add the mung beans until fully cooked.
Peel and fry the pumpkin in some oil.
Combine all cooked ingredients with fried onion, salt, pepper, turmeric, and some water in a pot and cover to cook until soft.
Add sugar and cinnamon, simmer until thickened, then serve decorated with walnuts and coconut powder, and enjoy with bread.

479f4083-fa9a-4f74-9302-1a8a5cdeeb0e.name: Spinach and Pear Salad
479f4083-fa9a-4f74-9302-1a8a5cdeeb0e.description: A refreshing salad with spinach, pear, and a zesty dressing.
instructions: Peel and slice the pear.
Thinly slice the radishes, halve the cherry tomatoes, and chop the green onions.
Peel and slice the cucumber.
Wash the spinach leaves and combine all ingredients in a suitable bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, and milk.
Add vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper, and mix until smooth.
Pour the dressing over the salad before serving.

43cd4cbc-2da3-4ff9-844c-68cc586df144.name: Roasted Vegetables
43cd4cbc-2da3-4ff9-844c-68cc586df144.description: A delightful mix of roasted vegetables seasoned to perfection.
instructions: Slice the tomatoes into thin rounds.
Cut the potatoes and onions lengthwise.
Chop the celery into small pieces.
Grease a baking dish and preheat the oven.
Layer half of the tomatoes at the bottom of the dish.
Add all the other ingredients on top of the tomatoes and layer the remaining tomatoes on top.
Mix parsley, mint, and dill together and sprinkle over the dish.
Add garlic, salt, and pepper, then drizzle olive oil over everything.
Bake in the oven for 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are cooked and tender.

2f14011c-7dfb-4b20-a371-e5fcc3a19aa2.name: Mushroom Pizza
2f14011c-7dfb-4b20-a371-e5fcc3a19aa2.description: Delicious homemade pizza topped with mushrooms, cheese, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Grease the baking dish and spread the pizza dough in it.
Spread pizza sauce on the dough and drizzle with vegetable oil.
Chop the bell pepper and tomatoes, and slice the mushrooms.
Layer onions, bell pepper, tomatoes, and mushrooms on the dough.
Sprinkle oregano on top.
Grate the pizza cheese and cover the toppings completely.
For better stretch, add cheese towards the end of baking.
Place the tray in a preheated oven at 350°F.
Once baked and golden, remove from the oven and drizzle with pizza sauce.

f111c393-9b2b-4ccd-84d9-953a71b65b2b.name: Zucchini Stew (Dietary)
f111c393-9b2b-4ccd-84d9-953a71b65b2b.description: A healthy and flavorful zucchini stew perfect for a light meal.
ingredients: Salt and pepper, turmeric to taste
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in olive oil.
Peel and chop the zucchinis, then add them to the onions and sauté until golden.
Add turmeric, salt, pepper, and tomato sauce, and stir well.
Chop the carrots and add to the mixture, stirring again.
Add 2 cups of water and lemon juice, then simmer on low heat.
Ensure the stew has no more than half a cup of water at the end.
If the water runs out and the vegetables are not cooked, add a little more water.
Optionally, add some crushed sumac for flavor.
For a no-oil version, cook the onions in water.
Chopped dill can also be added to the stew.
Serve the stew with rice.

56f27445-be23-4a1d-b802-7dac8e0ef9aa.name: Red Lentil Dal
56f27445-be23-4a1d-b802-7dac8e0ef9aa.description: A hearty and flavorful red lentil dish, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Sauté the onion in oil until golden, then add garlic and sauté briefly.
Add tomato paste, spices, dried limes, potatoes, and lentils, then reduce heat to steam.
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking, then add water and salt as needed.
Once cooked, turn off the heat and mash the dal with a potato masher until smooth.

43d1346a-36c6-436c-b9ca-80cc7b92fabf.name: Vegetarian Burger
43d1346a-36c6-436c-b9ca-80cc7b92fabf.description: Delicious and hearty vegetarian burgers packed with flavor and nutrients.
ingredients: some chives or green onions for garnish
instructions: Wash, peel, and chop the potatoes, then boil with salt until soft.
Grate the celery and carrots, finely chop the onion and chives, and mix with the mashed potatoes.
Beat the egg until frothy, add to the potato mixture with salt and crushed garlic.
Mix all ingredients thoroughly, adding corn flour until it binds.
Divide the mixture into 4 patties, each 2.5 cm thick.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Fry the patties for 6 minutes on each side.
Fry sunflower seeds in a small piece of butter until golden, stirring regularly.
Garnish the burgers with chives or green onions and fried seeds.

b871e4f9-8462-4797-9aa6-eaab4efa3d7b.name: Stuffed Eggplant and Zucchini
b871e4f9-8462-4797-9aa6-eaab4efa3d7b.description: A delightful dish of layered eggplant and zucchini with tomatoes and rice.
ingredients: about half a cup of cooked rice
about half a cup of cooked green peas
instructions: Trim the tops of the eggplants and zucchinis and slice them into rings without separating them.
Set aside four tomatoes and slice the rest into rings, placing a tomato ring between each eggplant and zucchini ring, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Arrange the eggplants and zucchinis alternately in a round baking dish, adding 150 grams of butter on top.
Bake in a moderate oven for 30 to 45 minutes until cooked but not mushy.
Halve three of the tomatoes and scoop out the insides.
Mix the cooked rice and green peas with salt, pepper, and 50 grams of melted butter, then fill the tomatoes with this mixture.
Place the stuffed tomatoes around the dish towards the end of cooking.
Slice one tomato and place it in the center of the dish, baking for an additional 15 minutes until the tomatoes are cooked but not mushy.
Serve the dish in the baking dish.

5904f797-163e-40ff-b587-31682b2afab5.name: Carrot and Rice Pudding
5904f797-163e-40ff-b587-31682b2afab5.description: A creamy and flavorful pudding made with carrots and rice.
instructions: Cook carrots, rice, and salt in warm water for 20 minutes until soft.
Drain and puree the mixture through a sieve.
Mix in butter, sugar, nutmeg, and eggs, then taste.
Pour the mixture into a buttered dish and place it over a pot of warm water in a 300°F oven for 45 minutes.

b5bc177e-37a1-4cc0-b665-e90a7404145b.name: Vegetable Cutlet
b5bc177e-37a1-4cc0-b665-e90a7404145b.description: Crispy and flavorful vegetable cutlets, perfect for a delightful snack.
instructions: Sauté the soy well and prepare it.
Peel the potatoes and onion, then grind them with the soy.
Add chickpea flour, breadcrumbs, gram flour, salt, pepper, turmeric, and cumin, and knead until sticky.
Shape the mixture into round or rectangular patties.
Fry both sides in hot oil and serve with lemon, pickles, tomatoes, and fried potatoes.

80e7de80-fa18-4120-95b0-b49daae35bfa.name: Greek Style Cauliflower
80e7de80-fa18-4120-95b0-b49daae35bfa.description: A savory cauliflower dish with rich tomato and garlic flavors.
instructions: Wash and chop the cauliflower.
Melt the oil in a pan and sauté the onion slightly.
Add tomato paste, garlic, salt, and black pepper.
Let it simmer on low heat for ten minutes.
Add the chopped cauliflower and cook for another 20 minutes.
Finally, stir in the chopped parsley and serve.

f53178da-2b49-4516-a5bd-a4bf909322b7.name: Eggplant Caviar
f53178da-2b49-4516-a5bd-a4bf909322b7.description: A delicious and tangy eggplant dip with fresh parsley.
instructions: Roast the eggplant in an oven and peel it.
Chop the eggplant and onions, then mix with salt, black pepper, olive oil, lemon juice, and parsley.

2362d2df-b604-4faf-8978-08472a1c14a7.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Sauce
2362d2df-b604-4faf-8978-08472a1c14a7.description: Delicious bell peppers cooked with a savory tomato sauce and herbs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté the onions.
Add bell pepper pieces, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, and rosemary. Cook on low heat for 25 minutes until peppers are soft. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

ec3997b3-f668-47b6-b662-d4f5e138196b.name: Greek Cabbage Soup
ec3997b3-f668-47b6-b662-d4f5e138196b.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with cabbage and tomatoes.
instructions: Sauté the onion for 5 minutes.
Add water and bring to a boil. Then add tomatoes, cabbage, salt, and black pepper.
Bring to a boil again and simmer for 1.5 hours until cabbage is tender.
Top with parsley and serve.

09d3cf90-dc85-4145-b801-e8cb954406bc.name: Spinach Omelette
09d3cf90-dc85-4145-b801-e8cb954406bc.description: A delicious spinach omelette packed with flavor and nutrients.
instructions: Melt 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Remove garlic pieces and discard them.
Beat the eggs and mix in salt and black pepper.
Add grated cheese, spinach, dried bread pieces, onion, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Clean the pan of any onion residue and heat the remaining oil.
Once the oil is hot, pour in the mixture and cook on low heat.
To cook the top, briefly place it under a hot broiler.

1aa4906a-cdeb-440c-9854-9b7ec4cdf812.name: Eggplant Dish with Mozzarella Cheese
1aa4906a-cdeb-440c-9854-9b7ec4cdf812.description: A delicious layered dish of eggplant, peppers, and mozzarella in a savory sauce.
instructions: Grill the bell peppers and place them on kitchen paper.
Slice the eggplants, add grape seed oil and salt in a pan, and sauté over low heat.
Boil parsley in water for 10 minutes, then drain.
Layer eggplant, parsley, and bell peppers in a dish.
Blend garlic, tomatoes, vinegar, and olive oil with some salt and pepper.
Pour the sauce into the pan, add mozzarella slices to the eggplant, sauté in the sauce for 5 minutes over low heat.

58e029fd-233d-4772-a877-615d6d92f7c2.name: Tips for Vegetarians
58e029fd-233d-4772-a877-615d6d92f7c2.description: Essential tips for vegetarians to maintain a healthy and balanced diet.
instructions: Consider your dietary motivations and ensure a balanced intake of nutrients.
Consult a nutritionist for personalized dietary planning.

0846274f-f929-453d-85bd-f26addb5bcf8.name: Polish Cold Beetroot Soup
0846274f-f929-453d-85bd-f26addb5bcf8.description: A refreshing cold soup made with beets, sour cream, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Chop the beets and combine with onion, vinegar, salt, sugar, and water in a pot. Cook on low heat for 45 minutes until beets are soft, then let cool.
Mix in sour cream, add potatoes, lettuce, and boiled eggs, then refrigerate. Before serving, top with chopped parsley or chervil.

ccbdd9d2-1928-4c1c-9bac-b9033a01b7e2.name: Vegetarian Gheymeh
ccbdd9d2-1928-4c1c-9bac-b9033a01b7e2.description: A nutritious and low-calorie dish packed with peas, tomatoes, and spices.
ingredients: half a tablespoon coriander seed powder
less than a teaspoon red pepper powder
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add crumbled cheese and fry until golden.
Add ground ingredients, stir in 1 cup of water and cook for 5 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients, including salt and green peas.
Pour in another cup of water, boil for 5 minutes, sprinkle cilantro on top, and serve hot.

0cdf7bb4-02e4-4492-b2a2-5766c62c3b28.name: Vegetable Lasagna
0cdf7bb4-02e4-4492-b2a2-5766c62c3b28.description: A delicious vegetarian lasagna layered with fresh vegetables and creamy sauce.
ingredients: 200 g Gouda cheese and mozzarella cheese
instructions: Wash and cube the eggplant into 2.5 cm pieces.
Sauté onion and garlic in a pot with some oil, then add eggplant and mushrooms and sauté again.
Add tomato paste, chopped tomatoes, vegetable broth, ginger, salt, pepper, and herbs; let it simmer until the liquid evaporates.
For the sauce, melt butter in a pot, add flour and sauté briefly.
Gradually add milk and nutmeg, stirring until thickened, then add salt.
Cook lasagna sheets in boiling water and place them on a clean kitchen towel.
Preheat the oven to 200°C, grease a 20x30 cm baking dish, layer some vegetables, place a lasagna sheet, add some white sauce, and repeat.
On the last layer, add white sauce and a mix of cheeses, then bake for 45 minutes until golden.

9bbb72ec-79f0-4022-aa1e-1253f627c10c.name: Stuffed Eggplant and Zucchini
9bbb72ec-79f0-4022-aa1e-1253f627c10c.description: Deliciously stuffed vegetables baked to perfection with a creamy sauce.
instructions: Cut the eggplants and zucchinis in half lengthwise and scoop out the insides.
Chop the scooped-out flesh and sauté with onion and garlic in hot oil until soft.
Add ground meat and cook until browned.
Stir in the chopped eggplant, zucchini, and grated tomato.
Dissolve tomato paste in meat broth and add to the mixture along with rice.
Cook uncovered for 15 minutes until thickened and rice is soft.
Season with parsley, salt, and pepper, then fill the eggplant and zucchini with the mixture.
Top with some prepared sauce and grated cheese, then bake at 180°C (350°F) for about 35 minutes until golden.
For the sauce, melt butter, add flour, and stir until raw smell disappears.
Gradually add milk while stirring until thickened.
Once cooled, mix in egg and nutmeg until smooth.

24614b6b-565e-4287-888b-2d74a321daf7.name: Pumpkin Stew
24614b6b-565e-4287-888b-2d74a321daf7.description: A hearty and nutritious pumpkin stew perfect for family meals.
instructions: Peel and chop the pumpkin into small pieces.
In a pan, combine onion and pumpkin with olive oil and cook on low heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add zucchini and mushrooms, sauté for 3 minutes.
Add tomatoes, pasta, and chicken broth, season with salt and pepper, and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream cheese and basil. Serve hot.

019d6593-54d0-4432-a819-6b1c94befbdf.name: Spinach Roll with Lemon Sauce
019d6593-54d0-4432-a819-6b1c94befbdf.description: A delicious spinach roll filled with creamy cheese and served with zesty lemon sauce.
instructions: Finely chop the spinach and cook it slightly, then let it cool.
Separate the egg yolks and whites, mix yolks with spinach, flour, milk, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Beat the egg whites until fluffy and gently fold into the spinach mixture.
Pour the mixture into a greased rectangular pan lined with parchment paper and bake at 300°F (150°C) for 20-30 minutes.
Turn the roll onto a towel-covered rack, remove the parchment paper, spread cream cheese, add ham, and sautéed mushrooms, then roll it up.

For the lemon sauce, melt butter, add flour, sauté, then mix in milk until smooth. Add lemon zest, saffron, salt, pepper, and cream, then remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Serve with the roll.

c87b04b1-9185-42a6-ac25-0a16b1df2974.name: Olive Breakfast Scramble
c87b04b1-9185-42a6-ac25-0a16b1df2974.description: A delicious scramble of eggs, tuna, cheese, and olives for a hearty breakfast.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add cheese and stir until melted.
Add tuna, break it up while stirring, then add olives.
Crack eggs into the pan, season with salt and pepper, and stir until cooked.

98e48456-43a5-4803-9716-52c658120f56.name: Stuffed Eggs
98e48456-43a5-4803-9716-52c658120f56.description: Deliciously stuffed eggs with a colorful vegetable filling.
ingredients: Mashed potatoes, spinach, grated beetroot, mashed carrots, mashed pumpkin, mashed peas, and softened egg yolk with butter
instructions: Wash the eggs with cold water and place them in a freezer bag, tying it securely.
Boil the bag in simmering water for 20 minutes to prevent cracking.
Peel the boiled eggs and cut them in half lengthwise, removing the yolks.
Mix the yolks with the vegetable purees and fill the egg whites using a piping bag.
Garnish with peas, boiled carrots, and lettuce.

88b921af-ae12-4c5c-ae3c-40a0195c0db4.name: Cheese Piroshki
88b921af-ae12-4c5c-ae3c-40a0195c0db4.description: Delicious fried pastries filled with cheese and herbs.
instructions: Mix cheese, parsley, and optional cumin or fennel.
Roll out the dough and cut into desired shapes.
Place a teaspoon of the mixture in the center of the dough.
Brush the edges of the dough with egg white.
Fold the dough over and seal the edges tightly.
Fry the piroshkis in hot oil until golden, then drain excess oil.

b51def78-65ea-4010-8fbd-8bf812ec5e6c.name: Vegetable Pizza
b51def78-65ea-4010-8fbd-8bf812ec5e6c.description: A delicious vegetarian pizza topped with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.
instructions: Mix all sauce ingredients and set aside.
Chop the onion, mushrooms, green pepper, and tomato.
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread sauce on the dough and sprinkle cheese on top.
Add chopped vegetables on top.
Bake in the oven at 450°F for 20-25 minutes.

a27082c4-be0b-48c8-ba3c-d30e813859ae.name: Zucchini Frittata
a27082c4-be0b-48c8-ba3c-d30e813859ae.description: A delicious and nutritious zucchini dish perfect for vegetarians.
instructions: Wash and slice zucchinis into 1 cm thick rounds, sprinkle with salt.
Sauté zucchinis in oil until slightly golden.
In a bowl, mix flour and milk, then add eggs and whisk well.
Add sautéed zucchinis, salt, pepper, and saffron to the egg mixture.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and flatten the surface.
Cover the pan and cook until set and golden, then flip to cook the other side.
Serve hot and enjoy!

1dc4684e-3756-4199-8af3-7749596b5332.name: Corn Salad
1dc4684e-3756-4199-8af3-7749596b5332.description: A creamy and nutritious salad perfect for picky eaters.
instructions: Cook corn in a pressure cooker with salt for 2 hours.
Mix mayonnaise, cream, lemon juice, salt, and sugar.
Combine green peas, corn, lettuce, carrots, and orange segments.
