Serve in a dish and garnish with sauce and carrots.

e1720566-79b7-48fe-8250-046666342292.name: Vegetable Kuku
e1720566-79b7-48fe-8250-046666342292.description: A delicious and healthy Persian vegetable dish, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Chop the eggplants and soak them in salted water for 15 minutes, then drain and sauté in olive oil.
Sauté onions and mushrooms separately in the same way.
Mix all ingredients together and add beaten eggs.
Prepare the mixture in a rice cooker with a spoon of oil and cook for 10 minutes.
Invert the kuku for even cooking and serve once ready.

4dd42e3a-12be-417e-93be-d2531fdd9e4c.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves without Meat
4dd42e3a-12be-417e-93be-d2531fdd9e4c.description: Delicious vegetarian stuffed grape leaves, bursting with flavor and herbs.
instructions: Melt half a cup of oil in a pot, mix in onions and rice, and sauté for 15 minutes on low heat, stirring constantly.
Add raisins, dill, salt, black pepper, and sweet bell pepper, cover, and cook on very low heat for 20 minutes, ensuring it doesn't burn.
Wrap the mixture in forty grape leaves as usual, place them in a pot, pour lemon juice and tomato juice over them, and cook on low heat for 1 to 4 hours.

176a4383-d503-467a-b2c5-5a2d17979f99.name: Vegetable Kebab
176a4383-d503-467a-b2c5-5a2d17979f99.description: Delicious grilled vegetable kebabs served with a flavorful sauce.
ingredients: a few drops of hot sauce
instructions: Cut zucchini into 2.5 cm thick slices and skewer with other vegetables.
Brush with oil and lemon juice, grill for about 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
For the sauce, heat oil, sauté onion and mushrooms for 8 minutes, blend for 30 seconds.
Add peanuts, blend for another 30 seconds until smooth, then add water, soy sauce, and hot sauce.
Simmer sauce on low heat for 10 minutes.

2e879589-6902-46f4-addd-148311fe78e4.name: Vegetable Roll
2e879589-6902-46f4-addd-148311fe78e4.description: A delicious savory roll filled with creamy cheese and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Grease a 30x25 cm baking tray or line it with parchment paper and grease the paper.
Finely chop garlic and leek, sauté with 30g butter for 4-5 minutes until soft.
Melt the remaining butter, add flour, and sauté gently to remove raw flour taste.
Gradually add milk to the butter-flour mixture, stirring until smooth and thick.
Separate egg yolks and whites.
Add egg yolks, leek-garlic mixture, salt, and pepper to the mixture, then transfer to a large bowl.
Beat egg whites until stiff, then fold into the mixture gently.
Preheat the oven to 400°C.
Pour the mixture into the tray and smooth the surface.
Bake in the middle of the oven for 12-15 minutes until puffed and golden.
Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of grated Parmesan evenly on parchment, flip the roll onto it, and remove the parchment if used.
Spread the mixture of green onions, corn, cream cheese, and Parmesan on the roll, then tightly roll it up and serve warm.

08174417-05d1-438a-a75f-6227bfceceec.name: Indian Style Yogurt and Egg Stew
08174417-05d1-438a-a75f-6227bfceceec.description: A spicy and creamy yogurt stew with boiled eggs, perfect for rice.
ingredients: Salt and red pepper to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the onions into thick strips.
Heat oil in a pot and fry the onions until golden.
Whisk the egg yolks with saffron, spices, salt, and pepper, then mix into the yogurt.
Add the yogurt mixture to the pot and stir with the onions, stirring regularly to prevent sticking.
Once the yogurt mixture starts boiling, reduce the heat and let it thicken.
Boil the eggs for about 15 minutes until hard, then cool, peel, and cut them in half.
When the stew thickens and releases some oil, add the halved eggs and serve hot with rice.

ef66c3d6-c0a3-4480-8c7f-7c1823d717bc.name: Beetroot and Lentil Soup
ef66c3d6-c0a3-4480-8c7f-7c1823d717bc.description: A hearty and flavorful soup with lentils and beets.
instructions: Grate or cube the beetroot and chop the washed herbs.
In a pot, cook the beetroot, then add washed lentils.
After a few boils, add salt, turmeric, pepper, chopped herbs, and fried onions.
Let it boil until cooked and thickened.
Dissolve flour in warm water and add to the pot, stirring several times.
Once thickened, turn off the heat and serve with vinegar.

50d49988-5873-452b-b827-985efdca955d.name: Rice with Noodles and Apricots
50d49988-5873-452b-b827-985efdca955d.description: A delightful Persian dish combining rice, noodles, and sweet apricots.
instructions: Soak the rice, then boil it with salt and oil until partially cooked.
Add the noodles and stir until fully cooked, then drain.
Mix soaked apricots with saffron, sugar, and fried onion.
Layer the bottom of the pot with rice, sprinkle the apricot mixture, and top with more rice.
Combine butter and saffron, then pour over the rice.
Optionally, add cooked meat or chicken between the layers.

149d0090-0303-4421-912c-4801f36d3aea.name: Special Potato Appetizer
149d0090-0303-4421-912c-4801f36d3aea.description: A delicious and savory potato dish, perfect for appetizers.
instructions: Melt the butter, grate or slice the boiled potatoes, and sauté in butter for 3-4 minutes.
Add turmeric, black cumin, and red pepper, and sauté for another minute. Serve and sprinkle with coriander.

b1d3e0eb-4298-4ba9-b9fa-30950e65b845.name: Chicken and Meat Ham Platter
b1d3e0eb-4298-4ba9-b9fa-30950e65b845.description: A delightful platter of chicken and meat ham, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Choose a round or rectangular tray and place the Olivier salad in the center.
Decorate the edges with bell pepper and tomatoes, then arrange the ham in a spiral around the tray.
Alternate layers of meat ham and chicken ham until reaching the salad.
Fill the space under the hams with lettuce and garnish with pickles, tomatoes, olives, and boiled carrots.

2bebd184-dd4c-41b0-a6d8-49aa8b344537.name: Vegetable Platter
2bebd184-dd4c-41b0-a6d8-49aa8b344537.description: A colorful and refreshing vegetable platter perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: 1 cup boiled and diced green beans
1/2 cup chopped scallions, parsley, and cilantro
1/4 cup olive oil or salad oil
Up to 1/3 cup vinegar and lemon juice
instructions: Boil potatoes with skin in salted water, peel, and cut into 1x1 cm cubes, then mix with olive oil.
Chop boiled carrots similarly, cut green beans into 1 cm pieces, sauté with a small onion in olive oil until shiny, then cook with water and salt.
Mix all ingredients together and combine with the dressing. Optionally add two crushed garlic cloves.
For a colorful presentation, divide into three equal parts and color with food-safe dyes.

e38d7e5a-042d-45c5-a384-2a6e0097b5d8.name: Mushroom Fritter
e38d7e5a-042d-45c5-a384-2a6e0097b5d8.description: Crispy mushroom fritters seasoned with spices, perfect for snacking.
instructions: Mix flour, salt, pepper, and baking powder; add water and let rest for 10 minutes.
Chop onion and garlic, add to batter, then mix in mushrooms and fry in oil until golden.

2c453d3a-e6a7-4c42-910e-8777f6e569d5.name: Cheese Platter
2c453d3a-e6a7-4c42-910e-8777f6e569d5.description: A delightful cheese platter with fresh herbs and nuts.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic or 1 tsp garlic powder
2 tbsp chopped walnuts or sesame seeds
Lettuce or grape leaves for garnish
instructions: Mix feta and cream cheese in a bowl until smooth.
Add garlic powder, mint, and parsley, then refrigerate to firm up.
Shape the cheese mixture into small balls and roll in sesame seeds or walnuts.
Refrigerate again, then garnish with lettuce or grape leaves before serving.

152e59a0-fc94-478c-b0e5-bb58261a3f3b.name: Shrimp Appetizer
152e59a0-fc94-478c-b0e5-bb58261a3f3b.description: A delightful shrimp dish served on crispy chips with a zesty sauce.
instructions: Boil the shrimp until the odor is gone and they are cooked.
Chop the shrimp and mix with pickles, olives, and bell pepper in a bowl, then add sauces and mix.
Place the mixture on chips, arrange in a suitable dish, and bake at 180°C for 10 to 15 minutes.
Garnish with sauce and cumin powder before serving.

5a5b6813-364d-434c-9d6a-f20a3b031eb4.name: Canapé Platter
5a5b6813-364d-434c-9d6a-f20a3b031eb4.description: Delicious bite-sized canapés perfect for any gathering.
ingredients: Olives, cherry tomatoes, radishes for decoration
instructions: Cut the toast into triangles and set aside.
Divide the triangles into three groups of ten for different flavors.
For the first type, place salami on the triangles, cut to fit, and add a slice of cheese on top.
For the second type, chop the herbs, mix with walnuts and breakfast cheese, and spread on the triangles.
For the third type, grind the cooked chicken, mix with mayonnaise, cream, green onions, salt, and pepper, and spread on the triangles.
Decorate with olives, cherry tomatoes, and radishes, then refrigerate for at least one hour before serving.

291cbfd7-34ad-431a-b70b-67d2de47608a.name: Spicy Potato and Cheese
291cbfd7-34ad-431a-b70b-67d2de47608a.description: A delicious layered dish of crispy potatoes and flavorful cheeses.
ingredients: Black pepper and salt to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the potatoes thinly.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the potatoes until golden, then drain on paper towels.
In a baking dish, layer fried potatoes, sprinkle with blue cheese, season with salt and spices, and add grated pizza cheese.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of pizza cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 5 minutes or grill in the microwave for 3 minutes.
Serve warm with ketchup.

bdc014a9-527a-485e-85b7-c030d0e96579.name: Stuffed Okra
bdc014a9-527a-485e-85b7-c030d0e96579.description: Deliciously stuffed okra with spiced meat and topped with melted cheese.
ingredients: half a cup of chopped basil and tarragon
instructions: Slice the okra lengthwise and remove the insides.
Boil the okra in water for 7-10 minutes until slightly soft.
Chop the onion and sauté with turmeric until softened.
Add the ground meat and mix until it changes color.
Pour in hot water, cover, and cook for 7-10 minutes on low heat.
Add chopped green peppers, herbs, curry powder, salt, and pepper, and mix briefly.
Blend tomatoes with salt and oil, then add hot water to create a smooth puree.
Spread the tomato puree in a baking dish and fill each okra with the meat mixture.
Arrange the stuffed okra on top of the puree, sprinkle with black pepper, and bake at 160°C (320°F) for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven, sprinkle with grated cheese, and return to bake for another 5-7 minutes until cheese melts.
Serve hot with basil leaves or desired sides.

cac90854-a366-44ef-a574-ac768ac2f827.name: Salad Platter
cac90854-a366-44ef-a574-ac768ac2f827.description: A delightful salad platter perfect for gatherings, beautifully decorated and delicious.
instructions: Place a circle of Olivier salad in the center of a suitable round platter and smooth it out with a round mold.
Spread mayonnaise on top and decorate with olives, pickles, and slices of hard-boiled eggs.
Arrange cooked shrimp, sliced cooked fish, tomatoes, and large grapes around the salad.

897710cb-ad45-43fe-aaa5-a7623882304a.name: Cucumber and Shrimp Appetizer
897710cb-ad45-43fe-aaa5-a7623882304a.description: A refreshing appetizer with cucumber and succulent shrimp.
instructions: Spread a little mayonnaise on cucumber slices.
Place a few cooked shrimp on top.

af75b41e-ed75-47f0-a70e-8f3641b5bbe0.name: Cucumber Rolls
af75b41e-ed75-47f0-a70e-8f3641b5bbe0.description: Delicious cucumber rolls filled with savory meat and mayonnaise.
instructions: Slice the cucumber and hollow out the center slightly.
Spread mayonnaise on a slice of sausage, roll it up, and thread it through the cucumber ring.

e343562c-d027-4f62-b29f-ca101e14f217.name: Tomato Appetizer
e343562c-d027-4f62-b29f-ca101e14f217.description: A refreshing tomato and cucumber appetizer with a creamy touch.
instructions: Wash and slice the tomatoes into rings without separating the ends.
Insert cucumber slices between the tomato rings and drizzle with mayonnaise.

36132bf4-b280-405a-865a-b843ffbdee41.name: Tuna and Hard-Boiled Egg Appetizer
36132bf4-b280-405a-865a-b843ffbdee41.description: A delightful appetizer featuring tuna, eggs, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Drain the tuna and mash it with a fork.
Mix in lemon juice, chopped herbs, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Cut the hard-boiled eggs in half lengthwise and remove the yolks.
Grate the yolks and mix them with the tuna mixture.
Fill the egg white halves with the tuna mixture.
Slice the tomato into thin strips and place them on top of the eggs.
Garnish with parsley and arrange on a bed of lettuce leaves.

aedf51d6-f792-4559-bb2d-5eb58ce224e0.name: Six Simple Appetizers
aedf51d6-f792-4559-bb2d-5eb58ce224e0.description: A delightful assortment of six easy-to-make appetizers for any gathering.
instructions: Place small bread rolls with mayonnaise and a black olive or fill with caviar.
Arrange pieces of canned tuna and lemon slices in another section.
Fill a section with canned mushrooms mixed with olive oil and vinegar, topped with tomato slices and parsley.
In the fourth section, place rolled cooked trout with pineapple and lemon slices on the sides, garnished with radish slices.
Fill the fifth section with tomato and onion slices, sprinkled with chopped parsley.
In the sixth section, add pickled cucumber slices, tomato, and hard-boiled eggs, topped with chopped parsley.

f1b4c0a2-98b7-4303-a7f4-9839260f951f.name: Celery Appetizer
f1b4c0a2-98b7-4303-a7f4-9839260f951f.description: A delicious celery dish topped with sausage, cheese, and parsley.
instructions: Cut celery into 4-inch pieces, wash, and boil in salted water until soft.
Drain celery, place in a dish, and melt half the butter over it.
Heat the dish gently to absorb the butter.
Sauté sausages in the remaining butter.
In a rectangular dish, layer half the sauce, arrange sausages, cover each with celery, add sauce, cheese, and parsley.

be5ca69a-2884-45bf-8710-e7bb0d522d3c.name: Four-Section Appetizer Platter
be5ca69a-2884-45bf-8710-e7bb0d522d3c.description: A delightful appetizer platter with fresh vegetables and creamy sauces.
instructions: Arrange cucumber slices in one section and add mayonnaise on top.
In the next section, place hard-boiled egg slices and add mayonnaise.
Repeat with another section of hard-boiled eggs and mayonnaise.
In the third section, add peeled tomato slices, drizzle with olive oil and vinegar, and sprinkle with chopped mushrooms.
Top with sautéed mushrooms and chopped parsley.
In the opposite section, place fried eggplant slices and sprinkle with parsley.
If using a five-section platter, fill the middle section with rice salad made of cooked rice, chopped green peppers, celery, walnuts, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Ensure the salad is moist and tender, optionally adding chopped boiled potatoes.

9baedd48-1647-4994-b8f5-feff7fc12016.name: Spinach Appetizer
9baedd48-1647-4994-b8f5-feff7fc12016.description: A delicious spinach dish topped with fried eggs and served on toasted bread.
instructions: Clean and wash the spinach with water, salt, and baking soda, then cook until tender.
Drain the spinach, chop it, and sauté with butter until slightly browned.
Toast the bread and fry the eggs.
On each piece of bread, place a slice of sausage, add spinach, and top with a fried egg.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on the eggs before serving.

8b90a916-3952-40a8-96e7-66b40bd48ec7.name: Unique Appetizer Platter
8b90a916-3952-40a8-96e7-66b40bd48ec7.description: A delightful appetizer with a creamy salad and colorful garnishes.
instructions: In the center of a round platter, place a circle of Olivier salad and smooth it with a round mold.
Spread mayonnaise on top and decorate with olives, pickles, and slices of hard-boiled eggs.
Arrange cooked shrimp, sliced cooked fish, tomato slices, and large grapes around the salad.

eb5c14b4-cd6d-4237-8689-b17bb7561337.name: Chicken and Almond Appetizer
eb5c14b4-cd6d-4237-8689-b17bb7561337.description: A delightful mix of chicken, almonds, and fresh herbs in a creamy dressing.
instructions: Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, then pour over chicken and almonds.
Add chopped celery or parsley, mix well, and serve in a small dish garnished with celery stalks and lemon slices.

8dbaf85a-5647-40f6-a059-e5af63630ff9.name: Cucumber, Celery, and Lettuce Appetizer
8dbaf85a-5647-40f6-a059-e5af63630ff9.description: A refreshing appetizer filled with yogurt, walnuts, and herbs.
instructions: Mix yogurt with salt, dried mint, chopped walnuts, and olive oil.
Clean and cut celery stalks into 4-5 cm pieces, fill with yogurt mixture.
Fill lettuce leaves with the same yogurt mixture.
Peel cucumbers, cut into 3-4 cm pieces, hollow them out, and fill with yogurt mixture.
Arrange cucumbers on a platter, surrounding them with lettuce and celery leaves.

dd42a765-00b1-414d-b3da-3a2b27380798.name: Sausage Appetizer
dd42a765-00b1-414d-b3da-3a2b27380798.description: A delicious and creamy sausage appetizer perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Finely chop the pickled cucumber and mix it with mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Combine the ground chicken, ground sausage, and chopped cucumber with the prepared sauce, then serve in a dish decorated with cucumber.

9f9bf74b-2180-48c2-b54b-2c73c7522de5.name: Potato Tomato Bake
9f9bf74b-2180-48c2-b54b-2c73c7522de5.description: A delicious layered dish of potatoes and tomatoes, topped with cheese.
instructions: Wash the potatoes with skin and boil them until tender but not mushy.
Peel the potatoes and slice them into 2-3 cm thick rounds.
Slice the tomatoes into rounds.
In a round baking dish, add melted butter at the bottom.
Layer potato slices, tomato slices, and sprinkle with salt and pepper alternately.
On the last layer of potatoes, pour some white sauce and sprinkle grated Dutch cheese on top.
Bake in the oven at 400°F for 30 minutes until the top is golden.
Garnish with parsley and serve directly from the dish.

26c1b638-cd5f-4409-a5d6-0c39d6e479b1.name: Herb and Cheese Appetizer
26c1b638-cd5f-4409-a5d6-0c39d6e479b1.description: A delightful blend of herbs, cheese, and walnuts, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Wash and dry the cheese, then grate it.
Wash the herbs thoroughly, drain, and finely chop them.
Gradually mix olive oil into the grated cheese until absorbed.
Add walnuts and chopped herbs to the cheese and mix well.
Optionally, mix in crushed garlic for extra flavor.
Transfer the mixture to a serving dish and garnish with green onions.

3ce03f97-4571-4bbf-89c2-f9d79fc55bfd.name: Cheese and Egg Appetizer
3ce03f97-4571-4bbf-89c2-f9d79fc55bfd.description: A delicious and savory cheese and egg dish, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and grate the cheese into it, stirring until slightly browned.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, then mix into the cheese until cooked.
Remove from heat, stir in parsley, and serve garnished with radishes and lettuce.

c8156a5e-ccf7-465a-b150-85cd4a7ce1dc.name: Eggplant Appetizer
c8156a5e-ccf7-465a-b150-85cd4a7ce1dc.description: Delicious baked eggplant topped with savory cheese and ham.
instructions: Mix grated Gruyere or Dutch cheese into the white sauce.
Chop the ham and add it to the sauce.
Pour the mixture over fried eggplant or zucchini and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for a few minutes, then arrange on a platter.
Garnish with chopped parsley and tomato slices.

61080589-bc37-4ed0-a89f-b8f0a85b79b3.name: Sausage Platter
61080589-bc37-4ed0-a89f-b8f0a85b79b3.description: A delightful platter of sausages, asparagus, and roasted pineapple.
instructions: Choose a beautiful rectangular tray and decorate it with sausage.
Roll some sausage and place cooked asparagus tips inside, leaving the tips exposed.
Top the sausage slices with pieces of roasted pineapple.
Decorate one side of the tray with cheese rings and whole cherry tomatoes.
Drizzle softened butter over the sausages in the center of the tray using a piping bag.
Garnish the edges of the tray with pieces of pineapple jelly.

84b450f2-67e6-4ea6-8e37-6196c6499acf.name: Deviled Egg Platter
84b450f2-67e6-4ea6-8e37-6196c6499acf.description: A delightful platter of deviled eggs and chicken jelly, perfect for gatherings.
ingredients: Cooked mixed vegetables (peas, green beans, carrots)
instructions: Prepare hard-boiled eggs and chicken jelly.
Mix egg yolks with fried chicken liver, mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Fill halved eggs with the mixture and place on chicken jelly.
Top with sautéed mushrooms.
Add cooked mixed vegetables in the center and arrange eggs around.
Drizzle with white sauce mixed with cream and sprinkle grated yolk on top.
Garnish with lettuce leaves and cover the bottom with parsley.
Finish by decorating with white sauce or mayonnaise and sausage slices.

cef8facf-d4b6-4278-b61e-fe267e6fae1f.name: Cold Meat Platter
cef8facf-d4b6-4278-b61e-fe267e6fae1f.description: A delightful platter featuring a variety of meats and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Sliced turkey or chicken, or ham
instructions: Place a small round bread in the center of a large platter.
Fill the bread with chopped celery mixed with mayonnaise.
Surround the bread with black olives and toasted bread slices.
Toast white bread slices in a mild oven.
Top the toasted bread with chopped lettuce mixed with mayonnaise.
Arrange cherry tomatoes around the lettuce.
Add rolled slices of turkey, chicken, or ham around the tomatoes.
Garnish the meat with an orange or tangerine slice and a pistachio sliver.
Decorate the edges of the platter with radishes shaped like flowers.

a21517ca-0eb2-472f-80f1-959f926a0548.name: Croissant
a21517ca-0eb2-472f-80f1-959f926a0548.description: Delicious stuffed croissants filled with sausage, cheese, and spices.
ingredients: Spices, thyme, and nutmeg to taste
instructions: Mix yeast with sugar and warm milk, then add egg, solid oil, salt, pepper, and flour until dough is non-sticky.
Sauté chopped onion and sausage, then add some tomato paste and spices.
Cut small triangles from the dough, place filling at the base, sprinkle with cheese, roll them up, and fold the corners inward.
Brush with egg yolk and bake at 175°C for 20 minutes, placing on the middle rack.

ee19f706-4b0d-4b52-a910-e427e6ceb879.name: Asian Burger
ee19f706-4b0d-4b52-a910-e427e6ceb879.description: A deliciously spiced burger with a unique blend of flavors.
instructions: Mix ground meat with carrot, dry bread, onion, and egg; refrigerate for 24 hours.
Shape into small patties, fry in oil until golden, and serve with lettuce, burger buns, pickles, and tomatoes.

bc9b7da6-2865-4275-a5ff-53c6b7f02c98.name: Fish Burger
bc9b7da6-2865-4275-a5ff-53c6b7f02c98.description: Crispy fish fillet in a delicious burger with fresh toppings.
instructions: Mix breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder in a bowl.
Press the fish fillet into the mixture to coat it well.
Fry the coated fish fillet in hot oil until golden brown.
Slice the hamburger bun in half and spread mayonnaise on one side.
Layer chopped lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and the fried fish fillet on the bun.
Top with the other half of the bun and serve the sandwiches.

5d02f905-d493-4232-bd38-8cbad05e6105.name: Roast Beef
5d02f905-d493-4232-bd38-8cbad05e6105.description: Savory beef sandwich with fresh vegetables and rich flavors.
instructions: Sauté onion and beef until golden.
Add tomato paste and chopped tomatoes, then mix in dissolved meat cube.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice, simmer until thick.
Serve in a baguette with lettuce.

e21a545b-dcfa-45c4-a2f7-18d9d1c668b9.name: Asian Samosa
e21a545b-dcfa-45c4-a2f7-18d9d1c668b9.description: Crispy pastries filled with savory meat and vegetables, perfect for snacking.
instructions: Sauté onions and bell pepper, then add ground meat and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms, chopped herbs, pepper, salt, and tomato paste.
For the dough, gradually add water to sifted flour to form a soft dough.
Mix in yeast (soaked in warm water), baking soda, yogurt, and salt to make a very soft dough.
Dust a surface with flour, shape the dough into small balls, and roll them out.
Fill the rolled dough with the prepared filling, seal the edges with a fork.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.

68014041-51c9-46f7-8cb0-ab7f9b86658d.name: Double Cheese Burger
68014041-51c9-46f7-8cb0-ab7f9b86658d.description: Juicy double cheese burgers packed with fresh herbs and melted cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix ground meat, onion, mint, and parsley in a bowl, adding salt and pepper; knead well.
Divide the mixture into eight equal parts and shape each into a burger.
Cut the cheese into four cubes and place one on each of four burgers.
Top with the remaining four burgers, sealing the edges to hide the cheese.
Brush oil on both sides of the burgers and cook in a non-stick pan over medium heat for 15 minutes.
Flip and cook the other side for an additional 5 to 10 minutes.

d2f17efa-4741-4a86-aa1c-f5a4d542c60b.name: Chicken Fillet Sandwich with Cheese
d2f17efa-4741-4a86-aa1c-f5a4d542c60b.description: A delicious sandwich filled with sautéed chicken, mushrooms, and melted cheese.
instructions: Sauté the onion until golden, then add the chopped chicken fillet and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and chicken broth, stir until the broth dissolves, then mix in the cheese until smooth.
Hollow out the baguette and fill it with the mixture, garnishing with tomato and pickles.

d3b3b02e-c00a-43f7-bed8-1f250582b08f.name: Sausage Bread
d3b3b02e-c00a-43f7-bed8-1f250582b08f.description: Delicious bread filled with savory sausages, perfect for sandwiches.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons of olive or liquid oil
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, and sugar together.
Add oil, then dissolve salt in warm water and gradually add to the flour until a smooth dough forms.
Knead the dough slightly, cover it, and let it rise until doubled in size.
Shape the dough into orange-sized pieces, flatten them, and place a sausage on each.
Roll the dough around the sausage and place in a greased pot.
Cover the pot with a lid and let it rest for another 10 minutes.
Cook on low heat until the bread is golden underneath, flipping if necessary.
For spicier bread, mix a teaspoon of red pepper with the flour before making the dough.
Boil sausages for 3 minutes, then drain before using.

28bba0d4-d33a-40da-aea6-15a90a1f930f.name: Gormeh
28bba0d4-d33a-40da-aea6-15a90a1f930f.description: A delicious stuffed bread with herbs, cheese, and egg.
instructions: Dissolve yeast in half a cup of water, then mix with flour and butter to form a dough.

Let the dough rest for two hours, steam the herbs, roll out the dough, fill with herbs, cheese, and egg, layer with thin dough, grease the pan, sprinkle salt, and fry both sides over low heat until cooked. Slice and serve.

3848e325-491d-4974-9971-715f3a60f8dc.name: Meat Bites
3848e325-491d-4974-9971-715f3a60f8dc.description: Delicious stuffed baguette bites filled with savory meat and cheese.
instructions: Prepare the ground meat with fried onion, salt, pepper, and tomato paste; let it cool.
Mix in chopped parsley, pizza cheese, and eggs until smooth.
Slice baguettes into rings and hollow them out carefully.
Heat oil in a pan, place the baguette rings, and fill them with the meat mixture.
Fry one side until golden, then flip to fry the other side.
Serve arranged in a dish.

bc44003e-64be-4ecc-8770-2d4d39ba4e41.name: Vegetable Samosa
bc44003e-64be-4ecc-8770-2d4d39ba4e41.description: Crispy pastry filled with savory vegetables and spices, perfect for snacking.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add onion, garlic, and spices until softened.
Add remaining ingredients, salt, and pepper, mix, and cook for 30 minutes on low heat.
Combine flour and salt, create a well, add oil and water, and mix into a firm dough.
Knead the dough until smooth, let it rest in plastic for 30 minutes.
Divide dough into 12 equal parts, roll out into 15 cm circles, and cut in half.
Form cones with the dough, fill with the prepared mixture, seal edges with water, and fry.

eb81fdbf-b056-4994-b8c0-8bc708f903d8.name: Homemade Chicken Burger
eb81fdbf-b056-4994-b8c0-8bc708f903d8.description: Juicy chicken burgers marinated for hours, perfect for a delicious meal.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon mixed dried herbs (thyme, parsley, tarragon, mint)
instructions: Grind the chicken and grate the onion into it. Add lemon zest, lemon juice, herbs, salt, and pepper, and mix well. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Remove from the fridge, divide into 6 equal parts, and shape into balls. Flatten each ball with your palm.
Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Fry the burgers for 10 to 12 minutes on each side.

f066e19d-303f-48da-b701-c56f089a6229.name: Chicken Bowl Sandwich
f066e19d-303f-48da-b701-c56f089a6229.description: A delicious and creamy chicken sandwich filled with vegetables and melted cheese.
instructions: Cut the bread as shown and hollow it out, ensuring the bottom remains intact.
Finely chop the onion and sauté it in a little oil, then add grated carrot and sauté briefly.
Shred the boiled chicken and add it to the mixture, sautéing slightly.
Add the food seasoning and continue to sauté, then mix in the cream and mayonnaise, allowing it to thicken.
Fill the hollowed bread with the mixture and sprinkle grated pizza cheese on top.
Arrange the sandwiches on a baking tray and bake at 180°C for 5 minutes until the cheese melts and turns golden.

4dd3d5bf-96bd-4205-beae-82377563068f.name: Cheese Triangles
4dd3d5bf-96bd-4205-beae-82377563068f.description: Delicious cheesy pastries baked to golden perfection.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Mix flour, baking powder, pepper, and salt in a bowl, then add half a cup of cheddar cheese and gradually mix in the milk.
Sprinkle some flour on a board, roll out the mixture, sprinkle with milk and cheddar cheese, then cut into triangles.
Bake the triangles in the oven for 15 minutes.

878f8ad1-774f-4009-ada2-f1d28fab10df.name: Chicken and Vegetable Sandwich
878f8ad1-774f-4009-ada2-f1d28fab10df.description: A delicious sandwich filled with chicken, vegetables, and a creamy dressing.
instructions: Mix thyme into the mayonnaise.
Shred cooked chicken and combine with onion and celery in a bowl.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add chopped parsley or cilantro and mix well.
Spoon the mixture into bread and serve as a snack.

5e8fbae6-2718-4abb-bb20-17ca283c67c4.name: Salami and Pear Sandwich
5e8fbae6-2718-4abb-bb20-17ca283c67c4.description: A delightful sandwich combining savory salami, sweet pear, and melted cheddar.
instructions: Heat a pan over medium heat and place cheese on one slice of bread.
Add salami or cooked meat and a layer of pear on another slice, then combine.
Spread butter on both sides of the sandwich and place it in the pan.
Press down gently with a spatula while cooking to melt the cheese and bind the ingredients.

9208b2f3-63bb-4468-8c71-9fd6ea1bc987.name: Warm French Sandwich
9208b2f3-63bb-4468-8c71-9fd6ea1bc987.description: A delicious warm sandwich filled with cheese, veggies, and savory flavors.
instructions: Slice the baguette open in the middle.
Spread cheese on one side, mayonnaise and ketchup on the other, adding a few drops of mustard.
Press the two sides together to combine the ingredients.
Layer the remaining ingredients inside the baguette and top with cheese slices.
Wrap the sandwich in aluminum foil and bake for 5 minutes until the cheese melts and the sandwich is warm.
Remove from the oven, cut into rolls, and serve with fried potatoes.

684fb8c0-4943-468b-9337-08f7710e5bc5.name: Quick Chicken Bites
684fb8c0-4943-468b-9337-08f7710e5bc5.description: Delicious and easy-to-make chicken bites perfect for a quick snack.
instructions: Spread cheese on lavash bread.
Place shredded chicken on top, covering half the bread.
Add sliced apple next to the chicken and spread some tomato sauce on top.
Fold the other side of the bread over.
Heat some oil in a pan and sauté the prepared bites for three minutes.
Serve these delicious bites with yogurt or salad.

58a2ba63-cfd4-4958-b9f7-12c84df26c1d.name: Tuna Sandwich
58a2ba63-cfd4-4958-b9f7-12c84df26c1d.description: A delicious and protein-packed tuna sandwich perfect for any meal.
instructions: Drain the tuna and remove its oil.
Boil the eggs in water for 15 minutes.
In a bowl, mix the tuna, chopped eggs, and celery well.
Add mayonnaise and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spread the mixture on slices of toast and enjoy.

3383ccf8-02e0-4040-bff3-96c195d9cacf.name: Layered Sandwich
3383ccf8-02e0-4040-bff3-96c195d9cacf.description: A delicious multi-layered sandwich with creamy fillings and crunchy textures.
instructions: Mix all ingredients for each layer in separate bowls.
Trim the edges of the bread and spread softened butter on top.
Spread the first layer mixture thickly on the bread, add three slices of bread on top, and butter again.
Spread the second layer mixture thickly, add three more slices of bread, and butter again.
Spread the third layer mixture, add the last three slices of bread, and gently press the layers together.
Mix 700g cream cheese with 1/2 cup of plain soda using an electric mixer.
Use half of the mixture to cover the sandwich and decorate with the rest.
Chill the sandwich in the refrigerator for at least two and a half hours before slicing and serving.

99dbe4e5-361e-4452-a1a3-4bdca1e6e7ef.name: Special Cheese and Salami Sandwich
99dbe4e5-361e-4452-a1a3-4bdca1e6e7ef.description: A delicious grilled sandwich with melted cheese and savory salami.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and nutmeg to taste
instructions: Melt butter in a suitable pot over medium heat and add flour to cook it slightly.
Gradually add milk, then season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Once boiling, stir in Parmesan cheese until thickened.
Place salami inside the bread, pour the cheese mixture over it, and top with pizza cheese.
Preheat the grill and place the sandwiches inside for 3 to 5 minutes.

f9b3a86a-ef43-4ba2-80bd-e6faf634d901.name: Monte Cristo Sandwich
f9b3a86a-ef43-4ba2-80bd-e6faf634d901.description: A deliciously layered sandwich with ham, turkey, and cheese, fried to golden perfection.
instructions: Spread a little mustard on one slice of bread, add a slice of Parmesan cheese.
Layer chicken ham, cheddar cheese, and turkey ham, then spread more mustard and top with another slice of bread.
Cut the sandwich in half and repeat with remaining ingredients.
Beat the eggs and mix with milk and salt, then dip the sandwiches in this mixture.
Fry in butter over medium heat until golden, and sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.

c456c6b8-bb44-46f9-bc8f-79f006d432e2.name: Mushroom Burger
c456c6b8-bb44-46f9-bc8f-79f006d432e2.description: Juicy beef burgers topped with sautéed mushrooms and cheddar cheese.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix ground beef, onion, parsley, thyme, tomato paste, salt, pepper, egg, and breadcrumbs until sticky.
Divide the mixture into six equal parts and shape into flat rounds. Place mushrooms and cheese on each, folding meat around them.
Grease a barbecue or grill tray and cook burgers for 4-5 minutes on each side. Alternatively, fry in a non-stick pan.
For sautéed mushrooms, slice them and fry in a pan with 1 tablespoon oil and 1 teaspoon lemon juice to prevent darkening.

b1ccd3c6-4430-4200-869a-3df3c737c75c.name: Giraffe Sandwich
b1ccd3c6-4430-4200-869a-3df3c737c75c.description: A fun and creative sandwich shaped like a giraffe, perfect for kids!
instructions: Chop the peeled egg and mix it with mayonnaise in a bowl.
Use a mold to cut the white and brown bread into giraffe shapes.
Make small circles on the giraffes with a metal tube.
Place brown circles on the white giraffe and white circles on the brown giraffe.
Spread the egg and mayonnaise mixture on the shapes and press the second mold on top to stick them together.
Place them on a plate, using cress as grass and shaped carrot for flowers.

be555e07-d6a3-414b-9516-b36ef0a8f488.name: Ham Sandwich with Indian Dressing
be555e07-d6a3-414b-9516-b36ef0a8f488.description: A delicious ham sandwich with a flavorful Indian-inspired dressing.
instructions: Mix 1/4 cup butter with vinegar in a medium bowl until light and fluffy.
Add spices and mustard, then mix in the ham until well combined.
Spread 1/2 tablespoon of butter on one slice of bread and top with 1/4 of the mixture.
Butter another slice and place it on top, repeating for four sandwiches.
Store sandwiches at 0 degrees for up to one month.

7a19998e-634c-4fe4-8df2-fdbc86dc8a9f.name: Cauliflower Omelette
7a19998e-634c-4fe4-8df2-fdbc86dc8a9f.description: A delicious omelette packed with cauliflower and fresh herbs.
instructions: Break the cauliflower into small florets, wash them, and boil for five minutes.
Mix eggs, chopped onion, salt, pepper, and flour, then fry in oil or butter. Serve topped with parsley.

3030f9f8-42ee-42bd-aed1-1c533c7c7f6e.name: Pasta Omelette
3030f9f8-42ee-42bd-aed1-1c533c7c7f6e.description: A delicious and hearty omelette with pasta, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
instructions: Boil the pasta according to package instructions and drain. Stir with a fork to separate.
Heat a non-stick pan and add oil. Sauté onion, then add tomatoes and fry for one minute.
Add pasta and parsley, stir-fry for two minutes, then season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mixture evenly in the pan. Beat eggs with water and salt, pour over the mixture.
Reduce heat, cover the pan, and cook until eggs are set and golden underneath.
Garnish the omelette with ketchup before serving.

25b5b410-09ef-4528-8aa1-528f78442412.name: Lentil Omelette
25b5b410-09ef-4528-8aa1-528f78442412.description: A hearty and nutritious omelette packed with lentils and vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook lentils in a pot for about 25 minutes.
Add chopped broccoli and let it boil for another 1-2 minutes.
Pour oil into a suitable baking dish and add onion rings.
Place the dish in a cold oven and set to 200°C (400°F) to bake for 25 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with milk or water, salt, and pepper, then add vegetables and tomatoes.
Drain lentils and broccoli and add to the onion in the dish.
Pour the egg mixture over the ingredients in the dish and bake for another 10 minutes.
Use a spatula to push the omelette mixture to the center to allow uncooked eggs to flow to the edges.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes until the eggs are set.

7973aa30-1be8-4a52-a152-16cd8214e46c.name: Leek and Spinach Omelette
7973aa30-1be8-4a52-a152-16cd8214e46c.description: A delicious and healthy omelette packed with leeks and spinach.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon of fresh basil and parsley, chopped
Salt and black pepper to taste
1.5 cups of grated Parmesan or pizza cheese (optional)
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan and sauté the bell pepper for 5-7 minutes, then add cumin.
Add leeks, cover, and sauté for 5 minutes until soft, then season with salt and pepper.
Place spinach on top of leeks, cover, and steam for 3-4 minutes, then stir.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with salt, pepper, cumin, basil, and parsley.
Pour egg mixture over the pan contents, cover, and cook on low heat until eggs set.
If desired, sprinkle cheese on top and place in a hot oven for a few minutes until melted and golden.

165e2dad-ed89-4959-a8e9-25dc68369ec5.name: Italian Omelette
165e2dad-ed89-4959-a8e9-25dc68369ec5.description: A delicious and hearty omelette packed with vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Sauté onion, zucchini, and mushrooms in oil, then add corn.
Mix sautéed ingredients with beaten eggs, cheese, pepper, salt, and breadcrumbs until thick.
Pour mixture into a buttered pan and cook both sides like a fritter.

a353081f-5731-4afa-8cf2-0724e3d5e146.name: Scallion and Cheese Omelette
a353081f-5731-4afa-8cf2-0724e3d5e146.description: A delicious omelette filled with scallions, cheese, and herbs.
instructions: Sauté the scallions briefly.
Mix the egg, parsley, red pepper, and cheese, then combine with the scallions.
Fry the mixture in a buttered pan.

8cb34955-9ff0-446e-9a2d-9dc2283a9c64.name: Spanish Omelette
8cb34955-9ff0-446e-9a2d-9dc2283a9c64.description: A delicious and hearty omelette packed with potatoes, peas, and tomatoes.
instructions: Peel and finely chop the potatoes, onion, and tomato.
Sauté the potatoes in olive oil until soft.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and add beaten eggs, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture into a pan with oil over medium heat and cook until set.

d9f61d37-7f1b-4022-9f4f-e916d61a0c72.name: Omelette with Garlic and Cheese
d9f61d37-7f1b-4022-9f4f-e916d61a0c72.description: A delicious omelette packed with garlic, cheese, and fresh herbs.
instructions: In a suitable bowl, crack the eggs and whisk them well.
Heat oil in a pan, then add minced garlic, chopped bell pepper, onion, water, vinegar, and baking powder to the eggs.
Pour the mixture into the pan and let it set slightly.
Sprinkle coriander and pizza cheese on top, cover, and wait for the omelette to finish cooking.

14340cfb-3623-4a8f-acdd-a64fe2b041b4.name: Cheese and Rice Omelette
14340cfb-3623-4a8f-acdd-a64fe2b041b4.description: A delicious omelette filled with cheese, rice, and bell peppers.
instructions: Mix cheese, rice, and bell pepper in a bowl.
In another bowl, beat the eggs and add salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour some beaten eggs into the pan, add the cheese and rice mixture, then top with remaining eggs.
Cook both sides until the omelette is firm and fully cooked.

1c1e0ee2-6940-4d35-8848-ffb80e1d3665.name: Mushroom and Cheese Omelette
1c1e0ee2-6940-4d35-8848-ffb80e1d3665.description: A delicious omelette filled with mushrooms and two types of cheese.
instructions: Beat the eggs in a glass bowl and add grated tomatoes.
Melt butter in a medium pan over low heat, add the egg and tomato mixture.
After a few minutes, add mushrooms, Parmesan, mozzarella, salt, and pepper.
Cover the pan and cook on low heat for four minutes.
Serve the omelette immediately after cooking.

e564eae9-7e8d-44fd-971e-3b4f18984be4.name: Diltanin Omelette
e564eae9-7e8d-44fd-971e-3b4f18984be4.description: A delicious and quick omelette with tomatoes, eggs, and cheese.
instructions: Chop the tomatoes into large cubes.
Heat a pan and add olive oil.
Add tomatoes and cook until slightly soft.
Season with salt and pepper, then mix.
Add half of the chopped dill and mint, stir well.
Add eggs one by one, keeping the heat low.
If desired, add garlic powder and mix gently.
Cover the pan until the mixture firms up.
Add grated cheese and remaining herbs, stir continuously.
Increase heat slightly until cheese melts and combines.
Serve once the desired consistency is reached.

003b4486-8172-42a9-987c-a8b1cdb18bdd.name: Basil Omelette
003b4486-8172-42a9-987c-a8b1cdb18bdd.description: A delicious and fragrant omelette packed with fresh basil and tomatoes.
ingredients: 75 grams grated cheese (blue cheese or Gouda)
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and wait until it warms up.
Chop tomatoes coarsely and add to the pan with salt and sumac, stirring until soft.
Add half of the grated cheese and chopped basil, stirring gently.
Mix eggs with flour until smooth, then pour evenly over the mixture in the pan.
Place whole green peppers on top and sprinkle remaining cheese and lemon juice.
Gently pull the edges of the omelette towards the center to cook evenly.
Once the omelette reaches desired thickness, transfer to a serving dish and garnish with chopped basil.

ab755c4b-f3a1-43cf-97c1-87a9816c4346.name: Eggplant Omelette
ab755c4b-f3a1-43cf-97c1-87a9816c4346.description: A delicious and savory omelette featuring fried eggplant and fresh herbs.
ingredients: half a cup of chopped parsley
instructions: Peel the eggplants and soak in salted water to remove bitterness. Rinse and dry, then slice evenly.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the eggplants until golden on both sides. Add pureed tomato, chopped garlic, and parsley.
Increase heat to evaporate tomato juice. Beat eggs in a bowl and mix in salt, pepper, turmeric, and flour.
Lower heat and pour egg mixture into the pan, shaking gently to spread evenly. Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Flip the omelette and cook the other side until golden.

151a1ec0-2a65-45ea-85f7-d10faa6d994b.name: Spinach Roll Omelette
151a1ec0-2a65-45ea-85f7-d10faa6d994b.description: A delicious omelette filled with spinach and cheese, perfect for a quick meal.
ingredients: Garlic powder, salt, turmeric, pepper (to taste)
instructions: Sauté chopped spinach with melted butter, turmeric, and salt for 2-3 minutes.
Add a cup of water, cover, and cook for 15 minutes.
Remove the lid, increase heat, and cook for another 6-7 minutes.
Let the spinach cool while mixing eggs, milk, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Heat oil in a pan and pour in the egg mixture, spreading it evenly.
Cook one side of the omelette on medium heat until golden, then flip and cook the other side.
Mix cooled spinach with grated cheese and place it in the center of the omelette.
Roll the omelette and let it firm up in the pan before serving.

974e510b-1421-421e-9210-d9e3dbedba08.name: Sausage and Green Onion Omelette
974e510b-1421-421e-9210-d9e3dbedba08.description: A delicious omelette packed with sausage and fresh green onions.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped green onions.
Add chopped sausages and cook for a few minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, salt, and pepper to taste.
Add water and sauté for another minute.
Beat eggs in a bowl and gently add to the pan, stirring well.
Sprinkle thyme on top and serve with bread.

d9060fd7-9f59-4e23-abd6-1c012b8c0035.name: Potato and Vegetable Omelette
d9060fd7-9f59-4e23-abd6-1c012b8c0035.description: A delicious omelette packed with potatoes, vegetables, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Mix corn flour and water in a large bowl until it forms a dough.
Heat olive oil in a pan, spread the dough, and cook for 5 minutes on low heat, then flip it.
In another bowl, mix eggs, tomato, salt, pepper, and butter.
Chop potatoes into small pieces and place them on the dough with the egg mixture.
Bake in the oven at 190°C for 30 minutes.
Garnish the omelette with basil leaves, mint, and sour cream before serving.

41428f59-8b1e-4186-810d-be14d29c5323.name: Omelette with Green Onions
41428f59-8b1e-4186-810d-be14d29c5323.description: A delicious and fluffy omelette with fresh green onions and tomatoes.
ingredients: a pinch of mint, salt, pepper
instructions: Heat olive oil in a suitable pan over medium heat.
Add chopped green onions and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and sauté for a few more minutes.
In a bowl, beat the eggs with salt, pepper, and mint until well combined.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and stir until the eggs set.
Add chopped coriander and serve with bread.

367eab63-504a-481e-a55e-5b3f18d444c9.name: Eggs with Potato Dough
367eab63-504a-481e-a55e-5b3f18d444c9.description: A delicious dish of fried eggs served on a bed of potato dough.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, add corn and onions, and sauté on low heat.
Chop grilled tomatoes and add them to the pan, optionally adding tomato sauce or juice.
Add pepper and a pinch of salt, and sauté for 10 minutes.
Mix potato flour with a little water to form a thin dough, grease the bottom of the pan, and place the dough in it for 1-2 minutes.
In another pan, melt butter and fry the eggs.
Place the dough in a suitable dish, top with fried eggs, and add coriander mixture beside it. Serve with bread.

3e1ccd1e-f0f2-485a-bb3d-ae9a5ecbd6a5.name: Delicious Omelette
3e1ccd1e-f0f2-485a-bb3d-ae9a5ecbd6a5.description: A savory omelette filled with vegetables and melted cheese.
instructions: Break the eggs and add 1 tablespoon of milk for each egg.
Chop the tomato, mushrooms, onion, and cheese.
In a pan, melt some butter and sauté with flour and half a cup of milk to make a sauce.
Sauté the mushrooms and onions in another pan.
Beat the eggs and cook in a pan with some oil, covering it for better results.
Don't forget to add salt and pepper.
Add the sautéed mushrooms and onions to the sauce, place chopped tomatoes and cheese on one side of the omelette.
Once the cheese melts, transfer it to a plate and add the sauce mixture to the other side.
Fold the omelette and garnish with grated carrot, lettuce, and chopped cabbage.

d760843e-635d-42cc-bd47-6dd129fd21fc.name: Spanish Omelette
d760843e-635d-42cc-bd47-6dd129fd21fc.description: A delicious and hearty omelette packed with vegetables and flavor.
instructions: Sauté grated onion in olive oil, then add garlic and sauté briefly.
Continue with chopped bell pepper, then add quartered mushrooms until they change color.
Add chopped tomatoes, ensuring to cook on low heat.
Season with salt, pepper, and spices, then crack eggs on top and mix yolks with a fork.
If you prefer whole yolks, add green peas before covering to cook on low heat.
Sprinkle thyme powder before serving for extra flavor.

3220d366-bc46-4ec4-84a4-68d986ffd68c.name: Spiced Omelette
3220d366-bc46-4ec4-84a4-68d986ffd68c.description: A savory omelette packed with meat, sausage, and spices.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325°F.
Sauté meat, sausage, and garlic in olive oil until sausage is browned.
Strain the mixture.
Add salt, cumin, tomato paste, and soy sauce; mix well.
Let the mixture cool.
Combine eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Pour the meat mixture into a baking dish and pour eggs on top.
Bake in the oven at 325°F for 45 minutes.

db9f8bcf-e92b-40ec-bd9f-6f04a8dba887.name: Potato Omelette
db9f8bcf-e92b-40ec-bd9f-6f04a8dba887.description: A delicious and hearty potato omelette, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix fried potatoes, onion, salt, pepper, and turmeric in a pan.
Add eggs, cover, and cook until set, then stir until fully cooked.

26538b50-a2a9-4865-95a4-ee00b614e203.name: Spinach Omelette (Narges)
26538b50-a2a9-4865-95a4-ee00b614e203.description: A delicious spinach omelette with a hint of spices.
instructions: Sauté the spinach in oil, ensuring it doesn't overcook.
Add fried onions, salt, pepper, turmeric, and garlic, then stir.
Crack the eggs into the mixture and cover.
Once the eggs start to set, stir to cook the whites thoroughly.
The dish is ready to serve.

83aa4f8d-9571-4bb8-82d9-52ecd7f72167.name: Pepper and Onion Omelette
83aa4f8d-9571-4bb8-82d9-52ecd7f72167.description: A colorful and creamy omelette packed with vegetables and flavor.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté sliced bell peppers and red onions for about 5 minutes until soft.
Add steamed peas and broccoli to the mixture.
Stir in cream, salt, special spices, and chopped parsley.
Heat slightly and serve.

14c21200-b9b8-4db7-ab1b-3c1ed2ad7cdd.name: Pepper and Cream Omelette
14c21200-b9b8-4db7-ab1b-3c1ed2ad7cdd.description: A creamy omelette packed with fresh vegetables and vibrant flavors.
instructions: Heat a little oil in a pan.
Sauté chopped bell pepper and onion with spices until soft, then add peas, corn, and boiled carrot.
Break cauliflower into small florets and add to the omelette with salt.
Once vegetables are cooked, add cream and chopped coriander, then cool before serving.

ea84c5ca-e141-4ec7-a1c0-81e3fb21fb12.name: Vegetable Omelette
ea84c5ca-e141-4ec7-a1c0-81e3fb21fb12.description: A delicious and fluffy omelette packed with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Mix all ingredients together.
Pour into a greased pan and cook until set, about 4 minutes.

0e1c9791-0e98-4a98-959a-b507ad57be3b.name: Tomato Omelette
0e1c9791-0e98-4a98-959a-b507ad57be3b.description: A delicious and easy-to-make tomato omelette packed with flavor.
instructions: Choose a baking dish and add 1 tablespoon of oil.
Slice the tomatoes and arrange them in the dish.
Slice the mushrooms and place them on top of the tomatoes.
Chop the bell pepper finely and sprinkle it over the tomatoes and mushrooms.
Chop the garlic and mix it with the fried onion, then add to the dish.
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top of the tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of oil and some salt over the dish, cover, and cook on low heat.
If using an oven or microwave, cook until the tomatoes soften.
If there is excess liquid, increase heat slightly and leave the lid ajar to evaporate it.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and mix in cheese if using, along with a pinch of salt.
Add the egg mixture to the dish, cover, and let it cook until the eggs are set.
For best results, place in the oven or microwave during the final stage to set the cheese and eggs.

22265861-1fde-4c9d-8178-3473cd0327dc.name: Fish Flavored Omelette
22265861-1fde-4c9d-8178-3473cd0327dc.description: A savory omelette infused with fish and fresh herbs.
instructions: Mix tomatoes, onion, and parsley, then add salt, spices, and garlic.
Add beaten eggs and vegetable oil, whisking together.
Stir in the shredded tuna.
Finally, add flour and baking powder, mixing well.
Grease a baking tray with butter, pour in the mixture, and bake at 160°C for 20 minutes until golden.

b6b30376-8ed1-453d-a195-5514c94d64ae.name: Indian Omelette
b6b30376-8ed1-453d-a195-5514c94d64ae.description: A flavorful omelette packed with onions, green peppers, and fresh coriander.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix the grated onion, green pepper, and coriander.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs well with a whisk.
Add the onion mixture to the eggs and mix thoroughly.
Stir in the salt.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large frying pan. Pour a large spoonful of the mixture into the pan.
Cook the omelette over medium heat, flipping once and pressing gently with a spoon until golden.
Repeat with the remaining mixture, keeping the cooked omelettes warm.

b4ebdc57-b23c-4caa-9fb5-d16430ac6089.name: Tomato Omelette with Cheese
b4ebdc57-b23c-4caa-9fb5-d16430ac6089.description: A savory omelette bursting with fresh tomatoes and creamy cheese.
instructions: Heat oil and sauté cumin and turmeric for about a minute.
Blend tomatoes into a puree, then add diced potatoes, bell pepper, and peas, cooking for 30 minutes.
Add cubed cottage cheese, salt, and pepper to the omelette, then cook for 5 more minutes.
Turn off heat and mix in cream, lemon juice, and chopped cilantro before serving.

e62145ca-d9b5-43b3-9099-7e73a0f13b46.name: Strawberry Omelette
e62145ca-d9b5-43b3-9099-7e73a0f13b46.description: A delightful omelette filled with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.
ingredients: 75 grams or 3/4 cup strawberries, halved lengthwise
2 tablespoons powdered sugar or regular sugar
instructions: In a medium glass bowl, whisk egg yolks with sugar until fluffy and pale. Add whipped cream and vanilla.
In another bowl, beat egg whites until stiff. Gently fold into the yolk mixture.
Melt butter in a medium pan, pour in the mixture, and reduce heat after 2 minutes. Add strawberries, fold the omelette, and cook for 2 more minutes.

8f42aa0c-3dd8-45f7-891c-4b62a344f179.name: French Toast Omelette
8f42aa0c-3dd8-45f7-891c-4b62a344f179.description: A delightful blend of eggs and sweet spices with crispy toast.
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, sugar, nutmeg, and vanilla thoroughly.
Heat vegetable oil in a hot pan, dip toast slices in the egg mixture, and cook until golden brown.

676e534a-8c3d-4226-b2b9-507c12c8afff.name: Greek Omelette
676e534a-8c3d-4226-b2b9-507c12c8afff.description: A delicious omelette packed with spinach, cheese, and herbs.
instructions: Sauté spinach in 2 tsp olive oil, adding salt and pepper until soft, then set aside.
Whisk eggs with cheese, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Sauté onion in 2 tsp olive oil for 5 minutes, add spinach and cook gently.
Pour in the egg mixture without stirring and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Preheat the oven and place the pan inside for 45 seconds to heat the top.

ef2aa483-0d95-4dcb-bd09-ce7f6556c717.name: Mushroom Omelette
ef2aa483-0d95-4dcb-bd09-ce7f6556c717.description: A delicious and fluffy omelette filled with sautéed mushrooms and fresh parsley.
instructions: Sauté the mushrooms with a bit of parsley.
Beat the eggs with a fork, adding salt and pepper.
Pour the eggs into a hot pan with oil, covering the bottom.
Once the bottom is cooked, add mushrooms to one half and fold the other half over.
When set, transfer to a plate and serve hot.

e42f7943-f17a-42ad-b83b-8cdd477b0b84.name: Vegetable Omelette
e42f7943-f17a-42ad-b83b-8cdd477b0b84.description: A delicious and fluffy omelette packed with fresh herbs.
ingredients: 5 tablespoons mixed herbs (parsley, tarragon, green onions)
instructions: Break 3 eggs into a bowl and beat well.
Add salt and pepper, then mix in 1 tablespoon of herbs and milk.
Heat oil in a pan, pour in the mixture, and fry until cooked.
Enjoy your omelette!

b909caa9-6630-43b1-8af4-c29813b5ac30.name: Omelette and Poached Eggs Tips
b909caa9-6630-43b1-8af4-c29813b5ac30.description: Simple yet delicious omelette tips for perfect cooking every time.
instructions: Beat the eggs well until frothy.
Heat the oil until hot, then pour in the beaten eggs.
Add one tablespoon of milk per egg.
Serve hot and garnish with tomato rings or parsley.

d0acd29f-3723-4d45-9396-6a12317f62d2.name: Sausage and Ham Omelette
d0acd29f-3723-4d45-9396-6a12317f62d2.description: A delicious omelette filled with savory sausage and ham, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan until hot.
Beat three eggs in a bowl until frothy, then mix in salt, pepper, and milk.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan to cover the surface.
Reduce heat and cover the pan until the omelette sets.
Layer three slices of ham or sausage on top of the omelette.
Use a spatula and fork to carefully roll the omelette.
Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve garnished with tomato rings and parsley.

a66fa4a8-c8cb-4dd8-828d-51fff33ad24e.name: Mushroom and Asparagus Omelette
a66fa4a8-c8cb-4dd8-828d-51fff33ad24e.description: A delicious omelette filled with mushrooms and asparagus, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Beat the eggs in a bowl until frothy, then add salt, pepper, and 3 tablespoons of milk.
Heat a suitable pan with 3 tablespoons of oil until hot, then pour in the egg mixture to cover the pan's surface.
Cover the pan for a moment to let the omelette set, then carefully roll it using a fork and spatula.
Mix asparagus, mushrooms, salt, and pepper, and prepare three omelettes, filling each with the mushroom and asparagus mixture.

f65a44b1-5c05-44ff-9a60-3a3ebcc4bf59.name: Chicken Omelette
f65a44b1-5c05-44ff-9a60-3a3ebcc4bf59.description: Delicious chicken omelettes filled with creamy goodness and savory ingredients.
instructions: Beat the eggs in a bowl until frothy, then add salt, pepper, and milk.
Heat oil in a suitable pan, pour in the egg mixture, and cover until set.
Carefully roll the omelette using a fork and spatula.
Mix cooked chicken, sausage, sautéed mushrooms, cream, salt, and pepper.
Divide the mixture into three parts and fill each omelette before rolling.

38f205a4-fa82-47eb-8886-ca9b713b206c.name: Omelette with Sausage and Salami
38f205a4-fa82-47eb-8886-ca9b713b206c.description: A delicious omelette packed with sausage, salami, and fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan.
Sauté the sausage or salami, then add chopped tomatoes, salt, and pepper.
Let the tomato juice reduce slightly.
In a bowl, beat the eggs with salt and pepper, then pour into the pan.
Cover and cook on low heat until the eggs are set.
Mix all ingredients and cook for a few more minutes.

d66306bb-f089-4d4e-af29-464d77b52338.name: Omelette
d66306bb-f089-4d4e-af29-464d77b52338.description: A delicious and cheesy omelette packed with fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add chopped tomatoes with salt and pepper until the juice reduces.
Grate cheese and mix it with tomatoes, then add beaten eggs with salt and pepper, stirring until cooked.

9ae9f323-4441-4e3d-af95-cfcaa1291afe.name: Simple and Easy Omelette
9ae9f323-4441-4e3d-af95-cfcaa1291afe.description: A fluffy and sweet omelette perfect for breakfast or dessert.
instructions: Boil milk, sugar, and vanilla together.
Beat eggs in a bowl until fluffy, then mix with the milk mixture.
Grease a shallow, oven-safe dish and pour in the mixture.
Bake in the middle of the oven for 40 to 45 minutes until golden.

6f2747c9-e703-42ba-bc1c-4525d4fadea0.name: Pepper and Ham Omelette
6f2747c9-e703-42ba-bc1c-4525d4fadea0.description: A delicious omelette filled with peppers, ham, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Cut the bell pepper into four parts and roast until the skin is charred, then peel and chop.
Heat butter in a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ham until soft. Add chopped tomatoes, bell pepper, black pepper, and dill. Let cool and strain excess liquid.
In a bowl, mix eggs, salt, and ham mixture. Grease a non-stick pan, pour half the mixture, cook until browned, fold, and serve. Repeat with remaining mixture.

abf7cc1c-3623-4809-9003-06b6e4e6e431.name: Sugar Omelette
abf7cc1c-3623-4809-9003-06b6e4e6e431.description: A sweet and fluffy omelette perfect for breakfast or dessert.
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until frothy.
Add a pinch of salt, pepper, and three tablespoons of milk, then mix well.
Heat a suitable pan with a height of about 2.5 cm and add three tablespoons of oil until hot.
Pour the egg and milk mixture into the pan to cover the surface.
Cover the pan for a moment to let the omelette set.
Carefully roll the omelette using a fork and spatula.
Repeat the process to make three omelettes, sprinkling sugar between each before rolling.

5ffb76c6-c706-4ac5-9f03-94de711e5593.name: Cheese Omelette
5ffb76c6-c706-4ac5-9f03-94de711e5593.description: A delicious cheese omelette filled with Gruyère and parsley.
instructions: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk until frothy, adding salt, pepper, and milk.
Heat a suitable pan with oil until hot, pour in the egg mixture to cover the surface.
Cover the pan briefly to allow the omelette to set, then carefully roll it using a fork and spatula.
Prepare two omelettes, adding half a cup of grated Gruyère cheese and chopped parsley inside each before rolling.

6c9546eb-01b1-43ce-9a37-bffbca8fcc16.name: Jam Omelette
6c9546eb-01b1-43ce-9a37-bffbca8fcc16.description: A delightful omelette filled with sweet jam for a unique breakfast experience.
instructions: Break the eggs into a bowl and whisk until frothy.
Add salt, pepper, and 3 tablespoons of milk, then mix well.
Heat a suitable pan with 3 tablespoons of oil until hot.
Pour the egg and milk mixture into the pan to cover the surface.
Cover the pan briefly to allow the omelette to set.
Carefully roll the omelette using a fork and spatula.
Repeat to make a second omelette, adding jam between them before rolling.

97dbd5a8-0588-4d85-aa50-46b9f44a19c2.name: Chicken or Lamb Liver Omelette
97dbd5a8-0588-4d85-aa50-46b9f44a19c2.description: A savory omelette filled with liver, mushrooms, and parsley.
instructions: Break and whisk the eggs in a bowl until frothy, then add salt, pepper, and milk.
Heat oil in a suitable pan, pour in the egg mixture, cover, and cook until set.
Prepare liver, mushrooms, and parsley mixture, then fill each omelette and roll them up.

4e736019-3315-45a8-af2b-6a17e2f213ac.name: Meat Omelette
4e736019-3315-45a8-af2b-6a17e2f213ac.description: A savory omelette filled with seasoned ground meat and vegetables.
instructions: In a non-stick pan, sauté ground meat with 1 tbsp oil until browned.
Add green onion, corn, mushrooms, sauces, salt, and pepper, cooking until mushrooms release moisture.
Mix eggs with water or milk, adding salt and pepper.
Grease a small non-stick pan with remaining oil and heat.
Pour a quarter of the egg mixture, swirling to cover the pan.
Cook until golden, flip to cook the other side.
Repeat with remaining egg mixture to make three more omelettes.
Place each omelette on a plate, fill with a quarter of the meat mixture, and roll up.
Serve immediately.

90d6a248-b28e-4293-861b-f1e541d54a16.name: Corn Egg Omelette
90d6a248-b28e-4293-861b-f1e541d54a16.description: A fluffy omelette with sweet corn, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl.
Drain the corn and add it to the eggs.
Season with salt and pepper, then mix well.
Grease a non-stick skillet and heat the oil, then pour in the mixture evenly.
Cook until one side is set, then flip to cook the other side.
Serve the omelette on a plate and cut into slices.

503368e4-cb98-4c6e-96fe-8598e95c6e51.name: Sausage Omelette
503368e4-cb98-4c6e-96fe-8598e95c6e51.description: A delicious omelette filled with sausage and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon of cooked and chopped carrot
1 tablespoon of cooked and chopped potato
instructions: Mix all ingredients except the sausage together.
Heat oil in a pan, place one slice of sausage, pour the mixed ingredients on top, cover with another slice of sausage, and cook until set.

7f823c57-05af-46c5-8a5e-8019f9c0287c.name: Tomato and Tuna Omelette
7f823c57-05af-46c5-8a5e-8019f9c0287c.description: A delicious and hearty omelette packed with flavors of tomato and tuna.
instructions: Mix tomatoes, onion, and parsley, then add salt, spices, and garlic, and stir with hands.
Add beaten eggs and vegetable oil, and whisk together.
Incorporate the tuna and mix well.
Finally, add flour and baking powder, and stir the mixture.
Grease a baking tray with 1 tablespoon of butter, pour in the mixture, and bake at 160°C for 20 minutes until golden.

d567cd07-28e1-4d88-9e69-8cc9331a65a2.name: Meat and Egg Omelette
d567cd07-28e1-4d88-9e69-8cc9331a65a2.description: A savory omelette packed with ground meat and spices.
ingredients: a pinch of pepper and turmeric
instructions: Place the ground meat in a pan over medium heat and stir for 5 minutes until the moisture evaporates.
Add oil and butter to the meat.
Add salt and spices, then sauté the meat.
Pour in the beaten eggs and stir with a wooden spoon until well mixed and cooked.
Serve the omelette in a dish.

52598dff-146e-4058-b585-d91e5898d386.name: Indian Omelette
52598dff-146e-4058-b585-d91e5898d386.description: A flavorful omelette packed with fresh herbs and spices.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix the grated onion, green pepper, and coriander.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs well.
Add the onion mixture to the eggs and mix thoroughly.
Stir in the salt.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large frying pan. Pour a large spoonful of the mixture into the pan.
Cook the omelette over low heat, flipping once and pressing gently with a spoon until golden.
Repeat with the remaining mixture, keeping the omelettes warm until all are cooked. Serve with bread. Enjoy!

a7b1915b-3bf0-47f5-9cff-23f74dfe4a4f.name: Sesame Chicken Wings
a7b1915b-3bf0-47f5-9cff-23f74dfe4a4f.description: Crispy chicken wings coated in sesame and served with tangy yogurt.
ingredients: Ginger powder, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Mix chicken wings with oil, salt, pepper, lemon juice, ginger powder, and chopped onion; refrigerate for 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan, mix breadcrumbs and sesame seeds, coat wings, and fry until golden brown. Serve with yogurt and garnish.

41189263-8600-48f4-95a6-a13a7a407ceb.name: Ostrich Schnitzel
41189263-8600-48f4-95a6-a13a7a407ceb.description: Crispy and flavorful ostrich schnitzel, perfect for a delightful meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, garlic powder, and oil for frying
instructions: Place the sliced meat between two freezer bags and pound it thin.
Mix salt, pepper, and garlic powder, then sprinkle on both sides of the meat.
Combine saffron water with the egg.
Dredge the meat in wheat flour, then dip in the beaten egg.
Finally, coat with breadcrumbs and fry in oil over medium heat.

df3ef410-b8a2-4dd7-acb1-3d4257836255.name: Chicken Roll with Vegetables
df3ef410-b8a2-4dd7-acb1-3d4257836255.description: A delicious chicken roll filled with tender vegetables, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Butter, oil, salt, pepper, and lemon juice to taste
instructions: Slice the chicken breast in half and pound it flat.
Marinate with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper, and lemon juice for 1 hour.
Chop the vegetables into thin strips and steam until slightly soft.
Lay the chicken flat, place the vegetables on top, and roll it up tightly, securing with string.
Heat oil and a little butter in a pan, add the chicken roll, cover, and cook on low heat until done.
Once cooked, let it cool before slicing.

835262fa-531d-4d5c-ad58-71d7ec0a0846.name: Fried Chicken Thighs with Yogurt Sauce
835262fa-531d-4d5c-ad58-71d7ec0a0846.description: Crispy fried chicken thighs served with a creamy yogurt sauce.
instructions: Freeze the chicken thighs for 30 minutes to firm them up.
Make cuts on the surface and marinate with grated onion, lemon juice, and pepper for 1 hour.
Coat the marinated chicken in flour, then dip in beaten eggs, and finally coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry in oil until golden brown.
For the sauce, mix yogurt, cream, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and chopped green onions.
Serve the fried chicken with the yogurt sauce.

df08ca64-e0f9-4a86-b65e-6bd7d8e9c11e.name: Whole Roasted Chicken
df08ca64-e0f9-4a86-b65e-6bd7d8e9c11e.description: A succulent whole chicken roasted to golden perfection with tomatoes and peppers.
instructions: Clean and wash the chicken, then let it drain.
Rub salt inside and outside the chicken, place chopped tomato and pepper pieces under the skin.
Grease a baking dish and place the chicken inside.
Preheat the oven to 175°C and roast for three hours, basting every 15 minutes with the collected juices until golden.

eeabf22a-a838-41a7-953a-a83b74f86fa7.name: Chicken and Shrimp with Almonds
eeabf22a-a838-41a7-953a-a83b74f86fa7.description: A delightful stir-fry of chicken, shrimp, and colorful vegetables with a nutty crunch.
instructions: In a preheated pan, add some vegetable oil and cook the chicken fillet pieces over high heat.
After three minutes, add the shrimp and cook together, then set aside.
In another pan, stir-fry all the vegetables and cashews over high heat for five minutes.
Add the cooked chicken and shrimp along with soy sauce, then finish with sesame oil and ginger before serving.

4362a65c-a88e-4688-8bb2-efb11f38a29e.name: Chicken Pie
4362a65c-a88e-4688-8bb2-efb11f38a29e.description: A savory pie filled with tender chicken and vegetables.
instructions: Beat the egg with a fork and add yogurt, then mix in salt and baking powder with oil.
Gradually add flour until a smooth dough forms.
Sauté cooked chicken with fried onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, and mushrooms, then let cool.
Grease the baking dish, spread the dough, and poke holes with a fork.
Reserve some dough for decoration, then layer the filling on the dough.
Cover with another layer of dough and seal the edges.
Decorate the top with remaining dough, brush with egg yolk and milk, and bake at 300°F for 25-30 minutes until golden.

ec25489b-522a-482c-b16d-c19cd433c1bc.name: Spicy Chicken
ec25489b-522a-482c-b16d-c19cd433c1bc.description: Crispy and flavorful chicken fillets, perfect for a delightful meal.
instructions: Cut the chicken fillets into 1 cm strips and marinate with lemon juice.
Coat each strip with spicy seasoning and mix the remaining seasoning with breadcrumbs.
Refrigerate the fillets in a sealed container for 1 hour.
Roll the fillets in wheat flour, then dip them in ice water.
Remove excess water and coat with the spicy breadcrumb mixture.
Heat 1.5 cups of oil in a pan over medium heat.
Fry the fillets for 5-7 minutes until golden brown, flipping to cook both sides.
Serve with ketchup.

2569f9a3-b5bc-4564-9a87-7eef277065f0.name: Chicken Cake
2569f9a3-b5bc-4564-9a87-7eef277065f0.description: A savory cake made with chicken, nuts, and spices, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: Oil, carrot, celery, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the chicken breast with carrot, celery, salt, and pepper until done.
Shred the chicken and mix with eggs, onion, barberries, saffron, walnuts, yogurt, and baking powder for 5 minutes.
Heat oil and pour the mixture into the pan to rise.
Invert onto a larger pan and garnish with parsley.

84f6aed3-1b92-4ffa-89e9-9f0a2766318a.name: Chicken Fillet Dish
84f6aed3-1b92-4ffa-89e9-9f0a2766318a.description: A savory chicken fillet dish with colorful vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, garlic powder, and ginger to taste
instructions: Sauté onion with chicken and olive oil until golden.
Add sliced bell peppers, salt, spices, and soy sauce.
Incorporate broccoli, mushrooms, and carrots, cover to steam.
Serve on a platter, garnished with herbs, grilled peppers, and lemon.

a491ba78-854e-4d76-b86c-2fa83096e9dd.name: Charcoal Chicken
a491ba78-854e-4d76-b86c-2fa83096e9dd.description: Deliciously grilled chicken infused with smoky flavors and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat oil and sauté chopped garlic and peppers briefly.
Cut chicken into cubes, add to oil, and sauté with the mixture.
In a bowl, mix yogurt, vinegar, mayonnaise, chopped cilantro, and mint.
Fry the chicken on medium heat until it releases oil, sprinkle with salt, and mix in the prepared sauce.
Grill the charcoal, create a bowl with foil, place it in the center of the chicken, add oil, and place the hot charcoal inside.
Cover the pot, turn off the heat, and let it sit for 3-4 minutes to absorb the smoky flavor.
Serve with bread or rice.

6ce2c58a-8881-4644-9f97-798471e6582f.name: Turkey Steak
6ce2c58a-8881-4644-9f97-798471e6582f.description: Juicy turkey steak marinated with garlic and spices, perfect with steamed vegetables.
instructions: Pound the turkey breast with a meat mallet.
Add garlic powder, soy sauce, saffron, and crushed black pepper, and let it marinate.
Fry the marinated turkey in a greased pan.
Serve the turkey steak with steamed vegetables.

4fc1b681-a209-4529-8f86-7ae5ed9d23f3.name: Oven Fried Chicken
4fc1b681-a209-4529-8f86-7ae5ed9d23f3.description: Crispy and flavorful chicken baked to perfection with potatoes and onions.
ingredients: spices (garlic powder, turmeric, angelica, and dried herbs) (as needed)
instructions: Clean and cut the chicken into desired pieces.
Coat chicken pieces, potatoes, and onions in bread crumbs.
Arrange them on a baking tray, optionally adding some butter.
Cover the tray with foil and bake at 350°F (175°C) for one hour.
Remove the foil in the last half hour to brown the chicken.

22c2bd91-35c6-4309-b89e-113daf9b08d0.name: Florentine Chicken Roll
22c2bd91-35c6-4309-b89e-113daf9b08d0.description: A delicious chicken roll filled with spinach, mushrooms, and cheese.
instructions: Butterfly the chicken breast and pound it flat.
Sauté onion and bell pepper in oil, then add mushrooms until cooked.
Steam spinach for 2 minutes, drain, and squeeze out excess water.
Layer chicken ham, spinach, sautéed vegetables, parsley, and cheese on the chicken.
Fold the chicken like an envelope, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Coat the roll in flour, then in egg and milk mixture, and finally in breadcrumbs.
Fry gently in oil until cooked through, then slice and serve.

d47575f9-c454-483f-a8c3-222f8c3a6baa.name: Thai Fried Chicken
d47575f9-c454-483f-a8c3-222f8c3a6baa.description: Crispy and flavorful Thai fried chicken, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Wash the chicken fillet and gently pound it to flatten.
Beat the eggs with saffron, dip the chicken pieces in the egg mixture, then coat with seasoned breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown on both sides.
Remove from oil and drain on a colander before serving.

8e967e54-b717-47aa-91de-79785b5aaad9.name: Chicken Sausage 2
8e967e54-b717-47aa-91de-79785b5aaad9.description: Delicious homemade chicken sausage with a blend of spices and nuts.
instructions: Clean the chicken thoroughly and grind it several times until very soft.
Add potato flour, spices, salt, pepper, and oil to the meat and knead well (all ingredients should be cold).
Place the mixture in a special cover, press well, and add black peppercorns, pistachios, and mushrooms in sections.
Add more meat mixture, press again, and shape into a roll.
Refrigerate to allow the mixture to bind while cooling.
Steam cook at chicken cooking temperature for twice the time.
Immediately place in ice after cooking, then freeze until completely cold before slicing.

a13acc00-1e3f-4dbd-88c9-d55820b8fcd2.name: Chicken Croquettes
a13acc00-1e3f-4dbd-88c9-d55820b8fcd2.description: Crispy chicken croquettes, perfectly seasoned and fried to golden perfection.
instructions: In a bowl, mix chicken breast, eggs, white flour, dissolved saffron, salt, and pepper well.
Moisten your hands, take about 30 grams of the mixture, shape it into a cylinder, and roll it in breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the croquettes until golden brown, then serve decorated with various cooked vegetables.

9d42fdf1-ae59-468a-b44a-1c609679237e.name: Chicken Sausage
9d42fdf1-ae59-468a-b44a-1c609679237e.description: Delicious chicken sausage filled with pistachios and garlic, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Clean the chicken and carefully separate the bones while keeping the skin intact.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on the meat, then add pistachios and garlic inside.
Tie the skin with string, then heat oil in a pan and add salt.
Brown the chicken, then add onion and a clove of garlic, sauté briefly.
Pour in half a cup of water, cover, and cook, flipping the chicken occasionally.
Remove from water and let it cool completely.
Freeze for 2-3 days, then slice thinly with a sharp knife.
Serve with various sauces and cooked vegetables.

9a6ef93f-5ad9-4c6a-b4a6-7ad7732c1adc.name: Chicken Breast with Orange Sauce
9a6ef93f-5ad9-4c6a-b4a6-7ad7732c1adc.description: Tender chicken breast served with a creamy orange sauce.
ingredients: Salt and white pepper to taste
Chicken breast for the number of servings
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté in butter.
Add orange zest and ginger, then sauté.
Pour in orange juice and simmer for 10 minutes until sauce thickens.
Stir in cream and strain the sauce using a metal sieve or hand blender.
Heat a pan, add oil or butter, and fry the chicken breast.
Arrange the fried chicken on a plate and cover with sauce.
Garnish with orange fillets and serve with rice or pasta.

884afdf8-ffb8-4fae-ac09-7d2fe5ba6aa1.name: Chicken Chop Suey
884afdf8-ffb8-4fae-ac09-7d2fe5ba6aa1.description: A delicious stir-fried chicken dish with colorful vegetables.
instructions: Cut the chicken into julienne strips and sauté in a pan.
Chop all vegetables diagonally and add to the chicken.
Crush the garlic and add it to the chicken.
Add all vegetables, soy sauce, vinegar, and chicken broth, and stir well.
Dissolve cornstarch in cold water and add to the pan, allowing it to thicken.
Add sesame oil before serving.

7da421d3-bf2c-4de0-94e6-eba6ef07e0fe.name: Chickens - Fried Chicken
7da421d3-bf2c-4de0-94e6-eba6ef07e0fe.description: Delicious fried chicken with mushrooms and fresh herbs, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Dice the chicken and add it to sautéing onions.
Chop the mushrooms and add them to the chicken, stir-fry on high heat for 10 minutes.
Turn off the heat and add green onions and parsley.
Mix in mayonnaise and combine all ingredients.
Serve the mixture over chips and garnish with lettuce.

d66c7726-098c-4e8c-bbf5-ec5c678acd97.name: Chicken and Bean Snack
d66c7726-098c-4e8c-bbf5-ec5c678acd97.description: A delicious snack with chicken, beans, and melted mozzarella on toasted bread.
instructions: In a pan, sauté chicken fillets in oil for about 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper, then mix with the bean stew.
Stir in mozzarella cheese and place 2 tablespoons of the mixture on toast.
Spread butter on the toast and bake for 5 to 8 minutes until golden.
Serve hot.

0b19d87b-6edd-41dd-9f59-f9bea682e2e5.name: Chicken Wings with Garlic Sauce
0b19d87b-6edd-41dd-9f59-f9bea682e2e5.description: Deliciously marinated chicken wings baked to perfection with a garlic kick.
