instructions: Mix chicken wings with all listed ingredients and marinate in the refrigerator for 3 hours.
Place the mixture in a baking dish and bake at 200°C until fully cooked.

97a9a1b2-e788-48b4-bedf-2995f88f7a56.name: Saffron Chicken Fillet Snack
97a9a1b2-e788-48b4-bedf-2995f88f7a56.description: Delicious saffron chicken fillet sandwiches with melted cheese.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped parsley or mixed herbs
1 tablespoon mustard, ketchup, and mayonnaise combined
Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Mix all ingredients together.
Trim the edges of the bread.
Spread a thin layer of butter on one slice of bread.
Place a tablespoon of the mixed ingredients on another slice.
Top with the buttered slice and place in the cooking device.

caffaf58-6440-47d3-be91-146d5620cec5.name: Eggplant Casserole with Chicken
caffaf58-6440-47d3-be91-146d5620cec5.description: A delicious layered dish of eggplant, chicken, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Layer the fried eggplants at the bottom of a baking dish.
Sauté onion and garlic in a little oil in a non-stick pan.
Add bell pepper, carrots, salt, pepper, and spices, then add thinly sliced boiled chicken and sauté briefly.
Pour the prepared mixture over the eggplants.
Sprinkle grated mozzarella cheese on top, then add chopped parsley.
Cover with remaining fried eggplants, then drizzle whipped cream over the top.
Sprinkle grated cheese over the cream.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 20 to 30 minutes until the cheese is golden.

767cd6e0-b907-43d6-b4ae-b7edff8ace99.name: Baked Chicken Breast with Cheese
767cd6e0-b907-43d6-b4ae-b7edff8ace99.description: Juicy chicken breasts stuffed with mozzarella and herbs, baked to perfection.
instructions: Marinate the chicken breasts in vinegar, lemon juice, and salt for 2 hours in the refrigerator.
Slice the chicken, mix mozzarella, grated onion, parsley, salt, and pepper, and stuff the chicken.
Grease a baking dish with olive oil, place the chicken, brush with olive oil, and sprinkle with spices and saffron.
Grate some cheese on top and bake at 180°C for 30 to 40 minutes until cooked through.

ab31b578-13d1-4661-a82c-01df939ff843.name: Mushroom Chicken Loaf
ab31b578-13d1-4661-a82c-01df939ff843.description: A delicious chicken loaf with mushrooms, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Sauté sliced mushrooms with a bit of salt, lemon juice, and butter for about 8 minutes.
Mix ground chicken with grated garlic, salt, pepper, mustard, baking powder, cream, breadcrumbs, and egg yolks.
Whip egg whites until fluffy, then gently fold into the chicken mixture along with the mushrooms.
Line a rectangular mold (22x12 cm) with parchment paper, pour in the mixture, and smooth the top.
Bake in a water bath at 175°C for 1.5 hours, ensuring the water reaches halfway up the mold.
Check if cooked by pressing with a finger or knife blade, then remove from water and cool.
Decorate with vegetables and slice with an electric or serrated knife.

4394c3a0-de78-4397-bb5d-e7c6e00013a7.name: Chicken with Mushrooms and Cream
4394c3a0-de78-4397-bb5d-e7c6e00013a7.description: A creamy chicken dish with mushrooms and a hint of lemon.
instructions: Peel and slice the onions and chicken breasts.
Quickly wash the mushrooms under cold water, dry them, and sprinkle with lemon juice to prevent browning.
Melt butter in a pot over heat, add onions, and stir until slightly golden.
Add the chicken, stir again, cover, and simmer on low for 10 minutes.
Add the mushrooms and stir, then simmer for another 10 minutes.
Remove the lid and let it boil on high heat if there's excess water.
Season with salt and pepper, add cream, and after a few boils, stir in parsley.
Remove from heat, serve in a dish, and enjoy.

61baafa9-8274-4cf8-ba99-53d502e47427.name: Chicken Breast Fillet with Mozzarella in Tomato Sauce
61baafa9-8274-4cf8-ba99-53d502e47427.description: Delicious chicken fillets topped with mozzarella and fresh basil in rich tomato sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper, then coat in flour, shaking off excess.
Dip in beaten egg, then coat in crushed dry bread and refrigerate for 15 minutes.
Heat 3 tbsp of oil in a pan and fry chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden.
Remove chicken and absorb excess oil with a paper towel.
In the same pan, add all sauce ingredients and simmer for 10-15 minutes until thickened.
Place 2 slices of ham, 2 pieces of mozzarella, and 2 basil leaves on each chicken piece.
Arrange chicken on the sauce in the pan, cover, and cook for 5 minutes until cheese melts.
Serve immediately.

5ac57f5a-70a8-49d5-a8aa-75e11956963d.name: Crispy Chicken Fillet
5ac57f5a-70a8-49d5-a8aa-75e11956963d.description: Deliciously crispy chicken fillets coated with corn flakes and served with a refreshing salad.
instructions: Season the cleaned chicken fillets with salt, pepper, and chicken curry powder.
Beat the eggs and coat the fillets in breadcrumbs, then in eggs, and finally in corn flakes.
Heat the oil in a deep pan and fry the fillets one by one, ensuring the corn flakes stay intact.
Remove the fillets and place them on a paper towel to drain excess oil.
Arrange the fillets on a plate and garnish with a tabbouleh salad for a colorful presentation.

d26d6860-82d0-44a8-b16a-a02a372e4d7c.name: Chicken Breast with Spinach and Walnut Sauce
d26d6860-82d0-44a8-b16a-a02a372e4d7c.description: Tender chicken breast served with a creamy spinach and walnut sauce.
ingredients: Spices: ground coriander, allspice, cumin, turmeric
Salt and black pepper to taste
Cumin, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Season the chicken breast with spices, salt, and pepper, then cook with sliced onion over low heat until done.
For the sauce, sauté onion until soft, then add garlic and spinach. Stir in flour and walnuts, then add chicken broth and simmer covered.
At the end of cooking, taste and adjust seasoning, then stir in cream and remove from heat. Serve with the cooked chicken and potatoes.
For the potatoes, slice washed potatoes with skin, place on greased foil, season, cover with foil, and bake at 350°F until cooked.

bc956af9-8333-49b7-a204-0bef80581bfc.name: Spicy Chicken Nuggets
bc956af9-8333-49b7-a204-0bef80581bfc.description: Crispy and flavorful chicken nuggets with a spicy twist.
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into small pieces.
Mix hot sauce, grape molasses, soy sauce, lemon juice, and sugar until smooth.
Marinate the chicken in the sauce for 30 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a medium pan over low heat.
In another bowl, mix ginger, flour, salt, red pepper, and hot sauce.
Coat the marinated chicken pieces in the flour mixture.
Fry the chicken in hot oil for three minutes on each side until fully cooked.

c4487906-358c-418c-8707-b285b8d07b7f.name: Stuffed Chicken Thighs
c4487906-358c-418c-8707-b285b8d07b7f.description: Delicious chicken thighs stuffed with vegetables, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons lemon juice or white vinegar
instructions: Separate the chicken thighs from the bone using a sharp knife and remove the tendons.
Cut carrots, celery, and zucchinis into 10-12 cm strips and fill the thighs with them.
Marinate the chicken overnight with salt, pepper, lemon juice, and oil.
In a lightly greased pan, cook the chicken on low heat for 30 minutes until the juices are gone.
Serve with saffron water and mushroom sauce if desired.

c0571d8b-d66e-4f25-a42d-6da2e752f7fc.name: Chicken with Special Vegetables
c0571d8b-d66e-4f25-a42d-6da2e752f7fc.description: A flavorful chicken dish cooked with vegetables and spices.
instructions: Chop the onion finely and sauté it.
Cut the chicken into suitable pieces and mix with the onion, then sauté.
Add the chopped potato, curry powder, salt, saffron, and turmeric.
Reduce the heat and let it simmer.
Add yogurt, then top with cream and peas before serving, garnished with chopped parsley.

1b9168ec-da27-47b8-ab47-98e3e20d7c3d.name: Chicken Breast Dish
1b9168ec-da27-47b8-ab47-98e3e20d7c3d.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken dish with coconut milk and pineapple.
instructions: Sauté the chicken breast in butter.
Add coconut milk and let it thicken, then mix in orange juice, cashews, and ginger. Season with salt, pepper, and fresh red chili at the end. Serve with rice.

f6410b49-8fa5-4699-98d0-d242ebe82cf6.name: Quail with Lemon Sauce
f6410b49-8fa5-4699-98d0-d242ebe82cf6.description: Tender quail cooked with a zesty lemon sauce and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cut the quails along the spine and remove the backbone.
Flatten the quail by pressing on the breast, season with salt and saffron.
Heat butter in a pan, sauté leeks, then add mushrooms until juicy.
Add vinegar, dates, salt, pepper, and thyme; mix well.
Grease a baking dish, pour in the mixture, and place quails on top.
Bake in a 75°C (167°F) oven for 45 minutes.
For the sauce, mix cornstarch with meat broth over heat.
Add lemon juice and zest, stirring until thickened.
Serve sauce over quails.

00e7f723-1d31-4029-a448-de722a1cd14e.name: Chicken with Sumac Seasoning
00e7f723-1d31-4029-a448-de722a1cd14e.description: A flavorful chicken dish seasoned with aromatic spices and fresh herbs.
ingredients: Salt and red pepper to taste
instructions: Marinate the chicken with all spices except saffron and fry in a pan.
Fry the onions in the same pan, add water to the chicken, and let it simmer.
Dissolve saffron in boiling water and pour over the chicken, allowing it to absorb the flavor.
In a separate pan, fry onions, tomatoes, and garlic, then add olives, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Serve the mixture alongside the chicken.

fd1e5e21-fef5-4ba4-a504-3322bbe856dc.name: Chicken and Vegetable Pie
fd1e5e21-fef5-4ba4-a504-3322bbe856dc.description: A delicious pie filled with chicken, vegetables, and melted mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Grease a pie dish and set aside.
In a bowl, mix flour and salt, then add cold butter and rub it into the flour.
Add solid oil, knead slightly, then mix in egg yolk and yogurt to form a dough.
Let the dough rest in the fridge for 1 hour.
Roll out the dough into a rectangle, fold it 3 times, then spread 3/2 of it in the pie dish.
Add the filling and cover with the remaining dough, making holes for steam to escape.
Brush the top with egg yolk and bake at 175°C (350°F) for 50 minutes or until golden.
For the filling, chop chicken into small pieces and sauté onion until translucent.
Add chicken and cook well, then add zucchini and bell pepper, followed by mushrooms.
Cook until moisture evaporates, then remove from heat and mix in garlic, parsley, and cheese.

7be9eedb-5e49-460b-b746-bcf1b2539719.name: Fried Chicken
7be9eedb-5e49-460b-b746-bcf1b2539719.description: Crispy fried chicken coated with a sweet and savory blend.
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into thin pieces.
Marinate chicken in a mixture of egg whites, soy sauce, honey, and garlic.
Coat marinated chicken in crushed chips and pepper.
Fry the coated chicken in plenty of oil over medium heat.
Serve with a spicy sauce if desired.

e7dd9fb6-7a56-42a2-8bb2-6610e63979ad.name: Crunchy Chicken
e7dd9fb6-7a56-42a2-8bb2-6610e63979ad.description: Crispy chicken legs coated in flavorful spices and crunchy chips.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons curry powder (mixed with a little salt)
instructions: Mix curry powder with a little water to form a paste and coat the chicken legs.
Dip the coated legs in the beaten eggs, then roll them in crushed chips.
Preheat the oven to 180°C (356°F) for 15 minutes.
Place the legs in a greased baking dish and bake for 40 minutes until golden.
Serve with ketchup.

ce795723-edb4-4483-a87c-86be9c0777b5.name: Ostrich Kebab
ce795723-edb4-4483-a87c-86be9c0777b5.description: Delicious grilled ostrich meat skewers with a zesty marinade.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cut the meat into 1x4 cm pieces.
Mix lemon juice, olive oil, crushed garlic, chopped red pepper, ground cumin, ground coriander, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.
Marinate the meat in this mixture for 2 hours in the refrigerator, covered.
Skewer the meat, placing a bay leaf between each piece.
Soak bay leaves in warm water for 2 hours for easy skewering.
Grill the kebabs over direct heat and serve with tomato and olive salsa.
For the salsa, finely chop green olives, onion, filleted tomatoes, and red bell pepper, mix with olive oil and salt, and serve.

e8ad227c-3dfa-4f71-89e2-44713437e2ff.name: Chicken Sausage
e8ad227c-3dfa-4f71-89e2-44713437e2ff.description: A flavorful chicken sausage infused with spices and herbs.
instructions: Remove bones and skin from the chicken.
Soak the boneless chicken in a mixture of onion water, garlic, nutmeg, ginger, salt, and coriander powder for 24 hours.
Roll the chicken with skin intact and tie it with string.
Layer carrot and onion rings in a pan, add water, and bake for 1.5 hours at 180°C.
Cool completely before slicing the chicken sausage.

dd082c46-9a3c-41bc-90d7-acffeb3a2e26.name: Chicken with Mustard and Cheese
dd082c46-9a3c-41bc-90d7-acffeb3a2e26.description: Crispy chicken fillets stuffed with ham and melted cheese, perfect for a delightful meal.
ingredients: 1/4 cup grated mozzarella or cheddar cheese
instructions: Flatten the chicken fillets with a meat mallet.
Place a slice of ham on each fillet and trim excess ham.
Spread mustard on the ham and fold the fillets in half.
Mix breadcrumbs and cheese in a bowl.
Dip the fillets in the breadcrumb mixture, then in the beaten egg.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the fillets for about 4 minutes on each side until golden.
Place fried fillets on paper towels to absorb excess oil.

71fcea49-6a7e-48c8-a1b5-75771495d58e.name: Spicy Fried Chicken
71fcea49-6a7e-48c8-a1b5-75771495d58e.description: Crispy, flavorful chicken pieces seasoned with a spicy blend and served with ketchup.
instructions: Cut the chicken into 8 pieces, keeping the skin on.
Marinate the chicken with lemon juice and half of the spice mix.
Mix the remaining spice mix with the bread crumbs.
Refrigerate the chicken for 1 hour in a covered container.
Coat the chicken pieces in wheat flour, then dip in ice water.
Roll the chicken in the bread crumb mixture to create a flaky texture.
Heat 1.5 cups of oil in a pressure cooker until hot.
Fry the chicken pieces in the hot oil, cover, and cook for 5 minutes.
Turn the chicken pieces over, cover, and cook for another 5 minutes.
Remove the chicken and serve with ketchup.

2aba45bf-0c14-4edf-bc58-7171abde2395.name: Chicken with Vegetables
2aba45bf-0c14-4edf-bc58-7171abde2395.description: A savory stir-fried chicken dish with colorful vegetables.
instructions: Julienne all the vegetables.
Cut the chicken breast into strips and sauté separately.
Sauté all the vegetables on low heat for a short time, then add the chicken.
Finally, add spices and soy sauce to the dish.
Serve warm for the best flavor.

af858539-f7e2-4e5d-aa71-b9837b6c4bc3.name: Stuffed Chicken Fillet
af858539-f7e2-4e5d-aa71-b9837b6c4bc3.description: Delicious chicken fillets stuffed with a sweet and savory filling.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix raisins, green onions, apple, ginger, and breadcrumbs in a bowl.
Flatten each chicken fillet with a meat mallet, place the filling on top, roll them up, and secure with toothpicks.
Heat oil in a non-stick pot and gently fry the fillets until golden, then set aside.
In the same pot, combine almonds, orange juice, jam, cinnamon, chicken broth, salt, and pepper; bring to a boil, then add the fillets back and simmer for 20 minutes.
Arrange the fillets on a plate, remove toothpicks, and garnish with almonds and green onions.

42f1e30e-5589-49a6-b95d-3374df8d94c5.name: Chicken with Barley and Mushrooms
42f1e30e-5589-49a6-b95d-3374df8d94c5.description: A hearty dish featuring tender chicken, mushrooms, and barley in a savory broth.
instructions: In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoon of butter or oil.
Add 1 chopped onion and sauté for 3-4 minutes over medium heat.
Add 150 grams of quartered mushrooms and 350 grams of diced boneless chicken with a pinch of turmeric, and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Allow the water to boil to prepare the stew.
Serve the dish with rice.

54cb425b-d5ba-4a0b-90b6-72a88202fe24.name: Quail Stew with Orange Sauce
54cb425b-d5ba-4a0b-90b6-72a88202fe24.description: A flavorful quail stew enriched with a sweet and tangy orange sauce.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onion until golden.
Cook the quails separately, add to the sautéed onion, and stir for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric.
Add Maggi seasoning.
Pour in the water and simmer for one hour.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Mix orange juice and cornstarch, heat for 10 minutes while stirring, then add sugar and continue until thick.
Add orange peel strips and heat for another 5 minutes. The sauce is ready.
Combine the sauce with the stew and heat for 5 minutes.
Peel and slice the oranges, placing them on top of the quails.
Heat for 2 minutes, then quickly remove the orange slices and use them to garnish around the quails.

f9bb2c6e-ab94-46ac-904d-2c11b8c06d9a.name: Chicken with Mushroom Sauce
f9bb2c6e-ab94-46ac-904d-2c11b8c06d9a.description: Tender chicken breasts in a creamy mushroom sauce, perfect for a delightful meal.
ingredients: 6 pieces boneless chicken breast marinated in Italian sauce
instructions: Sauté mushrooms in 1 tablespoon butter for 5 minutes until soft, then remove from pan.
Lower heat, add remaining butter, and cook chicken breasts for 8-12 minutes, flipping once.
Remove chicken, add vinegar to pan to deglaze, then stir in cream and pepper, simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Add mushrooms back to the sauce, heat through, and serve over chicken with optional steamed vegetables.

3517dfb1-d41c-46e4-ab3d-4313d550c9c9.name: Quick Chicken Dish
3517dfb1-d41c-46e4-ab3d-4313d550c9c9.description: A healthy and flavorful chicken dish with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a suitable pot.
Add chopped onion and sauté until slightly colored.
Add diced potatoes and increase the heat moderately.
After 5 minutes, add diced chicken and stir continuously.
After 7-10 minutes, add peeled chopped tomatoes and green pepper.
Wait a few minutes until the tomato juice reduces.
Add zucchini and spices, and cook for another 5 minutes.
Add oregano just before serving and drizzle with lemon juice.

b5653abe-08a9-4b30-9da6-ce70293017ad.name: Chicken and Mint Stew
b5653abe-08a9-4b30-9da6-ce70293017ad.description: A flavorful chicken stew infused with fresh mint and served with crispy potatoes.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté in oil until soft.
Add the diced chicken and cook with the onion for 6-8 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and desired spices.
Dice the tomatoes and add to the pan, increasing heat to evaporate excess liquid.
Add chopped mint and lime juice, then stir.
After 5-6 minutes, add 1 cup of boiling water and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and prepare the potatoes separately by frying until golden.
Add the fried potatoes to the stew once the sauce thickens.
Sauté mushrooms with lemon juice and butter, then add to the stew.
Adjust seasoning and ensure chicken is cooked through before serving.

384f4c30-1f6d-45c8-93a3-c2a30eb52186.name: Chicken Dish with Special Salad
384f4c30-1f6d-45c8-93a3-c2a30eb52186.description: A flavorful chicken dish served with a fresh vegetable salad.
instructions: Cook the chicken with chopped onion and season with salt.
Add crushed garlic, dried oregano, corn, and lemon juice to the chicken.
Let it boil until the liquid reduces.
Serve the cooked dish in a suitable dish with chopped vegetables on the side.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese on top for garnish.

bb06deac-6789-41c8-b630-e3a0e811c822.name: Chicken Wings with Peanut Sauce
bb06deac-6789-41c8-b630-e3a0e811c822.description: Crispy chicken wings coated in a rich and flavorful peanut sauce.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix flour, breadcrumbs, basil, and Parmesan cheese.
In another bowl, combine milk, salt, and black pepper, and coat the chicken wings.
Dredge the wings in the flour mixture to coat evenly.
Brush with some melted margarine and bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, mix peanuts, garlic, and ginger in a small bowl, then add the remaining ingredients.
Pour the sauce into a large dish, add the roasted wings, and garnish with herbs.

72ec470c-3d4e-4894-ac29-51e100d101b0.name: Chicken Stew with Carrots and Celery
72ec470c-3d4e-4894-ac29-51e100d101b0.description: A delicious chicken stew with vibrant carrots and celery.
instructions: Finely chop the celery and slice the carrots into thin rounds.
Skin the chicken breast, cut into thin strips, and sauté in oil until golden.
Sprinkle pepper and curry powder over the chicken.
Add celery and carrots to the chicken and stir.
Now add chicken broth and raisins to the mixture.
Let it simmer on low heat for three minutes, then taste for seasoning.
Your stew will be ready in about ten minutes.

3100111d-bbb1-45f9-96c1-dbbf8c198027.name: Chicken with Tangerine
3100111d-bbb1-45f9-96c1-dbbf8c198027.description: A refreshing chicken dish with tangerines and colorful vegetables.
instructions: Boil the chicken breast in a little water until cooked, then let it cool.
Chop the cooled chicken into finger-sized pieces and mix with tangerines and vegetables.

a2495700-e177-4699-81cc-00a52ad06418.name: Spiced Chicken with Pasta
a2495700-e177-4699-81cc-00a52ad06418.description: A flavorful chicken dish served with zesty pasta and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix cumin, paprika, turmeric, garlic, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice with salt and pepper.
Rub the mixture around the chicken breasts and marinate for 3 hours in the fridge.
Preheat the oven to 455°F (235°C) and bake the chicken for about 20 minutes.
Cook pasta in boiling salted water until done, then drain and cool.
Combine chopped bell pepper, celery, and onion with the pasta.
Mix honey, mustard, and lemon juice, then add to the pasta mixture.
Cut the chicken into small cubes and place on top of the pasta.

ee1d3879-8ac0-47b9-99fe-c3c15cacbd53.name: Christmas Turkey
ee1d3879-8ac0-47b9-99fe-c3c15cacbd53.description: A succulent turkey dish perfect for festive celebrations.
instructions: Clean and wash the turkey thoroughly, seasoning the inside with salt and pepper.
Boil the pasta in salted water until soft.
Set aside 8 whole, healthy apples and chop the rest finely after peeling.
Melt a third of the butter in a pan and sauté the chopped apples, then add the pasta and stir.
In a small pot, melt sugar over low heat until golden, then add half a glass of boiling water and stir until dissolved.
Mix half of this syrup with the apple and pasta mixture, adding lemon juice, salt, and pepper, then stuff the turkey and sew it shut.
Heat the remaining butter and brown the turkey in it, then add two glasses of water.
Add herbs, garlic, chopped carrots, and the remaining apples to the pot.
Simmer, adding more water if necessary until the turkey is cooked through.
In the last stages, add whole apples and tomatoes to cook without breaking.
Remove the herb bunch, add salt, pepper, remaining syrup, and lemon juice to the turkey, allowing it to boil briefly.
To thicken the sauce, sauté a tablespoon of flour in 50 g of butter, gradually adding half a glass of water while stirring until smooth.
Pour this sauce into the turkey and let it boil briefly, then strain the sauce.
Place the turkey on a platter, remove the string, and arrange the cooked apples and tomatoes around it, garnishing with parsley.
Serve with some of the strained sauce drizzled over the turkey.

3b7046b6-160a-404c-84d7-28b936330f5f.name: Kioski (Chicken Breast)
3b7046b6-160a-404c-84d7-28b936330f5f.description: Deliciously stuffed chicken breasts, crispy on the outside and buttery inside.
instructions: Carefully separate the chicken breast from the bone, leaving part of the wing joint attached.
Remove the skin and gently pound the breast to flatten it without tearing.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on the surface, place a piece of butter on each breast, and roll tightly.
Beat the eggs with some salt and pepper in a bowl.
Coat the rolled breasts in crushed bread, dip in egg, then coat again in flour and egg.
Heat plenty of oil in a deep pan and fry the kioskis until golden on both sides.
Serve hot, optionally garnished with flower-shaped paper decorations and mashed or fried potatoes.

11a31a1f-64b5-4d20-b6d5-bfc84e7fdd5c.name: Chicken Stroganoff
11a31a1f-64b5-4d20-b6d5-bfc84e7fdd5c.description: A creamy and savory chicken dish topped with crispy potato strips.
instructions: Slice the chicken fillet into thin strips and sauté with sliced onion and mushrooms.
Add diced green bell pepper, season with salt and pepper, and add a cup of water; let it boil.
Stir in the cream, remove from heat, and mix well.
Serve in a dish and sprinkle thinly sliced potatoes on top.

c5eb6cce-f535-451c-9879-9cd870c3b216.name: Chicken and Mushroom Dish
c5eb6cce-f535-451c-9879-9cd870c3b216.description: A savory chicken and mushroom dish with crispy potatoes.
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into cubes and sauté with some onions.
Chop the potatoes into large cubes and add them to the pan.
Once the potatoes are fried, add the mushrooms and spices, and sauté for ten minutes.
Transfer to a serving dish and garnish with tomatoes and pickles.

65557eda-2c7c-4fad-a89b-3e74a2e136b3.name: Zucchini with Sausage
65557eda-2c7c-4fad-a89b-3e74a2e136b3.description: A delightful dish of zucchini and sausage, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Wash and slice the zucchini and sausage into rings.
Steam the sliced ingredients in a metal colander over boiling water.
After steaming, add salt and olive oil, then mix in the tomato and bell pepper.
Serve with mustard and ketchup.

a9f91f04-1504-4725-aef9-5f063b9d0fce.name: Chicken Wings Dish
a9f91f04-1504-4725-aef9-5f063b9d0fce.description: Delicious marinated chicken wings, perfect for a savory meal.
instructions: Wash the chicken wings and place them in a bowl.
Add olive oil, salt, pepper, and lemon juice, then refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Sauté the garlic briefly, add cilantro, then place the wings on top.
Cover and cook on low heat until done, allowing the wings to brown.

c43b0b48-c265-4da1-ad26-d6eac7585ce4.name: Ginger Beef Stir-Fry
c43b0b48-c265-4da1-ad26-d6eac7585ce4.description: A savory beef dish with ginger, vegetables, and a hint of soy sauce.
instructions: Cut the beef into small pieces and marinate with grated ginger, coriander, and vinegar for 3 hours.
Sauté the marinated beef in butter, then set aside. Stir-fry spinach, corn, and bell pepper, add beef, tomatoes, and soy sauce, then serve garnished with parsley.

9d50de82-8697-471e-a7c8-29a2c2856f55.name: Special Tongue Dish
9d50de82-8697-471e-a7c8-29a2c2856f55.description: A savory dish featuring tender beef tongue in a flavorful sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil the beef tongue and remove the skin.
Chop the remaining ingredients and mix them in a separate bowl, adding tomato paste last.
Add some water to create a sauce consistency.
Slice the tongue and add it to the sauce, simmering for 40 minutes on low heat.

a69377f3-a6cc-4024-97d1-aec785c492e5.name: Chicken and Mushroom Dish
a69377f3-a6cc-4024-97d1-aec785c492e5.description: A savory chicken and mushroom dish, perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and oil to taste
instructions: Heat some oil and sauté the mushrooms.
Add bell peppers and green onions with salt, pepper, and tomato paste, then set aside.
Whisk the egg whites and optionally add saffron for color.
Coat the chicken in the egg whites and fry in oil over medium heat until cooked.
Serve the chicken and mushroom mixture in a dish.

1422d8e6-226d-4c13-9579-efbda741cd53.name: Carrot Stew
1422d8e6-226d-4c13-9579-efbda741cd53.description: A flavorful stew featuring tender lamb and sautéed carrots, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Cut the meat and cook it with one cup of water over heat.
Sauté the shredded carrots and onions in oil, then add sugar and lemon juice.
Mix in spices and salt with the meat, and simmer for five minutes.
Serve the meat on a plate, garnished with tomato and lemon.

10e3e156-91a8-4814-8e7e-3d6b53bd8ed8.name: Lamb Shank and Chicken Stew
10e3e156-91a8-4814-8e7e-3d6b53bd8ed8.description: A hearty stew featuring tender lamb shank and chicken, perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: water, salt, and pepper to taste
peas, corn, bell peppers, apricots, red cabbage, tomatoes, and potatoes for garnish
instructions: Wash the lamb shank thoroughly.
Chop the carrot, celery, and onion, sauté in oil, then place the lamb on top.
Pour tomato paste, salt, pepper, and water over the lamb and let it cook on low heat.
Cook the chicken breast in the same manner.
Once cooked, arrange in a serving dish and garnish.

19cbbcce-af5e-4ea0-86dc-e9687fce19ab.name: Mushrooms and Lamb Kidneys
19cbbcce-af5e-4ea0-86dc-e9687fce19ab.description: A savory dish featuring sautéed mushrooms and tender lamb kidneys.
instructions: Sauté mushrooms in half the butter, then add lemon juice.
Add sausages with salt and pepper, then mix in parsley.
Cook for 1-2 minutes and keep warm.
Halve the kidneys, remove the white part, and dry them.
Sauté kidneys in remaining butter until blood is cooked out.
Season with salt and pepper, mix with previous ingredients, and serve.

32d0f1d0-06d8-487a-94dc-b222fe7a1b3d.name: Fried Tongue Dish
32d0f1d0-06d8-487a-94dc-b222fe7a1b3d.description: Crispy fried beef tongue, seasoned and served hot.
instructions: Clean the tongue and place it in a pot of water, ensuring it's fully submerged.
Once boiling, skim off the foam, add onion, garlic, celery, and salt, and simmer for 4 hours.
Remove the skin from the tongue and slice it like cold cuts.
Beat the eggs with saffron, dip each slice of tongue into the mixture, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.

6da54b78-df1a-4ec9-99e2-9fccb1f5370a.name: Fish with Tomato Salad
6da54b78-df1a-4ec9-99e2-9fccb1f5370a.description: Delicious fish fillets served with a refreshing tomato salad.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix tomato, onion, hot pepper, and vinegar in a bowl.
Chop basil leaves and add with olive oil to the salad, then season with salt and pepper.
Cover and refrigerate the salad for 3 hours to marinate.
Season fish fillets with salt and pepper, then fry in a greased pan over medium heat for 8 minutes.
Serve the fish with the tomato salad.

ec3e180c-ee81-434a-ab92-873f0eb6fa43.name: Green Bean and Sausage Dish
ec3e180c-ee81-434a-ab92-873f0eb6fa43.description: A savory blend of green beans, sausage, and spices for a delightful meal.
instructions: Boil green beans with a little salt and lemon juice, then drain completely.
Cut sausages into cubes and fry in oil.
Sauté corn flour in butter, add soy sauce, ginger, salt, pepper, and half a cup of reserved bean cooking water.
After boiling, add fried onions mixed with olive oil and soy sauce.
Cut the boiled green beans in half and add them with cashews to the dish.
After a few boils, the dish is ready; garnish with fresh lemon and pickles.

8fdf7123-3197-4eb4-ab8e-01849f66f14a.name: Legume Stew
8fdf7123-3197-4eb4-ab8e-01849f66f14a.description: A nutritious and protein-rich stew made with various legumes and spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, lemon juice, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Soak all legumes, wheat, and barley overnight and boil them in the same water.
Reduce heat after boiling, sauté grated onion with tomato paste, then add to the pot.
Grate tomatoes and add them with salt and spices to the cooked legumes.
Let the stew simmer until thick and flavorful, serve with lemon juice or olive oil if desired.

da9f3b17-6c0b-4ebd-b99a-29bd2a4f863a.name: Beef Fillet Dish
da9f3b17-6c0b-4ebd-b99a-29bd2a4f863a.description: A savory beef fillet dish with colorful vegetables and herbs.
instructions: Chop the onion finely and fry it in oil until golden.
Cut the beef into cubes and add to the onion, then season with salt and spices.
Add chopped parsley and potatoes, and fry for a while.
Reduce heat and let the ingredients cook gently.

7c623c52-05dd-4070-b5e2-625e60397017.name: Mint and Parsley Stew
7c623c52-05dd-4070-b5e2-625e60397017.description: A flavorful stew with ground meat, vegetables, and fresh herbs.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Sauté the diced carrots and potatoes together.
Add sautéed mint and parsley, carrots, potatoes, salt, pepper, turmeric, and tomato paste, and cook until fragrant.
Add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Mix ground meat with onion, form into balls, and add to boiling mixture without stirring until cooked.

9f114770-9f86-4e40-8435-0a471b973ec2.name: Cauliflower and Green Bean Stir-Fry
9f114770-9f86-4e40-8435-0a471b973ec2.description: A vibrant and healthy stir-fry with cauliflower and green beans, topped with crispy garlic.
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté garlic until golden, then remove and set aside.
Sauté onion in the oil, adding red pepper, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Add cauliflower to the pot and stir for three minutes.
Incorporate green beans, then add soy sauce and sugar, cooking for another three minutes.
Once slightly cooked, add lemon juice and stir.
Serve in a dish, sprinkling the fried garlic on top.

b64dc08e-cd22-4f0b-9b94-5da4351a1543.name: Lettuce and Ham Stir-Fry
b64dc08e-cd22-4f0b-9b94-5da4351a1543.description: A savory stir-fry of ham and fresh lettuce, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Heat a large non-stick pan and add a little oil.
Sauté the diced ham for about four minutes.
Add remaining oil and onion, sauté for five minutes.
Add garlic and sauté for one minute.
Stir in lettuce, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
Cook for about 10 minutes until lettuce is soft.

236a5147-d32a-49e8-82ae-769f7663ea97.name: Shrimp Dish
236a5147-d32a-49e8-82ae-769f7663ea97.description: A delicious shrimp dish with a blend of spices and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Grate the onion and fry it in a pan.
Grate the garlic and mix it well with the shrimp, then pour it over the fried onions after 15 minutes.
Spread it evenly in the pan, add the fish spice mix and chopped parsley, and adjust the heat to cook.
After 30 minutes, the dish is ready. Serve with lemon and chopped walnuts, alongside boiled potatoes, carrots, and peas.

3374ff4a-6a63-451e-a168-c618238b8708.name: Mediterranean Beef
3374ff4a-6a63-451e-a168-c618238b8708.description: A flavorful stir-fried beef dish with colorful bell peppers.
ingredients: 2 each of red, yellow, and green bell peppers
instructions: Slice the beef thinly and sauté with onion in oil for 10 minutes without drying out.
Add sliced bell peppers and stir-fry until they don't change color.
Once softened, add both types of soy sauce and mix well.
Serve on a platter, garnished with tomatoes and lemon.

b4001485-6a37-4623-a7c6-b54fe2195f04.name: Beef and Onion Stew
b4001485-6a37-4623-a7c6-b54fe2195f04.description: A savory stew of beef, onions, and bell peppers, bursting with flavor.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Clean and cube the beef. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the beef and onions.
Wash and chop the bell peppers into large pieces. Add them and the tomatoes to the pan when the beef is slightly browned.
Continue sautéing for another 4-5 minutes. Roughly chop half of the basil and add it to the pan.
Add vinegar, salt, and pepper, then cover the pan. Once the beef is cooked, the stew is ready.
Sprinkle the remaining basil on top and serve in a desired dish.

22d56ec8-8cc6-41f4-ad60-24929e23bdd2.name: Green Bean Stew with Meat
22d56ec8-8cc6-41f4-ad60-24929e23bdd2.description: A hearty stew packed with green beans, meat, and vibrant vegetables.
instructions: Cook the stew meat with onions and bell pepper.
Sauté the green beans in oil or butter and set aside.
Repeat with carrots and potatoes, seasoning potatoes with salt and saffron.
Layer all ingredients in a pot, placing potatoes on top.
Mix tomato paste with salt, pepper, and saffron in meat broth and pour over the layers.
After cooking, add the meat and mix everything together.
Serve with lemon juice for seasoning.

3375696c-ceef-43dd-bb06-b1b6869d3014.name: Tongue Stew
3375696c-ceef-43dd-bb06-b1b6869d3014.description: A savory stew made with beef tongue and a rich mushroom sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, and spices to taste
2 cups of milk or water from the tongue
instructions: Boil the tongue in water until cooked, about four hours.
Remove the tongue, freeze it, then slice and serve with a special sauce.
For the sauce, sauté butter with flour, then add milk or tongue water.
Add chopped mushrooms and simmer for 10 minutes.
Pour the sauce over the tongue and enjoy.

e5076202-7c70-4adc-bd5e-f65c34051915.name: Grilled Chicken Dish
e5076202-7c70-4adc-bd5e-f65c34051915.description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated with garlic and spices, perfect for a delightful meal.
ingredients: 1 kg of chicken, cut into 8 pieces
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix garlic, cumin, cinnamon, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.
Add chicken pieces and stir to coat them well. Let marinate for at least 1 hour or overnight in the fridge.
Preheat the grill. Place chicken pieces on the grill and cook for 10 minutes, turning once until golden brown.
Ensure no juices run out when pierced with a fork. Serve hot.

b0e007ec-248a-4b34-a0cf-9a9045989bfc.name: Beef Broccoli Pizza
b0e007ec-248a-4b34-a0cf-9a9045989bfc.description: Delicious beef and broccoli pizza topped with melted Gouda cheese.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic until golden.
Add sliced beef fillet and stir-fry, then add broccoli and soy sauce.
Spread the mixture on pizza dough, top with grated Gouda cheese, and bake at 220°C for 30 minutes.

97a002f5-eb7a-4952-b191-6a574c0e84c5.name: Mango Pizza
97a002f5-eb7a-4952-b191-6a574c0e84c5.description: A delicious pizza topped with fresh mango, smoked sausage, and cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix flour and yeast with a pinch of salt in a large bowl, creating a well in the center.
Add water and three tablespoons of olive oil, mix well, and knead until smooth.
Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rise in a warm place for 30 minutes until doubled.
Divide the dough into six pieces, shape into balls, and flatten each into a 15 cm circle with thicker edges.
Peel and cube the mango, then arrange it with the sausage on the dough.
Top with cheese and cherry tomatoes, season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle remaining oil over the mini pizzas and bake at 200°C (400°F) for 10 minutes.

5bfaef0f-4b0e-491a-8870-699d4504f2d7.name: Potato Pizza
5bfaef0f-4b0e-491a-8870-699d4504f2d7.description: A delicious and unique pizza made with potatoes and mushrooms.
ingredients: half a cup grated pizza cheese
instructions: Boil the potatoes, then grate them and mix with eggs, salt, and pepper.
Sauté mushrooms in a little oil, sprinkle with mint, and mix.
Heat oil and pour it into a baking tray, spread the potato mixture evenly.
Evenly distribute the sautéed mushrooms on top and sprinkle with cheese.
Place the tray in the oven until the cheese melts and the potatoes puff up.
Serve in a suitable dish and garnish with tomato sauce.

238e436b-4dde-4cd5-8001-2d30709c1edb.name: Tropical Pizza
238e436b-4dde-4cd5-8001-2d30709c1edb.description: A delicious pizza topped with dates, pineapple, and kiwi for a unique flavor.
instructions: Sift flour into a bowl and mix in dry yeast.
Combine warm water and sugar, then add to flour while kneading.
Incorporate salt and olive oil, knead for 10 minutes, then let rise for 30 minutes.
Roll out dough and let it rest in a greased pan.
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C) and bake for 15 minutes.
Prepare date mixture with chopped dates and cream cheese.
Chop pineapple and slice kiwis.
Spread date mixture on pizza dough, layer with pineapple and kiwi.
Finish with remaining dates on top.

6e05b0c5-4b24-4c9f-9a3d-a2cd4f5dc8db.name: Mushroom and Meat Pizza
6e05b0c5-4b24-4c9f-9a3d-a2cd4f5dc8db.description: Delicious pizza topped with savory meat, mushrooms, and melted cheese.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Sauté the meat in a little oil, then add onion, salt, pepper, and spices, and remove from heat.
Roll out the dough to 2-3 mm thickness on a greased baking tray, spread tomato sauce, layer cheese, meat, bell peppers, and mushrooms, then top with more cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 30 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is melted. Serve hot.

fd55a966-fcca-4547-93e1-97561b5e8cd2.name: Smoked Sausage and Beer Pizza
fd55a966-fcca-4547-93e1-97561b5e8cd2.description: A delicious pizza topped with smoked sausage, cheese, and fresh parsley.
ingredients: Tomato slices and washed parsley for decoration
instructions: Melt 30 grams of butter in a pan over low heat, then gradually add 7 teaspoons of sifted flour, stirring constantly until soft and cream-colored.
Add 100 grams of grated cheddar cheese gradually while stirring, then add half a cup of carbonated beer.
Mix the cheese and beer again, then add one beaten egg yolk and let it cook on low heat.
Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F) or gas mark 7, and prepare the middle rack.
Poke holes in the pizza dough with a fork, brush with olive oil, and sprinkle black cumin evenly on top.
Sauté the sliced onion in the warmed butter until slightly cooled, then spread it evenly on the dough.
Top with the prepared cheese, arrange the sliced sausage, and sprinkle chopped parsley evenly.
Bake in the middle of the oven for 20 minutes, then serve decorated with tomato slices and parsley.

d5eaa3df-add2-4f40-97d6-c0df9ffd70db.name: Pizza Roll
d5eaa3df-add2-4f40-97d6-c0df9ffd70db.description: Delicious rolled pizza filled with savory ingredients and melted cheese.
instructions: Roll out the pizza dough and spread the hot sauce and tomato sauce on it.
Layer with cheese, ham, mushrooms, bell pepper, and olives, then roll it up.
Brush the roll with egg yolk and bake at 220°C for 15 minutes.
Let it cool slightly and slice into rolls.

a9f45d06-e166-46e5-af5b-292d12d0ab68.name: Toast Pizza
a9f45d06-e166-46e5-af5b-292d12d0ab68.description: Delicious mini pizzas made with toasted bread and topped with cheese and veggies.
instructions: Trim the edges of the bread slices.
Grease a baking tray and arrange the bread slices on it.
Brush the bread with a little olive oil.
Place sliced cheese on each bread slice and sprinkle oregano on top.
Add chopped mushrooms and olives, then sprinkle grated mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake the toast pizzas at 160°C for 10 minutes or until the cheese is golden.

ffaf4ba2-6c95-43dd-b0e9-3304806ac718.name: Double-Sided Red Bean Pizza
ffaf4ba2-6c95-43dd-b0e9-3304806ac718.description: A delicious pizza layered with red beans, vegetables, and cheese.
instructions: Make a thin layer of dough using baguette or pizza dough.
Top with cooked red beans, chopped tomatoes, zucchini, onion, mushrooms, and shredded chicken.
Sprinkle grated or sliced pizza cheese on top.
Place another layer of dough over the toppings, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Cover with foil and bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for half an hour.
Mix chopped cilantro, lettuce, and sour cream and serve alongside the pizza.

74f6f035-cbc0-4d8e-a109-d4b073162f27.name: Potato Pizza
74f6f035-cbc0-4d8e-a109-d4b073162f27.description: A delicious and cheesy potato pizza layered with savory ingredients.
instructions: Peel and slice the potatoes, then sauté them in butter with salt and pepper.
Grease a dish, layer potatoes, sprinkle parsley and Parmesan, add sausage and green onions, repeat layers.
Mix milk and cream, pour over layers, add pizza cheese, and bake at medium temperature for 40 minutes.

c040cf83-f6d5-4f3c-9962-450381bb1d6d.name: Quick Bites with Cheese and Olives
c040cf83-f6d5-4f3c-9962-450381bb1d6d.description: Delicious bites topped with a savory cheese and olive mixture.
instructions: Blend olives in a food processor and add garlic.
Mix in Parmesan, butter, olive oil, and parsley.
Slice baguette and spread the mixture on top.
Bake in the oven or microwave for two minutes.

4a49b75c-6234-4df3-8836-4a35867fd13a.name: Pita Pizza (Astara Style)
4a49b75c-6234-4df3-8836-4a35867fd13a.description: A delicious and unique pizza topped with fresh herbs and rice.
ingredients: 800g mixed greens (spinach, leek, parsley, cilantro, scallions)
Salt, pepper, clove powder, nutmeg, turmeric as needed
Sour grape juice or lemon juice as needed
instructions: Wash the mixed greens thoroughly and drain.
Heat 3 tablespoons of oil in a pan over low heat, add sliced onions, sauté until soft, then add turmeric and let cool.
Boil 1 cup of water in a pot, add chopped greens, and cook gently while stirring until tender, then drain.
Return the vegetable water to the pot, add soaked rice, and cook until boiling.
Chop the drained greens and mix with the rice, adding cloves, nutmeg, and more oil to taste, then add sour juice and season with salt and pepper.
Transfer the mixture to a frying pan with sautéed onions, stir, and let it settle.
Beat the egg and mix it into the mixture, allowing it to cook through.

Spread oil on the pizza dough, add tomato puree, then layer the cooked mixture evenly, sprinkle with nutmeg, add remaining oil, Parmesan, mozzarella, and decorate with bell peppers. Bake in the oven at 220°C (425°F) for 10-15 minutes until crispy and golden.

561241f1-b1cd-4e31-98dd-01de69369e66.name: Spinach and Egg Pizza
561241f1-b1cd-4e31-98dd-01de69369e66.description: A delicious pizza topped with spinach, egg, and melted cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop the spinach, then sauté in olive oil until steamed.
Add the egg and cook on low heat for three minutes.
Mix in salt and sugar, then place on the dough with cheese and bake at 175°C for 20 minutes.

1549df95-51af-4783-a059-a82b0cc0d973.name: Whole Wheat Pizza
1549df95-51af-4783-a059-a82b0cc0d973.description: Delicious homemade pizza with whole wheat crust and fresh toppings.
ingredients: ¼ medium yellow or green bell pepper
Various vegetables and toppings to taste
instructions: Roll the dough into a 28cm circle and transfer to a pizza pan.
Prick the surface with a fork and bake at 400°F (204°C) for 12-15 minutes.
Slice the green onion and bell pepper into thin strips, then blanch in boiling water for 2-3 minutes.
Spread pizza sauce on the baked crust, add cheese, and top with vegetables.
Bake for another 10-15 minutes until cheese is melted and pizza is hot.

f63fd4bd-55ea-43b7-902d-ec7ba80ee665.name: Margherita Pizza
f63fd4bd-55ea-43b7-902d-ec7ba80ee665.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh basil and mozzarella.
ingredients: 400 grams canned diced tomatoes or 500 grams fresh tomatoes
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, and salt in a bowl, add water and oil, and mix for 30 seconds.
Knead the dough for 6 to 8 minutes until soft and elastic, then let it rest for 10 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and roll out the dough on a floured surface.
Drizzle olive oil on the dough and spread a thin layer of sauce made from tomatoes, basil, garlic, and tomato paste.
Bake the pizzas for 15 minutes, add mozzarella, and bake for another 10 to 13 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves, slice, and serve immediately.

3dd111cd-b3f5-4112-986a-9da17351027b.name: Chicken and Cabbage Pizza
3dd111cd-b3f5-4112-986a-9da17351027b.description: A delicious pizza topped with chicken, red cabbage, and a spicy kick.
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into small pieces and sauté in canola oil.
In another bowl, mix corn flour, egg, and water to form a dough.
Soak the beans in water until soft.
Blend the beans with red cabbage and hot sauce.
Pour the blended mixture over the sautéed chicken and spread on the dough.
Bake in the oven at 190°C for 20 minutes.
Garnish with basil and sour cream before serving.

75e10972-095d-4c24-9d60-b923d998ba20.name: Mushroom Pizza with Eggs
75e10972-095d-4c24-9d60-b923d998ba20.description: A delicious pizza topped with mushrooms, eggs, and herbs.
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat, then add mushrooms, salt, and pepper, sautéing slightly.
Spread mushrooms, garlic, and pizza cheese on the pizza dough, crack eggs on top, add parsley and thyme, and bake at 180°C for 8-10 minutes.

010df312-060e-4d81-aaca-40b84bd3bfe4.name: Lebanese Bread Pizza
010df312-060e-4d81-aaca-40b84bd3bfe4.description: A delicious pizza topped with fresh vegetables and melted mozzarella cheese.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped black and green olives
instructions: Grease a round tray with olive oil and place the Lebanese bread on it.
Drizzle ketchup and olive oil on the bread, then layer with tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, mushrooms, sausage, and olives.
Cover the toppings with shredded mozzarella cheese.
Mix eggs and milk, whisk together, then add some salt and pepper.
Pour the egg and milk mixture over the pizza surface.
Bake in the oven at 160 degrees Celsius for 15 to 20 minutes until the cheese is golden.

340d80c0-85c0-4cdb-ab89-9dd31b978ca8.name: Bowl Pizza
340d80c0-85c0-4cdb-ab89-9dd31b978ca8.description: Delicious mini pizzas baked in a bowl with savory toppings.
instructions: Mix milk powder, salt, sugar, yeast, and oil together.
Add water and gradually mix in flour, kneading until smooth.
Let the dough rise in a warm place for 2 hours until doubled.
Roll out small circles from the dough and place them in a muffin tin.
Fill with pizza ingredients and top with grated cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven at 175°C for 20-30 minutes until golden.

3860bae3-0cbc-4dfb-9915-efa29055d4f0.name: Pizza Roll
3860bae3-0cbc-4dfb-9915-efa29055d4f0.description: Delicious rolled pizza filled with savory ingredients and crispy on the outside.
instructions: Mix dry milk, eggs, and salt; add water and then flour, mix well and let rest for 30 minutes.
Heat a small pan, grease with butter or olive oil, pour 3 tablespoons of batter, cook until golden, flip and cook the other side.
For the filling, mix sausage, pizza sauce, onions, bell pepper, mushrooms, olives, and some cheese.
Spread sauce on one side of the cooked bread, add filling, sprinkle cheese, fold the edges, and roll into a cylinder.
Dip the rolls in beaten egg and then in breadcrumbs, fry in oil until golden.

86ac6160-9adf-4319-a075-caf156eb2ba5.name: Heart-Shaped Pizza
86ac6160-9adf-4319-a075-caf156eb2ba5.description: A delightful heart-shaped pizza loaded with delicious toppings.
instructions: Mix oil, instant yeast, powdered milk, sugar, baking powder, and salt well.
Gradually add flour and water until the dough is smooth and non-sticky; knead well.
Let the dough rise in a warm place for two hours until it doubles in size.
Grease a baking dish with oil and sprinkle with flour; shape a ball of dough into a heart.
Spread ketchup on the dough and sprinkle garlic powder on top.
Add grated sausage and salami, followed by chopped mushrooms, bell pepper, and black olives; sprinkle oregano.
Bake the pizza at 180°C for 20 minutes on low heat, then 10-15 minutes on high heat until puffed.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle cheese on top, and return to melt and brown the cheese.

66ac0efd-13f8-4b03-9387-27efedcbdeee.name: Bean Pizza with Ground Meat
66ac0efd-13f8-4b03-9387-27efedcbdeee.description: A delicious pizza topped with ground meat, beans, and creamy goodness.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onion and ground meat until browned.
Add tomato sauce and thyme, cook for a few minutes uncovered.
Turn off the heat, mix in chips and beans thoroughly.
Place pizza doughs on a baking tray, cover with the mixture and sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes until golden and crispy.
Finely chop green pepper and onion, mix with lemon juice and cream.
Pour the mixture over the hot pizza and decorate with remaining cream.

d0716d76-2b02-46c6-aeb0-0b60df6f1357.name: Chicken Pizza
d0716d76-2b02-46c6-aeb0-0b60df6f1357.description: Delicious homemade chicken pizza with a cheesy, savory topping.
ingredients: Thyme powder, salt, and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix warm water with yeast and salt, stir until dissolved, and let sit for 10 minutes.
Add flour and knead, gradually adding olive oil for about 7 minutes until smooth.
Let the dough rise for 30 minutes covered with a clean cloth.
Mix grated cheese into the dough until well combined.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté chicken, bell pepper, green onions, mushrooms, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Grease a 28 cm round baking dish and spread the pizza dough in it.
Top the dough with sautéed mixture and sprinkle with grated cheese and thyme.
Bake in the oven for 10 minutes on the bottom rack and 20 minutes in the middle rack.

316877d6-3483-446e-ba8a-97869e0bbf66.name: Lasagna Pizza
316877d6-3483-446e-ba8a-97869e0bbf66.description: A delicious fusion of lasagna and pizza flavors baked to perfection.
instructions: Sauté ground meat with fried onion, then add tomato paste and a few tablespoons of water.
Add chopped sausage, salami, mushrooms, and bell pepper, cover, and let it simmer until water is mostly evaporated.
Transfer the mixture to a baking dish, stir in white sauce, and top with pizza cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, then turn off the oven and let it sit for 10 minutes before serving on baguette.

a55cb3eb-7046-4ce2-aaf7-d828ace57b98.name: Pineapple Pizza
a55cb3eb-7046-4ce2-aaf7-d828ace57b98.description: A delicious pizza topped with pineapple, cheese, and savory ingredients.
ingredients: 1 cup cooked chopped or ground meat
1 tablespoon chopped herbs like parsley or thyme
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
Top with meat, pineapple, bell pepper, mushrooms, cheese, and herbs.
Bake in the oven for 10 to 15 minutes until ready.
Enjoy your pineapple pizza!

0903a1cd-5228-4bec-b0b0-69c75cb059a8.name: Fried Cheese
0903a1cd-5228-4bec-b0b0-69c75cb059a8.description: Crispy, golden-brown cheese bites, perfect for snacking or appetizers.
instructions: Cut the cheese into eight triangular pieces and set aside.
Sift flour and mustard together on a piece of parchment paper.
In a small bowl, mix egg and milk; in another bowl, combine breadcrumbs and peppers.
Coat each cheese piece in flour, dip in egg mixture, then roll in breadcrumbs, repeating the egg and breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a small deep pan and fry the cheese for 30 to 60 seconds until golden brown.
Drain on paper towels, garnish with fresh herbs, and serve with hot sauce.

b81bf9f4-825e-48aa-8c36-376cbdd7381d.name: Pizza Dough
b81bf9f4-825e-48aa-8c36-376cbdd7381d.description: Delicious homemade pizza dough, perfect for your favorite toppings.
ingredients: 1.5 tablespoons melted butter or olive oil
instructions: Dissolve yeast or baking powder and salt in milk, then add the oil.
Gradually add flour until the dough is non-sticky and not too dry.
Knead the dough well and cover it to rise for 1-2 hours.

a91d47fa-9509-40a1-a85d-ea16594c0fbe.name: Homemade Pizza
a91d47fa-9509-40a1-a85d-ea16594c0fbe.description: Delicious homemade pizza topped with fresh ingredients, perfect for kids and adults alike.
instructions: Place the pizza dough on a baking tray and divide it into four equal parts.

Spread tomato sauce and oregano on the dough, then top each section with different ingredients: shredded chicken, canned tuna, ground beef, and tomato and onion slices. Sprinkle cheese on top and bake for about 30 minutes.

a8b9ed61-ad80-4db9-9cf2-bcea9127e78c.name: Colorful Bell Pepper Pizza
a8b9ed61-ad80-4db9-9cf2-bcea9127e78c.description: Delicious pizzas topped with vibrant bell peppers and fresh ingredients.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Wash and slice the bell peppers, chop the onion and tomatoes, halve the olives, and grate the garlic.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté the onion until soft, then add bell peppers, tomatoes, and garlic, cooking for 30 minutes while stirring occasionally. Add salt, pepper, and thyme.

Grease a baking tray, divide the dough, roll it out, and place on the tray. Preheat the oven to 230°C (450°F) for 15 minutes, then top with the mixture and decorate with olives. Bake for 15-20 minutes.

0b83c468-035e-4884-a527-e47a36e4a6b5.name: Seafood Pizza
0b83c468-035e-4884-a527-e47a36e4a6b5.description: A delicious pizza topped with shrimp, olives, and a savory tomato sauce.
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Add milk and oil, stirring continuously.
Knead the dough into a ball, let it rest for 30 minutes.
Prepare the sauce by mixing tomato puree, tomato paste, herbs, and garlic in a small pan over low heat until thickened.
Spread the dough in a 30 cm dish, add the sauce and toppings, sprinkle with oregano.
Preheat the oven to 200°C for 20 minutes and bake until the cheese is golden.

68a61453-9488-49f6-8df1-b7f9da2a32b7.name: Mushroom Pizza
68a61453-9488-49f6-8df1-b7f9da2a32b7.description: Delicious homemade pizza topped with mushrooms, peppers, and melted cheese.
instructions: Grease the baking dish and spread the pizza dough in it.
Spread pizza sauce on the dough and drizzle with vegetable oil.
Chop the bell pepper and tomatoes, and slice the mushrooms into rings.
Layer the onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, and mushrooms on the pizza dough.
Sprinkle oregano on top of the vegetables.
Grate the pizza cheese and cover the toppings completely with it.
For better stretchiness, add cheese towards the end of baking.
Place the tray in the center of a preheated oven at 350°F.
Once baked and golden, remove from the oven and drizzle with more pizza sauce.

f765fa30-4d39-4add-afa0-a5cbce392054.name: Stuffed Potato Pizza
f765fa30-4d39-4add-afa0-a5cbce392054.description: Delicious baked potatoes filled with savory meat and cheese.
instructions: Wash potatoes thoroughly, pierce with a fork, and microwave for 10-12 minutes.
Sauté ground meat in oil, then add tomato paste, onion, bell pepper, and mushrooms, cooking for 3 minutes.
Mix in herbs, parsley, and garlic powder, then combine with yogurt, salt, pepper, and 2/3 cup mozzarella.
Carefully scoop out some potato flesh, leaving enough to form a shell.
Place hollowed potatoes in a baking dish, fill with the meat mixture, and top with Parmesan, mozzarella, olives, and tomato sauce.
Bake at 400°F (204°C) for 20 minutes until fully cooked.

c8efb473-67be-4fb3-877c-06186670a03f.name: Cheese Pizza
c8efb473-67be-4fb3-877c-06186670a03f.description: A delicious cheese pizza ready in just 15 minutes.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Grease your work surface with olive oil, then roll out the dough and sprinkle garlic on top.
Add tomatoes and then low-fat cheese, leaving the edges empty. Bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, slice, and serve.

a2b3b16d-8bd7-4300-9f58-b999b01217e0.name: White Pizza
a2b3b16d-8bd7-4300-9f58-b999b01217e0.description: A delicious pizza topped with garlic, tomatoes, and cheese.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried oregano or mixed herbs
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Roll out the pizza dough and sprinkle crushed garlic on top.
Layer chopped tomatoes and grated cheese over the garlic, leaving edges clear.
Place onion rings on top of the cheese.
Bake in the oven until golden brown.
After 15 minutes, season with salt and pepper, then slice the pizza.

ab6f7a59-a630-4d56-9402-502c1e335000.name: Sausage Pizza
ab6f7a59-a630-4d56-9402-502c1e335000.description: Delicious homemade pizza topped with sausage and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Roll out the pizza dough and sprinkle crushed garlic over it, then brush with olive oil.
Spread chopped tomatoes on the dough, add pizza cheese, and leave edges empty.
Grease the bottom of a pan and sauté green pepper and onion for 5 minutes.
Arrange the vegetables on top of the cheese and bake for 15 minutes at 345°F.

5de39c29-25c7-423b-a627-0bd12811efe7.name: Four Seasons Pizza
5de39c29-25c7-423b-a627-0bd12811efe7.description: A delightful pizza topped with shrimp, mushrooms, cheese, and more.
ingredients: Fresh basil, marjoram, and parsley for garnish
instructions: Sprinkle flour on a clean surface and divide the dough into two, rolling each to 25cm.
Grease a baking tray, place the dough, fold the edges inward, and let it warm.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Drain the artichoke and shrimp, cut the artichokes into quarters, and slice the mushrooms.
Thinly slice the beef and grate the cheese. Halve the kilka fish.
Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water for 30 seconds, then cool and peel them.
Dice the tomatoes and mix with salt and thyme in a bowl.
Divide each dough into 4 sections, topping each with different ingredients.
Drizzle olive oil on top and bake for 35 minutes until golden.
Swap the trays halfway through baking.
Slice the pizza into four and garnish with fresh herbs before serving.

09383bd5-9819-423e-a5a6-f6b73737aeb8.name: Vegetable Pizza
09383bd5-9819-423e-a5a6-f6b73737aeb8.description: A delicious pizza topped with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.
ingredients: 1 can mixed peas, corn, and carrots
instructions: Grease a non-stick pan and spread the prepared pizza dough on it.
Spread some tomato sauce on the dough.
Top with mushrooms, peas, corn, carrots, and green bell pepper, ensuring to drain excess water from the canned mix.
Press the toppings gently onto the dough.
Evenly sprinkle shredded pizza cheese on top.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 350°F for 15 minutes on the lower heat and 10 minutes on the upper heat.

678b012c-b232-484c-9329-9cc74db18018.name: Bean and Ground Meat Pizza
678b012c-b232-484c-9329-9cc74db18018.description: A delicious pizza topped with savory ground meat and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and ground meat until browned.
Add spicy tomato sauce and thyme, cooking uncovered for a few minutes.
Turn off the heat and mix in corn chips, canned corn, and beans.
Place pizza doughs on a baking tray and cover with the mixture, sprinkling cheddar cheese on top.
Bake in the oven at high heat for 15 minutes until browned and crispy.
Finely chop zucchinis and half the red onion, then mix with lemon juice and thick cream.
Pour the mixture over the hot pizza and garnish with remaining cream.

66c725cd-39b3-4537-bdaf-d8ec815d5ec7.name: Pizza with Mushrooms and Sausage
66c725cd-39b3-4537-bdaf-d8ec815d5ec7.description: Delicious pizza topped with mushrooms, sausage, and melted cheese.
instructions: Grease the baking dish with vegetable oil and spread the pizza dough on it.
Cover the dough with tomato sauce, then layer mushrooms, sausage, green onions, and cheese on top.
Preheat the oven to 350°F and place the pizza in the center until golden brown.

9cbae31a-a39a-4949-b92e-335cb50e7a67.name: Corn Pizza
9cbae31a-a39a-4949-b92e-335cb50e7a67.description: Delicious pizza topped with sausage, cheese, and sweet corn.
instructions: Mix eggs and oil well, then add baking powder, yogurt, salt, and milk.
Gradually add flour while stirring continuously.
Place the dough in a plastic bag and let it rest for 3 to 4 hours.
Grease the baking dish and line it with parchment paper.
Layer the pizza dough, sprinkle cheese and cooked corn on top.
Add three tablespoons of sauce and layer the remaining ingredients.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 20 minutes.
Move the pizza to the top rack to crisp the top.

b2722f6f-009e-4381-89e0-a6a47e76054a.name: Vegetable Pizza
b2722f6f-009e-4381-89e0-a6a47e76054a.description: A delicious pizza topped with fresh vegetables and melted cheese.
instructions: Mix all sauce ingredients and set aside.
Chop onion, mushrooms, green pepper, and tomato.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread sauce on the dough and sprinkle cheese on top.
Add chopped vegetables on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at 450°F for 20-25 minutes.

14e7eabb-0679-4bab-b25f-348a73c81149.name: Cheese and Egg Pizza
14e7eabb-0679-4bab-b25f-348a73c81149.description: A delicious pizza topped with cheese, eggs, and fresh parsley.
instructions: Prepare the pizza dough by sifting flour, baking powder, and salt together.
Mix oil and milk without stirring, then combine with dry ingredients until sticky.
Knead the dough for 10 minutes, then roll it out to fit a greased pie dish.
Prick the dough with a fork and pre-bake it slightly.
Grease a shallow aluminum dish and line it with the rolled-out dough.
Spread a bit of pizza sauce on the dough.
Heat oil in a pan, add grated cheese, and stir until slightly browned.
Crack eggs into a bowl, season with salt and pepper, then mix with the cheese.
Pour the egg and cheese mixture into the dough, add parsley, and top with more sauce.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 20 minutes, then broil for an additional 15-20 minutes until golden.
Serve the pizza directly in the dish.

319cade7-118e-436a-a4b9-dfcda5eb385b.name: Meat Pizza
319cade7-118e-436a-a4b9-dfcda5eb385b.description: Delicious homemade pizza topped with savory minced meat and fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Prepare the pizza dough by sifting flour, baking powder, and salt together.
Mix oil and milk in a measuring cup without stirring, then add to dry ingredients and mix until sticky.
Knead the dough on a greased surface for 10 minutes.
Roll out the dough to fit a greased pie dish, press edges with a fork, and poke holes in the center.
Grease a shallow aluminum dish and place the rolled dough inside.
Blanch tomatoes in boiling water, peel, and chop them.
Sauté minced meat with fried onions, add water, tomato paste, pepper, and salt, and simmer until water evaporates.
Pour the meat mixture into the dough, add chopped tomatoes and cheese on top, and sprinkle with parsley.
Preheat oven to 350°F and bake pizza for 20 minutes, then move to the top rack for an additional 15-20 minutes until golden.
Serve the pizza in the dish.

4c11324b-4e3f-43b8-a0b7-1c7daad62533.name: Ham or Fish Pizza
4c11324b-4e3f-43b8-a0b7-1c7daad62533.description: Delicious pizza topped with ham or fish, fresh tomatoes, and melted cheese.
instructions: Prepare the pizza dough by sifting flour, baking powder, and salt together.
Mix oil and milk in a measuring cup without stirring, then add to dry ingredients.
Knead the dough for 10 minutes and roll it out to fit a greased pizza pan.
Prepare the filling by mixing fish or ham with fried onions and salt.
Peel and chop tomatoes, then layer them on the dough with the filling.
Top with cheese and parsley, then bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.
Finish baking until golden brown, then serve directly from the pan.

6bea89d7-906e-464c-8ceb-cdbf4d86b5eb.name: Sardine Pizza
6bea89d7-906e-464c-8ceb-cdbf4d86b5eb.description: A delicious pizza topped with sardines and fresh ingredients.
instructions: Prepare the pizza dough by sifting flour, baking powder, and salt together.
Mix oil and milk in a measuring cup without stirring, then add to dry ingredients and mix until sticky.
Knead the dough for 10 minutes, then roll it out to fit a greased pie dish.
Preheat the oven to 350°F and place the pizza in the dish.
Spread pizza sauce, chopped tomatoes, salt, pepper, and fried onions on the dough.
Arrange sardines over the tomatoes and sprinkle with Gruyere cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes, then move to the top rack for an additional 15-20 minutes until golden.
Serve the pizza directly in the dish.

7a955b9c-4307-410a-bfdd-843883c75fed.name: Tandoori Chicken Pizza
7a955b9c-4307-410a-bfdd-843883c75fed.description: A delicious pizza topped with marinated chicken and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 340g chicken fillet, cut into thin strips
2 ready-made pizza doughs, 22 cm in diameter
instructions: Mix yogurt and curry powder, then add chicken and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours.
If desired, mix additional yogurt with mango pickle.
Slice zucchini into thin layers using a peeler.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and sauté garlic and onion until soft.
Place pizza doughs on a greased baking tray.
Spread the yogurt and pickle mixture evenly over the dough.
Add the sautéed onion and garlic mixture on top.
Sprinkle grated cheese over the pizzas.
Evenly distribute the marinated chicken on the pizzas.
Top with zucchini slices and cashews if using.
Bake in a preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes until the dough is cooked.
Remove from oven and serve.

d581c47a-ce7e-4b91-b8f1-c1930efe98dc.name: Tandoori Pizza with Meat
d581c47a-ce7e-4b91-b8f1-c1930efe98dc.description: A delicious pizza topped with spiced meat and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Mix half of the yogurt with curry powder and marinate the meat for 10 minutes.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and fry the meat until well cooked, in batches if necessary.
Remove the meat and sauté onion and garlic until soft, then add spinach and cook until wilted.
Roll out the pizza dough and place it in a greased baking tray.
Sprinkle half of the cheese on the dough, then layer with spinach mixture and meat, and top with remaining cheese.
Bake in a preheated oven for 15-20 minutes until the crust is golden.
Mix remaining yogurt with coriander, lemon juice, and cumin.
Combine cucumber, tomato, and remaining coriander, and top the pizza with this mix.
Serve the pizza with yogurt and cumin mixture.

b837a108-9eb4-412d-bf7c-cd7542046e0d.name: Mexican Pizza
b837a108-9eb4-412d-bf7c-cd7542046e0d.description: A delicious and hearty pizza topped with savory meat and fresh ingredients.
instructions: Mix yeast with sugar and warm water; let it sit for 10 minutes.
Sift flour into a bowl, add yeast mixture and olive oil, knead until firm.
Let the dough rise for 30 minutes in a warm place.
Sauté onion in oil until golden, add ground meat and cook well.
Add tomato sauce, oregano, and water; simmer until thickened.
Mix in corn and beans, then spread over pizza doughs.
Top with cheese and red onion, bake for 15-20 minutes.
Serve with yogurt, parsley, and cherry tomatoes if desired.

a9f4c15c-352b-45ef-9292-5a4fcf1630e8.name: Pizza Dough 2
a9f4c15c-352b-45ef-9292-5a4fcf1630e8.description: Delicious homemade pizza dough, perfect for your favorite toppings.
instructions: Mix warm water with yeast and salt until dissolved, then let sit for 10 minutes.
Add flour and knead, gradually incorporating olive oil for about 7 minutes.
If sticky, add a little extra flour until smooth.
Let the dough rise in a bowl covered with a clean cloth for 30 minutes.
Incorporate grated cheese into the dough and knead until fully mixed.
The dough is now ready for baking.

35f135ce-1e54-4e49-8862-bd8574d8333f.name: Meat and Spinach Pizza
35f135ce-1e54-4e49-8862-bd8574d8333f.description: A delicious pizza topped with spiced meat and fresh spinach.
ingredients: 240 grams of lamb fillet or loin
instructions: Cut the meat into thin strips.
Mix spices with half of the yogurt and add salt, then marinate the meat for 10 minutes in the fridge.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and fry the meat until browned.
Remove the meat and sauté onion and garlic in the same pan until soft.
Add spinach and half of the lemon juice, cooking until the spinach is soft.
Roll out the pizza dough into a thin layer and place it on a baking tray.
Spread ketchup on the dough, sprinkle cheese, and add the meat and spinach mixture.
Bake the pizza in a medium oven until cooked.
Mix cumin, remaining lemon juice, and yogurt in a bowl, adding half of the coriander.
Combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the pizza, serving with yogurt and cumin sauce.

6c11bf3b-710c-4e75-92ed-ce37110447d6.name: Spicy Vegetable Pizza
6c11bf3b-710c-4e75-92ed-ce37110447d6.description: A delicious pizza topped with vibrant vegetables and rich flavors.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F).
Sauté eggplant in sunflower oil for 4-5 minutes, then drain excess oil.
Add red bell pepper, cover, and cook for 5-6 minutes until soft.
Peel and slice tomatoes, then blanch to remove skins.
Heat olive oil, add garlic and onion, and cook for 4 minutes until soft.
Add tomato slices and cook until soft, then season with salt, pepper, and basil.
Add chopped olives and broth, bring to a boil.
Mix in eggplant and pour over cooked rice in a suitable dish.
Cover with pizza dough, ensuring it extends slightly beyond the dish.
Bake for 25 minutes until golden brown, then serve hot.

cc2f930a-d8d7-41c4-bfd0-56d42739f13f.name: Shrimp Kebab
cc2f930a-d8d7-41c4-bfd0-56d42739f13f.description: Delicious marinated shrimp grilled to perfection, bursting with flavor.
instructions: Mix vinegar or lemon juice with the other ingredients and refrigerate for 1-2 hours.
Skewer the shrimp on metal or wooden skewers (soak wooden skewers for 3-4 minutes in water to prevent burning) and grill on charcoal or gas.

6a926f32-12e8-4f37-955e-8b8c50891981.name: Bakhtiari Spiral Kebab
6a926f32-12e8-4f37-955e-8b8c50891981.description: Delicious spiral kebabs made with chicken and beef, perfect for grilling.
ingredients: 5 pieces of beef or lamb fillet
instructions: Marinate the fillets with salt, pepper, sliced onion, and saffron, then add oil and mix.
Refrigerate for 2-3 hours. For beef, add yogurt for color.
Wrap the meat in a spiral and skewer, alternating chicken and lamb.
Grill over fire or pan-fry with oil on low heat.
Serve with grilled tomatoes and lemon slices.

899c969d-9f5d-4872-81b1-9d88d466b0c5.name: Shish Kebab
899c969d-9f5d-4872-81b1-9d88d466b0c5.description: Tender marinated meat skewers grilled to perfection.
instructions: Cut the meat into 2 cm thick pieces.
Grate the onions and mix with pepper, olive oil, and meat; refrigerate for 24 hours.
Skewer the marinated meat and brush with a little oil.
Grill over medium heat until cooked, ensuring it doesn't dry out.
Serve on a platter, sprinkle with salt, and add a bit of butter on top.

72c256aa-2a8c-4ed3-b45b-8728b386eedf.name: Kabab Koobideh
72c256aa-2a8c-4ed3-b45b-8728b386eedf.description: Delicious Persian minced meat kebabs, perfect for grilling.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Prepare the meat by removing skin and fat, then grind twice.
Finely chop the onions and mix with meat, salt, pepper, baking soda, and egg.
Knead the mixture for five minutes and refrigerate for one hour.
Shape the meat onto skewers, ensuring even thickness.
Grill on medium heat, turning until cooked through.

74cd1471-8201-4345-91ef-a28578f0ad97.name: Spiced Grilled Meat
74cd1471-8201-4345-91ef-a28578f0ad97.description: Tender meat marinated with aromatic spices, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Mix all spices in a suitable bowl.
Marinate the meat in the spice mixture for 8 hours in the refrigerator.
Grill the meat slowly.
Serve grilled meat with vegetables, bread, or rice.

2fec4eab-f626-4702-a217-34d294a50d3d.name: Chicken Kebab
2fec4eab-f626-4702-a217-34d294a50d3d.description: Delicious marinated chicken skewers, perfect for grilling or baking.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and mint to taste
instructions: Mix all salad dressing ingredients in a jar and shake well.
For the kebab, combine tomato paste, mustard, and olive oil in a bowl.
Cut chicken into small pieces and coat in the sauce.
Add chopped garlic and onion, season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to a sealed container and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Skewer and grill, or cook in a pan with water, or bake covered in the oven, or microwave on high for 6 minutes.

68407191-573c-490a-aeb1-79c42690e181.name: Chicken Kebab
68407191-573c-490a-aeb1-79c42690e181.description: Delicious and tender chicken kebabs, perfect for serving with rice or bread.
instructions: Grind the chicken breast and onion together until smooth.
Add breadcrumbs, egg, saffron, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
Shape the mixture into rectangular kebabs about 0.5 cm thick and 20 cm long.
Fry the kebabs in hot oil on both sides over medium heat.
Serve the kebabs with rice or bread.

fd2ab623-c9a7-4cff-84a5-3431f023c60f.name: Stuffed Kebab
fd2ab623-c9a7-4cff-84a5-3431f023c60f.description: Deliciously spiced ground meat kebabs, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Grate the onion finely and drain completely.
Mix ground meat, salt, pepper, and onion in a bowl and knead until sticky.
Add chopped herbs and mix well.
Combine saffron infusion and breadcrumbs separately, then add to the mixture.
Stir gently with a fork just until combined.
Chill the mixture in the freezer for 10 minutes to firm up.
Soak wooden skewers in warm water, then shape the mixture into 3x3 cm cubes and thread onto skewers.
Ensure the kebabs are spaced apart for even cooking.
Heat a little oil in a pan and fry the kebabs over low heat with the lid off.
Alternatively, place skewers in a greased oven-safe pan and bake at 170°C for 30 minutes.
Cover with aluminum foil after 15 minutes to prevent drying out.

cec4db1d-d37b-445a-ba92-623b385e5a27.name: Pepper Kebab
cec4db1d-d37b-445a-ba92-623b385e5a27.description: Juicy kebabs wrapped around green peppers, seasoned to perfection.
ingredients: Salt, garlic powder, turmeric, pepper (to taste)
instructions: Grate the onion and let it sit for a few minutes to release water.
Discard the onion water, mix grated onion with ground meat, and knead well.
Add salt, garlic powder, turmeric, pepper, and sumac, knead until sticky, then refrigerate for 15 minutes.
Mix tomato paste with saffron infusion and chopped basil until smooth.
Remove meat mixture from the fridge, discard excess water, and add basil sauce, kneading again.
Gradually add breadcrumbs until the mixture firms up.
Take a portion the size of a medium tangerine, press to remove excess water, and wrap it around a green pepper, leaving the stem exposed.
Prepare all kebabs in the same way.
Heat a pan, add some oil, and arrange the kebabs in the pan.
Cook on medium heat with the lid off until all sides are browned, serving with grilled tomatoes and desired sides.

d5ed06e3-348e-4fe0-80ee-86b934342ed7.name: Roasted Chicken
d5ed06e3-348e-4fe0-80ee-86b934342ed7.description: A flavorful roasted chicken infused with saffron and spices, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Preheat the oven to maximum temperature.
Clean the chicken and soak it in warm water for 15 minutes.
Trim excess parts from the chicken's neck and wings.
Mix saffron, spices, and lemon juice to create a marinade.
Dry the chicken and coat it with salt and the marinade multiple times.
Refrigerate the marinated chicken for 10 minutes, basting it with marinade.
Stuff the chicken with halved tomato, garlic, and bell pepper.
Make small incisions under the chicken skin and fill with marinade and vegetables.
Tie the chicken legs together and cover the ends with foil to prevent burning.
Skewer the chicken and place it in the rotisserie oven.
Grill and baste with melted butter and saffron every 15 minutes for about 3 hours.
Check doneness with a fork or knife, then serve immediately.

1fb4cf72-ee38-41f9-9827-45b3868cc7c6.name: Rosemary Grilled Chicken Thighs
1fb4cf72-ee38-41f9-9827-45b3868cc7c6.description: Juicy chicken thighs infused with rosemary and served with roasted potatoes.
ingredients: lemon juice and saffron to taste
instructions: Wash and dry the chicken thighs, then season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the chicken for 5 minutes until golden.
Peel and chop the potatoes into large pieces.
Grease a baking dish and add chicken, onion, garlic, rosemary, and potatoes.
Drizzle lemon juice and saffron over the ingredients.
Preheat the oven to 200°C and bake for 1 hour.

c4f5e12a-8606-4061-9678-797cce98a425.name: Spicy Grilled Chicken
c4f5e12a-8606-4061-9678-797cce98a425.description: Tender chicken marinated in a zesty spicy sauce, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Mix tomato sauce with hot sauce in a suitable bowl.
Add lemon juice, stir, and marinate chicken for 2 hours in the fridge before grilling.
