c65006ff-14ab-4943-b6c5-cf65767218ba.name: Spicy Fried Chicken Fillet
c65006ff-14ab-4943-b6c5-cf65767218ba.description: Crispy chicken fillets with a zesty lemon-garlic sauce.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a small pan over medium heat and sauté the garlic.
Add lemon juice and salt, simmer for another minute.
Mix salt, flour, and pepper in a bowl and coat the fillets.
Fry the fillets in a pan with some oil.
Preheat the oven to 400°F, pour the sauce over the fried fillets, and bake for five minutes.

e51c290d-a539-4812-a8b1-f45f7510e20a.name: Breadless Burger
e51c290d-a539-4812-a8b1-f45f7510e20a.description: Delicious meat patties layered with cheese and peppers, served in lettuce wraps.
ingredients: 3-4 teaspoons roasted red bell pepper, diced
instructions: Mix ground beef and sausage in a large bowl, divide into 12 equal patties, and shape into 10 cm circles.
Layer cheese and bell peppers on 6 patties, place the plain patties on top, press edges together, and season with salt and pepper.
Grill on charcoal or gas grill, cooking for 15-18 minutes, then serve each burger on lettuce with a small tomato on top.

5b2cedff-083b-475c-a704-2fb16d47ae11.name: Special Koobideh Kebab with Rice
5b2cedff-083b-475c-a704-2fb16d47ae11.description: Delicious minced meat kebabs served with fragrant rice.
instructions: Grate the onions and squeeze out excess water.
Mix minced meat with onions, saffron dissolved in hot water, salt, and pepper; knead well and refrigerate for 2-3 hours.
Wet your hands, shape the meat mixture onto skewers, and grill over a fire, ensuring to fan the flames initially.

a097b15d-157b-481f-a2ab-188f5271d9eb.name: Skillet Chicken Kebab
a097b15d-157b-481f-a2ab-188f5271d9eb.description: Juicy chicken kebabs marinated in a flavorful blend of spices and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Cut the chicken into pieces, removing large bones.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, onion juice, salt, pepper, and saffron.
Marinate the chicken in the mixture for 1 to 1.5 hours.
Skewer the chicken pieces onto small skewers (25 to 30 cm long).
Heat a cast iron skillet and grill the skewers, turning until cooked.
Serve on a platter with butter or tomato-onion sauce.

c9569906-0dd4-4d10-b323-869e3a282a85.name: Special Kebab
c9569906-0dd4-4d10-b323-869e3a282a85.description: A delicious mix of marinated meats and vegetables grilled to perfection.
instructions: Mix lamb loin with chopped onion and refrigerate for a day.
Mix chicken fillet with chopped onion and saffron, cut into 20cm pieces.
Wrap lamb pieces around chicken and skewer with bell pepper pieces.
Grill on medium heat until cooked through.
Sauté chopped onion in a wooden dish until hot.
Once kebabs are cooked, arrange them around the dish with the sautéed onion.
Place the cooked tomato in the center and garnish with olives and tomato.

5737681c-222e-4f09-9448-0eb570b6fe2f.name: Microwave Burger
5737681c-222e-4f09-9448-0eb570b6fe2f.description: Delicious homemade burgers cooked quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion, breadcrumbs, egg, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Divide the mixture into 2-3 portions, shape into patties, and place in a plate with 1 tablespoon of oil.
Cook in the microwave at 100% power for 3-4 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Serve the cooked burgers in buns with ketchup and chopped parsley on top.

2dafd076-15bd-44b1-b879-99d7e23249f8.name: Grilled Vegetables
2dafd076-15bd-44b1-b879-99d7e23249f8.description: A delicious medley of grilled vegetables, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Slice the tomatoes into thin rounds.
Cut the potatoes and onions lengthwise.
Chop the celery into small lengths.
Grease a baking dish and preheat the oven.
Layer half of the tomatoes at the bottom of the dish.
Add all the ingredients on top of the tomatoes and layer the remaining tomatoes.
Mix parsley, mint, and dill, and sprinkle over the dish.
Add garlic, salt, and pepper, then drizzle olive oil over everything.
Bake in the oven for 30 minutes, or until vegetables are cooked and tender.

2053a543-6598-4617-b358-dbabd2cbdf9b.name: Chicken Kebabs with Sesame Oil and Salad
2053a543-6598-4617-b358-dbabd2cbdf9b.description: Delicious chicken kebabs with fresh pineapple and a vibrant vegetable salad.
ingredients: 1 yellow or orange bell pepper, chopped
1 tablespoon pomegranate paste or chili sauce
2 cups mixed green vegetables (spinach, lettuce, cabbage, celery)
instructions: Cut each chicken breast into four lengthwise strips.
Skewer two strips of chicken, two pieces of pineapple, and two pieces of bell pepper onto each skewer.
In a jar, combine vinegar, water, oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, and mustard. Shake well.
Reserve 2 tablespoons of the sauce and refrigerate the rest.
Mix the reserved sauce with pomegranate paste and brush it on the kebabs.
Grill the kebabs on a charcoal grill or stovetop until the chicken is cooked through (about 10-12 minutes).
Mix the red cabbage and green vegetables, dividing them into four bowls.
Place the kebabs and mushrooms on top of the vegetables and drizzle with the remaining sauce.

bb480b66-b0df-494f-b5ab-b71ead794f8e.name: Kabab Koobideh
bb480b66-b0df-494f-b5ab-b71ead794f8e.description: Delicious Persian minced lamb skewers, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Grind the lean meat and tail fat together.
Add grated onions, eggs, and baking soda, then knead for 30 minutes.
Add salt and knead again, let it rest for 30 minutes.
Soak skewers in water, then shape the mixture onto the skewers.
Grill over hot charcoal until cooked, pressing to remove excess fat.
Serve immediately while hot.

e75a8688-74d9-4915-b0c3-c0f460ddbf3c.name: Shishlik
e75a8688-74d9-4915-b0c3-c0f460ddbf3c.description: Delicious grilled meat skewers marinated to perfection.
instructions: Cut the meat into 2 cm thick pieces and marinate with grated onion, oil, and pepper for at least 24 hours.
Skewer the marinated meat with pieces of fat and grill over moderate heat until cooked through.

c4d6cecb-52c1-4a98-aa1e-553d0d9635ad.name: Lamb Chops Kebab
c4d6cecb-52c1-4a98-aa1e-553d0d9635ad.description: Tender marinated lamb chops grilled to perfection.
instructions: Cut the meat into three-finger-wide pieces.
Slice the meat into half-centimeter thick pieces and marinate with grated onion, olive oil, and pepper overnight.
Skewer the marinated meat and pound it with a knife.
Grill the skewers over moderate heat, turning occasionally to prevent drying out.

8a363e8f-09ed-4a45-9693-fa9564ad6e75.name: Tazkabab - Persian Stew
8a363e8f-09ed-4a45-9693-fa9564ad6e75.description: A delicious Persian stew with tender meat and flavorful vegetables.
instructions: Cut the meat into thin 4x2 cm slices and prepare the vegetables by slicing them accordingly.
Layer the onions at the bottom of a pot, followed by the meat, plums, carrots, quinces, and eggplants, repeating the layers.
Add 1-2 cups of water, cover, and simmer on low heat until cooked through.
Near the end of cooking, add sliced potatoes and dissolve the tomato paste in the stew.

8a8e274a-299d-4edd-b721-cbf08548a8ca.name: Chicken Koobideh
8a8e274a-299d-4edd-b721-cbf08548a8ca.description: Juicy minced chicken skewers, perfectly spiced and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Remove the bones from the chicken and grind the meat and skin twice until sticky.
Grate the onion and mix with chopped parsley, salt, turmeric, and black pepper; knead well.
Shape 90 grams of the mixture onto skewers and grill over moderate charcoal heat.

dd91d885-1f53-4d5a-bd44-c6392b6215aa.name: Kebab with Cheese
dd91d885-1f53-4d5a-bd44-c6392b6215aa.description: Delicious kebabs infused with cheddar and Neniya cheese, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Grate cheddar and Neniya cheese, and grate the washed and peeled onions.
Mix the grated cheeses and onions with the ground meat, adding salt and pepper, and knead until sticky.
Evenly shape the mixture onto skewers and refrigerate for two hours.
Grill over high heat until the meat firms up, then lower the heat to cook through.

d8d3da88-afdb-494c-9e2a-e8ad86f72584.name: Sour Shami (Kal Shami)
d8d3da88-afdb-494c-9e2a-e8ad86f72584.description: A delicious Persian meat patty dish served with a tangy sauce.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, pepper, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Grate the onion and potato, then mix with ground meat.
Add eggs, salt, pepper, cinnamon, and turmeric, and knead well.
Shape the mixture into patties and fry in a pan.
In another pot, melt some butter and sauté the tomato paste.
Add sour grape juice and water, bring to a boil.
Add the patties to the sauce and let them absorb the flavor.
Serve garnished with fried potatoes and rice.

5be2c795-24b2-49a4-a6b2-828528f3a2eb.name: Eggplant Kebab
5be2c795-24b2-49a4-a6b2-828528f3a2eb.description: A delicious and tangy eggplant dish, perfect as an appetizer or side.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons dried mint and local herbs
instructions: Grill the eggplants or bake them in the oven until soft.
Peel the eggplants and mash them with a mortar.
Mix in ground walnuts, pomegranate juice, herbs, crushed garlic, and salt.
Serve as an appetizer or side dish; keeps in the fridge for 4 days.

5c7f2b7b-a607-44b7-a675-a22157b34ca4.name: Skewered Kebabs
5c7f2b7b-a607-44b7-a675-a22157b34ca4.description: Delicious marinated beef skewers grilled to perfection with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Blend crushed peppercorns, garlic, ginger, orange peel, green onions, and red pepper in a food processor.
Mix the blended ingredients with honey, soy sauce, and oils in a bowl, then season with salt and pepper.
Cut the beef into 16 small pieces and add to the marinade, mixing well. Let it marinate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Soak the skewers in water for 30 minutes before use to prevent burning.
Thread a cherry tomato, bay leaf, a piece of beef, and a mushroom onto each skewer, repeating until full.
Grill the kebabs on an electric grill or in a cast iron pan until cooked and charred, basting with marinade if desired.

5394875b-1d0b-4826-8b81-0fa6c3f836b3.name: Chicken Kebabs with Vegetables
5394875b-1d0b-4826-8b81-0fa6c3f836b3.description: Delicious grilled chicken skewers with vibrant vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the grill and thread chicken onto 6 skewers, and vegetables onto 2 skewers.
Brush skewers with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill chicken for 12 minutes and vegetables for 8 minutes. Drizzle lemon juice over chicken skewers and serve.

069bca0d-7074-43f2-bc68-5fab02311f53.name: Chicken Kebab with Tomato Sauce
069bca0d-7074-43f2-bc68-5fab02311f53.description: Delicious grilled chicken kebabs topped with a flavorful tomato sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix vinegar, half of the basil, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Add chicken and blend tomatoes, peanuts, garlic, and remaining basil.
Add cheese, remaining olive oil, sugar, broth, chicken, and pepper, and blend again.
Grill the chicken and serve on a platter topped with the prepared sauce.

d1c37bce-7b5a-4d15-9643-a959d10ac43d.name: Mushroom and Pepper Kebab
d1c37bce-7b5a-4d15-9643-a959d10ac43d.description: Delicious skewered beef with mushrooms and peppers, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Grate 2 onions and squeeze out the juice, then marinate the beef in onion juice for 24 hours.
Cut the remaining onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes into even pieces, halve the mushrooms, and skewer them with the marinated beef.
Preheat the oven and place the skewers in a greased baking tray, cooking one side first.
Flip the kebabs, season with salt and pepper, and sauté tomato paste with oil, adding a little water.
Pour the sauce over the kebabs in the last minutes of cooking, then remove from the oven after 2 minutes.

9a55ce00-308a-49ea-89bf-4679cd3ff5df.name: Mediterranean Skewers
9a55ce00-308a-49ea-89bf-4679cd3ff5df.description: Delicious grilled chicken and vegetables marinated in a zesty herb sauce.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper.
Slice the zucchini and eggplant lengthwise into 5mm thick slices.
Cut the chicken breast into 5cm cubes.
Wrap half of the chicken pieces in eggplant slices and the other half in zucchini slices.
On skewers, alternate chicken, pickled onion, and bell pepper.
Brush the skewers with the prepared sauce and let them marinate for 30 minutes.
During cooking, brush any remaining sauce from the plate onto the skewers.
Grill the skewers until tender, turning to cook evenly.
Serve the skewers warm.

43b7673e-a5f3-4172-97f9-9287c93f43db.name: Bulgarian Kebab
43b7673e-a5f3-4172-97f9-9287c93f43db.description: Deliciously spiced meat rolls, perfect for grilling.
ingredients: Sliced onion or bell pepper for stuffing
Lamb or beef fillet cut into 25x5 cm pieces
instructions: Season the meat with salt, pepper, and saffron, and place a slice of onion or bell pepper in the center.
Roll the meat from one side and secure the edge with a toothpick.
Heat oil in a small pan until hot, then place the meat in the oil, ensuring it is covered.
Cook on medium heat for about 30 minutes until cooked through and browned.

4a845181-9926-459f-8e18-b5973cc85709.name: Four Types of Kebab
4a845181-9926-459f-8e18-b5973cc85709.description: Deliciously grilled kebabs with a variety of meats and flavors.
instructions: Grind lamb and beef kidney meat, season with salt, refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Grind onion, discard juice, mix with meat, add salt and pepper.
Shape the meat mixture onto skewers and grill over heat or charcoal.
Cut lamb loin or beef fillet and marinate with onion, saffron, salt, and pepper for 2-3 hours.
Cut chicken breast similarly and marinate with onion, saffron, lemon juice, and yogurt.
Skewer alternating pieces of beef and chicken, starting and ending with beef.
Grill skewers and brush with butter after cooking.
Cut meat into finger-sized pieces, marinate with onion, black pepper, salt, and saffron for 2-3 hours.
Cut tail fat into pieces, skewer alternating meat, green pepper, and tail fat.
Cook kebabs over moderate heat, brushing with butter at the end.
Marinate pieces of meat in onion, pepper, salt, and saffron for 2-3 hours.
Skewer meat, grilled green pepper, and chicken pieces alternately.
Cook over moderate heat and finish with butter.

0e2c57b2-86ee-4eb6-9ddf-fe10a7591960.name: Mushroom Kebab
0e2c57b2-86ee-4eb6-9ddf-fe10a7591960.description: Delicious grilled mushrooms seasoned to perfection, perfect for any barbecue.
instructions: Coat oyster mushrooms in butter or oil, season with salt and pepper, and let sit for 20-30 minutes.
Skewer the mushrooms and grill over charcoal until cooked, or coat in egg and breadcrumbs and bake at 180°C for 10 minutes.

ed091335-9966-4f18-b0d7-4a8fb32a92f8.name: Biryani
ed091335-9966-4f18-b0d7-4a8fb32a92f8.description: A flavorful beef dish served with crispy bread, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Cut the beef into pieces and cook with water and chopped onions until tender.
Add salt, pepper, and spices towards the end, then chop the meat finely.
Heat the chopped meat in a pan until it sizzles.
Toast the bread pieces until slightly crispy, place meat on one piece, and top with another.

fe6f215e-ce39-4ade-b535-e181eb2a4df4.name: Turkish Kebab
fe6f215e-ce39-4ade-b535-e181eb2a4df4.description: Deliciously spiced ground meat kebabs served with a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion and knead well.
Shape the mixture into walnut-sized balls and roll in flour.
Fry the meatballs in hot oil until golden brown.
Grate tomatoes and cook with salt, red pepper, and olive oil until thick.
Add the fried meatballs to the tomato sauce and let them absorb the flavors.
Serve hot, optionally with rice.

8d814a26-2c3b-46dc-90ac-3fd55bd28fe5.name: Kebab Chengeh
8d814a26-2c3b-46dc-90ac-3fd55bd28fe5.description: Juicy beef kebabs marinated with onions and spices, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Use tender beef or lamb, marinate with onion and pepper for 24 hours.
Cut the meat into 2cm thick slices, alternating with pieces of tail fat on skewers.
Grate onions and mix with olive oil and pepper, then marinate the meat.
Skewer the meat and pound it lightly, then grill over low heat, turning occasionally.
Serve on a platter, sprinkle with salt, add butter, and garnish with sliced onions and parsley.

a68c0cd0-d7b6-4eb8-b17a-f94ada797aa1.name: Boneless Chicken Kebab
a68c0cd0-d7b6-4eb8-b17a-f94ada797aa1.description: Tender and flavorful boneless chicken kebabs, perfect for easy dining.
instructions: Prepare a marinade with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, onion juice, and saffron dissolved in hot water.
Marinate the chicken pieces for a few hours, then skewer them alternatingly with breast and thigh pieces.
Cook on a mild, even fire, starting with thigh pieces, then add breast pieces, basting with melted butter.
Serve arranged on a platter, garnished with green onions, radishes shaped like flowers, and pickles.

832b8e9d-57ea-475c-be67-2de8305a56cb.name: Fresh Kebab
832b8e9d-57ea-475c-be67-2de8305a56cb.description: Delicious layers of beef, potatoes, and onions seasoned to perfection.
instructions: Cut the beef into pieces and wash it.
Peel and slice the potatoes into rings, and slice the onions.
Layer a slice of beef, a slice of potato, and a slice of onion in a pot.
Sprinkle sumac, salt, and pepper on top.
Mix with 2 tablespoons of oil and half a glass of water, then let it cook.

a1a18074-7c27-40b8-bb64-0a514e6cb942.name: Goose Kebab
a1a18074-7c27-40b8-bb64-0a514e6cb942.description: Tender and flavorful goose kebabs, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Clean the goose and simmer with onions, bay leaves, and parsley until partially cooked.
Remove skin, separate breast and thigh pieces, and prepare a marinade with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Marinate the meat and skewer it like chicken kebabs, grilling over low heat while basting with the marinade until fully cooked and browned.

8af576ef-e5e4-4ca1-b622-ee4d18f3a6ac.name: Hosseini Kebab
8af576ef-e5e4-4ca1-b622-ee4d18f3a6ac.description: Delicious skewered lamb and vegetables, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Cut the lamb into pieces about 4 cm long and 2 cm thick.
Prepare wooden skewers, sharpen their tips, and alternate threading meat, tail fat, onion, and green pepper.
Layer sliced tomatoes and onion in a pot, then place the skewers on top, repeating the layers.
Cover the pot and cook on low heat until the tomato juice evaporates, adding water if necessary.
Season with salt towards the end of cooking; serve kebabs on the skewers with butter pieces if desired.

a1404cbf-a6c7-46af-8e08-8796f6851d73.name: Liver Kebab
a1404cbf-a6c7-46af-8e08-8796f6851d73.description: Deliciously spiced lamb liver kebabs, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Wash the lamb liver and cut it into small pieces.
Season with salt, coat in flour, and fry in olive oil.
Serve in a dish, topped with chopped pepper, green onion, and dill.

2647abe9-507c-4bb1-9c21-1e049fd7f370.name: Whole Quail Kebab
2647abe9-507c-4bb1-9c21-1e049fd7f370.description: Deliciously grilled whole quails marinated in saffron and lemon juice.
instructions: Burn the fine feathers of the quails over fire, then clean, wash, and dry them carefully.
Dissolve saffron in a little boiling water, mix some with olive oil, salt, and pepper, and marinate the quails overnight.
Skewer the quails and grill them in the oven at 450°F or over a gentle fire for 1 to 1.5 hours.
Melt the butter and mix it with saffron and lemon juice, basting the quails occasionally.
Turn the skewers to ensure even cooking and golden browning, then serve on a platter.

0bfe0a86-8057-4143-93b2-8692cb24275d.name: Greek Kebab
0bfe0a86-8057-4143-93b2-8692cb24275d.description: Juicy beef kebabs grilled to perfection with peppers and onions.
instructions: Cut the cleaned beef into finger-sized pieces and then into 2-3 parts depending on thickness.
Grate one onion and mix its juice with olive oil and pepper; marinate the beef for a few hours.
Skewer the beef with pieces of pepper and onion, grill over medium heat, basting with melted butter.
Sprinkle salt on both sides of the kebabs towards the end of cooking.
Serve on skewers with a little butter on top.

20655c7c-d0ce-4790-ba83-a26d7d031d99.name: Pan-Fried Kebab
20655c7c-d0ce-4790-ba83-a26d7d031d99.description: Delicious kebabs served with a flavorful bean dish.
ingredients: 900 g cooked red and white beans
instructions: Mix ground meat, garlic, cumin, pepper, salt, and tomato sauce in a bowl.
Knead the mixture and shape into 12 equal kebabs.
Combine beans and onion in a bowl after cooling.
Shake olive oil, vinegar, honey, and mustard in a jar and pour over beans.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan and fry kebabs for 10-12 minutes until browned.
Serve kebabs on a plate with the bean dish.

6677cf4a-eaa8-4f83-800f-81b9ace6578f.name: Roasting Meat in the Oven
6677cf4a-eaa8-4f83-800f-81b9ace6578f.description: Deliciously roasted meat, perfect for any gathering.
instructions: Preheat the oven.
Season the meat and roast until cooked.

085a2d5d-1882-460b-9ff1-760652b0aa19.name: Moroccan Style Chicken Kebab
085a2d5d-1882-460b-9ff1-760652b0aa19.description: Juicy chicken kebabs marinated in aromatic spices and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into pieces.
Mix saffron, garlic, olive oil, pepper, spices, lemon juice, and cream.
Marinate the chicken in the mixture for a while.
Skewer the chicken alternately with pieces of bell pepper on wooden skewers.
Fry in a pan without oil until cooked.

560481d4-0569-4f08-9b6d-a231f4ad5c97.name: French Cordon Bleu Steak
560481d4-0569-4f08-9b6d-a231f4ad5c97.description: Deliciously breaded beef fillet stuffed with chicken sausage and Gouda cheese.
instructions: Place beef fillets in a freezer bag and pound them gently with a meat mallet.
Cut chicken sausage and Gouda cheese smaller than the fillets, ensuring edges overlap slightly.
Layer sausage between two cheese slices and place between two fillets, then coat in flour.
Dip in beaten eggs, then roll in a mixture of coarse and fine breadcrumbs.
Heat oil and butter in a pan and fry the steaks over medium heat until cooked.
Serve with cooked vegetables.

ac2d75d9-38fd-47cb-ab2d-541232ee0288.name: Vegetable-Packed Burger
ac2d75d9-38fd-47cb-ab2d-541232ee0288.description: A delicious burger filled with healthy vegetables and flavorful spices.
ingredients: 4 whole wheat hamburger buns, halved and toasted
instructions: In a medium bowl, mix milk, carrot, green onion, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper. Add ground chicken and mix well. Divide into four portions and shape into 3 cm diameter patties.

Cook the patties in a cast-iron skillet or on a grill. Lightly grease the skillet or grill, heat on high, then reduce to medium. Place patties in the skillet, cover, and cook one side for 8 to 12 minutes. Flip and cook the other side for 6 to 8 minutes.
Meanwhile, mix mustard and curry powder. Place the patties on buns, top with your favorite vegetables - lettuce, tomato, and zucchini - and serve with mustard curry sauce.

d40930f2-2d3f-4120-8414-4a21aa9e8c2e.name: Cilantro Kebab
d40930f2-2d3f-4120-8414-4a21aa9e8c2e.description: Delicious meatballs infused with cilantro and spices, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Cook lentils in water for 45 minutes to 1 hour, then drain.
Blend ground meat with half an onion, then mix with lentils and seasonings.
Form small meatballs and fry them in hot oil.
Chop cilantro coarsely and sauté in oil.
Fry the remaining onion, add flour, then mix with lentil water and dried limes.
Add sautéed cilantro and meatballs, cook for 4-5 minutes until done.

06fba586-a367-41bb-b4d9-e384133309c4.name: Parmesan Steak
06fba586-a367-41bb-b4d9-e384133309c4.description: Deliciously breaded beef steak topped with melted cheese and tomato sauce.
instructions: Place flour, beaten egg, and breadcrumbs in separate bowls.
Coat the beef in flour, then egg, and finally breadcrumbs; refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat the oven to 180°C.
Heat butter and oil in a pan, season the beef with salt and pepper, and fry until golden on both sides.
Transfer the beef to a baking dish, top with tomato sauce, and sprinkle with both cheeses.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until golden, then serve.

4c90ba96-c196-4fdb-aed6-4a56e7dd9f35.name: Liver and Kidney Kebab
4c90ba96-c196-4fdb-aed6-4a56e7dd9f35.description: Deliciously grilled lamb or beef kidneys and liver, served with parsley.
instructions: Wash the kidneys, remove the skin and fat, then dry them with a clean cloth.
Brush with butter, skewer, and grill or bake in the oven. Serve with parsley.

5d9f55ae-99bd-4af9-84e5-a8299b44dba3.name: Bitter Kebab (Simple and Quick)
5d9f55ae-99bd-4af9-84e5-a8299b44dba3.description: A delicious and easy-to-make kebab with aromatic herbs.
instructions: Grind the onion, garlic, and bitter herb together until finely chopped.
Mix the ground meat with the chopped mixture, salt, and turmeric, and knead well.
Form large walnut-sized pieces and thread them onto wooden skewers.
Cook in a Tefal fryer or on a non-stick or cast-iron skillet over low heat, turning regularly until fully cooked.
Cover the pot while cooking and avoid turning until the kebabs are set.

bd2d4a17-c191-44b8-bfa8-9b0adc4b6558.name: Sour Kebab
bd2d4a17-c191-44b8-bfa8-9b0adc4b6558.description: A flavorful kebab with a tangy twist, perfect for grilling.
instructions: Pound the beef until thin and tender.
Grate the onion and mix with walnuts, herbs, pomegranate paste, salt, and pepper.
Place the mixture in a pot, reduce heat, and cook with oil and water until the beef is tender.
Grill or fry the tomatoes and serve them around the cooked meat.

5d14d45d-2b1b-4d38-ac81-8b6b16ace379.name: Low Fat Skewers
5d14d45d-2b1b-4d38-ac81-8b6b16ace379.description: Delicious low-fat skewers with lamb, vegetables, and a sweet soy sauce.
instructions: Mix the sauce ingredients and marinate the lamb for 30 minutes.
Skewer meat, eggplant, bell pepper, and mushroom, leaving 2 cm empty at the end.
Grill the skewers on a barbecue or in the oven.

3d7f9fbc-9076-4f5c-8ca2-366ea580519f.name: Grilled Fish Fillet
3d7f9fbc-9076-4f5c-8ca2-366ea580519f.description: Delicious grilled fish fillets marinated with fresh herbs and spices.
ingredients: 750g boneless fish fillet (tuna, salmon, or large fish)
instructions: Wash the fish and pat dry. Mix lemon juice, garlic, basil, olive oil, soy sauce, and pepper in a bowl and brush onto the fish pieces.
Place the fish on a grilling rack over hot coals. Grill for 4-6 minutes until the fish flakes easily, brushing with remaining marinade halfway through.
Serve the fish with grilled vegetables and lemon slices.

fa33f252-5ad6-45a1-a633-6e1011b1da25.name: Grilled Delights
fa33f252-5ad6-45a1-a633-6e1011b1da25.description: Savor the mouthwatering flavors of perfectly grilled meats and vegetables.
instructions: Clean all cooking utensils and surfaces with a disinfecting solution before starting.
Wash hands thoroughly with warm water and soap for at least 20 seconds before handling food.
Store meats and perishable ingredients in the refrigerator until ready to cook.
Preheat the grill with enough charcoal until it is red and hot.
Cook chicken partially before grilling it quickly over high heat.
Ensure food is kept out of the danger zone (4°C to 60°C).
After cooking, place food in a clean dish and cover to prevent contamination.
Serve immediately or keep warm at 60°C or above.

82e8a63a-39d8-42c0-8fc9-51abf29c1a37.name: Pea Kebab Stew
82e8a63a-39d8-42c0-8fc9-51abf29c1a37.description: A savory stew with tender beef and fresh peas, perfect for serving over rice.
instructions: Melt 1.5 tablespoons of butter in a pot and sauté the beef.
Add garlic, black pepper, and spices, then cook for 2 hours.
In another pan, melt 1.5 tablespoons of butter and sauté the carrots for 3 minutes.
Add tomato paste and cinnamon, sauté briefly, then add green peas and turn off the heat.
Combine the pea mixture with the cooked beef and let simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice. This recipe serves 6.

a3888dfb-2a79-4a1c-988a-1df0d9e48781.name: Citrus Chicken Kebab
a3888dfb-2a79-4a1c-988a-1df0d9e48781.description: Juicy chicken marinated with citrus and herbs, grilled to perfection.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Wash the chicken inside and out, dry it, and season with salt and pepper.
Juice the lemon and orange over the chicken, and place the lemon and orange peels, onion, celery, and thyme inside the cavity.
Place the chicken on a rack in the oven, drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper, and roast for 1.5 hours.
Let it rest for 15 minutes, then carve and serve.

263bda5d-f14b-49f9-9b64-82a40765d934.name: Chicken Kebabs with Yogurt Sauce
263bda5d-f14b-49f9-9b64-82a40765d934.description: Delicious chicken kebabs marinated in spices, served with a refreshing yogurt sauce.
instructions: Blend shallot, garlic, ginger, and hot pepper.
Cook the mixture with scallions for 5 minutes, then remove from heat.
Add remaining chicken marinade ingredients and let cool.
Mix yogurt sauce ingredients and refrigerate.
Dip chicken in marinade, skewer, and grill for 2 minutes.
Serve yogurt sauce separately.

2cfcb923-542b-476d-92a4-d33d4de97bdc.name: Homemade Turkish Kebab
2cfcb923-542b-476d-92a4-d33d4de97bdc.description: Delicious and nutritious kebabs, perfect for a family meal.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
1 piece of aluminum foil or parchment paper
instructions: Cut the meat into thin pieces the size of your palm.
Prepare the sauce and marinate the meat in it for a few hours in the fridge.
Remove the meat from the sauce and layer it on aluminum foil, covering it tightly.
Freeze until solid, then slice into very thin pieces before thawing.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the meat, adding garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Fill the bread with meat, sliced onions, tomato slices, and peppers.
Prepare the sauce with grated onion, grated tomato, vegetable oil, thyme, crushed garlic, salt, and pepper.

c3f6c502-f7d1-420c-b3b7-b37104ca9432.name: Filet Schnitzel
c3f6c502-f7d1-420c-b3b7-b37104ca9432.description: Crispy and delicious schnitzel made with tender filet, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Cut the filets into pieces.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs well.
Coat the filets in flour, then dip in the eggs, and finally coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with cooked vegetables like carrots and spinach.

6323f328-9741-46e6-82a3-7bc72cd93f10.name: Shish Kebab (Skewered Kebab)
6323f328-9741-46e6-82a3-7bc72cd93f10.description: Delicious marinated skewered meat grilled to perfection.
instructions: Dissolve saffron in a little hot water and mix with yogurt.
Add grated onion, ground pepper, and lemon juice; stir well.
Cut meat into 2-finger-wide cubes and marinate in yogurt mixture for 10-12 hours.
Peel onions, chop peppers, and skewer meat, peppers, tomatoes, and onions alternately.
Grill skewers over medium heat until cooked, then serve with a sprinkle of salt and a bit of butter on top.

44037643-5cc1-460d-860a-3876c70fa2c7.name: Whole Lamb
44037643-5cc1-460d-860a-3876c70fa2c7.description: A succulent whole lamb dish filled with flavorful ingredients and spices.
instructions: Finely chop the lamb livers and sauté with caramelized onions, adding salt and pepper.
Dissolve tomato paste in half a cup of water and add to the liver mixture, then remove from heat after a couple of boils.
Boil the pasta in salted water, drain, and mix with the liver mixture, adding almonds, pistachios, and orange peel.
Season the mixture with salt and pepper, then clean and wash the lamb, seasoning the inside with salt and pepper.
Stuff the lamb with the prepared mixture and sew it up, then heat oil in a suitable pot and fry the lamb until golden.
Add 2 to 3 cups of water, cover, and simmer until the lamb is tender, ensuring it retains some water.
If necessary, add more water during cooking and season with salt towards the end.
Serve the whole lamb on a platter, optionally garnished with a sauce made from tomato paste and decorated with fried cherry tomatoes and parsley.

c53e8b5e-f807-4e73-9311-960677067144.name: Quail Kebab
c53e8b5e-f807-4e73-9311-960677067144.description: Deliciously tender quail kebabs marinated and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Clean the quail and boil with onions, celery, and parsley until partially cooked.
Remove skin, separate breast and thigh pieces, and prepare a marinade with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Marinate the meat and skewer like chicken kebabs.
Grill over low heat, basting regularly with marinade until fully cooked and crispy.

a88abbd8-a2f8-4301-b5fb-2f7b5e164ca8.name: Quail Kebab
a88abbd8-a2f8-4301-b5fb-2f7b5e164ca8.description: Deliciously grilled quail marinated in lemon and olive oil.
instructions: Carefully remove the quail feathers and burn any small remnants.
Wash and dry the quail, then cut the meat into pieces like chicken kebabs.
Marinate the pieces in lemon juice and olive oil.
Skewer the pieces, separating the breasts and thighs.
Grill the thighs over the fire until slightly charred.
Then grill the breasts over moderate heat, turning regularly.
Baste with olive oil and lemon juice to ensure even cooking without drying out.

92294d20-5e1b-430a-8e18-0940e7a4a965.name: Minced Meat Kebab
92294d20-5e1b-430a-8e18-0940e7a4a965.description: Delicious kebabs made with spiced minced lamb and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
In a large bowl, mix minced meat with yogurt, red pepper, ginger, garlic, salt, curry, and sweet pepper.
Add the meat mixture to the sautéed onions and cook for 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat.
Meanwhile, chop green peppers and half of the coriander finely.
Blend the meat mixture until smooth or mash it with a fork in a large bowl. Mix with peppers and coriander.
Place the mixture in a shallow, heatproof dish and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent burning.
Garnish with onion rings, coriander, and lemon wedges.

752385a9-14b8-4d47-91e5-654cd12675ec.name: Whole Chicken Kebab in the Oven
752385a9-14b8-4d47-91e5-654cd12675ec.description: Juicy and flavorful whole chicken kebab, perfectly roasted to golden perfection.
instructions: Clean and dry the whole chicken, then marinate with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
Place the chicken on skewers or a rack in a baking dish and roast in a preheated oven at 450°F for 30-45 minutes, flipping occasionally.
Reduce the temperature to 350°F and continue roasting for another 30-45 minutes until fully cooked and golden.
Serve garnished with parsley and potato chips.

f3c01a0a-b558-4096-b1b3-1268ae74b7df.name: Kebab with Minced Meat
f3c01a0a-b558-4096-b1b3-1268ae74b7df.description: Delicious kebab made with tender minced meat and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Cut the boneless meat into large pieces and mix with crushed garlic, cilantro, mint, and peppers.
Gently chop the meat to incorporate the spices, then marinate in yogurt for an hour.
Fry the onions in oil, then add chickpea flour, black pepper, and turmeric, cooking on low heat.
Slice and fry the potatoes, adding them to the kebab mixture 15 minutes before serving.
Serve the kebab with lavash bread.

67df8255-0294-44e1-befb-6403c34bd695.name: Duck Kebab
67df8255-0294-44e1-befb-6403c34bd695.description: Tender duck pieces marinated and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Clean the duck and simmer with onions, bay leaves, and parsley until partially cooked.
Remove skin, separate breast and thigh pieces, and prepare a marinade with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Marinate the duck pieces and skewer them like chicken kebabs.
Grill over low heat, basting with butter and lemon juice until fully cooked and crispy.

e06c168b-a170-4851-9692-7873c2858870.name: Chicken Cutlet
e06c168b-a170-4851-9692-7873c2858870.description: Crispy chicken cutlets served with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Grind the cooled boiled potatoes with ground chicken.
Mix with spices and 2 tablespoons of breadcrumbs, then knead well.
Add salt and grind again.
Shape into small pieces, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry in hot oil on low heat.
Arrange cutlets on a platter and garnish with pickles, tomatoes, and broccoli.

77d4aa96-8305-40a6-8fd7-ea2eb48265fc.name: Arabic Kebab
77d4aa96-8305-40a6-8fd7-ea2eb48265fc.description: Delicious spiced chickpea patties, perfect with tangy sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Grind the chickpeas, then grind the bell pepper, onion, and potato, and drain the excess water.
Add salt, spices, and eggs, knead the mixture, then heat oil in a pan.
Take a portion the size of a tangerine, make a hole in the center with a spoon, and fry in oil until golden on both sides.
Place on a strainer to remove excess oil and serve with spicy red sauce and pickles.

d151c77e-22df-4cea-b740-d481c990befb.name: Carrot Meatballs
d151c77e-22df-4cea-b740-d481c990befb.description: Delicious meatballs made with ground meat and fresh carrots.
instructions: Mix ground meat, grated carrots, parsley, egg, and half of the onion; let it rest for 30 minutes.
Fry the remaining onion, add tomato paste, and sauté; fry some carrot sticks, add water, and bring to a boil.
Shape the meat mixture into balls and cook in the boiling water.

2cd7373f-264c-48b4-8499-e0d8cbc6a049.name: Basil Kofta
2cd7373f-264c-48b4-8499-e0d8cbc6a049.description: Delicious meatballs infused with fresh basil, served in a savory sauce.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and pepper to taste
instructions: Mix ground beef with chopped basil, egg, and chickpea flour, then knead with cooked rice for 15 minutes.
Shape the mixture into oval balls and fry in oil until golden.
For the sauce, sauté chopped onions until golden, add garlic and green onions, then stir in tomato paste.
Add 2 cups of water, bring to a boil, and gently place kofta in the sauce.
Leave the lid off and simmer until only 1 cup of water remains.
Add lemon juice 10 minutes before serving.

8a10b8cb-2b4d-4adb-8d1e-0e7ffef9ca3c.name: Chicken Meatballs
8a10b8cb-2b4d-4adb-8d1e-0e7ffef9ca3c.description: Delicious chicken meatballs with herbs and cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix breadcrumbs, parsley, eggs, milk, ketchup, cheese, chicken, salt, and pepper well.
Form into walnut-sized balls and fry. Add chicken broth and simmer on low heat for 5 minutes until broth evaporates. Garnish with parsley before serving.

7cafe0eb-e011-4a7c-8114-d1ebcf8e181e.name: Cheese Cutlets
7cafe0eb-e011-4a7c-8114-d1ebcf8e181e.description: Delicious beef cutlets topped with cheese and tomatoes, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: 1 slice of ham, cut into strips
instructions: Remove the crusts from the toast and soak the white part in milk in a small pot over low heat.
Once absorbed, mash the bread and let it cool.
Combine the meat, soaked bread, and egg in a bowl, adding salt and pepper.
Knead the mixture well, divide into six equal parts, and shape into cutlets.
Coat both sides of the cutlets in breadcrumbs and brush with oil.
Grill or pan-fry the cutlets for three minutes on each side.
Top each cutlet with a slice of tomato, season with salt and pepper, and add a slice of cheese.
Place two strips of ham in an X shape on each cheese slice and cook for an additional five minutes until the cheese melts.

2eaeaf4b-b482-4daa-a76e-1a6f6c7c413e.name: Peach Meatballs
2eaeaf4b-b482-4daa-a76e-1a6f6c7c413e.description: Delicious meatballs with a blend of spices and fresh herbs.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix ground meat with chickpea flour and onions, knead well.
Add grated carrots, dried mint, fresh basil, and lemon juice, mix until uniform.
Shape into peach-sized balls and fry in oil.
In another pot, sauté onions and raisins, add 2 cups of water.
Cook the meatballs in the pot for half an hour.

7e983605-e889-4cd2-b3fb-15f23ed44b37.name: Shami
7e983605-e889-4cd2-b3fb-15f23ed44b37.description: Delicious meat patties made with lentils and spices, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Heat some oil in a pot and sauté the sliced onion until golden.
Add the minced meat and cook until the moisture evaporates.
Pour in two cups of water and let the meat cook thoroughly.
Separately, cook the lentils with water and a pinch of salt, then grind them with the cooked meat.
Mix in the eggs, chickpea flour, salt, and pepper into the meat and lentil mixture.
Heat oil in a frying pan, shape the mixture into patties, and create a small indentation in the center.
Fry the patties in hot oil and arrange them on a plate.

38c2238d-3bd6-4364-8274-37b29601cb8d.name: Shrimp Cutlets
38c2238d-3bd6-4364-8274-37b29601cb8d.description: Crispy and flavorful shrimp cutlets, perfect for a delightful appetizer.
instructions: Boil cleaned shrimp with a little salt in water for 5 minutes, then drain and grind them.
Remove the inner bread from the baguettes, sift it to make it soft and powdery.
Mix all ingredients (except oil) thoroughly.
Heat oil in a pan, take some mixture, shape it into cutlets, and fry until golden.

e1255b80-f887-47c7-9519-2232c4e38d27.name: Vegetable Meatballs
e1255b80-f887-47c7-9519-2232c4e38d27.description: Delicious meatballs filled with herbs and served with rice.
ingredients: Mixed herbs (parsley, dill, green onion, tarragon)
Fried sliced onions, salt, turmeric, and pepper to taste
instructions: Grind the meat with soaked chickpeas and sliced onions.
Mix ground ingredients with herbs, salt, and pepper, then shape into balls.
Fry onions and raisins, then boil water with remaining ground chickpeas and spices.
Form balls with filling and cook in boiling water until firm.
Cook reserved rice with oil until fluffy and serve with meatballs.

76038ddb-b2d2-4930-a74d-fbf463288a2e.name: Harput Meatballs
76038ddb-b2d2-4930-a74d-fbf463288a2e.description: Delicious meatballs infused with herbs and spices, simmered to perfection.
instructions: Peel and wash the onions and parsley, then finely chop them.
Mix onions, parsley, half a tablespoon of tomato paste, pepper, salt, and spices well.
Gradually add the ground meat and mix for about five minutes.
Add bulgur and knead for another 7-8 minutes.
Cover with a damp cloth and wet your hands.
Take a piece of dough the size of half a walnut, shape it into a ball, and make an indentation in the center.
Roll between your thumb and index finger.
Dissolve the remaining tomato paste in water, add oil and salt.
Once boiling, add the meatballs and cook for 35-40 minutes.

e61e85a5-6b93-447e-97e4-6c7849ecded8.name: Izmir Meatballs
e61e85a5-6b93-447e-97e4-6c7849ecded8.description: Delicious meatballs from Izmir, packed with flavor and perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Black pepper, green cumin powder, and red pepper to taste
instructions: Place ground meat in a bowl. Peel, wash, and grate the onion.
Soak the stale bread in water, then squeeze out excess water.
Add onion, soaked bread, egg, salt, and spices to the meat and mix well.
Shape the mixture into walnut-sized oval meatballs.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the meatballs on both sides.
Arrange the meatballs on a plate.
In the same pan, add grated tomatoes, tomato paste, crushed garlic, and halved peppers.
Cover the pan and cook for a few minutes, then add the meatballs to the sauce and simmer for another 7-8 minutes.
Serve with fried potato sticks soaked in the sauce.

d39b6188-64eb-49f2-8e6b-7c5f5ed9f0b3.name: Chicken Pacharski
d39b6188-64eb-49f2-8e6b-7c5f5ed9f0b3.description: Delicious chicken balls with a crispy coating, served with a flavorful tomato sauce.
instructions: Soak the torn baguette in milk until soft, then separate from milk.
Remove bones from chicken breast, grind it, and grind the soaked baguette.
Grate garlic and mix with salt, pepper, and grated nutmeg.
Take a walnut-sized portion, place a walnut piece in the center, and shape into balls.
Roll the balls in breadcrumbs and refrigerate for an hour.
Beat 2 eggs with a little salt and saffron, coat the balls, roll in crushed baguette, and fry in hot oil.
For the sauce, chop tomatoes and cook with herbs, garlic, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.
Sauté chopped mushrooms, strain the tomato mixture, and pour over mushrooms, simmering for 5 minutes.

35ba8ad7-cc52-4773-aab5-db7ad0ef7cd5.name: Soy Cutlet
35ba8ad7-cc52-4773-aab5-db7ad0ef7cd5.description: Delicious soy cutlets packed with flavor and nutrients.
instructions: Soak soy in warm water for 30 minutes and drain.
Grind the soy using a meat grinder.
Slice the onion and fry in oil, adding turmeric.
Boil and grate the potatoes separately.
Mix potatoes and all ingredients except oil with the onion.
Shape the mixture with your hands and fry in hot oil.

9d8b9de6-8e51-47e0-b178-d73d1db876e1.name: Kermani Kofteh
9d8b9de6-8e51-47e0-b178-d73d1db876e1.description: Delicious Persian meatballs simmered in a flavorful broth.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric: to taste
instructions: Wash and grind the rice and raw chickpeas, then mix them.
Add ground meat and eggs to the mixture and stir well.
Chop the onion and fry it in oil, then add tomato paste and turmeric.
After frying, add 6 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Form balls from the initial mixture and add them to the boiling water.
Once the meatballs are set and not breaking apart, reduce heat and cover the pot to cook thoroughly.

9516d163-1265-4a6b-825c-09940e086d61.name: Meat Bread
9516d163-1265-4a6b-825c-09940e086d61.description: Delicious bread filled with spiced ground meat and served with a tangy sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Mix yeast with warm water and sugar until frothy.
Combine the yeast mixture with other ingredients and mix well until smooth.
Cover the bowl and let it rise in a warm place for 1 hour until doubled in size.
Heat vegetable oil until hot, then spoon the mixture into the oil gently until puffed and golden.
For the sauce, mix all sauce ingredients in a pot, heat, and simmer briefly before removing from heat.

396ef968-b448-4211-bd1f-bc0ba767c1fe.name: Kofta with Baguette Dough
396ef968-b448-4211-bd1f-bc0ba767c1fe.description: Delicious meat patties served with a creamy sauce and baguette.
instructions: Let the dough air dry and then grind it into about four cups.
Mix the ground dough with egg yolk, lemon juice, mustard, pepper, thyme, and celery spice.
Add the ground meat and chopped bell peppers to the mixture.
Heat olive oil in a pan and shape the mixture into patties, frying them gently.
In a bowl, mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for the sauce.
Serve the patties topped with the sauce alongside the baguette.

ef3f0387-eb8c-4e8c-a42b-c7254b5a6210.name: Green Fava Bean Meatballs
ef3f0387-eb8c-4e8c-a42b-c7254b5a6210.description: Delicious meatballs made with fava beans and fresh herbs, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, and coriander powder to taste
instructions: Rinse the rice, add salt and turmeric, and cook with just enough water until tender.
Mix the cooked rice with ground meat, cooked wheat, fava beans, herbs, spices, and 1-2 eggs until the mixture is soft.
Fry the onion in a large pot, add turmeric and tomato paste, then bring to a boil.
Shape the mixture into balls the size of tangerines and gently drop them into the boiling water.
Reduce the heat to prevent the meatballs from breaking apart and cover the pot.
Adjust the salt and ensure the broth is not too salty, as it will become saltier when boiling.
After one hour, the meatballs are ready to serve.

84d37dae-f990-454e-af28-edb993010e38.name: Bowl Kofta
84d37dae-f990-454e-af28-edb993010e38.description: Delicious meatballs filled with creamy potato puree, baked to perfection.
instructions: Wash and boil the potatoes for half an hour.
Grate the onions and soak the stale bread, then squeeze out excess water.
Mix the onions, bread, one egg, salt, and pepper with the meat and knead for a few minutes.
Divide the meat into desired portions, shape into bowls, and create a hollow center.
Grease a tray with oil and arrange the kofta on it.
Preheat the oven and bake the kofta for 25 minutes.
In another pot, heat the milk and margarine, mash the potatoes, and mix in salt and the other egg.
Spoon or pipe the puree into the kofta.
Mix the tomato paste with water, heat it, and pour over the tray.
Bake for another 10 minutes. The dish is ready to serve.

cddc54f3-2f1a-46c6-ae4c-94b5ff084b4d.name: Tarkhaneh Meatballs
cddc54f3-2f1a-46c6-ae4c-94b5ff084b4d.description: Delicious meatballs filled with herbs and nuts, simmered in a savory broth.
instructions: Mix ground meat, eggs, 1.5 cups rice, 250-300 g tarragon, and 1 tbsp saffron well.
Add salt, pepper, and turmeric, shape into balls, and fill with fried onions and walnuts.
Combine broth, remaining tomato paste, saffron, cooked rice, and oil, bring to boil.
Once rice dissolves, add meatballs to the broth and cook until fully done.

6a177f45-4177-4a8e-b473-0586b377cff3.name: Chicken Cutlet with Cheese
6a177f45-4177-4a8e-b473-0586b377cff3.description: Delicious chicken cutlets with cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground chicken, cooked potatoes, pizza cheese, grated onion, garlic, salt, pepper, and one egg.
Knead the mixture, add saffron dissolved in hot water, spread in a greased baking dish, and bake at 350°F for 15 minutes.
Let it cool, cut into small rectangles, roll in flour, dip in beaten egg, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry.
Serve decorated with parsley, tomatoes, and lemon.

afb91065-dfec-42ea-ab26-ece1d05d3930.name: Lentil Meat Patties
afb91065-dfec-42ea-ab26-ece1d05d3930.description: Delicious lentil and meat patties, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Cook the chopped meat with one onion and the lentils with another onion.
Grind the cooked meat and lentils, then mix with eggs, cinnamon, salt, pepper, and saffron.
Knead until a firm dough forms, shape into small balls, and make a hole in the center.
Fry in a smaller pan with more oil until golden brown.

d9823e6c-c289-4b86-8f1e-f53d8a6b54b7.name: Chickpea Flour Meat Patties
d9823e6c-c289-4b86-8f1e-f53d8a6b54b7.description: Deliciously spiced meat patties made with chickpea flour and saffron.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Mix ground meat with onion, eggs, chickpea flour, saffron, salt, pepper, and turmeric.
Add water to achieve a thick yogurt-like consistency.
Heat oil and drop spoonfuls of the mixture into the oil, frying until golden on one side, then flip and fry the other side.

80bdf871-c9e4-4766-a599-601b5b6e998b.name: Shami Pickle
80bdf871-c9e4-4766-a599-601b5b6e998b.description: A savory dish of spiced meat patties simmered in a tangy sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion and potatoes, then add eggs one by one.
Fry the mixture in oil until golden brown.
In another pot, melt some butter, add tomato paste, and sauté.
Add water and bring to a boil, then add cinnamon and sour grape juice.
Arrange the patties in the sauce and let them absorb the flavors.
Season with salt, pepper, turmeric, and cinnamon, then cook for 20 minutes.
Top with fried potatoes and serve with rice.

f811ea5d-b7ac-4c49-a6e0-3b41d896047a.name: Russian Meatballs
f811ea5d-b7ac-4c49-a6e0-3b41d896047a.description: Delicious meatballs filled with herbs, walnuts, and barberries, served with tomato sauce.
instructions: Sauté fried onion with ground meat and a bit of oil until moisture evaporates.
Add chopped herbs and tomato paste, sauté briefly, then mix in salt, pepper, turmeric, and saffron water.
Grate cooked potatoes and boiled eggs, combine with the meat mixture.
Shape mixture into small balls, hollow out the center, fill with barberries and walnuts, then form into round meatballs.
Dip meatballs in beaten raw egg and roll in breadcrumbs.
Chill meatballs in the refrigerator for two hours to firm up.
Fry in hot oil and serve with red sauce and tomatoes.

d458cc5c-a6a2-427f-a4bf-488798ff0f73.name: Dietary Meatballs
d458cc5c-a6a2-427f-a4bf-488798ff0f73.description: Healthy and flavorful meatballs made with soy and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Soak soy in milk overnight to change its flavor, then drain.
Grind potato, soy, carrot, mushrooms, and zucchini together.
Remove excess water, mix with egg white, salt, pepper, and whole wheat flour, and knead well.
Grate garlic and onion, sauté with tomato paste, ginger, and spices, then add 3 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Form small walnut-sized balls from the mixture, round them in your hands, and place in boiling water.
Cook the meatballs on low heat until the sauce thickens.
Finally, add sour orange or lemon juice at the end to preserve vitamin C.

42d8777a-16df-4459-a5a6-466fc33b1b54.name: Olympic Shami
42d8777a-16df-4459-a5a6-466fc33b1b54.description: A savory and flavorful Persian dish made with soy and spices.
instructions: Boil water in a pot and add milk with one grated onion until boiling.
Add drained soy to the pot and boil for 20 minutes.
Drain soy and let it cool completely.
Cook lentils with water and turmeric for 30 minutes, then drain.
Grind lentils, cooked chicken, soy, salt, and spices until smooth.
Mix in chopped herbs, egg, and saffron, then knead until sticky.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté remaining onion with turmeric until soft.
Add tomato paste and cook until raw smell disappears.
Pour in 2 cups of boiling water and reduce heat to thicken sauce.
Shape the mixture into patties and place in the sauce, cooking on low heat.
Cover and cook until patties are fully cooked, then serve with desired sides.

d45d5f2e-589b-495b-8335-af47f773b993.name: Gheymeh Kofteh with Sour Grapes
d45d5f2e-589b-495b-8335-af47f773b993.description: A savory meat patty dish topped with tomatoes and sour grapes.
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion, egg, grated potato, salt, turmeric, pepper, and chickpea flour until sticky.
Shape into oval patties and place in a skillet. Layer sliced potatoes and tomatoes on top, add fried onions and sour grapes.
Pour in water, cover, and cook on low heat until done, ensuring about half a cup of water remains.
Mix tomato paste with the remaining water and add during cooking.

bc672a9e-e73b-482b-8b2e-0458aba79419.name: Potato Cutlets
bc672a9e-e73b-482b-8b2e-0458aba79419.description: Crispy potato cutlets served with a flavorful sauce.
instructions: For the sauce, sauté onions and garlic in olive oil for 20 minutes until soft.
Blend the mixture with sugar and pepper, return to the pan, and sauté for another 10 minutes.
Mix grated potatoes with Parmesan, eggs, and flour, shape into cutlets, and fry.
Serve with the sauce and bread.

aa14fae3-8770-4e7c-a987-1c6854682c4f.name: Chicken Meatballs
aa14fae3-8770-4e7c-a987-1c6854682c4f.description: Deliciously seasoned chicken meatballs, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.
instructions: Mix parsley, onion, and spices with the ground chicken.
Shape the mixture into small balls and optionally roll in flour.
Heat enough oil in a pan and fry the meatballs until golden.

7235fb61-2408-46f5-afea-0921975a80a9.name: Chicken and Eggplant Stew
7235fb61-2408-46f5-afea-0921975a80a9.description: A savory stew featuring tender chicken and fried eggplant, bursting with flavor.
instructions: Peel and fry the eggplants in oil, then set aside.
Cut the chicken into desired pieces and sauté with a little oil.
Add tomato paste, fried onion, turmeric, and salt to the chicken and cook until partially done.
Layer the fried eggplants over the chicken and sprinkle unripe grapes on top, then cook until fully done.
Optionally, place small tomatoes on top to cook or fry them in oil and serve around the stew.

ac5e9ea0-d189-4963-8fe8-23163cf3e2f0.name: Okra Stew
ac5e9ea0-d189-4963-8fe8-23163cf3e2f0.description: A savory stew featuring tender meat and fresh okra in a tangy sauce.
instructions: Prepare fried onions and add meat, sauté for about three minutes.
Add 2-3 cups of water and let the meat cook.
Clean and wash okra, then boil in salted water for five minutes.
Drain the okra and set aside.
Once the meat is cooked, add tomato paste, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Add the okra to the stew and let it simmer for another five minutes until ready.

577fdf11-649a-403f-89a8-010c4ad9bb65.name: Chickpea Stew
577fdf11-649a-403f-89a8-010c4ad9bb65.description: A flavorful stew with chickpeas and tender lamb, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Soak chickpeas, peel, and split them in half.
Chop onions and sauté until golden, then add meat and chickpeas with turmeric.
Pour water and cook until partially tender.
Add tomato puree, saffron, and tomato paste.
In the last 15 minutes, add dried limes, salt, pepper, and cinnamon, and optionally rosewater.

49e4610c-d31a-4165-bd56-d741643c1cb7.name: Chicken Curry Stew
49e4610c-d31a-4165-bd56-d741643c1cb7.description: A flavorful chicken curry stew with nuts and aromatic spices.
instructions: Cook the chicken with salt, tomato paste, fried onions, and 3 cups of water until tender.
Add crushed or finely chopped walnuts or almonds to the chicken.
Sauté mushrooms and chopped celery in oil, then add curry powder, saffron, and lemon juice to the stew.
Let the stew simmer until thickened.

6e68e454-e921-4733-955d-75fde08849e2.name: Chicken Curry
6e68e454-e921-4733-955d-75fde08849e2.description: A flavorful chicken curry enriched with spices and peanuts.
instructions: Cook the chicken with salt, turmeric, and partially cooked onion.
Fry one onion, add the chicken, peanuts, and all spices, then let it cook.

11dbab67-61e4-42d2-804e-167e542ebf8c.name: Chickpea Curry Stew
11dbab67-61e4-42d2-804e-167e542ebf8c.description: A flavorful and hearty stew packed with vegetables and spices.
instructions: Chop onion, potato, eggplant, zucchini, carrot, and celery into small cubes.
Heat oil in a pan, mash the onion and garlic, and mix them.
In a small pan without oil, add cumin, paprika, and black pepper (add oil after toasting spices).
Boil chickpeas and then fry them in oil.
Add eggplant to the mixture.
Add zucchini and carrot to the pan.
Add cinnamon stick and curry leaf to the pan.
Finally, add celery to the pan.
Add potato as desired (optional).
Add tomato paste, then saffron, and water, and let it cook for 15 minutes.
Add ginger to the pan for a nice aroma.

fd7b1395-0cff-422e-90d6-2a87275eadd0.name: Shrimp Stew
fd7b1395-0cff-422e-90d6-2a87275eadd0.description: A savory shrimp stew with fresh herbs and tomatoes.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté chopped onion for three minutes.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds, then add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 to 10 minutes.
Stir in parsley and dill, then add shrimp and cook for 10 to 12 minutes until shrimp are done.
Serve the stew with bread, rice, or pasta.

add2e4d2-3843-47aa-ba1e-40afba81b305.name: Red Bean Stew
add2e4d2-3843-47aa-ba1e-40afba81b305.description: A hearty stew with red beans, sausage, and vegetables, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Soak the beans in 4 cups of cold water for 8 hours, then cook them over low heat until tender.
Sauté the onion in oil, add garlic, then celery and bell pepper until well cooked. Add sausage, then the cooked beans and tomato paste, stir well.
Serve the stew over rice in a suitable dish.

b95bfd41-1eab-4f05-8549-870d205471e1.name: Gheymeh Nesae
b95bfd41-1eab-4f05-8549-870d205471e1.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew with tender beef and aromatic spices.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion until golden, then add diced beef and sauté until browned.
Stir in tomato paste and saffron, add water, and simmer until thick.
Add toasted almond slivers and barberries, simmer for 1-2 minutes, then set aside.
Serve the stew over steamed rice.

4ec9ec36-2d4e-40a4-b4c6-32ac61259019.name: Qeymeh Pichak
4ec9ec36-2d4e-40a4-b4c6-32ac61259019.description: A delicious Persian stew with tender meat and flavorful spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, spices, and saffron to taste
instructions: Cook the meat with onions until slightly tender.
Sauté fried onions with almond slivers, then add salt, pepper, spices, and saffron.
Combine with meat and a half cup of water, let simmer for 5 minutes.
Add eggs to the stew based on servings, drizzle saffron on top.
Serve once the eggs are set.

4426211c-1c29-4d7f-9d1d-fa25c9cbfd27.name: Local Gheymé
4426211c-1c29-4d7f-9d1d-fa25c9cbfd27.description: A savory Persian stew with ground meat, lentils, and tangy lemon.
instructions: Grate or finely chop the onions and sauté with butter and saffron.
Add ground meat and fry for 5 minutes.
Add soaked lentils and sauté until they soften.
Stir in tomato paste, add salt, and pour in water.
Bring to a boil, then add sour lemon paste, pepper, and cinnamon.
Reduce heat and let it simmer until cooked.
Fry tomatoes separately and cut potatoes into cubes and fry.
A few minutes before serving, add potatoes to the stew and reserve some for garnish.
Garnish the stew with fried tomatoes and potatoes.

00f1e406-6fda-48a6-ad9f-10d0c8868828.name: Nettle Stew
00f1e406-6fda-48a6-ad9f-10d0c8868828.description: A flavorful stew made with nettles, garlic, and eggs, served over rice.
instructions: Wash the nettle leaves and cook them in a pot with very little water.
Fry the cooked nettles in a pan with oil until crispy.
In another pan, sauté the minced garlic and add the eggs one by one, stirring well.
Combine the egg and garlic mixture with the nettles, season with salt and pepper, and serve with rice.

9b1d50ec-19d1-4994-83f5-940ccb28bf39.name: Barberry Stew
9b1d50ec-19d1-4994-83f5-940ccb28bf39.description: A flavorful stew featuring tender lamb and tangy barberries.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and curry powder to taste
instructions: Sauté onions in oil, then add lamb and a little water; cook for 45 minutes.
Add soaked lentils, then sauté barberries with a bit of sugar and mix in.
Stir in tomato paste, pureed tomatoes, salt, pepper, and turmeric.
Once the stew is ready, add curry powder.

4638aae3-a898-4546-b2ef-aeb6301bcb84.name: Cauliflower Stew
4638aae3-a898-4546-b2ef-aeb6301bcb84.description: A delicious and healthy stew packed with vegetables and spices.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped spinach until wilted.
Add crumbled cheese to the vegetables and cook for 10 minutes until soft.
In a bowl, mix low-fat yogurt and white flour with a fork.
Combine mustard sauce, minced garlic, salt, pepper, and ginger powder, then add to the vegetables.
Allow the mixture to thicken for a few minutes.
Optional: Pre-boil carrots and potatoes before adding to the stew.
Boil water with turmeric, then add cauliflower and cook for a few minutes.

3e7df42e-d4f6-4188-9676-37be9b21bf41.name: Okra Stew with Tamarind
3e7df42e-d4f6-4188-9676-37be9b21bf41.description: A flavorful stew featuring tender meat and fresh okra in a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces, wash, and sauté in 1 tablespoon of oil until coated.
Add 3 cups of water and fried onions, then simmer on low heat.
Wash the okra, trim the ends to prevent mushiness, and lightly fry in 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add tomato paste to the okra, sauté briefly, then season with salt, pepper, and tamarind sauce.
Once the meat is nearly cooked, add the okra and allow to simmer together.
This stew is meant to be less watery.
For added aroma, sauté a small amount of mint and parsley (about 1 cup total is sufficient).
Peel and slice the potatoes thinly, fry them, and use as a garnish.

1115221f-d256-4197-9997-85d245153823.name: Quail Stew with Orange Sauce
1115221f-d256-4197-9997-85d245153823.description: A savory quail stew enriched with a tangy orange sauce.
instructions: Heat oil and sauté finely chopped onion until golden.
Cook quails separately, add to sautéed onion, and stir for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric.
Add Maggi seasoning.
Pour in water and simmer for one hour.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Mix orange juice and cornstarch, heat for 10 minutes while stirring.
Add sugar and continue heating until a thick sauce forms, then add orange peel strips and heat for 5 minutes.
Combine sauce with the stew and heat for another 5 minutes.
Peel and slice the oranges, placing them on top of the quails.
Heat for 2 minutes, then quickly remove orange slices for garnish around the quails.

96d6bb0c-4376-42f4-a7db-6011696fc9c2.name: Cauliflower Stew
96d6bb0c-4376-42f4-a7db-6011696fc9c2.description: A savory stew featuring tender meat and flavorful cauliflower.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground saffron (or 1 tablespoon tomato paste)
instructions: Cut the meat into walnut-sized pieces and wash them.
Combine meat with fried onions in a suitable pot, cover, and cook on low heat, stirring occasionally until the meat releases its juices.
Add 2 cups of water and wait for the meat to cook. If the water evaporates and the meat is not tender, add some warm water.
Add sugar, lemon juice, dissolved saffron in hot water or tomato paste, and season with salt and pepper.
Cut the cauliflower into small walnut-sized pieces, wash them, and add to the meat mixture, stirring well.
Cover the pot and let the cauliflower cook on low heat. Adjust seasoning to taste, balancing sourness and sweetness as desired.
Ensure the stew is not too watery and the cauliflower is not overcooked.

913c93c4-d638-4c4e-ac64-85c1bc8a54d7.name: Quince and Plum Stew
913c93c4-d638-4c4e-ac64-85c1bc8a54d7.description: A savory stew featuring tender meat, quince, and plums for a delightful flavor.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onion until golden.
Cut the meat into medium pieces and sauté with onion for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric.
Add Maggi seasoning.
Pour in water and cook for one hour.
Wash and slice the quince, fry in separate oil, and add to the meat.
Soak lentils in water for half an hour, drain, and add to the mixture.
Soak plums in water for half an hour and add to the mixture.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Add saffron.
Let the stew simmer until well cooked.

f49990d3-e20f-4445-be69-2780a316111b.name: Okra and Eggplant Stew
f49990d3-e20f-4445-be69-2780a316111b.description: A savory stew featuring tender okra and eggplant in a flavorful meat broth.
ingredients: 1 small cup of frozen sour grapes
instructions: Wash and cut the meat into pieces. Slice the onion and sauté in oil until golden.
Add the meat to the sautéed onion and cook until the broth evaporates.
Pour 6 cups of water over the mixture, bring to a boil, then simmer.
Clean the okra, trimming the tops carefully to avoid opening them.
Peel and slice the eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and let sit for about an hour.
Fry the eggplants in plenty of oil until golden, ensuring they don’t darken.
Remove the eggplants and fry the okra until just cooked.
Combine the fried eggplants and okra, then add quartered tomatoes.
Use only meat broth for cooking, adding it to the vegetable mixture.
Add the frozen sour grapes and let the stew simmer until well combined.
Once the meat is cooked, adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Serve with a splash of sour grape juice for added flavor.

41a42866-a5ca-4339-8bce-b9e7969ce04f.name: Cherry Stew
41a42866-a5ca-4339-8bce-b9e7969ce04f.description: A delightful stew combining tender chicken and tart cherries for a unique flavor.
ingredients: Lemon or bitter orange juice to taste
instructions: Place cherries in an enamel pot, sprinkle with sugar, and refrigerate for 3-4 hours.
Cook chicken with onion and 3-4 cups of water, then remove onion and strain the broth.
Shred the chicken and sauté in oil for 6-10 minutes until golden, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add half of the chicken broth to the chicken and simmer with the lid on until slightly thickened.
In the same pot with cherries, add the remaining chicken broth and adjust the tartness with lemon or orange juice.
Cook cherries in the broth for 30 minutes until the liquid reduces.
Add cherries to the chicken and stir gently, then cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes.
Serve with additional lemon or orange juice if desired.

9fa4da42-3ca8-4f7d-97bb-db4432c1fe1e.name: Miniature Celery Stew
9fa4da42-3ca8-4f7d-97bb-db4432c1fe1e.description: A flavorful and healthy stew packed with celery and herbs.
instructions: Wash the chicken, season with salt, and cook with onion and water for 30 minutes.
Finely chop the celery stalks and soak in salted water.
Chop celery leaves, mint, and parsley, then set aside.
Drain the celery and sauté in olive oil with chopped herbs and garlic for 3-5 minutes.
Add turmeric, mix, and turn off the heat.
Remove the onion from the chicken pot and add the sautéed mixture.
Season with black pepper and add water if needed.
Increase heat to bring to a boil, then simmer for 30-45 minutes with the lid on.
In the last 10 minutes, add lemon juice and let it cook uncovered.
Adjust salt and pepper before serving.

c03ac79b-ff14-4de1-a484-085c948db23c.name: Kermanshahi Almond Stew
c03ac79b-ff14-4de1-a484-085c948db23c.description: A rich and aromatic stew with tender meat and fragrant saffron.
instructions: Soften butter at room temperature. Heat oil in a pot and sauté chopped onion with turmeric until soft.
Add tomato paste and chopped meat, sauté until meat changes color. Pour in 3 cups of water and cook for 1.5 hours on medium heat with the lid on.
Soak sliced almonds in warm water for 15 minutes, then drain and soak in saffron solution for 5 minutes.
Add the almond and saffron mixture along with the cinnamon stick to the stew, ensuring water covers ingredients by 2-3 cm.
Reduce heat and simmer for another hour. 30 minutes before finishing, add washed barberries, rose water, and softened butter.
Remove cinnamon stick, adjust salt, and transfer to a serving dish. Serve without excess liquid.

b2f700ef-1508-4b58-bd5b-e49ce2d99249.name: Majlesi Eggplant Stew
b2f700ef-1508-4b58-bd5b-e49ce2d99249.description: A rich and flavorful stew featuring tender eggplants and succulent meat.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and pepper to taste
instructions: Peel the eggplants and make slits on their surface, then soak in salted water for 2 hours.
Rinse, dry, and fry the eggplants in oil until golden.
Sauté chopped onion with turmeric until soft, then add meat and brown.
Add 8-10 cups of water and bring to a boil, then simmer for 2 hours.
Arrange the eggplants in a suitable pot, strain the meat broth over them.
Place the meat in the center, add sour grape juice and unripe grapes.
Top with green peppers, bring to a boil, then add half of the saffron.
Cover and simmer until the stew thickens.
In the last 10 minutes, fry halved tomatoes and place them on top of the eggplants.
Add remaining saffron, cover, and steam for 10 minutes.
Adjust salt and pepper, then serve hot.

07b28973-b34b-4921-b1c0-971e2c578578.name: Sour Sumac Stew
07b28973-b34b-4921-b1c0-971e2c578578.description: A tangy and flavorful chicken stew with sumac and fresh herbs.
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté in oil until soft.
Add chicken and half of the sumac, along with turmeric, salt, and garlic powder. Fry for 15-20 minutes until the chicken changes color.
Add beans with 3-4 cups of water and bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1.5 hours.
Finely chop the herbs and sauté in oil for 7-10 minutes, adding some sumac and turmeric, then turn off the heat.
When the beans are soft, add the herbs, unripe grapes, and sour grape juice to the stew.
Check the stew's water level and add boiling water if needed. Once boiling, add the remaining sumac and let simmer until thickened.
Adjust the salt and seasoning before serving.

ff066536-c6d0-4def-aeba-cef3db2fdd49.name: Orange Stew
ff066536-c6d0-4def-aeba-cef3db2fdd49.description: A delightful stew combining chicken and oranges for a unique flavor.
instructions: Cut the chicken into small pieces and sauté in butter.
Add the peeled and blanched orange peel, water, and salt to the chicken and let it cook.
Peel 6 oranges, removing the thin skin from the segments, and add the flesh to the cooked chicken.
Add sugar and saffron, cooking for a few minutes without breaking the oranges.
Serve the stew and sprinkle pistachio slivers on top.

f370ca12-0d37-4fb9-9903-57a832e0bcf0.name: Shrimp Ghaliyeh
f370ca12-0d37-4fb9-9903-57a832e0bcf0.description: A flavorful shrimp stew with herbs and tamarind, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
1 tablespoon tomato paste or 1 cup tomato juice
instructions: Clean and wash the shrimp thoroughly.
Chop the onion and sauté it with 3 tablespoons of oil.
Add chopped garlic, fenugreek, and coriander to the onion and sauté briefly.
Sauté the shrimp with turmeric, pepper, and salt along with the herbs.
Add tamarind paste and tomato paste (or tomato juice) to the mixture.
Cook the shrimp stew on low heat for 30 minutes.
The dish is ready to serve.

b00cdffe-140d-4fa5-b088-a5a7345e40d4.name: Almond Stew
b00cdffe-140d-4fa5-b088-a5a7345e40d4.description: A rich and flavorful stew with tender meat and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces, wash it, and cook with fried onions and 3-4 cups of water until semi-cooked.
Clean and wash the mint and parsley, drain, chop finely, and sauté in a little oil.
Add the sautéed herbs and almonds to the meat, let the stew simmer until all ingredients are cooked.
Add salt and sourness towards the end of cooking, and serve when the stew is thickened.

d5ce71e4-57f0-4c5d-8292-3d34e24ea2dd.name: Yogurt Stew
d5ce71e4-57f0-4c5d-8292-3d34e24ea2dd.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken stew with yogurt and citrus zest.
ingredients: 1 cup orange or bitter orange peel
instructions: Clean the chicken and place it in a pot with fried onions, salt, and 1-2 cups of water.
Cook until fully done, then add saffron, salt, pepper, and the prepared orange peel.
Remove the chicken, place it on a serving dish, and reduce the heat.
Mix the yogurt until smooth and pour it into the stew, stirring gently.
Immediately pour the mixture over the chicken without boiling.
Optionally, add fried barberries for extra flavor.

88ba1ec4-ed1d-49a4-be5d-f5aeae59e9fe.name: Chicken and Grape Stew with Eggplant
88ba1ec4-ed1d-49a4-be5d-f5aeae59e9fe.description: A savory stew featuring tender chicken, tart grapes, and rich eggplant.
instructions: Peel the eggplants and fry them in oil until golden.
Sauté chopped onions until translucent.
Cook chicken pieces with chopped tomatoes, turmeric, salt, onions, and water until tender.
Add eggplants and grapes to the pot and simmer for 15 minutes on low heat.
Taste before serving to ensure eggplants are cooked through.
Serve with rice or bread.

e4564218-bab5-47e0-abdf-8872738f8338.name: Fish Stew
e4564218-bab5-47e0-abdf-8872738f8338.description: A flavorful fish stew cooked with tomatoes and spices, perfect with rice.
ingredients: Lemon juice and sugar to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute, then add peeled tomatoes.
Stir in thyme and gradually add some water after a minute.
Season with salt and pepper, and let the stew simmer.
Mix vinegar with some water in a suitable container, add fish, cover, and cook on low heat for 5 to 10 minutes.
Pour the stew over the fish and serve with rice.

a4414c86-212a-48f7-a6d1-9d12aa996312.name: Chicken Stew with Okra
a4414c86-212a-48f7-a6d1-9d12aa996312.description: A flavorful chicken stew with tender okra and aromatic spices.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté the chopped onions, then add washed chicken pieces.
Add mixed spices, turmeric, salt, and pepper, stirring until chicken is slightly browned.
Add water and bouillon cubes, cover, and simmer for 1 hour on low heat.
Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for another 45 minutes until the stew thickens.

5ba7eead-f46d-439c-954a-a5e5e77e567c.name: Plum Stew (Khoresh Alu Mosami)
5ba7eead-f46d-439c-954a-a5e5e77e567c.description: A savory and sweet stew with tender meat and plums, perfect with rice.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and spices as needed
Parsley, radish, and tomatoes for garnish
instructions: Cut the meat into large pieces and sauté with one onion, turmeric, spices, and some oil.
Add water and let the meat cook. Chop the carrots into rectangular pieces and sauté in oil.
Add the carrots, dried plums, and salt to the meat.
Finally, add lemon juice, sugar, and saffron, and simmer for about 20 minutes.
Serve the stew in a suitable dish, garnished with radish, tomatoes, and parsley, alongside rice.

02c8fe6a-df3f-48d5-b520-f11636df27a8.name: Tareh Stew
02c8fe6a-df3f-48d5-b520-f11636df27a8.description: A savory stew featuring lamb, herbs, and white beans, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Sauté the lamb and onions in oil, then add the soaked white beans with water to cook.
Chop the tareh and sauté in oil, then layer with cooked meat and beans in a pot, adding salt and spices.
Simmer until the stew is well-cooked and add dried lime to taste.
Fry the potatoes in oil, serve the stew garnished with fried potatoes and tomatoes.

c709c427-38ba-4049-99c6-f0c6004de5d5.name: Chicken Pea Stew
c709c427-38ba-4049-99c6-f0c6004de5d5.description: A flavorful stew with chicken and peas, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Cook the peas in a pot with water until tender.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the onion until golden, then add chicken and cook until partially done.
In a medium pot, combine all ingredients including turmeric, chicken broth, spices, and partially cooked peas, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for one hour.
In the meantime, heat remaining oil and sauté diced eggplant for 10 minutes, then add tomatoes and garlic, cook briefly, and set aside.
After one hour, add the eggplant mixture to the stew and simmer for another 45 minutes. Garnish with mint leaves and serve with plain rice.

af3417a3-aed2-40ae-b745-a39326cada86.name: Zucchini Gheymeh Stew
af3417a3-aed2-40ae-b745-a39326cada86.description: A savory stew with tender lamb, lentils, and sautéed zucchini.
ingredients: Salt, lime powder, and black pepper to taste
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté until golden.
Add the lamb and sauté with the onion.
Add soaked lentils and sauté until raw smell disappears.
Stir in turmeric and tomato paste, sautéing to thicken the stew.
Pour in 3-4 cups of water, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer.
Wash and cut zucchini in half or slices, then lightly fry in oil.
20 minutes before serving, layer fried zucchini on the stew and add saffron, lime powder or lemon juice, black pepper, and salt.
Let the stew finish cooking.

87279b1d-32ee-4f63-ad3b-cdbb3daf185c.name: Ground Meat Stew with Red Beans
87279b1d-32ee-4f63-ad3b-cdbb3daf185c.description: A hearty stew with ground meat, red beans, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Sauté ground meat, onion, green pepper, cooked red beans, green beans, tomatoes, and garlic in a non-stick pot over medium heat.
Add tomato paste, stir continuously for 10 minutes, then mix in the remaining ingredients except cheese and cover for 30 minutes on low heat. Top with cheese before serving.

2ecb357a-16cc-4372-a722-16fd1f8e138a.name: Ratatouille for Two
2ecb357a-16cc-4372-a722-16fd1f8e138a.description: A vibrant vegetable medley baked to perfection with cheese.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons grated pizza cheese or Parmesan
instructions: Chop the onion coarsely and sauté on high heat for 3 minutes.
Add chopped bell pepper and maintain high heat, adjusting oil to prevent sticking.
After 3 minutes, add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add diagonally sliced eggplant and zucchini, cooking for 10-15 minutes without steaming.
Add thickly sliced tomatoes, salt, black pepper, and vinegar, stirring gently for 4-5 minutes.
Sprinkle thyme and chopped basil, cover for a few minutes, then reduce heat to allow evaporation.
