Once cooked, layer the vegetables in a dish and top with cheese while hot.
Garnish with basil leaves before serving.

7872ca39-2f27-425b-8bec-c5017508aee5.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
7872ca39-2f27-425b-8bec-c5017508aee5.description: A delightful blend of sweet honey and tangy vinegar with tender chicken.
instructions: Boil the chicken with one onion for 7 minutes.
Drain the chicken and sauté it in oil.
Mix honey, ginger, red pepper powder, vinegar, lemon juice, chicken broth, and onion, then brush it onto the chicken.
Bake the chicken at 180°C for 45 minutes.
Brush the chicken with the mixture 6 or 7 times during baking.
Remove the skin before serving.

c2d033ba-1407-4ba9-b133-2df5ae2c0b82.name: Lentil Stew
c2d033ba-1407-4ba9-b133-2df5ae2c0b82.description: A hearty lentil stew with tangy dried plums and spices.
instructions: Cook lentils with chopped raw onions.
Add tomato paste, sliced potatoes, spices, salt, pepper, and sour plums, then cook with oil until thickened.

724e035f-1f14-4024-89e1-a6f71cb8ea87.name: Eggplant and Chicken Stew
724e035f-1f14-4024-89e1-a6f71cb8ea87.description: A savory stew featuring tender chicken and flavorful eggplant.
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté it in oil until soft and translucent.
Season the chicken with salt and saffron, then sauté with the onion.
Add turmeric and tomato paste, sauté, then add a cup of water and simmer for 30 minutes.
Peel the eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and let sit for an hour to remove bitterness, then rinse and dry.
Fry the eggplants in oil until golden.
Sauté the sour grapes in a pan, then add the eggplants and grapes to the stew.
Cook for another 15 minutes until well combined. Serve with rice.

ca605b0c-d16e-44c3-a60d-ca4d28635eac.name: Shrimp Stew
ca605b0c-d16e-44c3-a60d-ca4d28635eac.description: A flavorful shrimp stew with potatoes and spices, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Peel the shrimp and remove the back vein, then wash and drain.
Chop the onion and sauté until golden.
Add turmeric and shrimp, sauté for about 2 minutes.
Add the remaining ingredients and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
Top with fried potatoes before serving.

fc3a52e0-6cd2-4204-896e-71ea17095abe.name: Pumpkin Stew with Plums
fc3a52e0-6cd2-4204-896e-71ea17095abe.description: A savory stew combining tender meat, sweet pumpkin, and tangy plums.
ingredients: 500g boneless thigh meat or 750g with bone
Saffron and tomato paste, to taste
instructions: Cut the washed meat into pieces and sauté with fried onion.
Add 4 cups of water and let it simmer.
Wash the plums and add them to the pot to cook.
Add salt, pepper, lemon juice, sugar, dissolved saffron, and tomato paste.
Cut the washed pumpkin into regular pieces, fry both sides in oil, and arrange on the stew.
Pour some sauce over the pumpkin and let it simmer without breaking the pumpkin.

1ced425b-1f59-436b-aaa1-3dd2a2e2a75a.name: Colorful Stew
1ced425b-1f59-436b-aaa1-3dd2a2e2a75a.description: A vibrant and flavorful stew packed with vegetables and tender meat.
instructions: Sauté the meat in a pot with some oil, then add fried onions and set aside.
In a pan, sauté all vegetables except mushrooms with oil, then add mushrooms and stir for five minutes.
Add soy sauce, pepper, and salt, mix well, then add the sautéed meat and a glass of water.
Simmer on low heat for about two minutes, then serve.

c3713b66-a619-4eff-a35a-1dc8faa8305d.name: Duck Fesenjan
c3713b66-a619-4eff-a35a-1dc8faa8305d.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew made with duck and walnut sauce.
ingredients: 3-4 tablespoons sour pomegranate paste or sour plum paste
2-3 stalks of aromatic herbs (chives, mint, coriander, or angelica)
instructions: Grind the walnuts thoroughly after breaking them.
Sauté the grated onion in a pot with some oil, then add the walnuts.
If using duck or goose, add it at this stage along with 3-4 cups of cold water.
Cook on low heat for 5-6 hours until thickened.
Mix the pomegranate or plum paste with a little cold water and add to the stew.
In the last stages of cooking, add finely chopped aromatic herbs and fried eggplants.
Remove from heat and serve with rice.

ec4475ae-8098-4a0e-80ca-fcbe26275df7.name: Curry Stew (Indian Dish)
ec4475ae-8098-4a0e-80ca-fcbe26275df7.description: A flavorful and aromatic curry stew with meat or chicken, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Turmeric, black pepper, red pepper, and salt to taste
instructions: Fry the onions, then add garlic and ginger, sautéing until fragrant.
Add grated tomatoes and cook until the moisture evaporates.
Stir in yogurt and cook until it thickens.
Add spices and sauté briefly, then pour in 2-3 cups of boiling water and let it cook.
Add black pepper and cilantro, allowing it to simmer.
For the meatballs, mix ground meat with grated onion, garlic, ginger, cumin, curry powder, black and red pepper, turmeric, and salt.
Form small meatballs, fry them, and add to the curry to cook through.
Serve the curry in a dish, garnished with cilantro.

551205fc-2f05-402b-8319-a0082302b2d7.name: Rhubarb Stew
551205fc-2f05-402b-8319-a0082302b2d7.description: A tangy and savory stew featuring tender rhubarb and succulent meat.
instructions: Chop the onions and fry them in oil until golden.
Finely chop the meat and mix it with the onions, frying until the meat changes color.
Add 2-3 cups of boiling water and simmer on medium heat for 45 minutes.
Wash the rhubarb carefully and cut it into 3 cm pieces.
Finely chop the onions and parsley and fry them in oil.
Add rhubarb, mint, parsley, sugar, salt, and pepper to the meat and let it simmer for 10 minutes, ensuring the rhubarb doesn't become too soft.

5e70842a-01e2-40a6-a24f-95eb14840755.name: Qeymeh (Nazar Stew)
5e70842a-01e2-40a6-a24f-95eb14840755.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew with meat, lentils, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Wash the lentils and meat, then chop the onion.
Heat oil in a pot and sauté the onion until golden, adding turmeric.
Add the meat and sauté, then mix in the lentils and salt.
After a few minutes, add 2 cups of boiling water and simmer, then add saffron.
Soak the dried limes in hot water, pierce them, and add to the stew.
After 2 hours of simmering, fry the sliced potatoes.
Sauté the tomato paste in oil, add to the stew, then mix in cinnamon before serving.

b0b1e2da-24be-4b2b-8572-0afad0cb93f1.name: Quince Stew
b0b1e2da-24be-4b2b-8572-0afad0cb93f1.description: A flavorful stew with tender meat and sweet-tart quince.
instructions: Wash and slice quinces into crescent shapes, then sauté in oil until soft.
Soak dried plums in water for about 2 hours.
Chop onion and sauté with turmeric until golden, then add meat and sauté until browned.
Add boiling water to the pot, cover, and cook until meat is tender. Add soaked plums after about an hour.
Once meat is cooked, add sautéed quinces and sugar.
Sauté tomato paste in oil separately, then add to the pot and simmer for 15 more minutes.

cbd4aae0-9b43-433a-bb42-369cfed17335.name: Pomegranate Chicken Stew
cbd4aae0-9b43-433a-bb42-369cfed17335.description: A flavorful chicken stew enriched with pomegranate and herbs.
ingredients: 300g mixed herbs (anarijeh, zolang, garlic leaves, coriander, parsley, chives, fenugreek)
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté the chopped chicken.
Add turmeric.
Stir in the stew seasoning.
Pour in the sour pomegranate juice and simmer for 30 minutes.
Finely chop the herbs, sauté separately, and add to the chicken.
Mix in the ground walnuts.
Allow the stew to boil until well cooked.
Taste and add salt if needed.
Add the tomato paste and heat for 15 minutes.

24dc83a9-ec96-4dfd-8c90-751031b35529.name: Bean and Carrot Stew
24dc83a9-ec96-4dfd-8c90-751031b35529.description: A hearty stew with tender meat, beans, and carrots, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté the sliced onion until golden.
Cut the meat into small pieces and sauté with the onion for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric, pepper, and tomato paste, and sauté for 3 minutes.
Add the stew seasoning.
Pour in the water and simmer for one hour.
Cut the green beans into medium pieces, sauté separately in oil for 5 minutes, and add to the stew.
Slice the carrots and add them to the stew, then heat until well combined.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Add saffron and lemon juice, and heat for 5 minutes.
Fry the potato sticks separately in oil and use them to garnish the stew.

4698619a-5e33-4a2a-a980-925582a72cf2.name: Leek Stew
4698619a-5e33-4a2a-a980-925582a72cf2.description: A savory stew featuring tender meat and flavorful leeks, perfect with rice.
instructions: Wash the meat pieces and let them drain. Slice the onion into thin strips.
Heat oil in a pot and sauté the onion until golden. Add turmeric and cook together.
Add the meat to the pot and sauté with the onion and turmeric. Then add 2-3 cups of water and cover to cook.

Meanwhile, clean and finely chop the parsley. Sauté in a pan with some oil. Wash the leeks, separate the stems from the leaves, and slice the white stems into 3 cm pieces. Add to the sautéed parsley and cook for a few minutes.
Add the parsley and leek mixture to the cooked meat. Sauté the tomato paste in a small metal bowl with some oil, then add to the stew.
Reduce heat and let the stew simmer. Towards the end, add sour grape juice, let it boil a few times, then serve with rice.

ee2e7a6a-4558-4ad1-a809-cc4ba0ba3012.name: Cauliflower Stew
ee2e7a6a-4558-4ad1-a809-cc4ba0ba3012.description: A flavorful stew featuring sautéed cauliflower and spiced ground meat.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onions until golden.
Add ground meat with pepper and turmeric, sauté for 8 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and sauté for 3 minutes.
Add the stew seasoning.
Pour in water and heat for 10 minutes.
Wash cauliflower, cut into medium pieces, and sauté separately in oil for 20 minutes.
Add cauliflower to the rest of the ingredients and cook for 15-20 minutes.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Add saffron and lemon juice.
Allow the stew to simmer until well combined.

5cc80feb-abdf-4c12-ae02-0e0d6708c035.name: Spinach and Plum Stew
5cc80feb-abdf-4c12-ae02-0e0d6708c035.description: A savory stew with tender lamb, spinach, and sweet plums.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onion until golden.
Cut the meat into medium pieces and sauté with onion for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric and pepper.
Add the stew seasoning.
Pour in the water and cook for one hour.
Soak the plums in water for half an hour.
Wash and finely chop the spinach, then sauté separately.
Add spinach and plums to the meat.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Add saffron.
Let the stew simmer until well cooked.

7d3ef721-6b13-4fa5-abe9-4a42edaca0cd.name: Yogurt Stew
7d3ef721-6b13-4fa5-abe9-4a42edaca0cd.description: A creamy and flavorful stew made with chicken and yogurt.
ingredients: 1 cup candied orange or bitter orange peel
instructions: Cook the cleaned chicken with fried onions, salt, and 2 cups of water until tender.
Add ground saffron, salt, pepper, and pre-soaked candied peel; simmer briefly.
Remove the chicken, shred it, and reduce the heat.
Whisk the yogurt until smooth and stir it into the stew without boiling.
Serve the chicken in a dish and pour the stew over it.

b8a99b61-d7ff-4d37-b7e3-7b40460768a0.name: Carrot Stew
b8a99b61-d7ff-4d37-b7e3-7b40460768a0.description: A flavorful stew with tender meat, sweet carrots, and a hint of saffron.
instructions: Cook the chicken or meat with fried onions and several cups of water until tender.
Julienne the carrots and fry them in oil, then add them with washed plums to the meat and let it cook.
Add saffron, a little salt, and sugar to the stew and wait until the oil rises to the surface.
For a tangier flavor, add a little lemon juice at the end of cooking.

762f132c-0bf6-40d2-ad67-12ac87350cb9.name: Mint and Parsley Stew with Green Plums
762f132c-0bf6-40d2-ad67-12ac87350cb9.description: A flavorful stew combining tender meat, fresh herbs, and tangy green plums.
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces and cook with fried onions and 4 cups of water.
Chop and sauté the herbs in a little oil, then add to the meat and simmer until cooked.
Wash the green plums and add them to the stew, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Let the stew simmer until thickened, adding lemon juice at the end if desired.

95370e7c-3e92-4092-af8a-59c3ed6bf129.name: Mexican Chicken Stew
95370e7c-3e92-4092-af8a-59c3ed6bf129.description: A flavorful chicken stew with vibrant peppers and fresh herbs.
instructions: Wash and drain the chicken pieces, then cook in water for 20 minutes with salt, black pepper, and turmeric.
Fry the chicken pieces in hot oil until golden, then set aside.
Sauté the grated onion in the oil until golden, then add cilantro and green onions.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add the bell peppers and 2 cups of chicken broth, then mix in the tomato sauce.
Return the fried chicken to the pot and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt, red pepper, spices, and thyme, then serve with rice.

1d6c1630-96d5-47e7-b137-4ef30fcae93a.name: Fesenjan Stew
1d6c1630-96d5-47e7-b137-4ef30fcae93a.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew made with chicken, walnuts, and pomegranate.
instructions: Grind walnuts and sauté in oil until golden, avoiding burning.
Dissolve saffron in hot water.
Chop onion and sauté in oil until golden.
Combine chicken, walnuts, sautéed onion, salt, pepper, saffron water, and water in a pot over low heat.
Alternatively, cook chicken separately with saffron water, then add walnuts, onion, salt, pepper, and water.
For ground meat, mix with grated onion and salt, form small balls, and sauté.
Add pomegranate paste and sugar after some cooking.
If chicken cooks before the stew thickens, remove it and add back later.
Adjust sweetness and sourness with sugar at the end.
Ensure the stew is oily and thick; add cold water if needed.
Longer cooking on low heat enhances flavor and color.

b73acc45-5d4a-444b-b856-cfd1876321e1.name: Ghormeh Sabzi
b73acc45-5d4a-444b-b856-cfd1876321e1.description: A savory Persian stew with tender lamb, lentils, and fragrant spices.
instructions: Soak lentils overnight.
Cut the meat into small pieces.
Drain lentils and let them dry completely.
Sauté lentils in oil and set aside.
Chop onion finely and fry in oil until golden.
Add meat to the fried onion and cook until the meat's moisture evaporates.
Add lentils to the meat.
Pour enough water over the stew.
Pierce the dried lime and add it to the stew.
Sauté tomato paste in a little oil and add it to the stew for color.
Add salt, spices, and saffron, then reduce heat.
Cut potatoes into thin strips and fry in oil.
Once the stew is thickened, add some fried potatoes and let it boil.

c54bef8a-6c7e-43f6-880b-0ec3772fbae3.name: Ghormeh Sabzi
c54bef8a-6c7e-43f6-880b-0ec3772fbae3.description: A flavorful Persian herb stew with tender meat and beans.
ingredients: 750 g of boneless meat (or 1 kg with bone)
100 g of red or black-eyed beans
instructions: Sauté the meat with fried onions.
Add beans and dried limes, then let it cook.
Once the meat is tender, add the sautéed herbs.
Finally, add lime powder and salt; optionally add some sour grape juice.

a4109bfe-3058-46fa-af43-4dc58b6dc612.name: Kermanshahi Almond Stew
a4109bfe-3058-46fa-af43-4dc58b6dc612.description: A rich and flavorful stew with lamb, almonds, and barberries.
instructions: Slice the onions and sauté them in oil until golden.
Cut the lamb and add it to the onions, sautéing briefly before adding turmeric.
Pour in some water and simmer on low heat for one hour until the lamb is partially cooked.
Wash the almonds and lightly sauté them, then add to the lamb with saffron.

Sauté the tomato paste in a bit of oil, then add it to the stew with salt and pepper. After some cooking, add barberries for a tangy flavor and let the stew simmer until the lamb is tender (about two hours).

67ca8695-e6b3-4fdc-9658-5bc61ea3184d.name: Okra Stew
67ca8695-e6b3-4fdc-9658-5bc61ea3184d.description: A flavorful stew with tender lamb and vibrant okra.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onion for 5 minutes.
Add turmeric, pepper, tomato paste, and lamb; sauté for 2 minutes.
Add water and simmer for 1-2 hours.
Incorporate dried limes and adjust salt to taste.
Wash okra, fry separately, and add to the meat.
Stir in saffron and let the stew simmer until well combined.

5bbb98cc-89a4-47cc-82ea-1a03be786280.name: Sour Chicken Stew (Northern Dish)
5bbb98cc-89a4-47cc-82ea-1a03be786280.description: A tangy chicken stew with lentils and fresh herbs, perfect for a cozy meal.
ingredients: Herbed rice with plenty of cilantro
instructions: Cook lentils and chicken in a pot with some water.
Chop and sauté the herbs briefly.
Once the chicken is partially cooked, add the herbs, sour grape juice, tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
Let the stew simmer until fully cooked.

ec2904ab-a173-4523-975d-e53613cce173.name: Mushroom Stew
ec2904ab-a173-4523-975d-e53613cce173.description: A savory mushroom stew with vibrant peppers and rich spices.
instructions: Heat the oil and sauté finely chopped onions until golden.
Add chopped bell peppers and sauté for 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste, curry powder, and mustard.
Pour in the water.
Quarter the mushrooms and sauté separately with lemon juice and salt for 10 minutes.
Combine mushrooms with onions and bell peppers, and sauté for 15 minutes.
Beat the egg yolks with a fork and add pepper.
Remove the pot from heat, add the egg yolks, and mix well.
Taste the stew and add salt if needed.
Let the stew simmer for 5 to 10 minutes to meld the flavors.

7948b106-c115-459b-9f97-163831d290e5.name: Thistle Stew
7948b106-c115-459b-9f97-163831d290e5.description: A savory stew with tender meat and aromatic herbs.
ingredients: 1 small glass of orange juice or lemon juice
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces, wash, sauté with a little oil, and cook with 3 cups of water and fried onions.
Clean and chop the thistle into 2-finger lengths, sauté with oil, then add chopped mint and parsley.
Add dissolved saffron, salt, and pepper to the meat and let it cook until tender.
Adjust the sourness to taste, remove from heat, and serve.

db64aa60-7b7f-4498-be18-130d2850b9c5.name: Celery Stew
db64aa60-7b7f-4498-be18-130d2850b9c5.description: A flavorful Persian stew with tender meat and fresh celery.
instructions: Cut the meat into pieces, wash, and cook with fried onions and 3-4 cups of water.
Separate the tough celery stalks from the green leaves and set aside.
Cut the tender celery stalks into finger-length pieces, wash, and sauté in oil.
Add the sautéed celery to the meat and cook until tender but not mushy.
Add salt, pepper, lemon juice, and ground saffron, then let the stew simmer until thickened.

a0146a3e-c9ad-4a71-9d44-220afd85fd05.name: Baghala Ghatogh
a0146a3e-c9ad-4a71-9d44-220afd85fd05.description: A delicious Gilan stew made with fresh fava beans and herbs.
ingredients: 3 kg fresh green fava beans or 500 g dried fava beans
instructions: Remove the outer skins of fresh fava beans or soak dried beans overnight and peel them.
Sauté fava beans with minced garlic, turmeric, dill, and oil.
Add water to cover the beans and simmer gently until cooked.
Crack the eggs into the stew, cover, and let them set.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve with rice, smoked fish, or olives.

02d5713c-40a7-40a2-9858-8fd77c69a7b3.name: Almond Stew
02d5713c-40a7-40a2-9858-8fd77c69a7b3.description: A rich and flavorful stew featuring tender beef and almonds.
instructions: Cut the beef into small pieces.
Soak the sliced almonds in water for a few hours.
Finely chop the onion and sauté in a little oil.
Add the beef and sauté for a few more minutes.
Stir in the dissolved saffron.
Add three cups of water and the soaked almonds, and let it cook until the beef is tender.
A quarter of the way through cooking, sauté the barberries and tomato paste in a little oil, then add to the stew along with the dried limes.

018fae47-23a5-47d3-9f32-41bb6e2ee610.name: Eggplant Moutabal
018fae47-23a5-47d3-9f32-41bb6e2ee610.description: A creamy and flavorful eggplant dip, perfect for appetizers.
instructions: Wash the eggplants thoroughly and bake them in the oven for 1.5 hours.
Remove from the oven, peel, and mash in a bowl.
Add kashk, tahini, lemon juice, garlic powder, and olive oil, and mix well.
Transfer to a serving dish, smooth the top with olive oil, and garnish with olives.

402ae909-bb7a-41b9-9761-a80c27ca43fe.name: Green Plum Stew
402ae909-bb7a-41b9-9761-a80c27ca43fe.description: A tangy and flavorful stew featuring tender meat and fresh green plums.
instructions: Chop and wash the meat, then slice the onion thinly.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pot and sauté the onion until golden.
Add the meat and sauté, then add 3 to 4 cups of water.
Simmer until the meat is tender.
Sauté the mint and parsley in the remaining oil and add to the stew once the meat is partially cooked.
Wash the green plums and add them to the stew.
Cook until the stew thickens; add lemon juice if the plums are not sour enough.
For off-season preparation, freeze or brine green plums for later use.

3cbf02c6-b13d-41eb-aca0-35046efcbe27.name: Zucchini and Eggplant Stew
3cbf02c6-b13d-41eb-aca0-35046efcbe27.description: A flavorful stew featuring tender zucchini and eggplant in a rich sauce.
instructions: Chop vegetables and sauté onions until golden.
Add zucchini and eggplant, cook until tender.

d892e9f0-e3d7-4da2-a8b2-e185e084329a.name: Qeymeh Stew with Ground Meat
d892e9f0-e3d7-4da2-a8b2-e185e084329a.description: A savory Persian stew with lentils and ground meat, perfect over rice.
instructions: Soak lentils for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
Finely chop the onion, add salt and turmeric, and sauté until golden.
Add ground meat to the golden onion and sauté.
Cover the pan to allow the meat to cook slightly.
Add soaked lentils, pierced dried limes, and tomato paste, then sauté.
Pour in water and bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer.
Add salt, pepper, turmeric, and saffron 30 minutes before finishing.
Garnish with fried potatoes, eggplant, or tomatoes, and serve with rice.

e6a25113-ec41-459c-8943-1fe4182f0e29.name: Fish Curry
e6a25113-ec41-459c-8943-1fe4182f0e29.description: A flavorful fish curry with coconut and spices, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Marinate fish fillets with turmeric, salt, and lemon juice.
Sauté onion and garlic with oil and cumin for 2 minutes.
Add fish and curry powder, then mix in tamarind extract and water.
Cook on high heat with the lid on for 5 minutes.
Finally, mix cream, coriander, cashew powder, and coconut powder into the dish and cook for another 2 minutes.

fbd76b07-e6f4-4031-b7a9-477e9a4f5bd5.name: Almond Blossom Stew
fbd76b07-e6f4-4031-b7a9-477e9a4f5bd5.description: A flavorful stew featuring tender meat and fresh almond blossoms.
ingredients: ½ cup lemon juice and sour grape juice
instructions: Prepare a pot and heat some cooking oil in it.
Sauté sliced onions with turmeric until golden.
Add stew meat and almond blossoms, sauté together.
Pour in 4 cups of water, add salt and pepper, and simmer.
Chop mint and parsley, sauté in oil.
Once meat is partially cooked, add the sautéed herbs.
Add sour seasoning 15-30 minutes before serving.
Serve with rice.

5412c73f-f519-4aef-9da2-a6b20d41bb28.name: Simple Shrimp Stew
5412c73f-f519-4aef-9da2-a6b20d41bb28.description: A delightful shrimp stew with potatoes and a blend of spices.
instructions: Peel the shrimp and remove the intestinal vein, then wash and drain.
Chop the onion and sauté until golden.
Add turmeric and shrimp, sauté for about 2 minutes.
Add the remaining ingredients and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
Top with fried potatoes before serving.

d7d36527-65a3-4d37-9ecd-9d9013108bc2.name: Pumpkin Stew (Dietary)
d7d36527-65a3-4d37-9ecd-9d9013108bc2.description: A healthy and flavorful pumpkin stew perfect for a light meal.
ingredients: Salt and pepper, turmeric to taste
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in olive oil.
Peel and chop the pumpkins, then add them to the onions and sauté until golden.
Add turmeric, salt, pepper, and tomato sauce, then stir.
Chop the carrots and add them to the mixture, stirring gently.
Add 2 cups of water and lemon juice, then simmer on low heat.
Ensure the stew has no more than half a cup of water at the end.
If the stew runs out of water and the vegetables are undercooked, add a little more water.
Optionally, add some crushed sumac for extra flavor.
For a lighter version, cook the onions in water instead of oil.
Chopped dill can also be added to the stew.
Serve the stew with rice.

cd119c1a-7b0b-47f5-afe7-16bcb568fccd.name: Plum Stew
cd119c1a-7b0b-47f5-afe7-16bcb568fccd.description: A savory stew featuring tender chicken and sweet dried plums.
instructions: Wash the plums and soak them in two cups of water.
Cook the chicken with fried onions, lentils, and 2-3 cups of water until partially cooked, adding salt.
Add the plums with their soaking water to the stew and let it simmer until the chicken and plums are cooked through.
Dissolve saffron in a little boiling water, mix with sugar, and add to the stew.
Once the stew is oily, serve it, placing the chicken whole or in pieces.
For better texture, lightly fry the lentils with fried onions before adding them to the chicken.

82372dda-d80e-4fea-81ae-aff7ed178251.name: Simple Chicken Stew
82372dda-d80e-4fea-81ae-aff7ed178251.description: A flavorful chicken stew with crispy potatoes, perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: In a pot, combine chicken, chopped onion, garlic, and 2 cups of water over low heat.
Add salt, pepper, and cinnamon, and let the chicken cook for 30 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and lemon juice, and simmer for another 45 minutes on low heat.
Slice and fry the potatoes until crispy.
Serve the chicken in a dish, topped with fried potatoes.
If the stew is too dry, add a little water; it should have no more than 1 cup of liquid when done.
For a healthier option, add sliced potatoes after 30 minutes of cooking the chicken.

10241e88-2736-4e8e-a6ae-0f3a2d9ac17f.name: Cherry and Apple Stew
10241e88-2736-4e8e-a6ae-0f3a2d9ac17f.description: A delightful stew combining tart cherries and apples with tender meat.
ingredients: Turmeric, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Sauté the meat with turmeric and fried onion in oil, then add water and let it cook.
Peel and chop the apple, fry it in oil, then fry the cherries.
Add both the apple and cherries to the cooked meat with saffron, salt, and pepper.
Adjust the stew's water and let it simmer.
Before serving, add lemon juice and sugar, and let it boil a few more times.
Serve the stew in a suitable dish with rice.

d7201b44-102e-4e23-9e51-d3b8a31e8747.name: Chicken and Plum Stew
d7201b44-102e-4e23-9e51-d3b8a31e8747.description: A savory stew combining tender chicken and sweet plums.
instructions: Fry the onion in oil, then add lentils and sauté briefly.
Add chopped chicken, season with salt, pepper, and turmeric, and cook until chicken is done.
Once the chicken is cooked, add the plums and let the stew simmer.

a23f7d66-4a3f-4b97-a9e4-3ea028c873fc.name: Maharaja Stew
a23f7d66-4a3f-4b97-a9e4-3ea028c873fc.description: A rich and aromatic chicken stew with coconut and spices.
ingredients: 2-3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint and cilantro
1 cup extra chicken broth (or 1 soup cube)
instructions: Clean the chicken and wash it, then place it in a pot with fried onions, 2-3 cups of water, and the extra chicken broth.
Add cloves and cook until the chicken is half done, then remove the cloves.
Chop the bell peppers and add them along with coconut and other spices to the chicken.
Dissolve chickpea flour in a little cold water and add it to the stew.
Fry mint and cilantro in a few tablespoons of oil and add to the stew, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Let the stew simmer until thickened.
Pour boiling water over the tomatoes, peel them, grate, and add to the stew.
Allow the stew to simmer until the liquid reduces to a consistency similar to Fesenjan.
Serve the chicken whole or in pieces, pouring the stew over it. Optionally, add saffron dissolved in boiling water for color.

331c5df7-21c9-41b3-81a0-508c03723b6e.name: Rainbow Stew
331c5df7-21c9-41b3-81a0-508c03723b6e.description: A colorful and flavorful chicken stew with vibrant vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, then sauté chicken and fried onion together.
Remove chicken and onion, sauté bell pepper, then add carrots and celery.
Add mushrooms and diced tomatoes, stir until cooked.
Return chicken and onion to the pan, add soy sauce, and sauté briefly.

0dfcf782-d5ed-4890-8f0b-5b1c629f2ff9.name: Cauliflower Stew with Garlic
0dfcf782-d5ed-4890-8f0b-5b1c629f2ff9.description: A savory stew featuring tender cauliflower and aromatic garlic, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Chop the cauliflower and wash it thoroughly, then sauté in oil.
Peel and wash the garlic, cut each clove in half, and fry slightly in oil.
Mix ground meat with a small onion, salt, and pepper, then form into small balls and sauté with fried onions.
Add tomato paste to the meat and sauté briefly, then add 2 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Add the fried garlic, sautéed cauliflower, salt, pepper, lemon juice, and saffron to the stew.
Let the stew simmer on low heat for about 30 minutes until it thickens.

ac2e0804-6798-487a-ab47-e0c2b9196468.name: Tips for Various Stews
ac2e0804-6798-487a-ab47-e0c2b9196468.description: Essential tips for making delicious and perfectly cooked Persian stews.
instructions: Cook stews over low heat to maintain texture.
Avoid stirring too much to keep ingredients intact.
Add herbs after the meat is cooked.
Season according to personal taste.
Ensure the stew is thick and not watery.
Fry onions until golden without burning.
Add salt and sour ingredients towards the end.
Cook meat slowly in a covered pot before adding vegetables.
Leave the pot uncovered to evaporate excess water.

e5015516-a745-418a-aa88-05fd10ec553e.name: Jafari Ghormeh
e5015516-a745-418a-aa88-05fd10ec553e.description: A savory Persian stew with ground meat, herbs, and fried eggplants.
ingredients: 1 cup pomegranate juice or sour grape juice
instructions: Wash and finely chop the herbs, then sauté in oil and simmer with 2-3 cups of water until partially cooked.
Grate the onion into the ground meat, add salt and pepper, and form small meatballs the size of a walnut.
Sauté the meatballs in a little oil and add them to the partially cooked herbs.
Pour in the sour juice and let it simmer together.
Once the herbs and meat are fully cooked and the stew has released its oil, layer the fried, peeled eggplants on top.
Let it simmer for a couple of minutes without breaking the eggplants.

bc0398ec-1ea8-4177-9035-123bceef9b05.name: Eggplant Stew
bc0398ec-1ea8-4177-9035-123bceef9b05.description: A rich and flavorful stew with beef and eggplant, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Cut the beef into large pieces.
Slice two onions and sauté with the beef, adding a little water to simmer until 1.5 cups of broth remains.
Slice the remaining onion, and chop the garlic and almond slivers.
Sauté the onion and garlic in butter.
Mix the yogurt and saffron, then add to the pot with the sautéed onion and garlic.
Let the stew simmer, then add almond slivers and vinegar.
After 5 minutes of boiling, the stew is ready.

df39444e-196a-43de-8638-963d52c51696.name: Mexican Chicken Stew
df39444e-196a-43de-8638-963d52c51696.description: A flavorful chicken stew with vibrant peppers and fresh herbs.
ingredients: Salt and red pepper, to taste
instructions: Wash and drain the chicken pieces, then cook them with water for 20 minutes on low heat, adding salt, black pepper, and turmeric.
Strain the chicken and set aside the broth.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the chicken pieces until golden, then drain excess oil.
Sauté the grated onion in the oil until golden.
Add cilantro and green onions, stirring well.
Mix in the tomato paste and let it cook for 3-4 minutes on low heat.
Add the chopped bell peppers.
Pour in 2 cups of chicken broth and add the tomato puree, mixing well.
Add the fried chicken pieces and simmer for 15-20 minutes on low heat.
Finally, season with salt, red pepper, mixed spices, and thyme powder, stirring gently.
Serve the stew with rice.

ee251745-84f1-48e9-9bce-3aae97f436b1.name: Basil Stew
ee251745-84f1-48e9-9bce-3aae97f436b1.description: A fragrant and flavorful stew with tender meat and fresh herbs.
ingredients: 750g fresh herbs (basil, mint, cilantro, green onion, parsley)
a pinch of turmeric or tomato paste
instructions: Chop the meat into pieces slightly larger than walnuts, wash, and place in a pot.
Add fried onions, cover, and cook on low heat, stirring occasionally until the meat releases its juices and the onions soften.
Pour in 3-4 cups of water, reduce heat, and simmer until the meat is partially cooked.
Clean, wash, and chop the herbs, then sauté them in a bit of oil with turmeric.
Add the herbs to the meat, season with salt and pepper, and adjust the sourness.
If using tomato paste, add it with the other ingredients and let the stew cook until the meat and herbs are tender.
Peel the eggplants, make a slit in each, and sprinkle with salt.
Heat the remaining oil in a pan and fry the eggplants until golden on low heat.
Drain excess oil and arrange the eggplants on top of the stew, ensuring they remain intact.
Serve the stew with the meat and herbs in a dish, garnishing with fried eggplants and optionally diced tomatoes for decoration.

f6770cca-3061-408c-84f1-48b196eaba3b.name: Sour Chicken Stew (Northern Dish)
f6770cca-3061-408c-84f1-48b196eaba3b.description: A tangy and flavorful chicken stew with herbs and spices.
ingredients: Herbed rice with plenty of coriander
instructions: Cook lentils and chicken with some water.
Chop and sauté the herbs.
Once the chicken is partially cooked, add herbs, sour grape juice, tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and let the stew simmer.

8bcacac7-6bed-46b2-8846-b0ad676cfeb5.name: Gilan Garlic Stew
8bcacac7-6bed-46b2-8846-b0ad676cfeb5.description: A flavorful Gilan dish featuring fresh garlic leaves and tender meat.
ingredients: ½ or 1 small chicken or duck
Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Wash the garlic leaves and chop them into half-centimeter pieces.
Sauté the garlic leaves with turmeric, add the chicken or duck to cook with split peas, and finally stir in the eggs.

115e7256-ce42-4573-9562-92d0fbc79c75.name: Indian Yogurt Stew
115e7256-ce42-4573-9562-92d0fbc79c75.description: A flavorful chicken stew cooked with yogurt and spices, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Clean and wash the chicken, then cook it with one cup of water and fried onions over low heat.
Clean, wash, and finely chop the coriander. Sauté garlic with coriander in a little oil and add to the chicken.
Add cumin and dissolve saffron in a little boiling water, pouring half into the chicken.
Season with salt and pepper, allowing some liquid to remain. Remove the chicken, cool slightly, and cut into pieces, discarding large bones.
Return the chicken to the pot, reduce heat, mix yogurt with remaining saffron and a little salt, then stir into the chicken.
Ensure the stew does not boil after adding yogurt; it should only heat through to prevent curdling.
If the chicken is not cooked with the specified water, add a little more water.
This stew can also be made with meat; 500 grams of boneless meat is sufficient, but it requires more water for cooking.

9653829c-8c57-4575-9b38-19224c92c3a8.name: Golden Puff
9653829c-8c57-4575-9b38-19224c92c3a8.description: A delicious layered dish with spiced meat and creamy mashed potatoes.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, and saffron to taste
instructions: Sauté chopped onion in oil, then add meat, garlic powder, and turmeric.
Add sliced bell pepper, tomato paste, salt, and pepper, and cook.
Set meat aside, mash boiled potatoes with salt, pepper, garlic powder, saffron, and melted butter.
Grease a dish, spread half the mashed potatoes, layer with meat, and pipe remaining potatoes on top.
Drizzle with melted butter and bake at 350°C until golden.

9ea1ca4a-23b9-4fa5-8004-7a95277ecddb.name: Meat and Vegetable Roll
9ea1ca4a-23b9-4fa5-8004-7a95277ecddb.description: A delicious roll filled with seasoned meat and vegetables.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté in oil until golden.
Add ground meat and sauté, then add lemon-coated mushrooms and diced bell pepper.
Mix in salt, pepper, turmeric, and tomato paste, then remove from heat and stir in Parmesan and parsley.
Beat the eggs and pour into a greased pan, then add the meat mixture in the center and fold the eggs over.
Transfer to a dish and garnish with various herbs.

1aeddf12-379d-43f3-bb8c-4cd6896727b2.name: Meat Crepes
1aeddf12-379d-43f3-bb8c-4cd6896727b2.description: Delicious crepes filled with savory meat and herbs.
instructions: Beat the eggs, then add salt, pepper, and milk, mixing well.
Gradually add flour while stirring to avoid lumps; strain if necessary.
Pour oil into a pan and spread the batter evenly.
Once set, remove from heat to cool, then add pasta mixture and roll.
Cook on low heat for 5-6 minutes until crepes firm up.
Serve on a plate, gently separating edges if stuck.

b0bc7f9e-2cc6-4271-a3ce-ad030f923958.name: Filet Steak Pizzaiola
b0bc7f9e-2cc6-4271-a3ce-ad030f923958.description: Tender beef filet topped with a savory tomato and olive sauce.
instructions: Slice the beef filet into three pieces, marinate in olive oil, salt, and pepper for two hours.
Sauté onions in oil for three minutes, add garlic, then mushrooms and olives, cooking for another three minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and ground tomatoes, simmer on low heat for ten minutes, then add thyme, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan, grill each filet for four minutes on each side, serve with warm sauce, herbs, and potatoes.

3cc1b1f7-7f53-4463-a144-74112c8afc95.name: Meat Roll
3cc1b1f7-7f53-4463-a144-74112c8afc95.description: A savory meat roll filled with herbs and spices, baked to perfection.
instructions: Mix breadcrumbs, eggs, baking powder, milk, salt, and saffron, then combine with ground meat.
Add parsley, barberry, and tomato paste, pour into a greased rectangular mold, and bake at 150°C until golden.

a8906cac-57a8-4ee8-ad36-50343587ef54.name: Steak with Mint and Lemon
a8906cac-57a8-4ee8-ad36-50343587ef54.description: A flavorful lamb steak marinated with fresh mint and zesty lemon.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix all ingredients except the meat and coat the steaks in the mixture.
Cover and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.
Remove the meat from the marinade and grill or pan-fry over medium heat.
Baste the meat with the marinade occasionally while cooking.
Garnish the finished steak with fresh mint leaves.

36ce9387-0803-4727-8a73-8d2c66d72452.name: Meatballs
36ce9387-0803-4727-8a73-8d2c66d72452.description: Delicious meatballs in a creamy white sauce, perfect with boiled potatoes.
instructions: Mix ground beef with grated onion, salt, and pepper.
Add grated cheese, breadcrumbs, milk, and olive oil; knead well.
Incorporate chopped parsley and form into balls.
Fry the meatballs in hot oil until golden.
In a pot, combine flour, salt, milk, and olive oil to make a white sauce.
Pour the white sauce over the fried meatballs and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Serve with boiled potatoes.

a36fb17b-7cb8-444f-9a6d-51f87d6756a2.name: Sparrow Head
a36fb17b-7cb8-444f-9a6d-51f87d6756a2.description: A delicious meatball dish with potatoes and optional pasta.
ingredients: Turmeric, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Mix minced meat with onion and salt, forming small balls.
In a pot, combine fried onion, tomato paste, turmeric, and salt, adding water.
Add meatballs and diced potatoes to boiling water, optionally adding pasta.
Cover and simmer until water reduces to about one cup. Your dish is ready!

ff275e51-13ed-473f-b95d-bb73654fd9ac.name: Two-Colored Roll (Meat and Chicken)
ff275e51-13ed-473f-b95d-bb73654fd9ac.description: A delicious meat and chicken roll filled with herbs and nuts.
ingredients: Cinnamon, pepper, and curry powder to taste
instructions: Grind one onion and mix it with the minced beef and chicken, then season with spices and salt.
For the sauce, grind the second onion, sauté it, add tomato paste, then season with salt, pepper, spices, and lemon juice, and bring to a boil with two cups of water.
Lay the aluminum foil on a flat surface and coat it with two tablespoons of oil to prevent sticking.
Spread the minced beef to a thickness of 1.5 cm, then add the minced chicken on top, flattening it.
Sprinkle parsley, carrot, barberries, and walnuts on top, roll it from one side, and seal the ends of the foil.
Place the roll back in the foil and let it simmer in the sauce for 1.5 hours on low heat.
Remove the roll, unwrap the foil, and slice after cooling.

1255ec1b-d9d4-4102-8566-0493fb4e25d3.name: Chicken and Meat Roll
1255ec1b-d9d4-4102-8566-0493fb4e25d3.description: A delicious roll filled with minced chicken and beef, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Grate one onion into the minced meat, add parsley, salt, and pepper, and spread it on plastic wrap.
Mix the grated onion with minced chicken and spread it on top of the meat, roll it up like a log.
Fry both sides in a pan and slice to serve. Garnish with pickles, tomatoes, and fresh lemon.

76daf564-ef8a-49f6-8102-c45b7ee7d191.name: Meat Pie
76daf564-ef8a-49f6-8102-c45b7ee7d191.description: A savory pie filled with minced meat and vegetables, baked to perfection.
instructions: Warm the milk, add salt and yeast, and let it rise for a minute.
Add oil and flour until the dough is non-sticky, cover, and let it rest for 4-5 minutes.
Prepare the filling by mixing minced meat, sautéed mushrooms, parsley, thyme, bell pepper, boiled carrot, tomato, potato, and cheese.
Roll out the dough in pie molds, fill with the mixture, sprinkle cheese on top, and bake at 175°C for 30 minutes.

3b19ec43-f902-4a5e-aa52-fdfbe96edf30.name: Pepper Steak
3b19ec43-f902-4a5e-aa52-fdfbe96edf30.description: A deliciously seasoned beef steak with a creamy pepper sauce.
instructions: Crush the black peppercorns and rub them on both sides of the steaks.
Heat butter, olive oil, and minced garlic in a pan, then fry the steaks for 6-7 minutes to desired doneness.
Keep the cooked meat warm in a covered dish and remove burnt bits from the oil.
Add beef broth, lemon juice, and cream to the oil and simmer for 5 minutes until reduced by a third.

84f09dc6-b95f-4cfd-b172-7e9375650972.name: Meat Dish with Eggs
84f09dc6-b95f-4cfd-b172-7e9375650972.description: A savory meat dish enriched with eggs and spices, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Sauté onion, pepper, and meat in oil, then mix in the remaining ingredients thoroughly.
Grease a dish with a little oil, shape the mixture into a rectangle, and bake for one hour at 170°C. Optionally, brush the top during baking. Serve decorated with extra tomato sauce.

ba8e67da-f4d6-4704-89fd-fe8d6ab32205.name: Meat and Chicken Roll
ba8e67da-f4d6-4704-89fd-fe8d6ab32205.description: A savory roll filled with tender meat and chicken, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix ground meat and chicken with spices, onion, and garlic.
Shape the mixture into a roll and bake until cooked.

6ee2e9c2-d73b-48ee-801f-86286c81547b.name: Meat Kebab
6ee2e9c2-d73b-48ee-801f-86286c81547b.description: A flavorful meat dish with spices and pistachios, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: 1 kg ground beef with some fat
Spices (1 tsp each of complete spice mix, cardamom, nutmeg, salt, and pepper)
instructions: Mix ground beef with garlic, onion, dry milk, spices, and oil.
Add chopped pistachios and massage the mixture well.
Stuff the mixture into a thin cleaning bag, seal tightly, and steam for 2 hours.
Cool and freeze for next day use, then slice and serve with spicy curry sauce.

68304f04-c295-4451-81b6-5f763d0011a7.name: Cheese Stuffed Beef Fillet with Vegetables
68304f04-c295-4451-81b6-5f763d0011a7.description: A delicious beef fillet stuffed with cheese and served with sautéed vegetables.
instructions: Open the beef fillet flat and spread two teaspoons of cheese on it.
Place another piece of beef on top, seal the edges, and season with crushed pepper.
Heat a cast iron skillet and add half a tablespoon of oil.
Cook the fillet in the skillet until well done.
Garnish with boiled vegetables and sautéed mushrooms.
Optionally, use lettuce, parsley, and tomatoes for decoration.

f5a08927-6504-497a-8a6e-20c4b96ad081.name: Three-Color Meat Roll
f5a08927-6504-497a-8a6e-20c4b96ad081.description: A delicious layered meat roll with potatoes and herbs, baked to perfection.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion, salt, pepper, and one egg, then knead well.
Spread the mixture on greased aluminum foil to a thickness of 1 cm.
Layer potato mixture (potatoes, 2 eggs, salt, and pepper) on top of the meat.
Spread the herb mixture (herb mix, 2 eggs, salt, and pepper) over the potato layer.
Roll using the foil and place in the oven at 180°C for one hour.

d4433f19-a72e-41bb-aee3-927820ba6cf8.name: Lamb Stew in a Clay Pot
d4433f19-a72e-41bb-aee3-927820ba6cf8.description: A hearty lamb stew with fresh vegetables, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: Salt and black and red pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven.
Cut the lamb into 2-3 cm pieces.
Wash and chop the green beans into large pieces.
Chop the potatoes, peppers, and tomatoes into large chunks.
Slice the garlic and onions.
Grease the clay pot with 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add the lamb and thyme to the pot.
Layer the green beans, onions, zucchini, peppers, potatoes, and tomatoes on top of the meat.
Add oil, salt, and pepper over the vegetables, then close the pot (seal edges with dough to retain steam).
Bake at 160°C for 1 to 1.5 hours (do not exceed 2 hours to avoid burning).
Serve in the pot directly from the oven.

cc3a0032-10df-444a-9ba5-9d8af740b81b.name: Meat Snack
cc3a0032-10df-444a-9ba5-9d8af740b81b.description: Delicious meat sandwiches with creamy mushroom sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Slice the cooked meat into thin pieces.
Melt butter in a pan, add flour, and gradually stir in milk.
Add mushrooms and salt, then remove from heat once thickened.
On a slice of bread, place a piece of meat, a tablespoon of sauce, a slice of cheese, and some chopped parsley.
Top with another slice of bread and cook the sandwiches in a device for 5 to 7 minutes.

e85b255a-2947-4641-8e1e-b684c6d61f40.name: Stuffed Lamb Leg with Mushrooms
e85b255a-2947-4641-8e1e-b684c6d61f40.description: Tender lamb leg stuffed with garlic and served with a rich mushroom sauce.
instructions: Wash the meat and insert garlic cloves into it using a sharp knife.
Rub butter on both sides of the meat and place it in a pot with some water to cook on low heat.
When the water evaporates, add more water to ensure the meat cooks and browns, repeating this until fully cooked.
Strain the remaining meat juice and add it to the sautéed tomato paste and mushrooms, allowing it to simmer.
Place the meat on a serving dish, pour the sauce over it, and garnish with cooked beans, carrots, and fried potatoes.

0f5af92a-e016-4d59-b0b7-748e1ccdee40.name: Meat Roll with Cheese
0f5af92a-e016-4d59-b0b7-748e1ccdee40.description: Delicious meat rolls filled with cheese and spinach, perfect for sandwiches.
instructions: Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the ground meat and chopped onion until browned.
Add spinach, milk, cheese, lemon juice, salt, and nutmeg; stir well and cover, then turn off the heat.
Melt butter in another pan, slice the meat thinly, and sauté for 18 minutes.
Mix all ingredients together and serve in your choice of bread as a sandwich.
Note: This mixture can be stored in the freezer for up to 3 months.

6b89b07e-ad3e-4360-ba2d-fb6fa44ea378.name: Meatballs with Vegetables
6b89b07e-ad3e-4360-ba2d-fb6fa44ea378.description: Delicious meatballs served with fresh vegetables and a tangy dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop the lettuce, then mix with chopped carrots, bell peppers, vinegar, and salt.
In another bowl, mix ground meat, butter, and garlic, then add meat spice and form small meatballs.
Sauté the meatballs for 3 minutes.
Mix water, vinegar, and hot peppers, pour over meatballs, and sauté for another 3 minutes.
Serve meatballs over the vegetable mixture and refrigerate for 24 hours.

ed9f4e43-1506-477e-9c22-6e39d7d64306.name: Steak with Vegetables
ed9f4e43-1506-477e-9c22-6e39d7d64306.description: A delicious steak dish served with sautéed vegetables and rice.
instructions: Grate the onion and mix it with lemon juice, then marinate the meat in it for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan, fry the marinated meat on medium heat, adding salt and pepper to taste.
After 3 minutes, remove the meat and sauté the carrots and broccoli with the chopped onion.
Mix all ingredients together and cook on low heat for 25 minutes.
Wash the rice and cook it as desired.
Serve the cooked meat and vegetables with the rice for lunch.

37f11310-2272-4db9-aadd-80c446d7b2c5.name: Colorful Meat Dish with Rice
37f11310-2272-4db9-aadd-80c446d7b2c5.description: A vibrant and flavorful meat dish served with rice.
instructions: Cut the meat into thin strips and season with salt and pepper.
Peel and chop the garlic.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté the chopped onion for 2 minutes until soft.
Chop the tomatoes and bell peppers lengthwise and sauté them.
In another pan, cook the meat with garlic over low heat until tender.
Add the sautéed vegetables to the meat and cook together for another 10 minutes.
Cover the pan for a few minutes to let the flavors meld.
Serve this dish alongside rice.

bfe986af-c140-41f5-b266-1f804e840cef.name: Vabishkeh
bfe986af-c140-41f5-b266-1f804e840cef.description: A savory meat dish with tomatoes and eggs, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté until slightly golden.
Add the ground meat and turmeric, cooking until well browned.
Grate the tomatoes and mix them into the meat mixture to cook thoroughly.
Season with salt and pepper, then add the eggs once the oil separates.

7f52af6a-fba9-403d-aa01-174fe8272b46.name: Bread and Meat Rolls
7f52af6a-fba9-403d-aa01-174fe8272b46.description: Delicious meat-filled crepes, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, saffron, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Cook the meat with onion, water, salt, and turmeric, then grind it after cooling.
Sauté the ground meat with mint, parsley, cinnamon, saffron, and tomato paste.
For the crepes, beat the eggs and gradually add flour, mixing in oil, milk, water, and salt until smooth.
Heat a small pan with a bit of oil, pour in a ladle of batter, and cook until set and slightly browned.
Remove the crepe, fill it with the meat mixture, roll it up, and fry in oil.

bbaef86a-3aac-4386-b0b8-693980cb3d95.name: Eggplant and Meat Casserole
bbaef86a-3aac-4386-b0b8-693980cb3d95.description: A savory dish of fried eggplants filled with a spiced meat mixture.
ingredients: a small piece of fresh ginger
salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Wash and halve the eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and let sit for 30 minutes.
Make cuts around the eggplants without piercing through, dry them, coat in flour, and fry until golden on both sides.
Scoop out the insides and chop them.
Sauté chopped onion until golden, add minced garlic and grated ginger, then add ground meat and cook until water evaporates.
Stir in tomato paste, season with salt, pepper, and turmeric, then mix in baguette crumbs soaked in milk and chopped eggplant flesh.
Remove from heat, mix in chopped parsley and beaten egg.
Layer fried eggplants in a baking dish with the skin side down, fill with meat mixture, cover with remaining eggplants, and bake at 400°F for 1 hour.
Garnish with lettuce and tomatoes before serving.

e1e50019-a297-415e-9807-b775c74a7c1a.name: Meat Stew
e1e50019-a297-415e-9807-b775c74a7c1a.description: A flavorful stew with tender meat and a mix of fruits and spices.
instructions: In a pot, heat some oil and sauté the onion with garlic and ginger.
Add the ground spices, then the meat along with the fruits, salt, and pepper. Pour in cold water and let it simmer, then serve.

6359fa48-e9f6-45b9-b211-891d44eac6cc.name: Tongue with Mushroom Sauce
6359fa48-e9f6-45b9-b211-891d44eac6cc.description: Tender beef tongue served with a rich mushroom sauce.
instructions: Peel the tongue and cook it with root vegetables.
Season with soy sauce and ginger powder, slice, coat in corn flour, and fry.
Sauté mushrooms, then mix with chicken broth, soy sauce, and corn flour to make mushroom sauce.
Serve the tongue with the sauce poured over it.

c175d83d-bca5-4317-854c-77c99d9c2ba4.name: Hummus with Meat
c175d83d-bca5-4317-854c-77c99d9c2ba4.description: A creamy hummus topped with savory sautéed meat and pine nuts.
instructions: Mix tahini, lemon juice, and a bit of salt until combined, adding water if too thick.
Blend cooked chickpeas with a few tablespoons of water until smooth, then mix in grated garlic.
Add the tahini mixture to the chickpeas and blend until the consistency is like thick yogurt.
Sauté pine nuts in a mix of oil and butter until golden, then add ground meat and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hummus in a dish, topped with the sautéed meat and pine nuts.

bff8cd07-d6b8-4463-9949-d4179220b19a.name: Pea Stew with Beef
bff8cd07-d6b8-4463-9949-d4179220b19a.description: A hearty stew of beef and green peas, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: 2 cinnamon sticks or 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
instructions: Melt 1.5 tablespoons of butter in a pot and sauté the beef.
Add garlic, black pepper, and stew spice, and cook for 2 hours.
In another pan, melt 1.5 tablespoons of butter and sauté carrots for 3 minutes.
Add tomato paste and cinnamon, then stir in green peas and turn off the heat.
Combine the mixture with the cooked beef and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice.

13247c2e-8613-44e6-b5b8-6458440a1b02.name: Meat Pide
13247c2e-8613-44e6-b5b8-6458440a1b02.description: Delicious Turkish-style flatbread topped with savory minced meat and vegetables.
instructions: Sift the flour and make a well in the center.
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, add to flour, sprinkle with salt, and gradually add water to form a soft dough.
Let the dough rest for 15-20 minutes covered with a damp cloth.
For the meat sauce, blend tomatoes and bell pepper, then mix in meat, parsley, salt, pepper, thyme, and tomato paste.
Divide the dough into six pieces and shape into ovals, about half a centimeter thick.
Spread 2-3 tablespoons of meat sauce on each dough piece, fold edges inward.
Grease a baking tray and place the pide on it.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 20 minutes.
After baking, brush with butter and cut into 3-4 pieces.

5a966ec7-d200-4c4d-813d-ce77d2fe08b2.name: Meat Stew with Vegetables
5a966ec7-d200-4c4d-813d-ce77d2fe08b2.description: A hearty stew filled with tender meat and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a suitable pot over medium heat.
Add chopped meat and sauté for five minutes.
Add minced garlic and sauté for one minute.
Pour in beef broth and spices, cover, and simmer on low heat.
In another pot, melt butter and sauté potatoes, onion, and carrots until golden for 20 minutes.
Add vegetables to the meat and cook uncovered for 40 minutes.
Stir in parsley and serve the stew.

a323439e-8469-465d-8cf5-94bc9f1f0f9e.name: Liver Schnitzel
a323439e-8469-465d-8cf5-94bc9f1f0f9e.description: Crispy and flavorful lamb liver schnitzel, perfect for breakfast.
ingredients: Half a lamb liver, cut into small pieces
instructions: Wash the lamb liver and cut it into small pieces, then coat in flour.
Heat oil in a pan, add onions, and sauté until golden.
In another pan, add olive oil and gently fry the floured liver slices.
Season with salt and pepper as desired and serve with bread and tomato sauce.

d30cce49-cdc4-448a-9974-c6cc494d8606.name: Steak Roll
d30cce49-cdc4-448a-9974-c6cc494d8606.description: Delicious beef rolls filled with vegetables and melted cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Place the meat between two plastic bags and pound it to about 0.5 cm thickness.
Season the meat with black pepper, salt, vegetable oil, and crushed garlic.
Layer the thinly sliced carrot and zucchini on the meat and sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Roll the meat tightly and secure it with toothpicks.
Fry the rolls in hot oil and serve with your favorite sauce.

329749cf-a8c0-43ed-b77e-464fa20997a5.name: Gigot
329749cf-a8c0-43ed-b77e-464fa20997a5.description: A tender and flavorful lamb leg roast infused with garlic and herbs.
ingredients: 100 g mixed herbs (parsley, celery, tarragon, mint)
instructions: Clean, wash, and dry the meat, then tie it tightly with cooking twine.
Make finger-sized holes in the meat and insert garlic cloves.
Inject melted butter into the meat using a syringe for tenderness.
Season the meat with black pepper and fry in oil.
Add herbs, salt, and water in three stages, ensuring only a finger's depth of water remains.
Cover and let it cook for two hours.
At the end, the sauce should be thick and minimal.
Remove the twine, slice the meat thinly, and serve with cooked vegetables and sauce.

d0bd13ee-5f08-4648-9506-a38e844bff68.name: Grilled Beef Fillet on Vegetables
d0bd13ee-5f08-4648-9506-a38e844bff68.description: Tender beef fillet served over a bed of grilled vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cut the zucchini and eggplant diagonally.
Halve the mushrooms and slice the bell pepper into triangles.
Slice the onion into large rings and season with parsley, crushed garlic, cut vegetables, and rosemary.
Add black pepper and salt to the vegetable mixture.
In another bowl, season the steak slices with remaining olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill the vegetables on a cast-iron skillet until charred.
Place the grilled vegetables in the center of a serving dish and top with grilled fillets.
Do not flip the steak during cooking to maintain tenderness.
Serve hot.

39b546ad-7361-4eca-901f-39200de043a0.name: Braised Meat with Vegetables
39b546ad-7361-4eca-901f-39200de043a0.description: A hearty dish of tender meat and flavorful vegetables, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Place the vegetables at the bottom of a ceramic pot.
Pour the meat soup over the vegetables.
Arrange the meat on top of the vegetables in the pot.
Add the remaining ingredients.
Cover with a glass lid and set to HIGH for 3 to 4 hours.
If set to LOW, cook for 8 to 10 hours.

9b1dfd52-ab0c-4da0-9433-21ce571d85c6.name: Juicy Steak
9b1dfd52-ab0c-4da0-9433-21ce571d85c6.description: Tender and flavorful steak cooked to perfection with fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 5-6 pieces of lamb fillet or beef tenderloin (150g each)
Salt, spices, and sumac to taste
instructions: Finely chop the onion and bell pepper, mix with sumac, and refrigerate for 15 minutes.
Cut the meat into steak-sized pieces and marinate with the vegetable mixture.
Pound the steaks to ensure even thickness and flavor absorption.
Heat a pan with oil, then cook the steaks until browned on both sides.
Add blended tomato and diced tomato to the pan, simmering until steaks are cooked through.
Sauté sliced mushrooms separately and add to the main dish for flavor.
Adjust seasoning with salt and lemon juice before serving.

b567bc27-4c33-49ef-8e3f-62ecafc42bcb.name: Homemade Roast Ribs
b567bc27-4c33-49ef-8e3f-62ecafc42bcb.description: Tender lamb ribs seasoned and grilled to perfection.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and preferred spices (as needed)
instructions: Boil the meat pieces with bay leaves, onion, and 4 cups of water until it bubbles.
Remove the foam, add black pepper, reduce heat, and cook for 1 hour.
Strain the remaining water and discard solids, then cool the liquid.
Mix salt, pepper, and spices, and sprinkle over the meat to season.
Pound the meat lightly to tenderize.
Mix melted butter or margarine with the meat liquid and saffron to create a sauce.
Brush the sauce over the meat and let it sit for 10 minutes.
Preheat the sandwich maker or grill until hot.
Brush more sauce on the meat, grill for 7-10 minutes, then repeat for even cooking.
Sprinkle spices on the grilled ribs and serve with desired sides.

b505ba38-609a-442e-afc9-3943227dea41.name: Lamb Shank with Vegetables
b505ba38-609a-442e-afc9-3943227dea41.description: A hearty dish of tender lamb shank cooked with fresh vegetables and herbs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a medium pot, add onion and sauté.
Cut lamb shank into small pieces and brown in the oil.
Add garlic, tomatoes, celery, and leeks, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes on low heat.
Add 2 cups of boiling water along with basil, parsley, mushrooms, and orange, then simmer for another 20 minutes on medium heat.

811c3173-337b-4c70-8fb9-f0b551c4b86f.name: Meat Pie
811c3173-337b-4c70-8fb9-f0b551c4b86f.description: A savory pie filled with ground meat and cheese, baked to perfection.
instructions: Sift flour with salt and baking powder, then mix in melted butter.
Add eggs and milk to the flour and knead until smooth.
Chop onion finely and sauté in a little oil, then add ground meat and cook with onion.
Add spices and sauté for 15 minutes.
Roll out the pie dough in a circular dish and fill with the meat mixture.
Pour white sauce over the meat and sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake at 160°C for 20 to 30 minutes until the crust is cooked and cheese is golden.

32f95be7-bc6a-423d-92c9-5fd310633875.name: Wimpy - Ground Beef Steak
32f95be7-bc6a-423d-92c9-5fd310633875.description: Deliciously seasoned ground beef steaks, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Grate the onions and mix with the ground beef, salt, and pepper, kneading well.
Heat a pan until hot, divide the meat into four equal parts, shape into round patties, and flatten.
Once the pan is hot, cook each patty until browned on one side, then flip and cook the other side.
Optionally, place a bit of butter on each patty while cooking.
For variation, add a little tomato sauce on each patty.
Warm Wimpy bread in the oven, slice open, place the meat inside, and drizzle with sauce.

a9b6b2fa-2b6e-42dc-a403-c7f873555908.name: Tuna Noodle Casserole
a9b6b2fa-2b6e-42dc-a403-c7f873555908.description: A creamy and cheesy tuna noodle dish with broccoli and mushrooms.
instructions: Cook the noodles in water for 2 minutes, then add broccoli and cook for 2 more minutes.
Drain the mixture and sauté mushrooms until moisture evaporates.
In a pot, melt butter and sauté onion, then add noodles, broccoli, and mushrooms.
Mix well and add drained tuna.
In another bowl, combine cream, cheddar, milk, and season with salt and pepper.
Add potato flour and mix, then pour over the noodle mixture.
Bake at 400°F for 20 minutes.

1e5d2b94-0e9a-4556-ad8a-8da9da39f14e.name: Beef Noodles
1e5d2b94-0e9a-4556-ad8a-8da9da39f14e.description: A hearty dish of beef and noodles with vegetables, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: Olive oil or grape seed oil
instructions: Heat oil in a pot and cook the pasta or noodles for 4 minutes.
Sauté onion and bell pepper in oil until soft, then add garlic and tomatoes.
Cook for 10 minutes until well sautéed.
In another pan, sauté half the beef until browned.
Combine remaining beef with the first pan's mixture and mix well.
Add mushrooms to the second pan and sauté until cooked.
Mix all ingredients in a suitable dish and bake at low heat for 30 minutes.

d4292b34-369f-4460-9c21-c983ab9f606b.name: Tornado with Mushroom Sauce
d4292b34-369f-4460-9c21-c983ab9f606b.description: Deliciously tender meat fillets served with rich mushroom sauce.
instructions: Cut the meat into 12 pieces, shaping each into a round form.
Moisten your hands, shape the meat, and grease both sides.
Sprinkle with pepper and fry in a cast iron skillet.
Arrange the tornado pieces on a platter and drizzle with mushroom sauce.

fa232327-f3ac-4c7c-809c-5042f9193c47.name: Lamb Shank Stew
fa232327-f3ac-4c7c-809c-5042f9193c47.description: A rich and flavorful lamb stew with aromatic spices.
ingredients: Fresh ginger or 1 teaspoon ginger powder
instructions: Finely chop the garlic and slice the onion.
Peel the tomatoes and puree them in a food processor or grate them if unavailable.
Heat oil in a pot and sauté cloves, cardamom, and cinnamon until fragrant.
Add garlic and sauté until golden brown.
Add lamb, onion, red pepper, and salt; sauté until meat changes color and moisture evaporates.
Add water and bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer covered until meat is tender.
When meat is half-cooked, add the tomato puree.
Once the meat is fully cooked and the sauce thickens, add saffron and cream, heat through, then serve hot.

38e15176-06a3-45cf-addc-7cc026653a20.name: Beef Roti
38e15176-06a3-45cf-addc-7cc026653a20.description: A savory and tender beef dish, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Fold the fillet lengthwise or place two fillets side by side and tie with string.
Season the meat with pepper and sear in a pot with some oil.
Once browned, reduce heat and cook, basting with broth until tender.
If the broth evaporates, add water and salt as needed.
Once cooked, remove the string, slice the meat, and serve with mashed potatoes and peas, topped with sauce, cream, and pepper.

a85a7cb1-e3f9-4a74-aab6-9cee3d385572.name: Beef Stroganoff (Russian)
a85a7cb1-e3f9-4a74-aab6-9cee3d385572.description: A creamy, savory beef dish with mushrooms and herbs, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Slice the beef into thin strips, about 5-6 cm long, and cut into thin noodles.
Mix yogurt with cream and let it sit outside the fridge for 2-3 hours to sour slightly.
Heat butter in a regular pan and sauté the onion until translucent, then add mushrooms and stir for 3-4 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and keep warm.
In a separate skillet, heat butter over medium heat, then increase heat and add beef, stirring until browned.
Turn off the heat and pour the cream mixture over the onion and mushrooms, stirring gently.
Serve on a platter garnished with dill and alongside kasha.

0f7a0a03-19fe-4dea-bc26-8464555cd95d.name: Meat Cookies
0f7a0a03-19fe-4dea-bc26-8464555cd95d.description: Delicious meat-filled cookies, crispy on the outside and savory inside.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and curry powder to taste
instructions: Soak baguette crumbs in milk. Grate onion and sauté in oil.
Add minced garlic to the onion. Mix ground meat with soaked baguette, onion, parsley, tomato paste, spices, and egg.
Shape the mixture into round cookies, coat in flour, and fry in hot oil on low heat until cooked through.
Place cookies on a baking tray, sprinkle with grated Gouda cheese, and bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes.

0b9a150d-6d72-4460-9bea-d0e2f36eba5f.name: Steak with Bell Pepper Purée
0b9a150d-6d72-4460-9bea-d0e2f36eba5f.description: Juicy steak served with a flavorful bell pepper purée.
instructions: Mix lemon zest, olive oil, and pepper in a bowl. Marinate the steaks.
Halve the bell peppers, remove seeds, brush with olive oil, and grill until charred. Grill onions similarly.
Once cooled, peel the peppers and onions, then blend with red pepper, garlic, and salt until puréed.
Add lemon juice and salt to the steaks, remove from marinade, and grill for 8-10 minutes.
Serve the steaks with the bell pepper purée, garnished with lemon zest and lemon wedges.

96b8fb10-d503-49eb-bab9-912557198f91.name: Mint Steak
96b8fb10-d503-49eb-bab9-912557198f91.description: Juicy beef steak seasoned with mint and served with carrots.
instructions: Clean, wash, and dry the meat. Pound it with a meat mallet.
Mix 1 tbsp of oil, mustard, and pepper to marinate the meat.
Heat the remaining oil in a pan and fry the meat.
Add salt at the end of cooking and serve with barbecue sauce, garnished with mint and carrots.

b6cef834-c8b9-4785-b249-c5221864cc44.name: Gouda Cheese Meat Schnitzel
b6cef834-c8b9-4785-b249-c5221864cc44.description: Crispy schnitzel filled with ham and Gouda cheese, perfectly golden and delicious.
instructions: Place a slice of ham and Gouda cheese between two pieces of steak.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, season with salt and pepper.
Dip the prepared steaks in the egg mixture, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat some oil in a pan and fry the steaks in butter until golden brown.
Transfer to a serving dish.

c1d044a7-57c2-4d31-a6ae-64343741569b.name: Lamb Leg with Roasted Potatoes and Tomatoes
c1d044a7-57c2-4d31-a6ae-64343741569b.description: Succulent lamb leg roasted to perfection with flavorful vegetables.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Debone the lamb leg, leaving the muscle bone intact.
Mix oil, mustard, salt, pepper, soy sauce, and saffron dissolved in 2 tablespoons of boiling water.
Marinate the lamb leg with the mixture.
Cut carrot and celery into 1 cm thick and 10 cm long pieces, and place them on the meat.
Fold the lamb leg and sew it together.
Place in a baking tray, cover with aluminum foil, and bake for 1.5 hours in the middle of the oven.
Remove the foil and bake for another hour until roasted.
Wrap potatoes and tomatoes in aluminum foil and place in the oven, noting that tomatoes need less cooking time.
Once the meat is cooked, garnish with potatoes and tomatoes as desired.

f4d3396c-7a09-46ba-a554-508a023aeebf.name: Braised Beef Shank
f4d3396c-7a09-46ba-a554-508a023aeebf.description: Tender beef shank slow-cooked to perfection with aromatic vegetables.
instructions: Clean and prepare the young beef shank.
Peel and cut the carrots and garlic lengthwise, then insert them into the meat.
Season the meat with salt and pepper, and tie it securely with string.
Rub oil over the meat and wrap it in aluminum foil.
Bake in a 300°F oven for 2 hours.
After cooking, unwrap the foil and roast for an additional 30 minutes, basting every 5 minutes.
For serving, let the meat cool before slicing thinly, or reheat slices with sauce.

263b3099-bb3d-4cf0-94bc-94ec987863bb.name: Meat Cooking Tips
263b3099-bb3d-4cf0-94bc-94ec987863bb.description: Essential tips for selecting and cooking meat for delicious dishes.
instructions: Choose meat from a reliable source, considering the type of dish.
Ensure the meat is fresh and properly stored before cooking.

0173c0b4-f42e-4da4-b550-e21a2e94257c.name: Vegetable Soufflé
0173c0b4-f42e-4da4-b550-e21a2e94257c.description: A delightful baked dish layered with vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Cook cauliflower with a little milk and one cup of water, then drain.
Slice boiled potatoes, sauté carrots and zucchinis in oil.
Mix all vegetables and layer in a baking dish with white sauce, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and cheese.
Repeat layers until dish is full, finishing with sauce and cheese on top.
Bake at 350°C for 15 minutes until golden.

9fb88e37-6579-44c2-bf49-ab890b6c4ef6.name: Mushroom and Onion Tart
9fb88e37-6579-44c2-bf49-ab890b6c4ef6.description: A savory tart filled with mushrooms and onions, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Mix flour and butter until crumbly, then add egg yolk, water, and salt to form a dough.
Roll out the dough on a floured surface, place in a tart dish, and prick with a fork.
Sauté the onion, add mushrooms, and sprinkle over the dough.
Beat the egg and cream together, pour over the filling, and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

a0665732-40aa-4071-9bd3-6c8a74a1725c.name: Banana Soufflé
a0665732-40aa-4071-9bd3-6c8a74a1725c.description: A light and fluffy banana dessert, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Separate the egg yolks and whites. Beat yolks with sugar and vanilla until thick and creamy.
Whip the egg whites until fluffy and white. Dissolve gelatin in 1/4 cup cold water and warm it in a double boiler until fully dissolved, then add to the yolk mixture.
Fold in the whipped cream and egg whites, then add the chopped bananas.
Pour into a special dish and refrigerate for 5 to 6 hours until set.

7952df65-a1f2-4e71-bc7d-c9db4ba0aacb.name: Leek and Onion Tart
7952df65-a1f2-4e71-bc7d-c9db4ba0aacb.description: A savory tart filled with leeks, onions, and cheese, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix flour with butter thoroughly.
Whisk egg yolk with salt and water, then add to flour and butter mixture.
Let the mixture rest for half an hour at room temperature.
Roll out the dough and refrigerate.
Spread butter on the dough, then layer chopped onion and leek.
Beat eggs with cream and pour over leeks and onions, then sprinkle with cheese.
Preheat oven to 375°F and bake the tart for half an hour.

df749478-1f91-4dae-a35b-acf75d943547.name: Cheese Soufflé
df749478-1f91-4dae-a35b-acf75d943547.description: A light and fluffy cheese soufflé, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Prepare the white sauce and keep it warm.
Whisk the egg yolks and gradually add them to the white sauce, stirring continuously.
Set aside two to three tablespoons of cheese and mix the rest into the egg yolk and white sauce mixture.
Add salt, pepper, and nutmeg.
Whip the egg whites separately until stiff peaks form, adding a pinch of salt.
Fold the egg yolk mixture into the egg whites and cheese gently.
Pour the mixture into a suitable baking dish, filling it completely.
Sprinkle the reserved cheese on top.
Place the dish in a water bath in the oven and set the temperature to 350°F.
Bake for one hour without opening the oven door.
Serve immediately after baking for the best texture.

29e47445-47f1-4681-bfc9-1e81761ea156.name: Ham Soufflé
29e47445-47f1-4681-bfc9-1e81761ea156.description: A fluffy and savory ham soufflé, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Grease a suitable baking dish and sprinkle some grated cheese.
Mix egg yolks with salt and combine with white sauce and chopped ham.
Whip egg whites until stiff and fold into the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the prepared dish, leaving space at the top.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top.
Place the dish in a water bath in the oven set to 350°F.
Bake for one hour without opening the oven.
Serve immediately after baking for the best texture.

e88b0337-2760-4b2c-bf96-b64b02425e67.name: Eggplant Soufflé
e88b0337-2760-4b2c-bf96-b64b02425e67.description: A fluffy and savory eggplant dish, perfect for a delightful meal.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Finely chop mushrooms and carrots.
Beat egg yolks with a pinch of salt.
Grease a suitable baking dish and sprinkle some grated cheese inside.
Mix egg yolks with white sauce and add the prepared eggplant.
Whip egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold into the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the prepared dish, leaving 1-2 cm space at the top.
Sprinkle remaining grated cheese on top.
Place the soufflé dish in a baking tray with some water.
Bake at 350°F for one hour without opening the oven door.
Serve immediately after baking for the best texture.

1ba41f17-ba6b-4e7d-b64e-6b6de457e20e.name: Chicken or Fish Soufflé
1ba41f17-ba6b-4e7d-b64e-6b6de457e20e.description: A fluffy and savory soufflé made with chicken or fish and vegetables.
ingredients: 2.5 cups cooked and shredded chicken or fish
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Finely chop the mushrooms and carrots.
Beat the egg yolks with a little salt.
Grease a suitable baking dish and sprinkle some grated cheese inside.
Mix the egg yolks with the white sauce and add the shredded chicken or fish.
Whip the egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold into the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the prepared dish, leaving 1-2 inches empty at the top.
Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top.
Place the soufflé dish in a baking tray with water and bake at 350°F for one hour without opening the oven.
Serve immediately after baking for the best texture.

d05e9c2f-22dd-43ca-aada-8674e29ae8f6.name: Mushroom Soufflé
d05e9c2f-22dd-43ca-aada-8674e29ae8f6.description: A light and fluffy mushroom soufflé, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Clean and chop the mushrooms, then squeeze out excess water.
Melt butter in a pan, add mushrooms and salt, and cook until water evaporates.
Grease a baking dish with butter and sprinkle with flour.
Whisk egg yolks with a pinch of salt until fluffy and pale.
Mix the egg yolks with béchamel sauce and cream, then combine with the mushrooms.
Whip egg whites until stiff and fold into the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the dish and bake in a water bath at 350°F for 45 minutes without opening the oven.
Check doneness with a fork; if it comes out clean, it's ready. If not, bake for an additional 15 minutes.

03abb3f9-3b2d-4cd0-aaf3-06945b4153c9.name: Potato Soufflé
03abb3f9-3b2d-4cd0-aaf3-06945b4153c9.description: A fluffy and cheesy potato dish, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Boil and peel the potatoes, then mash them.
Preheat the oven to 400°F and grease a suitable baking dish.
Mix warm mashed potatoes with butter and a pinch of salt.
Separate the egg yolks and whites; beat the yolks well.
Whip the egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Combine yolks and whites, adding a bit of salt.
Fold the potato mixture into the egg mixture and pour into the dish, leaving some space at the top.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes without opening the oven.

2ed8c194-8c8e-4aac-94f8-9c49d1d4375d.name: Vegetable and Cauliflower Soufflé
2ed8c194-8c8e-4aac-94f8-9c49d1d4375d.description: A fluffy and golden soufflé made with vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Finely chop cooked vegetables like cauliflower, mushrooms, and carrots.
Beat egg yolks with a pinch of salt.
Grease a suitable baking dish and sprinkle some grated cheese inside.
Mix egg yolks with white sauce and add the prepared vegetables.
Whip egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold into the mixture.
Pour the mixture into the prepared dish, leaving 1-2 cm space at the top.
Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top.
Place the dish in a water bath in the oven and set the temperature to 350°F.
Bake for one hour without opening the oven.
The soufflé should rise, puff up, and turn golden.
Serve immediately after baking for the best texture.

fd343040-0421-4d14-b1af-451dc7b23167.name: Spinach Soufflé with Ham
fd343040-0421-4d14-b1af-451dc7b23167.description: A delightful spinach soufflé enriched with savory ham and creamy béchamel.
instructions: Wash spinach leaves and boil with water, baking soda, and salt for 15 minutes.
Drain spinach and mix with sautéed flour in butter until moisture evaporates.
Combine spinach with chopped ham and béchamel sauce.
Separate egg yolks and whites; beat yolks until frothy and whites until stiff.
Grease a baking dish, layer half the cheese, mix spinach mixture with egg yolks, fold in egg whites, and pour into the dish.
Top with remaining cheese and bake in a water bath or directly in the oven at 350°F for 30-45 minutes.

00ff7f18-5be8-4bea-a996-3527fcf4dd46.name: Fondue
00ff7f18-5be8-4bea-a996-3527fcf4dd46.description: A creamy cheese dip perfect for bread or vegetables.
instructions: Mix egg yolk with a pinch of salt and whisk.
Combine with bechamel sauce and heat gently, stirring until cheese melts.
Drizzle mixture over small, thin slices of bread.
Place bread in the oven at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until slightly toasted.

f453c37b-b4b8-4f75-82ce-e3ac95e368ef.name: Tomato Fondue
f453c37b-b4b8-4f75-82ce-e3ac95e368ef.description: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce perfect for dipping.
instructions: Sauté butter and shallots together.
Crush garlic and add it to the mixture.
Peel and chop tomatoes, then add to the butter and shallots.
Reduce heat, season with salt and pepper, and stir until the sauce thickens.
Serve the fondue with small toasted bread.

3cf241bf-1d86-4de0-92f6-f7f952a255ba.name: Sour Herb Fondue
