3cf241bf-1d86-4de0-92f6-f7f952a255ba.description: A creamy and tangy fondue made with tender sour herbs.
instructions: Separate the stems of the sour herbs and wash the leaves carefully.
Mix the herbs with salt, pepper, and butter in a suitable pot and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally until the water evaporates.
Remove from heat and mix with cream, then serve in a dish.
Serve the fondue with fried square bread.

eab31961-0a3b-44c8-8fcc-775288264f35.name: Bourguignon Fondue
eab31961-0a3b-44c8-8fcc-775288264f35.description: A delightful meat fondue experience cooked at the table.
instructions: Cut the meat into small pieces, about the size of a pinky finger.
Heat the oil in a special fondue lamp until hot.
Use a wooden fork to dip the meat into the hot oil.
Cook for a few moments, then dip into your desired sauce and enjoy.

bfb85149-5a6f-479c-ae38-698a7de965c1.name: Chocolate Soufflé
bfb85149-5a6f-479c-ae38-698a7de965c1.description: A rich and airy chocolate dessert that's simply irresistible.
instructions: Separate the egg yolks and whites. Beat yolks with half the sugar and vanilla until creamy.
Dissolve coffee powder in 2 tablespoons warm water and mix into the yolk mixture until smooth.
Melt cocoa and butter over low heat until combined.
Dissolve gelatin in 5 tablespoons water over a double boiler, then mix into the yolk mixture.
Whip cream until it holds peaks and fold into the mixture.
Beat egg whites in a separate bowl until foamy, gradually adding remaining sugar until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold egg whites into the mixture.
Pour into a desired dish and refrigerate for 9 hours until set.
Briefly dip the bottom of the dish in warm water and invert onto a plate.

7b4f3dd0-d51e-43b4-a165-d2c14efb02a3.name: Fruit Soufflé
7b4f3dd0-d51e-43b4-a165-d2c14efb02a3.description: A delightful and fluffy dessert made with fruits and vanilla pudding.
instructions: Heat the milk in a pan until warm, then soak the toast in it.
Drain the fruit compote and layer it in a baking dish, followed by the soaked toast.
Cover the toast with vanilla pudding.
Whip the egg white and sugar until stiff and white, then spread over the pudding.
Preheat the oven to 375°F and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
Remove from the oven and let cool completely.

bdf6fbe2-7949-41e8-8f8d-c7204a2617d1.name: Zucchini and Eggplant Soufflé
bdf6fbe2-7949-41e8-8f8d-c7204a2617d1.description: A delicious layered dish of zucchini, eggplant, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Peel and cut the eggplants and zucchinis into quarters, then fry and set aside.
Sauté ground meat, add mushrooms, bell pepper, and fried onion, then mix in tomato paste, salt, and pepper.
Add a cup of water, cover, and let it cook until the water evaporates.
Grease a suitable baking dish, layer with fried eggplant and zucchini until the bottom is covered.
Pour some of the meat mixture over the vegetables, add two tablespoons of white sauce and pizza cheese, and smooth it out.
Continue layering with zucchini and eggplant, repeating the process until all ingredients are used.
Top with pizza cheese, place in a preheated oven for 10 minutes until the cheese melts.
Turn off the oven, let it sit for 10 minutes, then serve directly from the dish.

ade6d62d-9aa5-48a1-855f-e08e2114cabc.name: Chicken and Mushroom Soufflé
ade6d62d-9aa5-48a1-855f-e08e2114cabc.description: A fluffy and savory soufflé featuring chicken and mushrooms, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Melt butter over heat and sauté flour until golden.
Gradually add milk, stirring until smooth; strain if lumpy.
Bring to a boil, then mix in beaten egg yolks and mustard.
Remove from heat after a few boils.
Whip egg whites until fluffy.
Combine chicken, sautéed mushrooms, and milk mixture; season with salt and pepper.
Fold in whipped egg whites and pour into a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top and bake at 400°F for 45 minutes.
For a softer soufflé, use a water bath method.

bfc5eb6d-01c9-490c-b6cf-5cb357ab1296.name: Soufflé Tips
bfc5eb6d-01c9-490c-b6cf-5cb357ab1296.description: Delicious French soufflé tips for perfect cooking every time.
instructions: Cook soufflé for 45 minutes to 1 hour after preparation.
Ensure heat from below is higher than from above.
Add egg whites after mixing all ingredients and bake immediately.
Do not open the oven until the soufflé is ready.
Preheat the oven before placing the soufflé dish inside.
Use Gruyère cheese for a golden, melted top.

d9a253e3-c634-4b76-b352-f73e61bac745.name: Moussaka
d9a253e3-c634-4b76-b352-f73e61bac745.description: A delicious layered dish with eggplant, meat, and creamy sauce.
ingredients: Oil, salt, pepper, and thyme to taste
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and grated garlic in oil until soft.
Add meat, tomato paste, mushrooms, ham, and bell peppers, then season and cook.
Mash half of the boiled potatoes and mix with the sautéed mixture, combine the rest with white sauce.
Grease a dish, layer with white sauce, then eggplant, followed by the meat mixture.
Top with white sauce and grated cheese, bake at 180°C until golden.

fb8d2cef-29fb-43b4-81f0-1d9d65398a12.name: Neapolitan Bread
fb8d2cef-29fb-43b4-81f0-1d9d65398a12.description: Delicious homemade bread topped with cheese and herbs, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Sift the flour and add the egg and yeast, mixing well.
Gradually add olive oil and knead for 10 minutes until sticky.
Divide the dough and let it rise in a warm place for 2 hours.
Roll out the dough and mix tomato sauce, garlic, basil, thyme, salt, pepper, and sugar, then spread on the dough.
Top with pizza cheese and bake in a preheated oven for 15 minutes until golden brown.

225ec409-bbed-43ef-b21d-4779691ede41.name: Italian Shishlik
225ec409-bbed-43ef-b21d-4779691ede41.description: Delicious skewered meat coated with cheese and breadcrumbs, baked to perfection.
ingredients: Mozzarella cheese, olive oil, salt, pepper, and saffron to taste
instructions: Marinate the meat in olive oil, salt, pepper, and saffron for 2 hours in the fridge.
Mix Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs with salt and pepper, then set aside.
Coat the marinated meat in white flour, dip in beaten eggs, and then roll in the breadcrumb mixture.
Fry in oil for 3 minutes on each side, then place on a steel tray.
Top each piece with mozzarella cheese and bake in a preheated oven for 10 minutes.
Serve on a plate.

e5464988-4b4b-460a-af2b-e0d094aacb68.name: Tournedos with Tarragon and Cilantro Sauce
e5464988-4b4b-460a-af2b-e0d094aacb68.description: A delicious beef dish served with a creamy herb sauce.
instructions: Soak the meat in pepper for half an hour.
In a suitable pot, combine onion and garlic, then add vinegar with some water, tomato sauce, and a bit of salt, and simmer until reduced.
Remove from heat and let cool. Beat the egg yolks with two tablespoons of water and a pinch of salt, then heat using a double boiler.
Gradually add butter while stirring with a wooden spoon until a thick mayonnaise-like sauce forms.
Add tarragon, cilantro, cooked onion, garlic, and mushrooms to the mixture and stir.
Heat some oil on a grill or heavy pan, and cook the tournedos for two to three minutes on each side, seasoning with salt before removing.
Serve the tournedos with the sauce on the side, accompanied by white bread or boiled/fried potatoes.

829c490d-0503-46bd-b2a1-a086e0b5415f.name: Pansaroti
829c490d-0503-46bd-b2a1-a086e0b5415f.description: A delicious rolled pizza filled with sautéed vegetables and shrimp.
instructions: Sauté the vegetables in a pan.
Roll out the pizza dough, spread tomato sauce in the center, and top with cheese and sautéed vegetables.
Roll the dough into a log and cut into six equal pieces.
Add sautéed shrimp and decorate with cherry tomatoes.

38f2e734-2d2b-4da8-bf63-bb2b03df60d0.name: Chicken and Meat Calzone
38f2e734-2d2b-4da8-bf63-bb2b03df60d0.description: A delicious calzone filled with chicken, mushrooms, and cheese.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste
instructions: Sift flour, salt, and yeast powder in a bowl.
Add oil and warm milk, mix until dough forms.
Use flour to prevent sticking, but avoid adding too much.
Place dough in a plastic bag and let it rise until doubled in size.
Wash and slice mushrooms, sauté until moisture evaporates.
Peel and dice tomatoes.
Peel, wash, and dice onion.
Mix tomato paste, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper, set aside.
Divide dough into two, roll each into a circle, leaving extra for decoration.
Place one circle on a greased baking tray.
Brush half the tomato mixture on the dough, and the other half on the second circle.
Layer tomatoes, garlic powder, thyme, chicken, onion, half the cheese, meat filling, mushrooms, salt, and pepper on the first dough.
Cover with the second dough, sauce side down.
Seal edges with a fork, brush with oil, and let rest for 15 minutes.
Brush the top with egg yolk and decorate with leftover dough, brushing yolk on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 30-40 minutes until golden.

7e55d35b-87df-4551-8dc6-aa5d9ba23587.name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
7e55d35b-87df-4551-8dc6-aa5d9ba23587.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with seasoned ground meat and baked to perfection.
instructions: Soak cabbage leaves in boiling salted water for 10 minutes until soft.
Carefully separate the leaves and drain them.
Sauté ground meat with fried onions, adding salt and pepper.
Mix in sandwich bread crumbs and season further.
Place 1-2 tablespoons of the meat mixture in each leaf and roll them up.
Arrange the rolls in a metal basket and place it in a pot.
Add beef broth and butter to the pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover tightly, and cook for 30 minutes until fully cooked.

2e5899ab-c288-459f-bdae-018dc40e2020.name: Potato and Ham Gratin
2e5899ab-c288-459f-bdae-018dc40e2020.description: A creamy and cheesy potato dish layered with savory ham.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (240°C).
Grease a 9-inch round Pyrex dish with garlic and butter.
In a small pot, combine cream, milk, and garlic, and heat until boiling.
Layer half the potatoes and half the celery alternately in the greased dish.
Sprinkle chopped ham and 1 cup of cheese over the layers.
Add the remaining potatoes and celery on top.
Pour the hot cream and milk mixture over the layers.
Sprinkle the remaining cream and 2 tablespoons of cheese on top.
Bake for about 15 minutes until golden, then reduce oven temperature to 375°F (190°C) and bake for another 50 minutes.
Let the dish sit for 10 minutes before serving.

e2c90f40-bc6e-4562-bd15-ad82b7a3d1e4.name: Stuffed Zucchini with Yogurt
e2c90f40-bc6e-4562-bd15-ad82b7a3d1e4.description: Delicious stuffed zucchini served with a creamy yogurt sauce.
ingredients: 1/2 cup pine nuts or slivered almonds
Salt, pepper, spices, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Hollow out the zucchini and set aside.
Lightly fry the pine nuts or almonds and set aside.
Sauté the ground meat, adding salt, pepper, spices, and a bit of cinnamon.
Mix in the pine nuts or almonds and remove from heat.
Whisk the yogurt and strain it through a fine sieve.
Dissolve starch in a cup of cold water and add it to the yogurt with one egg, mixing well.
Add a bit of salt to the yogurt mixture.
Pour the mixture into a pot, place on low heat, and stir continuously until it thickens.
Stuff the zucchini with the ground meat mixture and fry in oil until golden.
Add 1 cup of water and a bit of salt, cover, and cook for 15 minutes until zucchini is tender.
Add the cooked zucchini to the yogurt mixture and heat gently without stirring too much for 20-30 minutes.
Reserve some pine nuts and cooked meat for garnish.

7a72c44d-eb31-42c5-b35a-91044e67444b.name: Baked Chicken Bowl
7a72c44d-eb31-42c5-b35a-91044e67444b.description: A creamy and flavorful chicken dish with peas, served with rice and potatoes.
instructions: Boil the chicken and cut it into stew-sized pieces.
Add half a cup of chicken broth and cream, then simmer.
Stir in peas, salt, pepper, and nutmeg, cooking for 5 minutes.
Serve on a plate, garnishing with boiled potato and rice.

69538a11-e603-4536-9fc6-63a4ff6cfe7e.name: Meat Goulburg
69538a11-e603-4536-9fc6-63a4ff6cfe7e.description: Delicious pastry filled with spiced meat and herbs, baked to golden perfection.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Sift the flour. Add yogurt, oil, vinegar, salt, and water to the flour and knead until non-sticky.
Divide the dough into egg-sized pieces and roll each into 2-3 mm thick circles. Cut into four parts.
Grease the dough pieces. Grate the onion and sauté with oil. Add ground meat and continue cooking until browned.
Turn off the heat and mix in parsley, salt, and pepper. Place about a tablespoon of filling on the edge of the dough, roll it up, and shape into a spiral.
Grease a baking tray and arrange the spirals. Beat egg yolks, mix with 2-3 tablespoons of oil, and brush over the spirals.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 40-50 minutes.

bcb2cac3-c97f-4346-a2e7-b7694254c06e.name: Mushroom Gratin
bcb2cac3-c97f-4346-a2e7-b7694254c06e.description: A creamy, cheesy mushroom and potato bake that's simply irresistible.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Grease a baking dish with butter and minced garlic.
Layer half of the sliced potatoes in the dish.
Add the mushrooms on top, then cover with the remaining potatoes.
Beat the eggs, then mix in the milk, cream, salt, and pepper; pour over the dish.
Bake in the middle of the oven for one hour.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top and bake for an additional 25 minutes until golden.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

010208ea-5cbf-4e68-869f-a4e6ccafb501.name: Mini Mushroom Galette
010208ea-5cbf-4e68-869f-a4e6ccafb501.description: Delicious mini galettes filled with mushrooms and herbs, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Wash and dry the mushrooms, then sprinkle with lemon juice to prevent browning and chop them.
Peel and chop the garlic and onion. Sauté them in butter for 2 minutes over low heat.
Add the mushrooms, increase the heat, and stir until the moisture evaporates. Remove from heat and let cool.
In a bowl, beat the eggs and gradually add the cream while whisking.
Sift the flour over the egg and cream mixture, then mix well. Add salt, pepper, and chopped basil.
Incorporate the cooled mushroom mixture into the batter.
Heat oil in a pan (about 2 cm deep). Once hot, pour a tablespoon of the mixture, flatten slightly, and fry until golden on both sides (about 6-8 minutes).
Place the cooked galettes on paper towels to absorb excess oil, then serve hot on a platter.

2793ec45-f850-4488-91f9-b7e1cda2254c.name: Spinach Crepes
2793ec45-f850-4488-91f9-b7e1cda2254c.description: Delicious spinach and meat-filled crepes baked with cheese and white sauce.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, and spices to taste
instructions: Sauté onions, add ground meat, season with salt and pepper, then add spinach and sauté.
Prepare the crepes by mixing flour, milk, salt, and pepper until smooth, then add eggs and oil.
Grease a pan, pour in a ladle of the batter to make crepes.
Layer spinach mixture, white sauce, and cheese on each crepe, repeating the process.
Top with a final crepe, add white sauce and cheese, and bake at 170°C for 15 minutes.

e28c0b2f-e32c-4fc5-b690-e33f7ea6cd35.name: Almond Crackers
e28c0b2f-e32c-4fc5-b690-e33f7ea6cd35.description: Crispy almond crackers perfect for dipping or snacking.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F).
Set aside 1/4 cup of sunflower seed powder, mix the rest with ground almonds and baking powder.
In a small bowl, mix milk and egg yolk, then add melted butter to the nut mixture and knead.
Roll the dough on a surface sprinkled with sunflower seed powder, dust the top with more powder, and roll to 5mm thickness.
Sprinkle sesame seeds on top, cut into 5cm pieces, and place on a baking tray.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the edges are golden.
Serve cooled with hummus, chopped celery, cheese, or as desired.

4e6a3252-ad55-4f14-beb4-6c6391ad64e3.name: Mushroom and Brioche
4e6a3252-ad55-4f14-beb4-6c6391ad64e3.description: A creamy mushroom filling served in a toasted brioche, perfect for a delightful appetizer.
instructions: Slice the mushrooms and set aside.
Sauté the green onions and minced garlic in a little butter.
Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes until the moisture evaporates.
Stir in the cream and cook for another 5 minutes until thickened.
Season with salt, pepper, and parsley, then remove from heat.
Cut a thin layer off the top of the bread rolls and hollow out the insides.
Place the rolls in the oven for 5 minutes.
Immediately fill with the mushroom mixture, replace the top, and serve warm.

a3ffebb7-0bc1-4fb6-8de4-90c743a9bc5c.name: Polish Lemon Fish Fillet
a3ffebb7-0bc1-4fb6-8de4-90c743a9bc5c.description: A delightful fish dish with fresh herbs and lemon.
instructions: Slice the fish into rings.
Add basil, lemon, and fresh parsley to the fish, then fry in oil.

5f4e0b2d-5003-4d73-be13-b38625287464.name: Cheese Roll
5f4e0b2d-5003-4d73-be13-b38625287464.description: A delicious cheese roll filled with savory ingredients, perfect as an appetizer.
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, and vegetable oil together, then gradually add flour.
Add salt, pepper, and garlic powder, and mix until smooth.
Heat a pan, grease it, and pour in the mixture to form a thin layer.
Once set, transfer the dough to a flat surface and mix all filling ingredients.
Spread a little mayonnaise on the dough, add the filling, and roll it up.
Refrigerate for 15 to 20 minutes, then slice into rolls and garnish with green onions and olives.

429b4890-e87e-4991-aaac-b6f8f99b13d4.name: Fancy Rolls
429b4890-e87e-4991-aaac-b6f8f99b13d4.description: Delicious rolls filled with cheese, vegetables, and savory sauce.
instructions: Dissolve sugar in warm water, add yeast, and let it activate for 5-10 minutes.
In a bowl, mix oil, salt, and activated yeast, then gradually add flour until non-sticky.
Knead the dough for 5-10 minutes or pound it 30-50 times, then let it rest for an hour covered.
For the sauce, grate tomatoes, drain excess water, and heat with oil until evaporated, then add thyme, tomato sauce, and nutmeg.
Sauté onion if desired, then mix with bell pepper, egg, and ham.
Roll out the dough to 2-3 mm thickness, trim edges, spread sauce, and add filling.
Roll the dough tightly, cut into 2-3 cm pieces, and place upright in greased muffin tins.
Bake in a preheated oven at 170°C (275°F) for 15-20 minutes until golden.
Use remaining sauce on top of the rolls.

91264dc2-c18c-4ffe-8960-c33b3a7d5f22.name: Ratatouille - French Vegetable Dish
91264dc2-c18c-4ffe-8960-c33b3a7d5f22.description: A colorful medley of sautéed vegetables baked to perfection.
ingredients: 4 tbsp mixed herbs (parsley, cilantro, marjoram, mint)
Salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and refrigerate for 1 hour to remove bitterness.
Rinse and press the eggplants, then fry in oil. Fry the potatoes and mushrooms separately.
Sauté the onion until translucent. Layer the eggplants, herbs, potatoes, onions, mushrooms, tomatoes, and bell pepper in a baking dish.
Sauté the tomato paste, add water and lemon juice, then pour over the vegetables.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 175°C for 30 minutes.

3fb0c39b-2335-401e-a3c7-b22b4bfae216.name: French Chicken with Orange Sauce
3fb0c39b-2335-401e-a3c7-b22b4bfae216.description: A delightful chicken dish infused with zesty orange and lemon flavors.
instructions: Cut and wash the chicken, then sauté in oil.
Add orange juice, orange zest, lemon zest, and salt; cook on low heat.
Towards the end, dissolve cornstarch in cold water and add lemon juice to thicken the sauce.
Add saffron solution and sugar for color and sweetness.
Garnish with sweetened citrus peel or toasted sesame seeds before serving.

a5e6ed93-033d-4765-8562-94acd12c2631.name: Tartila
a5e6ed93-033d-4765-8562-94acd12c2631.description: A savory baked dish with potatoes, eggs, and cheese, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons of dried thyme or basil
1/2 teaspoon of hot pepper or hot sauce
Black and red pepper, salt to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven and bake the potatoes for 15 minutes.
Slice the onion and sauté it until soft.
Beat the eggs and add crushed garlic, thyme, hot sauce, black pepper, salt, and peas.
Slice the baked potatoes and layer them in a baking dish with onion.
Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes and onions.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 160-180 degrees Celsius for 25 minutes.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, and bake for another 5 minutes.
Cut into 3 cm squares and garnish with red pepper.

6de7a255-1399-4624-9656-1ea367980b5c.name: Mexican Taco
6de7a255-1399-4624-9656-1ea367980b5c.description: Delicious homemade tacos filled with your favorite ingredients.
instructions: Mix corn flour, salt, and vegetable oil in a bowl, then add warm water and combine until a dough forms.
Knead the dough on a floured surface for 3-4 minutes until soft, then rest in a plastic bag for 1 hour.
Divide the dough into 12 small balls, roll each ball between two sheets of plastic into thin circles.
Fry in oil, folding them in a U shape while cooking, and fill with desired ingredients before serving.

5450571a-070a-49c0-b226-5d4c72f90237.name: French Molded Rice
5450571a-070a-49c0-b226-5d4c72f90237.description: A flavorful rice dish with colorful peppers and spices.
instructions: Sauté onion and bell peppers in butter and oil until soft and glossy.
Add turmeric, curry powder, and rice; sauté briefly.
Pour in saffron solution, water, and salt; cook for 30 minutes.

ab5b4952-f92c-4991-acf2-41634c44a863.name: Pakora
ab5b4952-f92c-4991-acf2-41634c44a863.description: Crispy chickpea fritters packed with spices and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 cup chopped onion or green onion
instructions: Mix chickpea flour with turmeric, red chili powder, black pepper, and baking powder.
Gradually add water to form a thick batter.
Add salt, green pepper, and chopped onion to the batter and let it rest for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and drop spoonfuls of the batter into the oil.
Fry until golden brown.

23b13c83-20a6-41e0-9e94-222d3c7623d6.name: Pasta with Chicken Alfredo Sauce
23b13c83-20a6-41e0-9e94-222d3c7623d6.description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with tender chicken and a hint of nutmeg.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in butter until soft.
Add flour and cook for 1 minute.
Mix chicken and bouillon cube, then sauté in butter.
Add Alfredo sauce and simmer for 2 minutes.
Cook pasta in boiling water with oil, then drain.
Mix cream, Parmesan, and nutmeg with the sauce.
Combine with cooked pasta and serve.
Optionally, add food coloring for a decorative touch.

7eec6973-bc8d-431d-a521-b079aef452af.name: Beef Stroganoff
7eec6973-bc8d-431d-a521-b079aef452af.description: A creamy and savory beef dish with mushrooms and onions.
instructions: Peel the onion and wash the mushrooms quickly under cold water, then dry them with a towel and add lemon juice to prevent browning.
Chop the mushrooms and onion, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large pan, and sauté the onion and mushrooms.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Slice the beef into half-centimeter thick pieces and then cut each slice into half-centimeter strips.
Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil to the pan, and once heated, add the mushrooms and onions, then fry the remaining beef in the same way.
Add mustard, salt, and pepper to the beef, then stir in the cream, bring to a boil, remove from heat, and serve.

33b71d54-6c40-4b2a-91fa-f707c0d46792.name: Puffed Shrimp Fritters with Tartar Sauce
33b71d54-6c40-4b2a-91fa-f707c0d46792.description: Crispy shrimp fritters served with tangy tartar sauce for a delightful treat.
instructions: Make a shallow cut on the back of the shrimp and remove the intestine, then rinse and drain.
Marinate the cleaned shrimp with lemon juice and salt for 30 minutes in the refrigerator.
Whisk all ingredients except egg whites until combined, then gradually add flour until smooth.
In another bowl, beat egg whites with a pinch of salt until stiff, then fold into the mixture.
Let the batter rest for an hour at room temperature.
Add parsley and chopped tomato to the batter and mix well.
Coat the shrimp in flour, dip in the batter, and fry in hot oil until golden.
Serve garnished with vegetables and tartar sauce.

a96e11af-ca37-4562-a7c9-f875b31f136e.name: Chicken, Cauliflower, and Onion Fritters
a96e11af-ca37-4562-a7c9-f875b31f136e.description: Crispy fritters made with chicken, cauliflower, and onions, perfect for a delightful snack.
instructions: Cut the cooked chicken into desired pieces.
Divide the cooked cauliflower into small florets.
Slice the onion and separate the rings.
Beat the eggs with salt, pepper, spices, and saffron solution using a whisk.
Add the other ingredients and mix well, gradually adding flour until smooth.
Dip the chicken and cauliflower pieces into the batter, then fry in hot oil.
Coat the onion rings in flour, dip them in the batter, and fry in hot oil.

4e18d829-c09c-4220-88f8-37afcb162b05.name: Bord Fish
4e18d829-c09c-4220-88f8-37afcb162b05.description: A delicious meat-filled pastry baked to golden perfection.
ingredients: spices, salt, pepper, coriander, and cinnamon to taste
instructions: Mix eggs, milk, and oil, then gradually add flour, salt, baking powder, and sugar until a smooth dough forms.
Roll out the dough into a rectangle on aluminum foil, create grooves, fill with cooled meat mixture, fold, and bake.

cf22f70c-2288-419b-afdc-b88a9cc788bf.name: Onion and Potato Fritters
cf22f70c-2288-419b-afdc-b88a9cc788bf.description: Crispy fritters made with onions and potatoes, perfect for a savory snack.
instructions: Mix milk, egg, and butter together, then add flour and stir until smooth.
Add the remaining ingredients, pour 1/4 cup of the mixture into a pan to cook and puff up, then flip to fry the other side. Serve with sour cream.

f88b6ce0-b48d-4591-bb62-732c19654cc2.name: Chicken Ham Croissant
f88b6ce0-b48d-4591-bb62-732c19654cc2.description: Delicious flaky croissants filled with chicken ham and herbs.
instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water with sugar and let it sit for 5 minutes.
Mix flour in a bowl, create a well, and add beaten egg and oil.
Incorporate the yeast mixture and butter, knead for 5 minutes, then let it rise until doubled.
Roll out the dough on a floured surface, cut into triangles, and fill with sauce, oregano, and ham.
Roll the triangles from the base and place on a greased tray, let rest for 5 minutes.
Brush with beaten egg, sprinkle sesame seeds, and bake at 180°C (360°F) for 15 minutes until golden.

f5f6ab2d-5e8e-48be-bc47-acfb05b13bb2.name: Honey Soy Chicken Wings
f5f6ab2d-5e8e-48be-bc47-acfb05b13bb2.description: Delicious chicken wings marinated in a sweet and savory honey soy sauce.
ingredients: 1 tbsp almond oil or vegetable oil
instructions: Separate the wing tips and cut the joint ends.
Carefully slide the knife along the bone to separate the meat from the skin.
Mix light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, honey, brown sugar, minced garlic, water, and ginger in a bowl.
Marinate the chicken wings in the mixture for 2 hours.
Heat a pan over medium heat and add the marinated wings with the sauce.
Cook for 10 minutes, then remove the lid and stir for 5 minutes until wings are browned.
Serve in a suitable dish.

2ac87615-6e3b-46af-bedb-e61094ce67e9.name: Islim Kebab
2ac87615-6e3b-46af-bedb-e61094ce67e9.description: Delicious skewers of beef and eggplant, baked to perfection.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Heat margarine and fry the beef pieces until browned.
Remove beef and sauté chopped onion until golden.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper, and turmeric; stir for a few minutes.
Pour in water and let the beef cook thoroughly.
Peel eggplants in stripes, cut into 3-4 pieces, and soak in salted water for 15 minutes.
Dry the eggplants and fry both sides in oil.
Layer two eggplant pieces in a cross, place 2-3 pieces of beef in the center, and fold the edges over the meat.
Slice tomatoes and cut peppers in half; secure them on top with toothpicks.
Arrange in a tray, add beef broth, and bake at 160°C for 15 minutes.

c41d055d-fba1-440a-9073-37065a1aef08.name: Russian Chicken Kiev
c41d055d-fba1-440a-9073-37065a1aef08.description: Delicious chicken breast filled with herb-infused butter, crispy and golden.
instructions: Soften the butter at room temperature, then mix in grated garlic, lemon zest, chopped tarragon, and nutmeg.
Wrap the butter mixture in plastic and freeze until firm.
Stuff the chicken breasts with the frozen butter, folding and securing with toothpicks if necessary.
Optionally, cut the chicken into pieces or leave whole, then dip in egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry in hot oil until golden and cooked through.

bfb7e665-9fdd-428a-a39c-e1a8db782003.name: Galani
bfb7e665-9fdd-428a-a39c-e1a8db782003.description: A delicious rolled chicken dish with nuts and spices.
ingredients: salt, pepper, and spices to taste
instructions: Grind the skinless chicken and freeze until firm but not frozen.
Mix the chicken with onion, bell peppers, pistachio, almond slivers, and egg yolks until sticky.
Lay out aluminum foil, grease with oil, and place the meat mixture in the center.
Roll tightly like a sausage and boil water in a pot.
Optionally add carrots, parsley, lemon, salt, and green pepper to the boiling water.
Place the chicken roll in the boiling water and cook for 45 minutes.
Allow to cool completely before slicing.

50530e05-9f4b-4361-bd29-41af01b8aa72.name: Vegetable Rice with Noodles
50530e05-9f4b-4361-bd29-41af01b8aa72.description: A delightful rice dish with crispy noodles and aromatic spices.
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it for 2 hours.
Fry the broken noodles in oil until golden brown.
Drain excess water from the rice and add it to the noodles.
Pour enough water to cover the rice by a finger's width.
Add salt and oil, mix well.
Increase heat until boiling, then reduce heat.
Once water is absorbed, cover and steam on low heat.

11c78cb6-102b-4526-979e-d77cf83fb551.name: Pizza Puff
11c78cb6-102b-4526-979e-d77cf83fb551.description: Delicious pastry filled with sausage, ham, cheese, and vegetables.
instructions: Mix flour in a bowl, create a well, and add yeast, sugar, and oil.
Gradually add warm water, knead, and let rise for 30 minutes covered.
Combine filling ingredients and place 3 tablespoons in the center of a rolled-out dough circle.
Moisten edges with water, seal, shape like a crescent, and deep fry on low heat until cooked through.

1537e0b4-269d-46ea-a361-012aede1dffb.name: Beef Stroganoff
1537e0b4-269d-46ea-a361-012aede1dffb.description: A creamy and savory beef dish, perfect with crispy potatoes.
instructions: Chop the onions into small cubes and the pickled cucumber into strips.
Clean the mushrooms and slice them thinly, then cut the meat into thin strips.
Sauté half of the onions in butter without browning them.
Add the mushrooms and sauté, then reduce heat and add sour cream and regular cream, seasoning with salt and pepper.
In another pan, heat oil and fry the meat over high heat.
After two minutes, add the remaining onions and let the dish rest for about 2 minutes.
For the best accompaniment, prepare fried potatoes by washing them with skin and boiling in salted water until slightly firm.
Peel and slice the potatoes, then fry them in butter and oil the next day, adding fresh rosemary or parsley at the end.

4a551489-ab75-4abc-a589-695b8d00ea5c.name: Chinese Egg Rolls
4a551489-ab75-4abc-a589-695b8d00ea5c.description: Crispy rolls filled with savory vegetables and spices, perfect for a snack.
ingredients: Black and red pepper, Ginger powder (to taste)
instructions: Chop all vegetables and sauté them in a pan.
Add soy sauce, zucchini, and spices; once vegetables are soft, fill egg roll wrappers, fold, and roll tightly.
Fry in oil until golden brown.

97bce87c-36ca-4c6e-b019-8665f13f6f25.name: Cannelloni with Mushrooms and Spinach
97bce87c-36ca-4c6e-b019-8665f13f6f25.description: Delicious cannelloni filled with sautéed mushrooms and spinach, topped with cheese.
instructions: Chop the mushrooms, finely dice the onion, and mince the garlic.
Sauté the spinach in 2 tablespoons of olive oil.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté the onion, garlic, mushrooms, and spinach together.
Blanch the cannelloni sheets in boiling water for 6 to 10 minutes until soft.
Place the sautéed mixture on the softened cannelloni sheets.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 350°F for 30 minutes, then serve.

e014cd6b-6d8c-4aaa-96e3-82da1bcdd214.name: Simit - Turkey
e014cd6b-6d8c-4aaa-96e3-82da1bcdd214.description: Delicious sesame-covered bread rings, perfect for breakfast or snacks.
instructions: In a suitable bowl, mix flour, yeast, sugar, enhancer, and eggs with a wooden spoon.
Add warm milk and water to the mixture, then add salt and oil, mixing well.
Knead the dough by hand for 8-10 minutes.
Place the dough in a floured bowl, cover with a cloth, and let it rest in a warm place for 40-50 minutes.
Knead the risen dough for 1 minute and divide it into 6 pieces of approximately 140g each.
Roll each piece on a floured surface, twist into a long shape, and form into a ring.
Dip the ring in water and roll in sesame seeds, then place on a greased tray with space between them.
Let them rest for 20 minutes covered.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F) and bake for 30 minutes on the middle rack.

8c751180-a061-4c09-a38a-123c09753834.name: Bread with Cheese and Green Onion
8c751180-a061-4c09-a38a-123c09753834.description: Delicious bread filled with cheddar cheese and green onions, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Mix flour, salt, and sugar; add softened butter.
Combine water, yeast, and a spoonful of sugar; knead until smooth.
Add oil, cheese, and green onion to the dough; mix well.
Divide dough into desired sizes and let it rise until doubled.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 15-20 minutes.

89ad95d5-9971-49e1-9bc3-dde2bd9d4f9d.name: Borek with Yufka Dough
89ad95d5-9971-49e1-9bc3-dde2bd9d4f9d.description: Delicious layers of flaky dough filled with savory meat and rice.
ingredients: Salt, black and red pepper to taste
instructions: Mix yogurt, egg, salt, baking powder, and butter; add flour until dough is non-sticky.
Rest dough for 30 minutes, then sauté onions and add meat until cooked.
Add rice and parsley, cook briefly, then roll out dough and layer with oil.
Place in a greased baking dish, add filling, cover with more dough, and cut into squares.
Bake at 200°C for 30 minutes until golden; optionally brush with egg yolk.

80aa0ab2-f4f8-4ef5-b065-730b7e276833.name: Zucchini and Eggplant Rolls
80aa0ab2-f4f8-4ef5-b065-730b7e276833.description: Delicious rolls filled with meat, cheese, and grilled vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Trim the ends of the eggplants and zucchinis, then slice them into half-centimeter thick sheets and sprinkle with salt.
Brush the eggplant and zucchini sheets with oil and grill until golden.
In another pan, sauté the onion in oil, add ground meat, salt, and pepper until browned.
Add crushed garlic and tomato paste, then stir in chopped parsley and remove from heat.
Layer a grilled zucchini and eggplant sheet, add meat mixture, place a piece of cheese, and roll them up.
Secure with toothpicks and soak toothpicks in water for 2 hours beforehand.
Arrange the rolls in a baking dish and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes until cheese melts.

a97936aa-fe60-4a4e-8a27-0f4a2f3bf2dc.name: Thai Omelette
a97936aa-fe60-4a4e-8a27-0f4a2f3bf2dc.description: A flavorful omelette packed with minced meat, tomatoes, and herbs.
instructions: Crack the eggs into fish sauce and mix well.
Add sautéed minced meat and onion to the eggs.
Incorporate garlic and sauté the mixture.
Season with salt and pepper.
Chop the tomato and mix it with the minced meat.
Garnish with coriander or slices of cucumber and tomato.

9978bf12-3dc0-483a-8cb2-b63e4f9e54c9.name: Italian Shrimp Dish
9978bf12-3dc0-483a-8cb2-b63e4f9e54c9.description: A creamy and flavorful shrimp dish with a hint of beer.
instructions: Clean the shrimp and soak them in beer for 12 hours.
Grate the tomatoes and add them to a pan with olive oil.
Once the tomato water evaporates, beat the eggs separately and mix them with the tomato.
Add cream to the mixture and set aside.
Chop the garlic and onion, sauté them in olive oil until golden, then add the shrimp and stir-fry.
Spread the shrimp on a plate and pour the prepared sauce over it.

1ff20a54-b7ff-4e19-81ce-d4c0de40c5bd.name: Lamb Curry with Vegetables
1ff20a54-b7ff-4e19-81ce-d4c0de40c5bd.description: A rich and flavorful lamb curry with fresh vegetables and coconut milk.
instructions: Sauté chopped onions with curry sauce until softened.
Add cubed lamb and cook until browned, then stir in pureed tomatoes.
Increase heat to boil the tomato juice, then reduce and simmer covered for 1 hour.
Fry cubed potatoes and zucchini separately, then add to the pot.
Drain lentils and add after 10 minutes; add boiling water if needed.
Simmer uncovered for 15 minutes until lentils and potatoes are soft.
Stir in coconut milk, spinach, cilantro, and green chilies.
Cook for an additional 30 minutes before serving.

f19d1256-447e-4271-964d-e18541c2d35c.name: Kam Chori Puree
f19d1256-447e-4271-964d-e18541c2d35c.description: A creamy and flavorful potato puree, perfect as a side or appetizer.
ingredients: half a teacup of strained yogurt
instructions: Boil the potatoes with skin and hard-boil the eggs separately.
Mix the spices and dried herbs together.
Take the butter out of the fridge 30 minutes before use to reach room temperature.
Peel the boiled potatoes, grate them finely, and add the butter.
Mix with a spoon, grate the hard-boiled eggs, and add to the mixture.
Combine the milk and yogurt, whisking with a fork until smooth.
Gradually add this mixture to the potato mixture while stirring continuously.
Add the mixed spices and herbs to the mixture.
Use a masher to mash everything until it becomes a smooth and stretchy puree.
Cover the puree with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours to firm up and enhance the flavor.
Transfer the puree into a piping bag and fill a serving dish using a large star nozzle.
Top each swirl with a pomegranate seed, sprinkle some black pepper, and serve cold.

27192b70-0598-47e6-bdc6-1248e445b10a.name: Fried Chicken
27192b70-0598-47e6-bdc6-1248e445b10a.description: Crispy and flavorful fried chicken, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Boil chicken pieces with onion, water, and salt until slightly cooked (about 20 minutes).
Beat the eggs in a bowl until well mixed.
Sift the all-purpose flour into a flat dish.
Mix breadcrumbs and spices in another flat dish.
Coat the cooled chicken pieces in flour, then dip in eggs, and finally coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a deep pan until hot, ensuring the oil is sufficient to reduce absorption.
Fry the chicken pieces in hot oil for 6-10 minutes until golden brown.
Place fried chicken on a paper towel to absorb excess oil.
Sprinkle garlic powder and oregano on top before serving, if desired.

5e103147-72b8-486d-83d0-e28bb41adc53.name: Maruka
5e103147-72b8-486d-83d0-e28bb41adc53.description: A flavorful chicken dish with aromatic spices and vegetables, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Half a glass of garlic powder
Half a glass of carrots and zucchini
instructions: Sauté chicken with one sliced onion until the raw smell disappears, then add a dried lime and 3 cups of water.
Simmer for one hour, ensuring about 2 cups of broth remain.
Sauté the remaining onion until golden, add grated tomato, and reduce until dry.
Add chopped green pepper and saffron to the tomato mixture, cover to thicken the sauce.
Remove onion and lime from the broth, dissolve curry powder and salt, and add to the sauce with cumin and black pepper.
Add chicken to the sauce, simmer with a partially open lid until fully cooked.
Grill chicken in the oven at 150°C for 15 minutes, or microwave for 5-6 minutes.
Boil carrots and zucchini separately with water and salt, then drizzle with lemon juice.
Serve grilled chicken with vegetables and remaining sauce, garnished with garlic and oregano powder.

87911c4f-ff72-40bc-a6dc-36d7ecb0f052.name: Rice Croquettes
87911c4f-ff72-40bc-a6dc-36d7ecb0f052.description: Deliciously crispy rice croquettes filled with spiced meat and herbs.
ingredients: salt, black pepper, curry powder as needed
instructions: Soak rice for an hour with water and salt, then cook without yogurt and saffron.
Sauté finely chopped onion in oil with turmeric until soft, then add ground meat and cook until browned.
Add tomato paste and cook briefly, then mix in chopped boiled egg, parsley, and barberries.
Season with salt, pepper, and curry powder, add water, and let cook until flavors meld.
Let the mixture cool, then process cooked rice until smooth, adding black pepper and two eggs.
Shape rice mixture around meat filling, then coat in breadcrumbs and beaten egg.
Fry croquettes in hot oil until golden, then drain on paper towels and serve.

8dd39683-4694-461e-87f4-f78c179d581c.name: English Baked Potatoes
8dd39683-4694-461e-87f4-f78c179d581c.description: Deliciously baked potatoes stuffed with herbs and cheese, perfect as a side dish.
instructions: Wash the potatoes thoroughly with a brush or sponge.
Bake the potatoes either wrapped in foil at 250°C for 15 minutes or in a pot with salt for 45 minutes.
After baking, make a shallow cut on each potato and fill with herbs and cheese.
Wrap the potatoes in foil again and bake at 120°C for another 15 minutes.
Serve the potatoes warm, optionally alongside steamed fish.

bc5e03ac-e17d-4a63-8c60-6cf619f1f55c.name: Vegetable Roll
bc5e03ac-e17d-4a63-8c60-6cf619f1f55c.description: A delicious vegetable roll baked to perfection with a cheesy topping.
instructions: Heat 3 teaspoons of oil in a pan and add corn flour, sauté for 3 minutes until golden.
In another pan, sauté onion and garlic until slightly golden, then mix in green onion, cilantro, and vinegar with tomato sauce.
Add water and after a few minutes, mix in the grated tomato.
Grease a dish, spread the prepared dough, layer the mixture, top with cheese, cilantro, and sour cream.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 10 minutes.

4479ccf2-411e-4638-a501-7f881ae05ab7.name: French Onion Soup
4479ccf2-411e-4638-a501-7f881ae05ab7.description: A rich and savory soup topped with melted cheese and served with crispy bread.
instructions: Sauté the onions in a pot until soft, then add soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Add chicken stock and thin béchamel sauce along with bay leaves, simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Remove bay leaves, stir in lemon juice, and add cheese, heating for another 5 minutes.
Serve with toasted bread pieces fried in butter.

de71e5ba-cca7-4bd2-ad02-b959bef2a3ab.name: Aboulaboula
de71e5ba-cca7-4bd2-ad02-b959bef2a3ab.description: A colorful vegetable stew bursting with flavors and textures.
ingredients: Spices: salt, black pepper, a pinch of cinnamon, thyme (optional), corn (optional)
instructions: Chop the onions and sauté them in a small pot over low heat.
Once the onions are cooked, add finely chopped potatoes and cover the pot.
Wash and chop the carrots and bell pepper, then add them to the pot and cover again.
Slice the zucchini and eggplants, then add them to the pot after a few minutes.
After 5 minutes, add chopped tomatoes, season with salt, and cover for 15-20 minutes on low heat.
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking, and serve when ready.

b9de4387-a33a-4199-9b85-32ca8f1bf250.name: Ratatouille for Two
b9de4387-a33a-4199-9b85-32ca8f1bf250.description: A delicious vegetable medley bursting with flavor and freshness.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons grated pizza cheese or Parmesan cheese
instructions: Chop the onion coarsely and sauté on high heat for 3 minutes.
Add chopped bell pepper and keep the heat high, adjusting oil to prevent sticking.
After 3 minutes, finely chop garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add diagonally sliced eggplant and zucchini (at least 2 cm thick) and cook for 10-15 minutes.
Lower the heat slightly if sticking occurs, ensuring vegetables fry well without steaming.

32e7dfd6-a47f-4371-a5c1-96f776fa7b31.name: French Meat Roll
32e7dfd6-a47f-4371-a5c1-96f776fa7b31.description: A savory meat roll filled with chicken and cheese, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Mix ground meat with chopped vegetables, onions, salt, pepper, eggs, and dissolved saffron.
Flatten the meat into a rectangle on greased foil, layer with chicken and cheese, then roll it up.
Bake the roll in the oven at 250°C (464°F) for 35 minutes.
Serve with lemon slices, tomatoes, and parsley.

03e4b614-62b4-48b2-8cdd-e97f4c722a91.name: Potato Croquettes
03e4b614-62b4-48b2-8cdd-e97f4c722a91.description: Crispy potato croquettes filled with savory chicken or meat, served with a delicious tomato sauce.
ingredients: 4-5 pieces of chicken or meat cocktail
instructions: Cut the cocktails into quarters and fry them in oil, then set aside.
Grate the potatoes and mix with egg, salt, pepper, and turmeric. Add flour if the mixture is too loose.
Take a small ball of the mixture, flatten it, and place a cocktail in the center. Fold the sides to enclose the cocktail.
Roll the croquettes in breadcrumbs to coat them evenly and refrigerate for an hour.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the croquettes on low heat until golden brown.
Peel and chop the tomatoes, sauté them in oil, and add salt, pepper, and turmeric.
Add green peas and corn, then turn off the heat and pour the sauce over the croquettes.

84bf07ec-8409-4db7-b801-e3690822dbd5.name: Italian Chicken Dish
84bf07ec-8409-4db7-b801-e3690822dbd5.description: A delicious roasted chicken dish with a flavorful tomato and herb sauce.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 210°C.
Bake bread pieces for 6 minutes until golden.
Tie the chicken wings and thighs securely.
Place the chicken breast-side up in a baking tray.
Season the chicken with olive oil, black pepper, and salt.
Rub butter on the chicken and bake for 40 minutes.
In a bowl, mix tomatoes, garlic, parsley, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
Add toasted bread and remaining oil, mix well.
Cover the dish tightly or with foil and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove the cover and bake for an additional 12 minutes.
Let the chicken cool for 10 minutes, then cut into pieces.
Mix the chicken with the prepared sauce and serve.

abd960a7-4eda-4c04-be11-b044989d4452.name: Beef
abd960a7-4eda-4c04-be11-b044989d4452.description: Juicy beef steak with a flavorful mushroom sauce, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Pound the beef to a thickness of 1.5 to 2 cm for even cooking.
Heat a skillet until very hot, add a little olive oil.
Sear the beef for about 2 minutes on each side, avoiding overcooking.
Prepare the sauce by chopping parsley, basil, and garlic; clean and chop mushrooms.
Sauté chopped onion in oil until golden, then add mushrooms and cook.
Add parsley and basil, sauté briefly, then stir in garlic.
Pour in the cream and let it simmer for a few minutes.

a3195c7e-9dd6-46b2-a402-2cc8f36837a0.name: Meat Roll with Mushrooms
a3195c7e-9dd6-46b2-a402-2cc8f36837a0.description: A savory meat roll filled with mushrooms and vegetables, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Wash and slice the mushrooms, then sauté them in 1 tablespoon of oil until the moisture evaporates.
Mix the ground meat with onion, chickpea flour, eggs, salt, and pepper until sticky.
Spread the meat mixture on parchment paper to a thickness of 2 cm.
Place mushrooms on the meat, leaving a finger-width space at the edges.
Chop the dried apricots into strips and sprinkle them with sautéed barberries over the mushrooms.
Place boiled carrots in the center and roll the meat using the parchment paper.
Fry the roll in hot oil until golden, then add tomato paste and 2 cups of water.
Cook until the roll is done and the sauce thickens, then coat the roll with sauce and serve garnished with vegetables.

28e3e318-47c0-4a81-a277-d0b40638a57f.name: Thai Turkey Scallops
28e3e318-47c0-4a81-a277-d0b40638a57f.description: Deliciously tender turkey scallops seasoned with fresh herbs and spices.
ingredients: 1-2 red or green chili peppers, finely chopped
instructions: Cut the turkey fillet into four thick circles.
Place in a freezer bag and pound to 1 cm thickness.
Remove from the bag and season with scallions, chili, and salt.
Return to the bag and pound to 0.5 cm thickness.
Heat oil in a large skillet.
Dredge turkey pieces in flour, shaking off excess.
Fry in oil over medium heat for 10 minutes, flipping once.
Garnish with lemon slices if desired.

f1fa03c3-02fc-4948-909c-a5105c184fc5.name: Karado Dish
f1fa03c3-02fc-4948-909c-a5105c184fc5.description: Delicious meatballs stuffed with salad and served with crispy potato chips.
instructions: Grate and sauté one onion, then extract juice from the second onion.
Mix bread crumbs with onion juice and add to the meat along with one egg, mixing well.
Form small meatballs, making a hole in the center, and fry them in hot oil.
Stuff each meatball with salad, slice potatoes into chips, and fry them.
Peel and cut the tomato into small pieces, shaping them into flowers to place on the meatballs.
Garnish with parsley stems next to the tomato.

81a0a362-8ffd-4b5f-b1f0-45a73533239e.name: Italian Lasagna
81a0a362-8ffd-4b5f-b1f0-45a73533239e.description: A delicious layered pasta dish with meat, cheese, and creamy sauce.
instructions: Sauté ground meat with fried onions and 2 tablespoons of oil until cooked.
Add tomato paste, salt, and pepper; simmer until oil separates.
Boil lasagna sheets in salted water with oil until soft, then rinse with cold water.
Layer lasagna sheets, meat mixture, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes until cheese is golden.

ad4922e6-8430-46f0-8e5d-6e9cfc9e199b.name: Calzone
ad4922e6-8430-46f0-8e5d-6e9cfc9e199b.description: Delicious Italian stuffed pastry filled with sausage, cheese, and herbs.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil for one minute.
Add tomato, basil, chopped sausage, and olives; remove from heat and let cool.
Mix yeast, sugar, and warm water in a bowl; cover and let sit for 10 minutes.
In another bowl, combine flour, salt, and oil; add the activated yeast and knead for 5 minutes.
Cover the dough with a cloth and let rise in a warm place for one hour.
Divide the dough into two parts and roll out to 25 cm circles.
Fill half of each circle with the mixture and top with half of the cheese.
Fold the dough over and seal the edges tightly.
Place calzones on a baking sheet, brush with milk, and poke holes with a fork.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 40 minutes.

7be1a871-4732-4884-87c5-86059af481d6.name: Spanish Soup
7be1a871-4732-4884-87c5-86059af481d6.description: A hearty soup rich in flavors, perfect for cold winter nights.
instructions: Place the beef bone in a pot, add water, and bring to a boil.
Remove the bone and rinse it to eliminate impurities.
Add two chopped onions to the pot to reduce any unpleasant odors.
Add barley, onions, and cabbage, and let cook for 2 hours.
If using a pressure cooker, add a little salt to prevent discoloration.
Stir in tomato paste until the soup is fully colored.
Add cilantro, pepper, and salt in the final cooking stage.
Boil a few more times, ensuring the greens retain their color.
Optionally, garnish with fresh lemon for extra flavor.

af844cbd-94cd-4ef7-ab6c-145cb3b3527c.name: Spaghetti Frittata
af844cbd-94cd-4ef7-ab6c-145cb3b3527c.description: A delicious Italian-inspired frittata with pasta, cheese, and vegetables.
instructions: Sauté sliced mushrooms in vegetable oil in a pan.
Add bell pepper, ham, peas, and pasta, and stir-fry.
Mix milk, cream, and eggs, then pour over the mixture.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top, cover, and reduce heat.
Once the cheese melts completely, your dish is ready.

4c0f581e-26c5-4ffe-91d9-d925d2aafbff.name: Mushroom Chips
4c0f581e-26c5-4ffe-91d9-d925d2aafbff.description: Crispy and flavorful mushroom chips, perfect for snacking.
instructions: Trim the tough stems of the mushrooms and clean them carefully.
Sprinkle with salt and coat in flour.
Beat the eggs with salt, pepper, and cream.
Dip the mushrooms in the egg mixture.
Mix breadcrumbs with grated cheese.
Coat the mushrooms in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently.
Heat oil in a deep pan.
Fry the mushrooms one by one until crispy, ensuring they don't burn.
Place fried mushroom chips on a rack to drain excess oil.

13e5231c-cb20-45e9-bd61-770d8f2946dd.name: Pastitsio
13e5231c-cb20-45e9-bd61-770d8f2946dd.description: A delicious Greek pasta dish layered with meat sauce and creamy topping.
instructions: Heat olive oil, sauté onions and ground meat until browned.
Add tomatoes, tomato juice, and cinnamon; simmer until thickened.
Let cool, then mix in a beaten egg.
Melt butter, add flour, and cook until bubbly.
Gradually add milk, bring to a boil, then mix in cheese and egg yolks.
Cook macaroni in boiling water until soft, then drain.
Mix macaroni with eggs and cheese, place in a baking dish.
Layer meat sauce over macaroni, then top with the creamy mixture.
Sprinkle breadcrumbs on top and bake uncovered for about an hour until browned.
Let cool before serving.

07c9a52d-c0db-44cc-bbae-88d5b1c06b37.name: Pizza History
07c9a52d-c0db-44cc-bbae-88d5b1c06b37.description: Discover the rich history of pizza from ancient times to modern Italy.
instructions: Prepare flatbread and bake it on a stone.
Top with olive oil, herbs, and honey before serving.

75d0fb2b-d739-495a-bc52-456c98674b14.name: Broccoli Pie (German Style)
75d0fb2b-d739-495a-bc52-456c98674b14.description: A savory pie filled with broccoli, eggs, and cream, baked to perfection.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and grated garlic in oil for 5 minutes until golden.
Add chopped broccoli, salt, and pepper, and cook for 5 minutes on low heat.
Mix eggs with cream, add salt and nutmeg, then combine with other ingredients.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 200°C for 30 minutes.

c662814d-92f2-4baf-98d2-00796cd7947e.name: Spanish Plate
c662814d-92f2-4baf-98d2-00796cd7947e.description: A delicious chicken and mushroom dish with a creamy sauce.
instructions: Cook the chicken fillet with 4 cups of water for 45 minutes, adding salt, turmeric, and a bit of cinnamon. Dice the fillets.
Chop the mushrooms and onions, sauté them with a bit of salt and lemon juice in olive oil.
Sauté the chicken fillet separately in a pan.
Add the sautéed mushrooms to the chicken, pour the sauce over, and heat for 2 minutes.
The dish is ready to serve.
For the sauce: Heat some oil in a pot, add chopped onions until soft.
Add the flour and sauté until golden.
Gradually add warm chicken broth, then slowly add milk, stirring until it reaches a boil.
Add soy sauce, cream, and a bit of salt and pepper, stirring until the consistency is like yogurt.

a9b1201b-fb65-4310-a5df-36ce3b87253c.name: German Style Potato and Chicken Bake
a9b1201b-fb65-4310-a5df-36ce3b87253c.description: A delicious baked dish with potatoes, chicken, and creamy cheese sauce.
ingredients: Red pepper powder and salt to taste
instructions: Peel and slice the potatoes, then fry them in plenty of oil and drain.
Blend the cheeses with milk, salt, and red pepper until well mixed.
Sauté garlic in a little oil, then add sliced cooked chicken and sauté briefly.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and let it simmer on low heat until it boils.
Pour the mixture into an oiled baking dish and bake at 170°C for 30 minutes.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle pizza cheese on top, and return until golden.

9814056b-add4-403a-bc36-0f0e3a758a4d.name: Italian Chicken with Olives
9814056b-add4-403a-bc36-0f0e3a758a4d.description: A savory chicken dish infused with olives and aromatic herbs.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Season chicken with salt and pepper, fry for 8 minutes until golden, then remove.
Sauté onion and garlic for 5 minutes until soft.
Add rosemary and vinegar, boil until reduced to 1/4 cup.
Add chicken broth, tomatoes, chicken, olives, and remaining salt, cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Mash garlic in the dish, add black pepper and basil.
Once it boils, remove from heat and serve.

a1f21779-4073-4236-99c0-667e4bff5d99.name: Swiss Breakfast
a1f21779-4073-4236-99c0-667e4bff5d99.description: A hearty and nutritious breakfast packed with grains, nuts, and dried fruits.
ingredients: 1/2 cup soy milk or non-fat milk
instructions: Mix all ingredients together (serves 8).
Boil 2 cups of water, add 1/4 cup of the mixture, reduce heat, and cook uncovered for 7 minutes.
Turn off the heat, cover, and let sit for 2 minutes.
Serve with low-fat milk or soy milk.
For the second recipe, boil water and salt, add barley, stir, and cook until absorbed.
After 5 minutes, add cinnamon, raisins, and walnuts, cover, and let sit for 5 minutes.
Serve with milk and honey.

35220963-14e3-406a-8a55-ec9ce214c97d.name: Mexican Corn
35220963-14e3-406a-8a55-ec9ce214c97d.description: Deliciously seasoned corn with a creamy texture and a crunchy finish.
instructions: Prepare corn by either using canned or fresh corn.
If using fresh corn, remove kernels carefully.
Steam the corn until cooked, about 15 to 30 minutes.
Add salt, thyme, and margarine to the cooked corn.
Mix in mayonnaise and a little lemon juice.
Sauté mushrooms separately and combine with corn.
Add pizza cheese and let it melt.
Top with julienned chips just before serving.

6c26037f-45a4-466c-a5f3-14f5e9ddce0d.name: Traditional Limousine Rice
6c26037f-45a4-466c-a5f3-14f5e9ddce0d.description: A flavorful rice dish with chicken, carrots, and spices, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Fry the chicken pieces and set them aside.
Fry the onions separately.
Soak the rice in cold water for one hour, then boil and drain it.
In a large pot, combine fried onions, fried chicken, grated carrots, raisins, green peas, tomato paste, spices, and cardamom.
Finally, add the drained rice, mix well, and let it steam on low heat.

2d90f888-db82-402f-97ea-597ee10ae5d8.name: Mediterranean Okra Stew
2d90f888-db82-402f-97ea-597ee10ae5d8.description: A flavorful okra stew with tomatoes and spices, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: a handful of fresh coriander leaves
instructions: Preheat the oven to 190°C (350°F). Wash and slice the okra into rings.
Peel and chop the tomatoes and one onion. Blend the onion, garlic, water, coriander, green and red peppers until smooth.
Slice the second onion into thin strips and sauté in oil over medium heat until golden.
Reduce heat, add the blended mixture to the sautéed onion and cook for 2 minutes, stirring regularly. Then add tomatoes, okra, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Transfer the mixture to an oven-safe dish and bake for 15 minutes until the okra is fully cooked.

6bf3740b-a8a7-4753-9e7f-f75c6eaa87b9.name: Mexican Rice
6bf3740b-a8a7-4753-9e7f-f75c6eaa87b9.description: A vibrant and flavorful rice dish with chicken and vegetables.
instructions: Chop the onion and sauté it with turmeric, black, and red pepper.
Cut the chicken into small pieces and add to the sautéed onion.
Add cooked peas and corn, then season with salt and add a little water to cook.
Add bell peppers, drain the rice, and layer the mixture with the rice.
Let it steam, then mold it into shape and garnish.

5b671b3e-9f89-4f97-b89c-0b8f8eae43f7.name: Mexican Bean Soup
5b671b3e-9f89-4f97-b89c-0b8f8eae43f7.description: A hearty and flavorful soup packed with beans and vegetables.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Soak the pinto beans overnight in cold water and cook them the next day.
Add carrots, garlic, onion, red pepper, and chicken broth to the beans and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend half of the mixture in a food processor until smooth, then return it to the pot.
Add tomatoes and celery, cooking for an additional 10-15 minutes until the celery is tender. Add boiling water if needed.
Cut the toast into small cubes and fry with the grated garlic in a little oil until golden. Drain excess oil.
Season with salt, pepper, and cilantro, heat for a few minutes, then serve with fried bread on top.

4353d209-9109-45ed-a083-c9c43387b094.name: Broccoli Pie (Germany)
4353d209-9109-45ed-a083-c9c43387b094.description: A savory pie filled with broccoli, eggs, and creamy goodness.
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and grated garlic in oil for 5 minutes until golden.
Add chopped broccoli, salt, and pepper; cook on low heat for 5 minutes.
Mix eggs with cream, add salt and nutmeg, then combine with other ingredients.
Bake in the middle of the oven at 200°C for 30 minutes.

23b23cd5-a3a2-44eb-b115-04248fc0fe61.name: Creamy Spinach Soup (Hungarian)
23b23cd5-a3a2-44eb-b115-04248fc0fe61.description: A rich and creamy spinach soup, perfect for a comforting meal.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Boil water in a pot and add spinach, cooking for 5-6 minutes.
2. Remove spinach, puree it in a food processor, and set the water aside.
3. Melt butter in a pan, sauté onions until golden, then add flour and cook for 1-2 minutes.
4. Add the onion-flour mixture to the reserved water and bring to a boil until slightly thickened.
5. Stir in the spinach puree and cream, heating until the soup thickens.
6. Season with salt and pepper.
7. Boil eggs in a small pot, then slice and place on top of the soup before serving.

83672fd8-3bf3-42e6-a804-3e25f2d991b8.name: Winter Vegetable Frittata (Italy)
83672fd8-3bf3-42e6-a804-3e25f2d991b8.description: A delicious frittata packed with seasonal vegetables and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat, add bell pepper, and sauté for 6-8 minutes, stirring frequently. Add half a teaspoon of cumin and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add sliced leeks to the mixture, cover, and cook for 4-5 minutes until soft. Season with salt and black pepper.
Wash spinach leaves and add them with their water to the skillet, cover, and cook for another 5 minutes until wilted.
In a separate bowl, beat eggs with salt, pepper, basil, parsley, and remaining cumin. Pour over the cooked vegetables and increase heat to set the eggs, covering the skillet.
Once the bottom is cooked, turn on the broiler and place the skillet in the oven to brown the top, watching carefully to avoid burning. Grate Parmesan on top before serving.

8a5130a6-7dcd-421f-b780-e1c1824067b3.name: Eggplant Dish (Italian Style)
8a5130a6-7dcd-421f-b780-e1c1824067b3.description: A savory baked eggplant dish layered with tomato sauce and cheese.
instructions: Peel and slice the eggplants into 5 cm thick rounds, sprinkle with salt, and cover with a cloth to drain.

Prepare tomato sauce with tomatoes, parsley, onion, butter, and flour. Fry the eggplants in oil, layer them in a greased dish, pour the sauce over, sprinkle with grated cheese and melted butter, and bake for one hour.

79fe44eb-e8c5-4627-bdaa-14cf2de23a3d.name: Chicken and Pepper Salad (Mexican)
79fe44eb-e8c5-4627-bdaa-14cf2de23a3d.description: A vibrant salad featuring chicken, peppers, and a creamy dressing.
instructions: Shred the cooked chicken and place it in a bowl.
Mix mayonnaise, yogurt, red pepper powder, tomato paste, and grated onion; let it sit.
Combine the mixture with chicken, add bell peppers and corn.
Serve with rice or bread as desired.

86feb7bf-2458-4a8f-b9d1-034f2392bebd.name: French Roti Fillet
86feb7bf-2458-4a8f-b9d1-034f2392bebd.description: A succulent beef fillet dish, perfect for special occasions.
instructions: Fold the fillet lengthwise or place two fillets side by side and tie with string.
Season the meat with pepper and sear in a tall-sided pan with some oil.
Once browned, reduce heat to cook through, basting with broth occasionally.
If broth runs out, add water and season with salt.
Once cooked and liquid is reduced, remove string, slice the meat, and serve with sauce, mashed potatoes, and peas.

c3e66e25-2bec-4855-8aaa-94728a62f828.name: Drachna (Russian Dish)
c3e66e25-2bec-4855-8aaa-94728a62f828.description: A savory baked dish with vegetables and creamy egg mixture.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Heat oil in a skillet and sauté green onions for 3 minutes. Add garlic and cook until soft.
Spread the mixture in a greased ceramic or Pyrex dish and layer with chopped tomatoes.
In a bowl, mix flour and milk until smooth, then gradually add whipped cream and mix with eggs.
Combine the egg mixture with butter and parsley, season with salt and pepper.
Pour the egg mixture over the vegetables and bake for 40-45 minutes until set.
Let cool, slice, and serve.

8b061d81-6c14-48b1-a720-e400bfabfabe.name: Chicken and Rice Burrito (Mexico)
8b061d81-6c14-48b1-a720-e400bfabfabe.description: Delicious burritos filled with chicken, rice, and cheese, perfect for a satisfying meal.
instructions: Boil rice in water for a few minutes and drain.
Heat oil in a pan, sauté onion until golden, then add cloves and oregano.
Add rice and grated tomato, cook until rice is done and tomato water evaporates.
Cook chicken, shred it, and mix with rice and cheddar cheese.
Preheat oven to 160°C (320°F). Wrap tortillas in foil and steam to soften.
Place chicken and rice mixture in tortillas and fold into bundles.
Place burritos in a baking dish, cover with foil, and heat in the oven.
Serve warm after preparing all burritos.

8b43193b-fadb-4a3c-b02d-c2591db241b4.name: Creamy Mushroom Soup with Cheese (Italy)
8b43193b-fadb-4a3c-b02d-c2591db241b4.description: A rich and creamy mushroom soup, perfect for a cozy meal.
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté in oil until translucent.
Chop the celery and add it to the onion, then add washed and chopped mushrooms.
Stir well, then add grated garlic, chicken broth, salt, and pepper.
Reduce heat and cook until soft, then strain and blend the mixture.
Return the blended mixture to the pot over low heat.
Sauté flour in butter, remove from heat, and gradually add milk until smooth.
Add this to the soup and cook until thickened.
Stir in cream and lemon juice, then serve with cubed Gouda and chopped parsley on top.

0ec73113-4776-4b1f-93aa-441db5a8eb91.name: Beef and Mushroom Casserole (Italian Style)
0ec73113-4776-4b1f-93aa-441db5a8eb91.description: A savory casserole layered with beef, mushrooms, and zucchini, topped with melted Parmesan.
ingredients: Salt, turmeric, and pepper to taste
instructions: Chop and sauté the onion in olive oil until golden, adding garlic, turmeric, and pepper near the end.
Add ground beef, tomato paste, and salt; stir for 2 minutes. Add water and vinegar, simmer for 10 minutes.

Sauté sliced zucchini and mushrooms in remaining olive oil. Layer sautéed mushrooms in a baking dish, followed by half the meat mixture, then zucchini, remaining meat, sliced tomatoes, salad seasoning, and drizzle with olive oil.
Top with grated Parmesan and bake for 10 minutes or microwave for 1.5 minutes, serve hot.

bc37968a-a5c8-4d9e-a854-ac6d8fa9aa9d.name: Pasta with Sauce (Italy)
bc37968a-a5c8-4d9e-a854-ac6d8fa9aa9d.description: A creamy and spicy pasta dish topped with Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Fry the sausages for 5 minutes until browned and remove from skillet.
Reduce heat, add onion and garlic, and sauté for 5 minutes until soft.
Add sausages, tomatoes, and salt; cover and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in black pepper, parsley, and cream.
In a large pot, bring water and salt to a boil, add pasta, and cook for 14 minutes.
Drain pasta, place in a dish, pour sauce over, garnish with Parmesan, and serve.

42fe99ac-308f-4ae9-973f-e7cac63d850c.name: Italian Chicken
42fe99ac-308f-4ae9-973f-e7cac63d850c.description: A flavorful roasted chicken dish with herbs and a savory tomato topping.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons dried rosemary or 2 tablespoons fresh chopped rosemary
instructions: Preheat the oven to 210°C (410°F). Toast the bread for 6 minutes until golden.
Tie the chicken wings and thighs. Place the chicken breast-side up in a baking dish, season with oil, pepper, and salt, then butter it and roast for 40 minutes.

In a bowl, mix tomatoes, garlic, parsley, rosemary, remaining salt, and pepper. Add toasted bread and remaining oil, mix well. Cover and bake for 20 minutes, then uncover and bake for an additional 12 minutes.
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes, then carve and serve with the prepared sauce and remaining mixture.

375d8714-d08d-4ba9-b0aa-af1bf9d49160.name: Florentine Fried Mushrooms
375d8714-d08d-4ba9-b0aa-af1bf9d49160.description: Crispy fried mushrooms coated in a delicious egg and milk mixture.
instructions: Wash the mushrooms thoroughly and let them dry, then coat in breadcrumbs.
Beat the egg gently, add milk and salt, and mix well.
Dip the breadcrumb-coated mushrooms in the egg mixture and fry in hot olive oil until golden brown. Serve hot.

e7744988-1c60-4a39-a75b-04c1092db131.name: Zucchini and Pepperoni Frittata
e7744988-1c60-4a39-a75b-04c1092db131.description: A delicious Italian frittata packed with zucchini, pepperoni, and melted mozzarella.
ingredients: 2 tsp fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp dried thyme
2 tsp fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp dried oregano
2 tsp fresh basil or 1 tsp dried basil
2 tsp fresh mint or 1 tsp dried mint
instructions: Blanch zucchini in boiling water for 3 minutes, then drain.
Mix eggs, flour, salt, and pepper in a bowl, add zucchini and herbs.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet, pour in the zucchini mixture.
Cook on low heat for about 15 minutes without stirring until eggs set slightly.
Top with tomato, pepperoni, and cheese, then broil for 1-2 minutes until cheese melts.
Slice and serve the frittata.

46a61bf0-f25b-468d-b43a-9dc14f2aa820.name: Italian Potato Salad
46a61bf0-f25b-468d-b43a-9dc14f2aa820.description: A fresh and flavorful potato salad with tomatoes and herbs.
instructions: Peel and cube the potatoes into medium-sized pieces.
Place them in a pan, cover with water, add salt, and boil for 20 minutes.
Chop the tomatoes and onion, then mix them with the potatoes in a large bowl.
Add chopped chili, 6 tablespoons of olive oil, and a tablespoon each of basil and mint to the salad.

ca67d92a-521a-4e63-870f-fcd3f6c3177a.name: Russian Salad
ca67d92a-521a-4e63-870f-fcd3f6c3177a.description: A creamy and flavorful salad with vegetables and sausages, perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Boil the potatoes until tender but not mushy, then dice into small cubes.
Chop the pickles and sausages into similar-sized pieces.
Add the peas and mayonnaise, adjusting the amount of mayonnaise to your preference.
Season with salt and mix gently to avoid mashing the ingredients.
Garnish with tomatoes, lettuce, and chips before serving.

517a7f27-0678-43a7-a6e2-39a72bcae977.name: French Omelette
517a7f27-0678-43a7-a6e2-39a72bcae977.description: A fluffy and savory omelette filled with your choice of vegetables.
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl, add milk, salt, and pepper, and whisk until smooth.
Melt butter in a pan, add the egg mixture, and layer optional vegetables after 2 minutes. Fold when edges are brown.

4d9e7670-3393-438e-a817-822b81c41156.name: Chicken Alaking (French)
4d9e7670-3393-438e-a817-822b81c41156.description: A creamy chicken dish with mushrooms and bell peppers, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Cut the chicken into 1.5 to 2 cm cubes and chop the bell peppers.
Heat butter in a pan, add mushrooms and bell peppers, sauté until soft, then set aside.
Add more butter to the pan, sauté the chicken until golden (add 1 tablespoon of oil to prevent burning), then add cream and bring to a boil.
Add the peppers and mushrooms, remove from heat, stir in the egg yolks, return to heat without boiling, stirring constantly, then serve.

a0919624-ffe5-4763-9e7a-a5bd8425c920.name: Stuffed Chicken Drumsticks (Canadian Style)
a0919624-ffe5-4763-9e7a-a5bd8425c920.description: Delicious stuffed chicken drumsticks with cheese and vegetables, baked to perfection.
instructions: Debone the drumsticks, season with salt and pepper, and rub with lemon juice and saffron.
Slice the green onions and place some inside the drumsticks.
Chop the mushrooms and sauté them, then add the sliced bell pepper and stuff the mixture into the drumsticks.
Roll the drumsticks and wrap them in aluminum foil, placing them in a dish with a little boiling water.
Bake in the oven at 225°C for 35 minutes.
After 35 minutes, remove from the oven, unwrap the foil, and place cheese slices on top.
Return to a greased baking tray and bake for another 10 minutes.
Alternatively, fry the drumsticks in oil until golden, then wrap with cheese and bake for 10 minutes.

200aff6a-694d-4391-84d1-7c28d7bbe299.name: Microwave Chocolate Cake
200aff6a-694d-4391-84d1-7c28d7bbe299.description: A quick and easy chocolate cake made in the microwave.
instructions: Beat eggs and sugar until white and stiff.
Add butter and milk, mix well.
Heat water in a microwave-safe container for 3-4 minutes.
Mix flour, baking powder, and cocoa powder, then add to the batter gently.
Grease a suitable container with oil.
Pour the batter into the greased container.
Remove the hot water container and place the cake container in the microwave.
Cook for 10 minutes at 70% power.
Do not open the microwave door for 5 minutes after cooking.

2ea592e6-aa96-46e3-bcb9-deeb4b8abc11.name: Walnut Bread in Microwave
2ea592e6-aa96-46e3-bcb9-deeb4b8abc11.description: Delicious walnut bread made quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Mix milk, egg, and melted butter until fluffy, then add sugar and flour gently.
Fold in walnuts, dates, and mashed banana, then pour into a greased dish.
Microwave at 70% power for 10-12 minutes, let cool, and decorate with powdered sugar and banana slices.

95971497-916c-4455-90de-c2a92a320d27.name: Ratako
95971497-916c-4455-90de-c2a92a320d27.description: A delicious layered dish with eggplant, minced meat, and cheese.
instructions: Poke the eggplant with a fork and microwave on a metal rack for 7 minutes.
Slice the onion and garlic, sauté in oil for 5 minutes using a grill setting.
Add minced meat, mushrooms, and diced eggplant, cover, and cook for 7 minutes.
Stir in sliced tomato, parsley, salt, and pepper, then sprinkle cheese on top.
Cover and microwave for another 5 minutes using a grill setting.

7dce1801-a59a-40d0-9a57-f7ac186399f1.name: Shrimp Kebab
7dce1801-a59a-40d0-9a57-f7ac186399f1.description: Delicious grilled shrimp kebabs with tender meat and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 4 pieces of beef or chicken fillet, cut into 5 cm pieces and salted
1 green pepper, cut into 16 pieces of about 2.5 cm
instructions: Place salted fillet meat in a microwave-safe dish and microwave on 100% power for 2 minutes until semi-cooked.
Melt butter in a microwave-safe glass container for 1 minute on maximum power and set aside.
Skewer shrimp, meat, green pepper, and mushrooms in order onto a microwave skewer.
Brush the kebabs with melted butter and place them in a metal dish.
Microwave on grill mode for 10 minutes, then turn the skewers, brush with butter again, and grill for another 7 minutes until shrimp are cooked and slightly charred.

92d5fb32-bbe8-4e53-bfa0-262c199a336c.name: Strawberry Jam
92d5fb32-bbe8-4e53-bfa0-262c199a336c.description: Delicious homemade strawberry jam, perfect for spreading on toast.
instructions: Wash the strawberries and remove the green tops, then drain in a colander.
In a large bowl, combine strawberries and sugar and let it sit until the strawberries release their juice.
Microwave the mixture uncovered on high for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally until it starts boiling.
Add lemon juice and continue microwaving for another 10 minutes or until the jam thickens.
To test the jam, drop a spoonful into a cold plate of water and check if it forms a layer.

933ec223-7fcc-498b-ad9c-c2a174afe4c3.name: Microwave Peach Compote
933ec223-7fcc-498b-ad9c-c2a174afe4c3.description: A quick and easy peach compote made in the microwave.
instructions: Wash and peel the peaches, remove the pit, and cut into quarters or sixths.
Place peaches in a suitable bowl, add water, and microwave on 100% power for 4-5 minutes.
Add sugar, stir, and microwave again for 4-6 minutes, stirring once in between.

751b8fda-ee08-448b-825c-a0809a3bc40a.name: Microwave Apple Compote
751b8fda-ee08-448b-825c-a0809a3bc40a.description: Quick and easy microwave apple compote, perfect for desserts or toppings.
instructions: Peel and chop the apples, place them in a suitable bowl, and add water.
Cover and microwave on 100% power for 4-5 minutes. Stir in sugar, cover, and microwave for another 5-6 minutes, stirring once.

b4d415e4-29b6-4a3a-8b3a-dff754659a47.name: Microwave Apricot Compote
b4d415e4-29b6-4a3a-8b3a-dff754659a47.description: A sweet and tangy apricot compote made effortlessly in the microwave.
instructions: Wash and halve the apricots, removing the pits.
Place in a suitable bowl, add water, cover, and microwave on 100% power for 5 minutes.
Add sugar and vanilla, microwave uncovered for 5-6 minutes, stirring once.

acb3e450-0cfe-4c27-bb99-bf7b4fd4469d.name: Microwave Cherry Compote
acb3e450-0cfe-4c27-bb99-bf7b4fd4469d.description: A quick and delicious cherry compote made in the microwave.
instructions: Place cherries in a suitable bowl, cover, and microwave on 100% power for 3-4 minutes.
Remove the bowl, add sugar, vanilla, and water, then microwave uncovered for 5-6 minutes, stirring once.

cf48112a-7c44-443c-ae7c-41ff5c3333ec.name: Fried Onions in Microwave
cf48112a-7c44-443c-ae7c-41ff5c3333ec.description: Quick and easy fried onions, perfect for adding flavor to your dishes.
instructions: Choose a suitable flat dish and add the onions.
Mix with liquid oil and microwave for 20-30 minutes, stirring three times.

072a0bc1-101b-4314-b9f8-761eef033c51.name: Microwave Mashed Potatoes
072a0bc1-101b-4314-b9f8-761eef033c51.description: Creamy mashed potatoes with a hint of parsley, perfect as a side dish.
instructions: Peel and chop the potatoes into small pieces, then place them in a suitable bowl.
Mix in the milk and butter, cover, and microwave on 100% power for 15-20 minutes, stirring once during cooking.
After cooking, let it sit for 5 minutes, then mash the contents well, adding cream, salt, and pepper.
Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

eae417ed-54c9-4c1f-b578-692fa52be8a9.name: Microwave Rice Pudding
eae417ed-54c9-4c1f-b578-692fa52be8a9.description: A creamy and fragrant rice pudding made effortlessly in the microwave.
instructions: Mix rice flour, sugar, and cold milk well in a suitable bowl and microwave for 2 minutes at 100%. Stir once during this time.
Add rose water and microwave for 3-6 minutes at 70%, stirring 3-4 times in between.

0a22aff6-2a5f-48ae-908b-d877b93c013b.name: Rice Pudding in Microwave
0a22aff6-2a5f-48ae-908b-d877b93c013b.description: A creamy and delicious rice pudding made effortlessly in the microwave.
instructions: Wash the rice and soak it in hot water for 2-3 hours.
Place the rice in a 2-liter microwave-safe dish and add one cup of water. Microwave on 100% power for 10-15 minutes without a lid, stirring once.
Add milk and microwave for another 20 minutes on 100% power without a lid.
Add sugar and butter, then microwave for an additional 15-20 minutes on 100% power without a lid.
If the rice is cooked but the pudding is not thick, mix a tablespoon of rice flour with some cold milk and add it along with rosewater, then microwave for 3-4 minutes on 100% power, stirring once.

00fd7567-ef64-4257-b9f2-75efa0cc7590.name: Microwave Potato Gratin
00fd7567-ef64-4257-b9f2-75efa0cc7590.description: A quick and creamy potato gratin made in the microwave.
instructions: Peel and slice the potatoes thinly, then place them in a shallow dish.
