Microwave on 100% power for 8-10 minutes with the lid on, then add salt, pepper, white sauce, and grated cheese. Microwave again without the lid for 5-7 minutes.

511f35bc-11b1-45ff-8bb0-9ccb003ba5d5.name: Microwave Lasagna
511f35bc-11b1-45ff-8bb0-9ccb003ba5d5.description: Delicious lasagna made effortlessly in the microwave with layers of meat, cheese, and sauce.
instructions: Mix ground meat, bell pepper, mushrooms, fried onion, salt, and pepper; microwave for 10 minutes at 100%.
Dissolve tomato paste in boiling water, add saffron and butter, microwave for 2-3 minutes, then mix with meat.
Cover and microwave for another 5 minutes at 100%.
Boil water in a suitable dish for 10 minutes at 100%, then add oil and salt.
Add lasagna sheets and microwave for 6-8 minutes, then drain.
Layer lasagna sheets, tomato sauce, meat, and cheese in a pan; repeat layers twice.
Cover and microwave for 5 minutes at 100%, then uncover and microwave for another 5 minutes.
Serve and enjoy your microwave lasagna.

cab6d26c-7042-45d2-8832-3de9045abc4e.name: Stuffed Tomatoes in Microwave
cab6d26c-7042-45d2-8832-3de9045abc4e.description: Delicious stuffed tomatoes filled with a savory mixture, cooked quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Soak lentils for 2-3 hours, then microwave with water for 5 minutes.
Add washed rice, double the water, butter, and salt; microwave for 10-15 minutes.
Mix ground meat, fried onion, salt, and pepper; microwave for 5-6 minutes, stirring once.
Dilute tomato paste with boiling water, add saffron and butter; microwave for 3-4 minutes.
Combine all ingredients with dolmeh herbs in a large bowl.
Cut and remove the tops of the tomatoes, hollow them out.
Fill tomatoes with the dolmeh mixture, replace tops, and place in a suitable dish.
Pour some tomato sauce over them, cover, and microwave for 20-25 minutes.

d0f07eac-b336-4312-9e37-ff36253ab28e.name: Stuffed Green Peppers in Microwave
d0f07eac-b336-4312-9e37-ff36253ab28e.description: Delicious green peppers filled with a savory meat and rice mixture, cooked quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Soak lentils for 2-3 hours, then microwave with 1 cup of water for 5 minutes on 100% power.
Wash rice, add to lentils, pour 2 cups of water, add butter and salt, and microwave for 10-15 minutes on 100% power.
Mix ground meat, fried onion, salt, and pepper in a bowl, microwave for 5-6 minutes on 100% power, stirring once.
Dilute tomato paste with boiling water, add saffron and butter, microwave for 3-4 minutes on 100% power.
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl with stuffed herbs.
Cut the tops of the peppers, hollow them out, and fill with the stuffing mixture.
Replace the tops, place in a suitable dish, pour some tomato sauce over, cover, and microwave for 20-25 minutes on 100% power.

0c314967-e83f-472e-ae03-9d88fcf3e20f.name: Microwave Spaghetti
0c314967-e83f-472e-ae03-9d88fcf3e20f.description: Quick and flavorful spaghetti made easily in the microwave.
instructions: Mix ground meat, fried onion, bell peppers, salt, and pepper in a suitable dish and microwave for 5-6 minutes at 100%.
Add chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, and saffron dissolved in hot water, cover, and microwave for another 6-10 minutes, stirring once.
For spaghetti, boil 1-1.5 liters of water in a suitable dish for 10 minutes at 100%.
Add salt and oil, then add spaghetti and microwave uncovered for 8-10 minutes at 100% until cooked.
Drain spaghetti, mix with the meat sauce, and garnish as desired.
If the sauce has cooled, microwave the mixed dish for an additional 3-4 minutes at 100%.

e5fc4912-b722-4d21-8495-7c7e694681e4.name: Microwave Mashed Potato Pie
e5fc4912-b722-4d21-8495-7c7e694681e4.description: A creamy and cheesy mashed potato pie, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Chop the onion, add oil, and microwave for 3 minutes at 100%.
Add ground meat, microwave for 2 more minutes, stirring once.
Mix in flour, salt, pepper, and dissolved tomato paste, cover, and microwave for 8-10 minutes, stirring twice.
Peel and chop potatoes, place in a separate dish, add 100ml milk, cover with plastic wrap, and microwave for 15-17 minutes.
Let the potatoes sit for 5 minutes, then mash and mix with egg, remaining milk, and butter.
Spread the mixture over the meat, sprinkle with cheese, and microwave for 3-4 minutes until cheese melts.

ec69917c-0879-4edf-b873-062d2d351669.name: Microwave Skillet Kebab
ec69917c-0879-4edf-b873-062d2d351669.description: Delicious kebabs cooked quickly in the microwave with tender meat and fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Grate the onions and mix the meat with salt, pepper, and dissolved saffron.
Spread the mixture in a round dish, shape into rectangles, place butter on top, and microwave for 5 minutes at 100%.
Peel and slice the tomatoes, arrange them on the meat and around the dish, and microwave for 10 minutes at 100% without a lid.

9d42d97a-7f81-48a9-ba24-70c8f799d5f6.name: Microwave Hamburger
9d42d97a-7f81-48a9-ba24-70c8f799d5f6.description: Delicious homemade hamburgers cooked quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Mix ground meat with grated onion, breadcrumbs, egg, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Divide the mixture into 2-3 portions, shape into patties, and place in a plate with 1 tablespoon of oil.
Cook in the microwave for 3-4 minutes on 100% power, flipping halfway through.
Serve the cooked patties in hamburger buns topped with tomato sauce and chopped parsley.

e2db99b6-7af5-405d-a8a3-ce0e10438bed.name: Shrimp with Sauce in Microwave
e2db99b6-7af5-405d-a8a3-ce0e10438bed.description: Delicious shrimp in a creamy sauce, quick and easy to prepare.
instructions: Melt butter in a microwave-safe bowl for 1 minute at 100% power.
Mix in flour and microwave for 2 more minutes.
Gradually add milk, salt, and pepper; stir and microwave for 3-4 minutes at 50% power until thickened.
Add cream to the sauce.
Peel and clean the shrimp, then rinse.
In a microwave-safe dish, combine 2 cups of water with salt and pepper.
Microwave at 100% power until boiling, then add shrimp and cook for 6-8 minutes.
Drain shrimp, mix with sauce, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

7033379e-c5a4-4161-9481-6d97a898b7e8.name: Mexican Chicken in Microwave
7033379e-c5a4-4161-9481-6d97a898b7e8.description: A quick and flavorful Mexican chicken dish made in the microwave.
instructions: Melt butter in a microwave-safe bowl for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Add chopped garlic, onion, green and red peppers, cover with plastic wrap, and microwave for 5 minutes at 100% power.
Add seasoned chicken to the mixture, pour in tomato juice, tomato paste, mushrooms, salt, and pepper, cover, and microwave for 15-20 minutes at 100% power.
Add corn, cover again, and microwave for an additional 3-5 minutes at 100% power.
Remove from microwave, take out chicken, and mix sauce with cream.
Return chicken to the dish and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

e2b07a5f-34f8-4a11-87d6-90dd3148094d.name: Simple Microwave Chicken
e2b07a5f-34f8-4a11-87d6-90dd3148094d.description: Tender chicken cooked with saffron and spices in the microwave.
instructions: Melt butter in a deep plate, then add grated onion, saffron, and salt. Microwave on 100% for 2 minutes.
Coat the chicken with the mixture, place it in a suitable dish, cover, and microwave on 100% for 10-15 minutes.
Remove the dish, flip the chicken, cover, and microwave again on 60% for 15-20 minutes. The dish is ready.

64a9450e-d435-4e35-a3c9-ccbdb0acd386.name: Microwave Fish
64a9450e-d435-4e35-a3c9-ccbdb0acd386.description: Deliciously buttered fish cooked to perfection in the microwave.
instructions: Clean the fish, remove its insides, and dry it well.
Melt butter in the microwave for 30 seconds and coat the fish with it.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on the fish and stuff it with herbs.
Cover the dish with plastic wrap, make holes in it, and microwave for 10 minutes.
Remove the dish, flip the fish, and microwave for another 5-10 minutes.
Drizzle lemon juice on top and serve.

f6a6e776-46f0-4911-bc7e-f1262e0cee03.name: Cream Sauce in Microwave
f6a6e776-46f0-4911-bc7e-f1262e0cee03.description: A creamy sauce perfect for enhancing white meats.
instructions: Melt butter in a microwave-safe dish for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Add chopped onions and microwave for 3 minutes.
Stir in flour until smooth, then gradually add beef broth while mixing to avoid lumps.
Add herbs and microwave for 10 minutes at 50% power until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper, strain the sauce, and microwave for another 10 minutes at 100% power.
Stir in cream and serve with white meats.

7b14a7bf-3d6e-44cd-b059-45e96d502317.name: Microwave Tomato Sauce
7b14a7bf-3d6e-44cd-b059-45e96d502317.description: A quick and easy microwave tomato sauce perfect for any dish.
instructions: Dissolve tomato paste in beef broth, add salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
Gradually add flour while stirring until smooth.
Add butter and microwave for 3 minutes covered.
Combine with sautéed onion and microwave for 4 minutes, stirring at intervals.
Sprinkle with chopped parsley before serving.

5f189a37-53da-4d04-a592-2d8500f19ff5.name: Microwave White Sauce
5f189a37-53da-4d04-a592-2d8500f19ff5.description: A creamy white sauce perfect for pasta or casseroles.
instructions: Melt butter in a bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Gradually add flour to milk, mixing in salt and pepper until smooth. Combine with melted butter and microwave for 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds.

5a88f830-fc7b-4a4c-ace0-80608c55e216.name: Microwave Sauce Preparation Tips
5a88f830-fc7b-4a4c-ace0-80608c55e216.description: Essential tips for making sauces in the microwave for perfect consistency.
instructions: Use gentle heat when preparing sauces.
Stir continuously when adding water, meat, or milk for thicker sauces.
Stir well during cooking in the microwave and when adding other ingredients.

93e11aad-9ea7-49e6-aa0d-85df4154984f.name: Simple Microwave Rice
93e11aad-9ea7-49e6-aa0d-85df4154984f.description: Quick and easy rice cooked perfectly in the microwave.
instructions: Wash the rice and place it in a suitable bowl with warm water, salt, and butter or oil.
Microwave on 100% power for 15-20 minutes, stirring once. Then cover with plastic wrap, make holes, and microwave on 30% power for another 15-20 minutes.

0279c6b4-647a-4f93-ad7d-6efe41b7eb3e.name: Mushroom Stew in Microwave
0279c6b4-647a-4f93-ad7d-6efe41b7eb3e.description: A quick and delicious mushroom stew made effortlessly in the microwave.
instructions: Combine chopped mushrooms, butter, fried onions, and spices in a microwave-safe dish and microwave for 4-5 minutes at 100%.
Add chicken, salt, saffron, and water, cover, and microwave for 15-20 minutes at 100%.
Dissolve a spoonful of flour in cold water, add to the dish, and microwave uncovered for 2-3 minutes at 100%, stirring once.

7ee4f1f8-665e-481b-9f30-b6c802683090.name: Fesenjan in Microwave
7ee4f1f8-665e-481b-9f30-b6c802683090.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew made with walnuts and pomegranate.
instructions: Place walnuts in a shallow dish and microwave on 100% power for 3-6 minutes, stirring once.
Combine chicken, walnuts, fried onions, water, salt, and saffron in a suitable dish and microwave for 20 minutes.
Add pomegranate paste and sugar, then microwave for an additional 10-12 minutes.

31d7a78b-6343-4d41-aefb-ede13285ae92.name: Mushroom Soup in Microwave
31d7a78b-6343-4d41-aefb-ede13285ae92.description: A creamy and savory mushroom soup, perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a suitable container in the microwave for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Add mushrooms and microwave for another 2 minutes at 100% power.
In a separate bowl, mix milk (or broth) with flour and microwave for 4-6 minutes at 100%, stirring twice.
Add prepared mushrooms, parsley, salt, and pepper, then microwave for 5-8 minutes at 70% power.
Dissolve cream with some soup before serving.

45bcc942-bb9b-4c51-a340-bb8d04c5c2fc.name: Barley or Rice Porridge in Microwave
45bcc942-bb9b-4c51-a340-bb8d04c5c2fc.description: A creamy and savory porridge perfect for a quick meal.
instructions: Melt butter in a small bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Add barley flour and microwave for 1 minute at 100% power.
Mix with some meat broth until smooth, then pour into a deep dish.
Add remaining meat or chicken broth and milk, microwave for 5-8 minutes at 100% power, stirring 2-3 times.
Add cream and parsley at the last moment and stir well.

dcdac025-cddf-45d3-a84c-9da0af557de4.name: Vegetable Soup in Microwave
dcdac025-cddf-45d3-a84c-9da0af557de4.description: A quick and delicious vegetable soup made in the microwave.
instructions: Combine all ingredients with broth in a suitable bowl, cover, and microwave for 10-15 minutes at 100%.
Add milk, salt, and pepper, then microwave uncovered for an additional 5-10 minutes at 100%.

08b22c1c-78e9-4829-bd85-274dc51a701f.name: Herb Frittata in Microwave
08b22c1c-78e9-4829-bd85-274dc51a701f.description: A quick and delicious herb frittata made in the microwave.
instructions: Melt butter in a microwave-safe dish for 1 minute on 100% power.
Mix all other ingredients in a separate bowl, then pour into the dish and microwave for 4-5 minutes on 100% power.
Remove the dish, flip the frittata, cover, and microwave for another 2-4 minutes on 100% power.
Optionally, add some barberries and chopped walnuts to the mixture before cooking.

f1e2296c-293f-482b-a714-71a8858882cf.name: Mushroom Omelette in Microwave
f1e2296c-293f-482b-a714-71a8858882cf.description: A quick and delicious mushroom omelette made in the microwave.
instructions: Chop the onion and mushrooms, place in a microwave-safe dish, add oil or butter, and microwave for 5 minutes at 100%.
Beat the eggs with salt and pepper in a separate bowl, add to the dish, and microwave for another 3-4 minutes at 100%.

9602cef9-d9df-4824-aec7-341451935a32.name: Microwave Fried Eggs
9602cef9-d9df-4824-aec7-341451935a32.description: Quick and easy fried eggs made in the microwave.
instructions: Place butter in a microwave-safe dish and heat for 30 seconds at 100% power.
Crack the eggs into the melted butter, puncture the yolks, and microwave for 1 to 1.5 minutes at 100% power, leaving the lid slightly ajar.

a1297ddb-7210-44ba-bb63-ca5d366c212a.name: Microwave Egg Dish
a1297ddb-7210-44ba-bb63-ca5d366c212a.description: A quick and fluffy egg dish made in the microwave.
instructions: Break the eggs and mix with milk until slightly white.
Add salt and pepper, then melt butter in a microwave-safe dish for 30 seconds.
Pour the egg mixture into the dish and microwave for 3 minutes on 100%.
Flip the dish and microwave for another 2-3 minutes on 100%.

3f21f482-186f-4f63-9796-20e682af9970.name: Microwave Cooking Tips
3f21f482-186f-4f63-9796-20e682af9970.description: Master the art of cooking and reheating food using a microwave efficiently.
instructions: Cover food to speed up cooking by trapping steam.
Use appropriate containers for microwave cooking.
Avoid cooking eggs in their shells; crack them first.
Pierce foods with skins to prevent bursting.
Stir liquids to avoid overflow when heating.
Use short cooking times to prevent burning.
Ensure food is fresh for best results.
Microwave is ideal for melting butter or chocolate.

7a5791aa-30ce-47cc-b66f-ffa5fdc2ed66.name: Mushroom Stew in Microwave
7a5791aa-30ce-47cc-b66f-ffa5fdc2ed66.description: A quick and flavorful mushroom and chicken stew made in the microwave.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and lemon juice to taste
instructions: Chop the chicken into small pieces, coat with oil, and place in a bowl with mushrooms, fried onions, and salt.
Microwave uncovered at 100% power for 5 minutes to sauté.
Stir and add half a cup of water with saffron, cover, and microwave for 15-17 minutes at 100% power.
Dissolve flour in cold milk, add with lemon juice to the dish, and microwave uncovered for 3-4 minutes at 100% power, stirring once.
Optionally, beat an egg yolk and add it one minute before the cooking time ends.

01b3fe6d-e210-43eb-b559-e6250a12250a.name: Plum Stew
01b3fe6d-e210-43eb-b559-e6250a12250a.description: A savory stew with tender chicken and sweet dried plums.
ingredients: Salt and lemon juice to taste
instructions: Soak lentils and plums separately for 2-3 hours.
Cut chicken and make small holes in it, then place in a pot with salt, fried onion, lentils, and 1 cup of water.
Cover and cook on 100% heat for 10-12 minutes until partially cooked.
Add plums with their water and cook on 80% heat for 18-20 minutes, stirring once.
Five minutes before cooking is done, add tomato paste, sugar, and saffron.

12264ed0-8206-4d68-8a72-c259e72170ff.name: Microwave Chicken Tahchin
12264ed0-8206-4d68-8a72-c259e72170ff.description: A delicious saffron-infused rice dish layered with tender chicken.
instructions: Rinse the rice according to the instructions for lentil rice.
Cut the chicken and poke holes in it, then marinate with oil and salt.
Microwave the chicken at 80% power for 17-20 minutes, flipping once.
Remove the bones from the chicken and dissolve saffron in hot water.
Mix saffron water with eggs and yogurt, then add the drained rice.
Grease a flat dish and layer half of the rice mixture, then add the chicken.
Top with the remaining rice mixture and cover the dish.
Microwave at 60% power for 15 minutes.
Uncover, brush the top with oil and saffron water, then microwave at 60% with grill for 15-20 minutes until golden.

3877d8cb-e619-4fb6-a41b-366aad121ee1.name: Lentil Rice in Microwave
3877d8cb-e619-4fb6-a41b-366aad121ee1.description: A delicious and easy lentil rice dish made in the microwave.
instructions: Soak rice and lentils separately for 2 hours.
In a bowl, combine lentils with 1.5-1.75 cups of water and 1 tablespoon of oil, cover, and microwave at 100% for 10-12 minutes.
In another bowl, combine rice with 2.5-3 cups of water, a little salt, and 3 tablespoons of oil, and microwave uncovered at 100% for 13-16 minutes until water evaporates.
Mix the cooked lentils with the rice, cover, and microwave at 40% for 12-14 minutes to steam.
Optionally, mix raisins with 1 tablespoon of oil, sugar, and saffron dissolved in hot water, microwave at 60% for 1.5-2 minutes, and then combine with the lentil rice.

9cc9ca9e-9821-47e1-88c1-530b8cabc126.name: Stamboli Rice with Microwave
9cc9ca9e-9821-47e1-88c1-530b8cabc126.description: A flavorful rice dish with minced meat and tomatoes, cooked quickly in the microwave.
instructions: Wash and finely chop the potato.
Combine grated tomatoes, water, potato, salt, oil, and rice in a bowl and let soak for an hour.
Mix ground meat with fried onions in a flat dish and microwave on 100% power for 2 minutes without a lid.
Mix tomato paste and a bit of saffron with boiling water and add to the meat.
Cover and microwave for another 2-3 minutes on 100% power.
Microwave the rice for 16-20 minutes on 100% power without a lid, stirring 1-2 times.
Mix the meat mixture with the rice and cover, then heat for 13-15 minutes on 60% power to steam the rice.

f82b9291-7526-47a0-bcd8-467fceb16307.name: Fesenjan Stew in Microwave
f82b9291-7526-47a0-bcd8-467fceb16307.description: A rich and flavorful Persian stew with chicken and walnut sauce.
instructions: Place ground walnuts in a flat dish and microwave on 100% power for 4-6 minutes, stirring twice.
Chop the chicken and combine with walnuts, fried onions, water, and salt in a deep dish. Cover and microwave at 70% power for 15 minutes.
Add pomegranate paste, sugar, and dissolved saffron, then microwave covered for another 8-15 minutes at 80% power until the stew is oily.

6a01fea1-7bac-455b-afa2-36d6bcc99742.name: Tiger Treats
6a01fea1-7bac-455b-afa2-36d6bcc99742.description: Delicious fruit and vegetable snacks shaped like tigers for a fun presentation.
instructions: Cut the mandarin orange in half, slice the apple into small circles, and cut the kiwi into small triangles for decoration.
For the canape, cut large circles from toast and potato, and small circles from carrot, then cook them.
Use black olives to cut small triangles, place the toast on a plate, and layer with cooked potato.
Mix red sauce and mustard, spread on the potato, and decorate with carrot and olives.
For the jelly tiger, prepare orange and banana jelly, cut into circles, and decorate with chocolate triangles and dragees.

f7770c51-bd9f-4ca4-bc61-e46d96209328.name: Eggplant Canned Dish
f7770c51-bd9f-4ca4-bc61-e46d96209328.description: A simple and delicious eggplant dish perfect for a light snack.
instructions: Mix crushed garlic with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Add canned eggplant and steam for five minutes. Serve with dried herbs on top.

3b9e19f1-6d30-4db5-a0fa-7bc5463c4660.name: Sliced Zucchini
3b9e19f1-6d30-4db5-a0fa-7bc5463c4660.description: Quick and delicious zucchini dish, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: Oil, salt, and pepper to taste
instructions: Wash the zucchinis well and slice them into rings.
Fry the zucchini in oil over medium heat.
Mix the eggs with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Layer the zucchini in a pan and pour the egg mixture over them.
Cover the pan and let it cook until done.

5f5ea8e4-c26d-4d81-a747-13c275e21605.name: Cheesy Potato Bread
5f5ea8e4-c26d-4d81-a747-13c275e21605.description: Deliciously soft potato bread filled with melted cheese.
instructions: Boil the potatoes and mash them until smooth.
In a pot, heat the mashed potatoes gently to evaporate excess water.
Add the egg and spices to the potatoes and knead by hand, then refrigerate for 2 hours.
Take small portions of the mixture, shape them into balls, and create a small cavity to fill with grated cheese.
Cover the cheese with the potato mixture and shape into small breads.
Place the breads separately in a greased baking dish.
Bake in a preheated oven at 170°C for 20 minutes until the bottoms are golden, then increase the heat to brown the tops.
Serve warm.

27c2ffcb-53f3-4fc2-87d8-2f52c029afca.name: Finger Tuna
27c2ffcb-53f3-4fc2-87d8-2f52c029afca.description: Crispy tuna bites served with tangy tomato sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, mix tuna and eggs, then add tomato sauce.
Add breadcrumbs and form walnut-sized finger shapes, rolling them in flour.
Fry the tuna fingers in plenty of oil.
Serve with tomato sauce.

17e13b05-d8bf-4fbd-b510-c28b5e861e3d.name: Spicy Fried Potatoes
17e13b05-d8bf-4fbd-b510-c28b5e861e3d.description: Crispy fried potatoes seasoned with colorful peppers and aromatic curry spices.
instructions: Boil the potatoes, peel, and cut them into large cubes.
Chop the bell pepper into cubes and roughly chop the green onions.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the green onions for 2 minutes.
Add the bell peppers and then the potatoes, sautéing until golden.
Season the fried potatoes with curry powder to taste.

374050c7-9338-4b1e-8edc-5a9752b04378.name: Rosti
374050c7-9338-4b1e-8edc-5a9752b04378.description: Crispy potato dish, perfect with a fresh salad.
instructions: Grate the cooked potatoes and mix with chopped onion, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mixture in a hot pan with oil and fry for 5 to 7 minutes.
Flip using a large plate and fry the other side.
Add butter at the end to achieve a golden color.

c3ff5b62-21f6-4f43-872d-e7dfc3dd370c.name: Stuffed Potatoes
c3ff5b62-21f6-4f43-872d-e7dfc3dd370c.description: Deliciously baked potatoes filled with cheese, sausage, and creamy goodness.
instructions: Wash the potatoes, then cook them in the microwave or bake at 400°F for one hour.
Chop the sausage and sauté with salt and pepper.
Once cooled, cut the potatoes in half and scoop out the insides.
Mix the scooped potato with cheddar cheese in a pan for two minutes, then add the sausage.
Stuff the potato halves with the mixture, add cream, and garnish with green onions.
Bake the stuffed potatoes in the oven at 350°F for 15 minutes.

7624547a-fd6a-4fcc-9856-72c17c30cb98.name: Mushroom Dish with Bread
7624547a-fd6a-4fcc-9856-72c17c30cb98.description: A hearty mushroom dish perfect for a nutritious breakfast.
instructions: Melt butter in a pan over heat and sauté chopped mushrooms and shallots for five minutes.
In another pan, heat peanut butter, then add garlic to the mushroom mixture, followed by peanut butter.
Once combined, turn off the heat and let it cool slightly.
In a suitable bowl, mix lemon juice with sour cream and parsley, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Combine this mixture with the mushroom blend and serve as a nutritious breakfast.

5ffa7328-a15d-440e-a187-a464a362fa5b.name: Lentil and Spinach Chapati
5ffa7328-a15d-440e-a187-a464a362fa5b.description: Delicious chapatis filled with lentils and spinach, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion and crushed garlic.
Add spices, then lentils and chicken broth; cook for 20 minutes.
Stir in chopped spinach and remove from heat.
Mix white and whole wheat flour with salt, add olive oil and warm water gradually.
Knead the dough for 10 minutes and let it rest for 1 hour.
Divide the dough into 16 parts, roll each into a 14cm circle.
Place filling in the center, cover with another dough circle, seal edges with water.
Cook in a pan until golden brown.

8f6e952d-5bb5-4be8-b357-d724de27371c.name: Vegetable Piroshki
8f6e952d-5bb5-4be8-b357-d724de27371c.description: Delicious stuffed pastries filled with sautéed vegetables and cheese.
ingredients: 1 tbsp each of green, yellow, and red bell pepper
Salt, pepper, and thyme to taste
instructions: Mix all ingredients except flour in a bowl until smooth, then gradually add flour until the dough is non-sticky.
Let the dough rest in a warm place for 1 hour, then roll out to 0.5 cm thickness, cut into circles, fill with 1 tsp filling, fold and fry in hot oil over medium heat.

996856f0-23d1-4df4-bad4-70323e95497f.name: Tuna and Corn Canapés
996856f0-23d1-4df4-bad4-70323e95497f.description: Delicious canapés topped with a creamy tuna and corn mixture.
instructions: Boil the canned tuna for twenty minutes, then sauté it in a little butter.
Combine with corn and mayonnaise, refrigerate for half an hour, then spread the mixture between two slices of toast.

f9f58c4b-c66f-40ce-bc23-5efebc7e633b.name: Stuffed Zucchini
f9f58c4b-c66f-40ce-bc23-5efebc7e633b.description: Delicious zucchini stuffed with seasoned meat and melted cheese.
instructions: Wash the zucchinis and trim the ends without peeling them.
Place zucchinis in a pot with 1 cup of water and 1 tablespoon of salt, cooking on low heat.
In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil, sauté grated onion, and add ground meat, cooking briefly.
Add tomato paste, salt, and pepper to the meat, allowing it to fry in the oil.
Using a thin spoon, hollow out the zucchinis vertically and fill them with the meat mixture and cheese.
In a baking dish, add 2 tablespoons of oil and tomato juice, placing the stuffed zucchinis inside.
Bake in the oven at 350°F until the cheese melts and the zucchinis are golden.

d7f52bc5-10ea-41d5-8144-74af9b842fd3.name: Stuffed Zucchini
d7f52bc5-10ea-41d5-8144-74af9b842fd3.description: Deliciously stuffed zucchini with a savory filling of meat, vegetables, and cheese.
ingredients: 1 large green zucchini or 6 small zucchinis
instructions: Wash the zucchini thoroughly and cut it in half lengthwise.
Scoop out the insides with a teaspoon.
Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan over medium heat, add garlic and onion, and sauté until soft.
Add chopped mushrooms and the scooped zucchini flesh, sauté for another 2 minutes.
In another pan, heat the remaining oil and sauté ground meat, then add chopped tomatoes and cook until golden for 6 minutes.
Combine the contents of both pans, add rosemary and basil.
In a bowl, mix egg, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper, then add to the pan mixture and heat for 1 minute.
Fill the zucchini halves with the prepared mixture and bake in the oven for 20 minutes.

3586071a-0dcf-4b45-85d0-9a745beb0b35.name: Dutch Snack
3586071a-0dcf-4b45-85d0-9a745beb0b35.description: Crispy sandwiches filled with seasoned chicken, cheese, and potatoes, perfect for a quick bite.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté chopped onion until soft.
Add chicken slices with salt, pepper, and turmeric; cook for 7-10 minutes.
Let the mixture cool, then combine grated potatoes, cheese, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Add the chicken mixture and stir gently.
Spread softened butter on the outside of the bread slices.
Spread the mixture on 8 slices of bread, top with tomato slices and Gouda cheese.
Place another 8 slices of bread on top, press gently, and grill in a sandwich maker for 3-6 minutes.
Serve with ketchup.

58101680-ab06-4893-9055-84660956be68.name: Soybean and Eggplant Snack
58101680-ab06-4893-9055-84660956be68.description: A delicious and crispy snack filled with savory soybean and eggplant.
ingredients: Turmeric and red pepper to taste
instructions: Soak soybeans in water or milk for a few hours.
Peel and chop eggplants, soak in salty water for 1 hour.
Chop onion and sauté in oil until soft, then add peppers and turmeric.
Drain and dry eggplants, then fry with onions until golden.
Add soaked soybeans and mix, then add pureed tomato.
Add sliced peppers, salt, and crushed garlic, and let water evaporate.
Add a cup of boiling water, cover, and simmer until cooked.
Spread prepared mixture on toast, add cheese if desired, and top with another slice.
Brush both sides with melted butter and prepare all snacks this way.
Cook in a sandwich maker for 3-5 minutes and serve hot.

5b29ad0c-5f99-40ff-8bfe-63000a192943.name: Warm Green Bean Dish
5b29ad0c-5f99-40ff-8bfe-63000a192943.description: A delightful mix of green beans, tomatoes, and sausage topped with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Half a cup of Parmesan cheese
instructions: Cut the tomatoes in half and chop them.
In a small bowl, mix honey with vinegar.
Sauté the sausage in a little olive oil.
In a pot, add enough water and a bit of color, then add the green beans and cook for 10 minutes.
In a suitable dish, mix the cooked green beans with tomatoes, sausage, salt, and pepper, then sprinkle the chopped Parmesan on top.

ed809718-cc7f-424a-b5c3-5050c8bc01dd.name: Zucchini Dish with Yogurt
ed809718-cc7f-424a-b5c3-5050c8bc01dd.description: A quick and healthy zucchini dish served with yogurt.
ingredients: 150 grams mixed soy and ground meat
Salt, black pepper, lemon juice to taste
instructions: Wash, peel, and chop the zucchinis.
Fry the zucchinis in a little oil until lightly browned.
Grate 2 tomatoes and add them to the zucchinis, cover to cook.
In another pan, fry sliced onions in oil, then add the meat and soy mixture.
Once the mixture is cooked, add the remaining grated tomatoes, chopped bell pepper, salt, and pepper.
Combine the zucchini with the meat mixture, cover, and cook for 10 minutes.
Adjust seasoning with salt, pepper, and lemon juice, then serve with yogurt and bread.

89d75d2b-f321-4040-9e18-27d17a2d190a.name: Eggplant Dish with Mozzarella Cheese
89d75d2b-f321-4040-9e18-27d17a2d190a.description: A delicious layered dish of eggplant, peppers, and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Grill the bell peppers and place them on kitchen paper.
Slice the eggplants and fry them in grape seed oil with salt over medium heat.
Boil parsley for 10 minutes, then drain.
Layer eggplant, parsley, and bell peppers.
Blend garlic, tomatoes, vinegar, and olive oil with salt and pepper.
Pour the sauce into a pan.
Add mozzarella slices to the eggplant layers, sauté in sauce for 5 minutes over medium heat.

64b8918c-15e2-4dee-ac8c-395845f132c1.name: Tuna Pasta Bake
64b8918c-15e2-4dee-ac8c-395845f132c1.description: A creamy and cheesy tuna pasta dish, baked to perfection.
instructions: Melt the margarine in a pan and sauté the onions for 5 minutes until soft.
Add flour and salt, mix well, then stir in milk until creamy. Add cheese, tuna, and pasta.
Refrigerate for 2 days, then bake at 190°C for 15 minutes.

dbf2c672-5d27-4778-a931-53f85eff34a2.name: Spinach Roll
dbf2c672-5d27-4778-a931-53f85eff34a2.description: Delicious spinach rolls filled with cheese and creamy goodness.
instructions: Wash and chop the spinach.
Melt butter in a pan, add garlic and onion, and sauté.
Add spinach to the pan and cook on low heat for five minutes.
Remove from heat, stir in cheese, sour cream, salt, and pepper.
Cut lavash into desired sizes, place filling inside, and roll.
Place rolls in a greased dish and bake at 190°C for 20 minutes.
Spread mayonnaise or tomato sauce on rolls after baking.

a0b08dff-b5f7-43fc-bd1f-f21e5efde05e.name: Simple Soup Noodle Dish
a0b08dff-b5f7-43fc-bd1f-f21e5efde05e.description: A comforting noodle dish cooked in chicken broth with sautéed onions and tomatoes.
ingredients: Half a pack of soup noodles
Half a cup of olive oil
instructions: Cook the soup noodles in the chicken broth.
Sauté the onion in olive oil until golden.
Add chopped tomatoes and season with salt and pepper.
Once the chicken broth boils, cover and simmer for half an hour until the liquid evaporates.

7946b3bc-de44-4b0b-acbc-33ed79d21a76.name: Sausage Omelette
7946b3bc-de44-4b0b-acbc-33ed79d21a76.description: A delicious and savory omelette packed with sausage and cheese.
instructions: Blend eggs and milk together until well mixed.
Chop the sausage and add it to the mixture along with chopped green onions, salt, and pepper.
Pour olive oil into a pan and add the mixture to cook.
Sprinkle cheese on top and let it cook for another minute.

2b35f332-f097-44f9-846c-50847acfe013.name: Green Bean and Sausage Dish
2b35f332-f097-44f9-846c-50847acfe013.description: A delightful mix of green beans, sausage, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Wash the green beans and cook them over low heat.
Chop the sausages and sauté them in butter.
Cut the French bread into small pieces and fry in oil until golden.
Chop the tomatoes, radishes, and cucumbers.
Arrange the spinach leaves around the dish and place the prepared ingredients together.

d2f0e4ae-6270-49eb-a6c3-1a1e1de719e4.name: Vegetable Salad with Special Dressing
d2f0e4ae-6270-49eb-a6c3-1a1e1de719e4.description: A refreshing salad with a zesty dressing, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Choose a suitable bowl, then drain the corn and combine it with lettuce, sausage, and green onions.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, vinegar, and thyme, adding salt and pepper to taste. Pour the dressing over the salad and serve immediately.

8b97d9a2-0768-4b26-9f83-822e0daa7033.name: Black-eyed Bean Stew with Sausage
8b97d9a2-0768-4b26-9f83-822e0daa7033.description: A hearty stew featuring black-eyed beans, sausage, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Soak the beans overnight and cook until tender, about one hour.
Drain the beans and chop the onion and carrot.
Mix the beans with the chopped onion and carrot in a suitable dish.
Peel and chop the tomatoes, and add them along with the chopped sausage.
In another bowl, mix the sauce ingredients and pour over the stew.

396b8ea9-32af-4192-9fa8-b06f03faba47.name: White Bean and Celery Dish
396b8ea9-32af-4192-9fa8-b06f03faba47.description: A creamy and savory dish featuring tender white beans and fresh celery.
instructions: Wash the white beans and cook them thoroughly.
Drain the beans and cook them in a pot with celery stalks and chicken broth for 15 minutes until soft.
Add chopped cilantro and dressing, seasoning with salt and pepper, and mix well with a fork.

98f98534-04c2-480f-a02d-0d2a74238f16.name: Warm Bean Dish
98f98534-04c2-480f-a02d-0d2a74238f16.description: A hearty and nutritious bean dish perfect for gatherings.
instructions: Soak the beans and chickpeas overnight, then cook until soft.
Mix the cooked beans in a bowl, chop the bell peppers, slice the radishes, and chop the green onions.
Combine all ingredients in the bowl.
Mix sauce ingredients in a small container until smooth and add to the dish.

eee9317a-92e7-49d4-9d08-cbc3aeb5538c.name: Vegetable Platter
eee9317a-92e7-49d4-9d08-cbc3aeb5538c.description: A colorful and healthy assortment of steamed vegetables with sweet plums.
instructions: Steam all vegetables separately until tender without changing color.
Soak plums in water, then boil for 30 seconds, draining water 2-3 times to remove sand.
Add 1 tablespoon of sugar to the plums and let the water evaporate.
Arrange the vegetables in a rectangular dish, placing the plums in the center.

62790056-4f5b-4df7-94c9-fcef701f3b01.name: Eggplant Dish with Olives
62790056-4f5b-4df7-94c9-fcef701f3b01.description: A savory and tangy eggplant dish with olives and bell peppers.
instructions: Cube the eggplants and fry them in oil, then set aside.
Cube the bell peppers and fry them in oil, then set aside.
Slice the onion and finely chop the olives and celery.
Sauté the onion, olives, and celery in a bit of oil, then add the tomato paste and stir.
Add the fried eggplant, bell peppers, and lemon juice to the mixture and stir.
Let the mixture simmer on low heat for 2 minutes, then serve.

a3fd61cc-0349-4b81-8e9a-b4bb140d460b.name: Market Style Baked Potatoes with Special Sauce
a3fd61cc-0349-4b81-8e9a-b4bb140d460b.description: Crispy baked potatoes served with a delicious homemade sauce.
instructions: Peel and cut potatoes into large fries.
Boil water with salt and curry powder, then add potatoes for 5-6 minutes.
Drain and cool potatoes, then freeze for 45-60 minutes.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Heat oil in a pan and fry the frozen potatoes until golden brown.
Optional: Top with cheese and microwave for 30 seconds before serving.
Serve with the special sauce.

d0aa041b-e207-440d-85a4-e34b1819ac63.name: Stuffed Eggs with Mayonnaise
d0aa041b-e207-440d-85a4-e34b1819ac63.description: Delicious boiled eggs filled with a creamy mayonnaise mixture.
instructions: Boil the eggs and cut them in half lengthwise.
Separate the yolks from the whites without damaging the whites, then mash the yolks in a bowl.
Add a few tablespoons of mayonnaise and some ketchup to the yolks.
Fill the egg whites with the yolk and mayonnaise mixture and sprinkle with red pepper powder.
Arrange the stuffed eggs on a plate and enjoy.

bafd2018-f385-4628-a0a6-dbd92f985ff3.name: Corn Egg Omelette
bafd2018-f385-4628-a0a6-dbd92f985ff3.description: A fluffy omelette with sweet corn, perfect for breakfast or a light meal.
instructions: Beat the eggs in a bowl until well mixed.
Drain the corn in a sieve to remove excess liquid, then add it to the eggs.
Add salt and pepper, and mix well.
Grease a non-stick pan and heat the oil, then pour in the mixture evenly.
Cook until one side is well done, then flip to cook the other side.
Serve the omelette on a plate and cut it with a knife.

e015db16-9f70-4b59-bb51-db63838c6e34.name: Shrimp Cutlets
e015db16-9f70-4b59-bb51-db63838c6e34.description: Delicious shrimp cutlets, crispy on the outside and flavorful inside.
instructions: Boil the cleaned shrimp with water and salt, then grind with potatoes and onions.
Add turmeric, pepper, salt, and flour to the shrimp mixture. Incorporate the egg and knead well.
Heat oil in a pan. Flatten some mixture in your palm and fry both sides until golden. Repeat with remaining mixture.
Arrange the cutlets on a platter and garnish with vegetables, fried potatoes, and peas.

fe09822a-5fe4-41fb-9339-1896553be71e.name: Potato Casserole with Bechamel
fe09822a-5fe4-41fb-9339-1896553be71e.description: A creamy potato casserole topped with savory bechamel and cheese.
instructions: Boil the potatoes, peel them, and let them cool.
Mash the potatoes and mix in melted butter.
Spread the mashed potatoes in a rectangular baking dish.
Fry sliced onion, then add tuna, salt, pepper, and Maggi seasoning, and sauté briefly.
Spread the tuna mixture over the mashed potatoes.
Pour the bechamel sauce over the top and sprinkle with grated cheese.
Bake at 160°C for 30 minutes until golden brown.

0fdaca97-354d-44e2-ad5b-54d54dfdb667.name: Mirza Ghasemi with Zucchini
0fdaca97-354d-44e2-ad5b-54d54dfdb667.description: A delicious Iranian dish with zucchini, garlic, and eggs.
instructions: Peel the zucchinis and cook them with very little water until soft, then mash them.
Soak the garlic in cold water to easily peel it, then chop and sauté in oil with salt and turmeric until golden.
Add the mashed zucchinis to the pan and mix well with the garlic, allowing it to fry slightly.
Peel and chop the tomatoes, then add them along with pepper and cinnamon to the mixture.
You can prepare the eggs either by frying them and placing on top of the dish or whisking and pouring over the mixture to set.

7972eeec-2e14-42d1-bfe5-10ab6d716ed4.name: Iranian Matzabal
7972eeec-2e14-42d1-bfe5-10ab6d716ed4.description: A creamy and flavorful eggplant dip, perfect for appetizers.
instructions: Wash the eggplants and place them on a baking tray, then bake at 200°C for 1 hour until soft.
Let the eggplants cool, peel them, and blend with the remaining ingredients until smooth.
Transfer the mixture to a serving dish, drizzle with olive oil, and smooth the top.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves.

9dd688f8-1ce4-4942-bc08-c3d633436e31.name: Sesame Toast
9dd688f8-1ce4-4942-bc08-c3d633436e31.description: Delicious toasted bread coated with a flavorful chicken and sesame mixture.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Chop the onion and add salt, pepper, and turmeric, then boil the chicken breast in it.
Once the chicken is cooked and cooled, shred it by hand or chop finely with kitchen scissors.
Add the eggs to the chicken and mix well until the consistency is similar to yogurt.
Dip both sides of the toast in the mixture, ensuring it sticks well, then coat with sesame seeds.
Fry in oil until golden brown.

0f2faca1-b162-405b-a93d-e75ee8e4a3f4.name: Khuzestani Falafel
0f2faca1-b162-405b-a93d-e75ee8e4a3f4.description: Delicious falafel made with mashed potatoes and spices.
instructions: Mix mashed potatoes with tomato paste, pepper, and salt in water.
Cook until a thick mixture forms.

1adc6c0f-e11e-426f-999b-c04a95d72879.name: Potato Pudding
1adc6c0f-e11e-426f-999b-c04a95d72879.description: A savory and flavorful potato pudding, perfect for any meal.
instructions: Dice the potatoes and fry them until golden.
Sauté the bell pepper with the grated onion.
Beat the eggs and mix in saffron, salt, flour, and baking powder.
Combine all ingredients in a greased baking dish and bake at medium heat for 30 minutes.
Serve with ketchup for garnish, or cook in a skillet.

8b6361c6-dd87-43f8-8391-f32326b707bd.name: Sausage Omelette
8b6361c6-dd87-43f8-8391-f32326b707bd.description: A delicious and hearty omelette filled with sausage and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon of cooked and chopped carrot
1 tablespoon of cooked and chopped potato
instructions: Mix all ingredients except the sausage together.
Heat oil in a pan, place one slice of sausage, pour the mixture on top, add another slice of sausage, cover, and cook until set.

7f11f6a4-7c19-4ef8-9e41-62d1e9d76ee1.name: Tuna Dish
7f11f6a4-7c19-4ef8-9e41-62d1e9d76ee1.description: A savory tuna dish with crispy potatoes and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, turmeric, spices, saffron to taste
instructions: Heat oil from the tuna in a pan and add diced onion, sautéing until soft.
Add the tuna and fry slightly, then mix in salt, pepper, turmeric, spices, and saffron.
Fry the sliced potatoes in another pan until crispy.
Dissolve tomato paste in water and add to the tuna mixture.
Add peas, cover, and let simmer for about 10 minutes.
Turn off the heat and mix in the fried potatoes.

d85a4404-9773-4a03-98dd-9c09805081c0.name: Potato Pakora
d85a4404-9773-4a03-98dd-9c09805081c0.description: Crispy potato rings coated in a spiced chickpea batter.
instructions: Slice the potato into thin rings.
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl, add water, and stir until smooth.
Soak potato rings in the mixture for 30 minutes.
Fry the potato rings in hot oil until golden.

087e102a-ca67-4fdb-8e63-d34f0b3347e5.name: Chicken and Cheese Balls
087e102a-ca67-4fdb-8e63-d34f0b3347e5.description: Deliciously creamy chicken and cheese balls coated in crunchy nuts.
instructions: Mix chicken, cream cheese, mustard, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt in a blender until combined.
Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
Form tablespoon-sized balls and roll them in crushed salted nuts, then refrigerate for another hour.

4f91082b-f02e-4687-8769-df778529e867.name: Mexican Corn
4f91082b-f02e-4687-8769-df778529e867.description: A delicious and creamy corn dish with mushrooms and spices.
instructions: Slice the mushrooms and sauté them with a bit of vegetable butter.
Add the canned corn and cover for 5 minutes until heated through.
Transfer the mixture to another bowl and let it cool slightly.
Add butter, garlic powder, thyme powder, black pepper, mayonnaise, and lemon juice, then mix well and serve.
Note: Serve this appetizer warm, and do not add butter while the mixture is hot to prevent separation.

a072dce2-f526-4e20-8edb-cb3371775bbf.name: Lentil Snack
a072dce2-f526-4e20-8edb-cb3371775bbf.description: A creamy and cheesy lentil spread between crispy toasted bread.
instructions: Mash the cooked lentils with a hand blender, then mix with cream, cheese, lemon juice, thyme, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Crush the chicken bouillon cube, mix it into the lentil mixture, spread a thin layer on a slice of toast, top with another slice, and butter the top slice.
Place the snack in a sandwich maker for about 5 minutes until the bread is golden.

6f4c270d-a32e-44e6-b96a-46b8c4d96a2a.name: Cumin Eggplant Rice
6f4c270d-a32e-44e6-b96a-46b8c4d96a2a.description: A flavorful rice dish with eggplant, potatoes, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Dice the eggplants, potatoes, and bell pepper.
Soak eggplants in salted water, then dry and fry them.
Fry potatoes separately, then add bell pepper and sauté.
Add garlic, salt, pepper, turmeric, and fried onions.
Quickly remove from heat after adding cumin to avoid burning.
Layer the mixture with the cooked rice and steam.
Optionally, sprinkle sesame seeds on top before serving.

6b3b4b03-be56-492f-806d-f8a5e3b3f96d.name: Soy Meatballs
6b3b4b03-be56-492f-806d-f8a5e3b3f96d.description: Delicious and crispy soy meatballs with a flavorful filling.
instructions: Boil the potatoes until cooked.
In a pan, sauté the onion and add soaked soy, then bell pepper.
Add spices and tomato paste, cook until ready.
Peel and grate the potatoes, take some and fill with the mixture, cover with more potatoes.
Roll in egg, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry in a pan.

033ddf66-0edb-47f0-b63d-517a13bb0349.name: Pumpkin Stew
033ddf66-0edb-47f0-b63d-517a13bb0349.description: A delicious and hearty pumpkin stew with beans and spices.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
Walnuts and coconut powder as needed
instructions: Soak red beans and mung beans overnight. Cook red beans first, then add mung beans until fully cooked.
Peel the pumpkin and fry it in some oil.
Combine all cooked ingredients with fried onion, salt, pepper, turmeric, and some water in a pot, cover, and cook until soft.
Add sugar and cinnamon, let it boil, then serve in a dish, garnished with walnuts and coconut powder, and enjoy with bread.

655d4913-b624-40a5-8ac8-5c23c5a4adda.name: Potato Strips
655d4913-b624-40a5-8ac8-5c23c5a4adda.description: Crispy and flavorful potato strips, perfect for snacking.
instructions: Mash the boiled potatoes until smooth, then add fried onions, chopped parsley, and sautéed mushrooms.
Add salt and pepper, and knead the mixture.
Take a portion the size of a tangerine and shape it into a rectangle.
Roll in flour, then in egg, and finally in breadcrumbs before frying in oil. Optionally, add salt and pepper to the egg for extra flavor.

05857e18-a63e-416e-bb33-079631b2059e.name: Soybean Rice with Beans
05857e18-a63e-416e-bb33-079631b2059e.description: A delicious rice dish with soybeans and flavorful spices.
instructions: Soak soybeans for 10 minutes, drain, then boil for 5 minutes and drain again.
Soak and cook black-eyed peas briefly.
Fry 2 onions, add turmeric and cinnamon, then mix in cooked beans.
Drain soaked rice, layer with bean mixture while steaming, and top with saffron and butter.
Fry prepared soybeans with one onion, add salt, turmeric, black pepper, and chickpea flour, shape into small balls, and fry.

74c4a85c-29a0-4e69-986b-54504d7055c0.name: Tomato and Tuna Omelette
74c4a85c-29a0-4e69-986b-54504d7055c0.description: A savory omelette packed with tomatoes, tuna, and herbs.
instructions: Mix tomatoes, onion, and parsley; add salt, spices, and garlic.
Add beaten eggs and oil, whisking together.
Incorporate the tuna and mix well.
Add flour and baking powder, stirring to combine.
Grease a baking tray with butter, pour in the mixture, and bake at 160°C for 20 minutes until golden.

394069f5-bc29-4125-96ce-41635287b954.name: Chicken Fillet Chips and Cheese
394069f5-bc29-4125-96ce-41635287b954.description: A delicious layered dish of chips, chicken, and cheese baked to perfection.
ingredients: 3 slices of dry sausage or chicken (optional)
Thyme, black pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: In a microwave, combine chopped mushrooms and bell pepper with black pepper and turmeric, then microwave for 4 minutes.
In a round dish for 2, layer chips, then add cooked ingredients, half the cheese, and another layer of chips, finishing with remaining cheese.
Microwave for 2 to 2.5 minutes until heated through, then sprinkle with thyme before serving.

5751ed53-15a1-4e4a-a0cb-16e613efa60f.name: Chips and Cheese (Appetizer)
5751ed53-15a1-4e4a-a0cb-16e613efa60f.description: Crispy potato chips layered with savory sausage and melted cheese.
instructions: Peel the potatoes, slice them into chips, and fry until crispy.
Layer the fried chips with chopped sausage and cheese, then microwave until the cheese melts.

cc45a770-78c5-46c7-bd6f-58d02dd82cc0.name: Meat and Egg Omelette
cc45a770-78c5-46c7-bd6f-58d02dd82cc0.description: A hearty omelette packed with ground meat and spices.
ingredients: A pinch of pepper and turmeric
instructions: Place the ground meat in a pan over medium heat and stir for 5 minutes until the moisture evaporates.
Add oil and butter to the meat.
Add salt and spices to the meat and sauté.
Add the beaten eggs to the mixture and stir with a wooden spoon until well combined and cooked.
Serve the mixture in a dish.

dc7018c1-f6b1-4684-b2b5-d38d895f7264.name: Spinach Samosa (Arabic)
dc7018c1-f6b1-4684-b2b5-d38d895f7264.description: Delicious crispy pastries filled with savory spinach and spices.
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, sugar, and dry milk in a bowl.
Add hot water and oil to the mixture and stir.
Knead the dough until smooth and elastic.
Let the dough rise in a warm place for 30-40 minutes until doubled in size.
Combine spinach, onions, sumac, salt, pomegranate paste, and cinnamon.
Drain the mixture in a sieve for 5 minutes.
Press the mixture to remove excess water.
Add olive oil to the mixture until fully absorbed.
Roll out the dough on a floured surface to 1 cm thickness.
Cut circles using a glass and fill with the mixture.
Fold the dough into triangles covering the filling.
Grease a baking tray, sprinkle with flour, and arrange the samosas.
Bake in a preheated oven at 160°C for 30-40 minutes until golden.

e0f10fdf-d3b5-4122-ab95-a84a756cf46b.name: Mushrooms with Cream
e0f10fdf-d3b5-4122-ab95-a84a756cf46b.description: Delicious sautéed mushrooms topped with creamy sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop the mushrooms, then add lemon juice to prevent browning.
Sauté the mushrooms in butter or olive oil.
Mix cream, egg yolks, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Grease a baking dish and layer with sautéed mushrooms.
Cover with the cream and egg mixture, then sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in the oven at 240°C until the cheese is golden.

c0f9d2ac-4627-4ad6-bb4b-51f69d53f336.name: Zucchini Chips (Appetizer)
c0f9d2ac-4627-4ad6-bb4b-51f69d53f336.description: Crispy zucchini chips seasoned with spices, served with yogurt and garlic.
instructions: Slice zucchinis into thin rings like chips.
Soak in ice water, then coat in flour and drain.
Quickly dip zucchinis in water again before frying to help flour stick.
Fry in very hot oil until crispy.
Place fried zucchini on parchment paper and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and thyme.
Serve in a dish with yogurt and garlic, or use prepared garlic yogurt.

a511c7a8-39e9-49e1-8dd9-2140d0c5df11.name: Zucchini Pancakes
a511c7a8-39e9-49e1-8dd9-2140d0c5df11.description: Deliciously crispy zucchini pancakes, perfect for any meal or snack.
instructions: Wash zucchinis, trim ends, and grate them to yield about 5 cups of grated zucchini. Mix with salt in a large bowl and drain in a colander for 15 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix eggs and garlic, then add flour, cheese, onion, and pepper, stirring until combined. Fold in grated zucchini until just mixed.
For each pancake, place a heaping tablespoon of batter in a hot skillet with a little oil, flatten slightly, and cook over medium heat for 2-3 minutes per side.
Serve pancakes warm with your favorite sauces or freeze them with parchment paper in between after cooling.
To reheat, preheat oven to 425°F (218°C), place pancakes in a greased baking tray, and warm for 8-10 minutes.

70dc05df-c799-4ea0-82b9-1120f179d7f2.name: Delicious Vegetable Stew
70dc05df-c799-4ea0-82b9-1120f179d7f2.description: A flavorful medley of sautéed vegetables, perfect for a hearty meal.
ingredients: Spices, salt, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Peel and cube the potatoes, then fry in oil.
Cube the zucchinis and add to the potatoes once they are slightly fried.
Add chopped onions and fry until slightly golden.
Add cubed eggplants after the onions have cooked a bit.
Mix in chopped green pepper and carrot, then sauté with other vegetables.
Stir in tomato paste, spices, and salt, and sauté briefly.
Add chopped tomatoes, cover, and let steam until vegetables are cooked.
Stir occasionally; no water is needed for this dish.

3c7f765b-cd70-489d-9397-e3e9ef48dd9d.name: Omelette
3c7f765b-cd70-489d-9397-e3e9ef48dd9d.description: A delicious and fluffy omelette with tomatoes and spices.
instructions: Finely chop the onion and sauté it in hot oil until golden, adding turmeric.
Peel and grate the tomatoes, then add to the pan and cover until softened.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper, and spices, then stir in beaten eggs over low heat until slightly thickened.

0a63ae45-067e-4b96-ab63-e881e22bfd95.name: Vegetable Stuffed Peppers
0a63ae45-067e-4b96-ab63-e881e22bfd95.description: Delicious peppers filled with a savory mixture of bulgur, vegetables, and cheese.
ingredients: 2 large bell peppers or 4 small ones
2 tablespoons slivered almonds or chopped walnuts
instructions: Combine broth, carrots, and onion in a large pot and bring to a boil, then simmer for 5 minutes.
Add bulgur and raisins, remove from heat, cover, and let sit for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare the peppers by cutting off the tops and hollowing them out.
Mix grated cheese into the bulgur mixture and fill the peppers evenly.
Place the peppers in a suitable pot, add 1/2 cup water, bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until peppers are tender and heat penetrates.
Garnish with almonds or walnuts when serving.

f3d4661f-2d5a-4d88-a328-47ff1b5af4e5.name: Hummus
f3d4661f-2d5a-4d88-a328-47ff1b5af4e5.description: A creamy and flavorful chickpea dip, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a mixer until smooth.
Transfer to a dish, drizzle with olive oil, and smooth with a spoon. Garnish with olives or parsley.

3edad078-d048-42c4-ad4e-5aca8ddd040a.name: Fried Mushrooms
3edad078-d048-42c4-ad4e-5aca8ddd040a.description: Crispy and golden fried mushrooms, perfect as a snack or appetizer.
instructions: Wash the mushrooms thoroughly and let them dry, then coat them in breadcrumbs.
Beat the egg gently, add milk and salt, and mix well.
Dip the breadcrumb-coated mushrooms into the egg mixture and fry in hot olive oil until golden brown. Serve hot.

9c3b07d0-d6d5-4c2b-8670-c89440d0bc6b.name: Eggplant and Zucchini Dish
9c3b07d0-d6d5-4c2b-8670-c89440d0bc6b.description: A delicious layered dish of eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes baked to perfection.
instructions: Trim the ends of the eggplants and zucchinis, then slice them into rings without separating the ends.
Slice three tomatoes and the potatoes, alternating layers with the eggplant and zucchini rings.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper, then arrange them in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, and bake at a low temperature for 30-40 minutes.
Remove from the oven, chop the remaining tomatoes, and place them with the cooked peas in the center.
Grate cheese over the dish and return to the oven for another 10 minutes.
Serve directly from the baking dish.

343cfe8f-1ebb-4441-bc3b-d3ae78a25504.name: Cheese and Olive Balls
343cfe8f-1ebb-4441-bc3b-d3ae78a25504.description: Delicious cheese and olive balls, perfect for snacking or entertaining.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives or green onions
Salted crackers, chopped apples, and toasted bread
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the cheeses and butter, letting them reach room temperature. Mix with a low-speed electric mixer until smooth.
Add the olives and chopped chives, mix well. Cover and refrigerate for 4 to 24 hours.

Shape the mixture into balls, cover, and refrigerate until serving. Roll the balls in chopped walnuts or almonds and let sit for 15 minutes. Optionally garnish with parsley. Serve with assorted crackers and chopped apples.

647bab1d-103e-4d73-adb4-4cfe47bfc49f.name: Sheep's Stomach Stew
647bab1d-103e-4d73-adb4-4cfe47bfc49f.description: A hearty and flavorful stew made with sheep's stomach and spices.
instructions: Thoroughly wash the sheep's stomach and clean it with a knife.
Cook it with onion, garlic, spices, and turmeric until tender, leaving about 4-5 tablespoons of water.
Cook the kidney beans until soft, leaving about 1 tablespoon of water.
Cut the potatoes into matchsticks and fry them.
Sauté the tomato paste separately.
Add spices, salt, and turmeric to the fried potatoes and mix well.
Combine the cooked sheep's stomach and tomato paste with the potatoes and mix thoroughly.

ed0821d3-6be7-4f47-a255-4d7bacda9c15.name: Rice with Black-eyed Peas and Meatballs
ed0821d3-6be7-4f47-a255-4d7bacda9c15.description: A delightful rice dish with flavorful black-eyed peas and crispy meatballs.
instructions: Soak black-eyed peas for 2 hours, then cook them.
Fry 3 onions with turmeric, cinnamon, saffron, salt, and pepper, then mix with cooked peas.
Drain the rice, and when cooked, layer it with the pea mixture in a serving dish, garnishing with meatballs.
Prepare soy by soaking in cold water for 10 minutes, then boil for 5 minutes to remove undesirable odors.
Drain and mix soy with 1 minced onion, salt, pepper, chickpea flour, and turmeric, then shape into small balls.
Fry the balls in hot vegetable oil until crispy.

98c4a7da-e433-46da-af8c-8e5daf39e821.name: Stuffed Mushrooms with Cheese
98c4a7da-e433-46da-af8c-8e5daf39e821.description: Delicious stuffed mushrooms filled with cheese and walnuts, baked to perfection.
instructions: Wash and dry 200g of mushrooms, then chop them in a food processor.
Sauté garlic in butter until soft, then add chopped mushrooms and lemon juice. Cook for 5-7 minutes until moisture evaporates.
Add salt and pepper, remove from heat, and mix in Gouda cheese and walnuts.
Remove caps from 6 large mushrooms, hollow them out, and fill with the prepared mixture.
Sprinkle pizza cheese on top of each stuffed mushroom and bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 12-15 minutes until cheese is melted and golden.
Serve warm with fresh parsley.

d203f56a-bc3f-4ded-ba90-f0c5575af211.name: Zucchini Borani
d203f56a-bc3f-4ded-ba90-f0c5575af211.description: A creamy and flavorful zucchini dish, perfect as a side or appetizer.
instructions: Drain yogurt in a small bag until it reduces to about 2 cups.
Peel zucchinis, slice into rings, and sprinkle with salt; let drain.
Heat oil in a pan and fry zucchini rings until golden on both sides.
Place fried zucchinis on a strainer to remove excess oil.
Dissolve saffron in a little hot water and mix with yogurt, salt, pepper, and cilantro until smooth.
Layer zucchinis in a dish, covering with yogurt mixture, and smooth the top.
Sprinkle chopped cilantro on top, or use dried mint as an alternative.

b50f2b5d-09b3-4e40-8a42-78363c7596b8.name: Indian Fish Samosa
b50f2b5d-09b3-4e40-8a42-78363c7596b8.description: Crispy samosas filled with spiced fish and potatoes, perfect for a savory snack.
instructions: Heat some oil in a pan and sauté the onion.
Add the fish along with salt and turmeric, then stir-fry.
Add red pepper, garlic powder, cumin powder, dried fenugreek, and fresh coriander, and stir well.
Mix in the chopped potatoes, remove from heat, and place some filling on each piece of dough.
Fold into triangles and fry in oil until golden brown.

4f032760-2b89-4a40-9739-37691177a514.name: Potato and Spinach Casserole
4f032760-2b89-4a40-9739-37691177a514.description: A delicious layered dish of potatoes, spinach, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Sauté the onion, then add boiled spinach.
Mix in chopped sausage and layer half of mashed potatoes in a greased baking dish.
Spread the spinach and sausage mixture over the potatoes, then top with remaining potatoes.
Sprinkle shredded cheese on top and bake in the oven for 15 minutes until cheese is melted and golden.

cd5bd3f6-13c8-4d15-8ee9-6d434884f518.name: Yogurt and Bread Pudding
cd5bd3f6-13c8-4d15-8ee9-6d434884f518.description: A delightful blend of yogurt, milk, and bread for a unique dessert.
instructions: Mix 2 cups of milk with 1 cup of yogurt.
Add sugar if desired and stir until sweetened.
Add crumbled bread and let it soak before serving.

83a47a69-aca3-472f-88e7-15279d5aa7eb.name: Rice Balls
83a47a69-aca3-472f-88e7-15279d5aa7eb.description: Delicious rice balls filled with cheese, perfect for a savory snack.
instructions: Mix cooked rice, chopped herbs, 2 eggs, salt, pepper, and saffron.
Form small balls, create a hole, fill with cheese, and reshape.
Roll the balls in beaten egg, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry in oil.

bdc00d1e-8b82-4528-9951-26fe15f98b09.name: Spring Fava Beans
bdc00d1e-8b82-4528-9951-26fe15f98b09.description: A delightful spring dish featuring tender fava beans and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 500 g small white onions (or 1 kg large green onions)
instructions: Remove the outer skin of the fava beans and wash them.
Boil water in a suitable pot, add fava beans, baking soda, and salt, and cook gently until tender.
Drain the fava beans and set aside.
Wash the peeled onions or green onion whites and cook with half a cup of water and a bit of salt.
Cut ham and peppers into small cubes.
Mix all ingredients together, place in a beautiful glass dish, and smooth the top.
Serve with a yogurt sauce or a mixture of olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.

97786349-0a6f-46d3-b05a-446cda2bd1a1.name: Okra Stew
97786349-0a6f-46d3-b05a-446cda2bd1a1.description: A delicious and flavorful stew featuring tender okra and fresh tomatoes.
instructions: Trim the long stems of the okra without cutting from the bottom.
Peel the garlic, wash it with the okra, and place them in a suitable pot.
Pour some boiling water over the tomatoes, peel them, chop, and add to the okra.
Add a pinch of salt and pepper, cover the pot, and cook on low heat until the okra is tender and the sauce thickens.
Avoid overcooking the okra to prevent it from becoming slimy and unappetizing.

048a50c5-58d0-477e-a071-19398a8f35ed.name: Simple Chelo
048a50c5-58d0-477e-a071-19398a8f35ed.description: A fluffy and aromatic Persian rice dish, perfect for any meal.
ingredients: ½ cup yogurt for the bottom crust
instructions: Boil water in a suitable pot.
Add rice and cook until slightly soft, then drain.
Mix oil and water for the bottom crust and heat.
Shape rice into a cone in the pot and cover.
Cook on low heat, then add hot oil and water on top.
If using an oven, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, then reduce heat.
Let it steam for 1 to 1.5 hours, depending on crust preference.
Remove from oven to cool slightly before serving.

af8c6f15-5af4-4460-9832-66ddf9531768.name: Vegetable Roll
af8c6f15-5af4-4460-9832-66ddf9531768.description: A delicious and savory vegetable roll filled with spinach and cheese.
instructions: Chop the garlic and leek, sauté in butter until soft.
Mix remaining butter with flour, salt, and pepper, then heat until raw flour taste disappears.
Gradually add milk to the butter-flour mixture, stirring until thickened.
Separate egg yolks from whites; beat the whites until stiff.
Mix yolks into the leek-garlic mixture, then fold in the beaten egg whites.
Combine corn, spinach, grated Parmesan, green onions, thyme, and cream cheese in a bowl.
Pour the batter onto a parchment-lined baking tray and bake at 180°C for 12 minutes.
Remove from oven, sprinkle with grated Parmesan, spread filling, and roll up.
Return to the oven for another 15 minutes, then slice after cooling.

bb89b6e5-927d-49ac-8eb8-89a798396631.name: Vegetable Casserole
bb89b6e5-927d-49ac-8eb8-89a798396631.description: A delicious baked vegetable dish with a golden crust.
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix all ingredients except oil in a large bowl until a thick batter forms.
Pour half the oil into a non-stick baking dish, add the mixture, and drizzle the remaining oil on top.
Bake for 40 to 60 minutes until the vegetables are cooked and the top is dark golden.

66b781da-1810-48e2-bb56-0f16b21df1c0.name: Mixed Vegetable Dish
66b781da-1810-48e2-bb56-0f16b21df1c0.description: A colorful medley of sautéed vegetables topped with melted cheese.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and basil to taste
instructions: Sauté eggplant, zucchini, onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, garlic, and potato until slightly softened.
Grate the tomatoes, add tomato paste, spices, and basil, then simmer on low heat until cooked and water evaporates.
Add pizza cheese and turn off the heat once the cheese melts.

ec42798b-2e1f-4108-a054-08240703ffaa.name: Mini Vegetable Tart
ec42798b-2e1f-4108-a054-08240703ffaa.description: Delicious mini tarts filled with savory vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and salt; rub in butter with fingertips.
Add milk until dough is sticky; roll out and place in greased tart pan.
Prick dough with a fork and bake at 180°C for about 15 minutes until golden.
Sauté onion in oil, add ground meat, then add chopped, partially cooked vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper; remove from heat when water evaporates.
Fill baked tart with vegetable mixture, top with cheese, and bake until cheese is golden.

de22511e-6df9-42f6-8c15-c63e7baa7946.name: Spinach Pie
de22511e-6df9-42f6-8c15-c63e7baa7946.description: A delicious spinach and cheese pie, perfect for a savory snack.
instructions: Cook chopped spinach with a little water, butter, salt, and pepper until soft and water evaporates.
Sauté fried onions and mushrooms with spinach, mix with white sauce made from flour, butter, milk, cumin, and cheese.
Spread butter on toast, add spinach mixture, sprinkle grated pizza cheese, and cover with another toast.
Bake in the oven or sandwich maker until warm and serve.

1abcff26-a17f-454e-a9f4-2a704e14efd9.name: Lentil Snack
1abcff26-a17f-454e-a9f4-2a704e14efd9.description: A delicious lentil spread on toasted bread, perfect for a quick bite.
ingredients: Black pepper, thyme, and lemon juice to taste
instructions: In a bowl, mix semi-cooked lentils, cream, garlic powder, black pepper, thyme, and lemon juice.
Crush the chicken bouillon cube into the mixture, then spread a heaping spoonful on a slice of toast.
Cover with another slice of toast and place in a device for 5 to 7 minutes until the bread is crispy.

ba750b57-af2e-4df0-9e54-ef10bfa8b662.name: Spicy Bean Dish
ba750b57-af2e-4df0-9e54-ef10bfa8b662.description: A hearty and flavorful dish packed with beans and spices.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions for five minutes.
Add garlic, then ground meat, cumin, pepper, and oregano; sauté for seven minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and cooked beans, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
Mix cheddar cheese, sour cream, and green onion in a bowl and pour over the dish.
Serve with bread. Can be stored in the fridge for three days or in the freezer for three months.

90535587-ba9d-443e-8bd3-46e6ad16c084.name: Colorful Vegetable Dish
90535587-ba9d-443e-8bd3-46e6ad16c084.description: A vibrant mix of vegetables and eggs, perfect for a refreshing meal.
instructions: Wash potatoes and boil in water for 20 minutes until cooked, then cool in cold water.
Peel and chop the potatoes, mix with lemon juice and dill.
Chop parsley, onion, celery, and shallots, then mix with chopped hard-boiled eggs and mayonnaise.
Add mustard and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the mixture with bread.

c1507ff8-8ac9-4c5b-a892-8df48ac44d8b.name: Zucchini with Feta Cheese
c1507ff8-8ac9-4c5b-a892-8df48ac44d8b.description: A delicious sautéed zucchini dish with fresh herbs and feta cheese.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, add sliced zucchinis and sauté until golden on both sides.
In another pan, sauté onion, then add garlic after five minutes and cook for one more minute.
Combine sautéed onion and garlic with zucchinis, add salt, pepper, tarragon, basil, and crumbled feta cheese.
Serve this dish with bread.

27a8a416-ef79-4a2e-aa59-7da21426c0d5.name: Zucchini Dish
27a8a416-ef79-4a2e-aa59-7da21426c0d5.description: A delicious and healthy zucchini dish with cheese and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and sliced zucchini with chopped bell pepper in olive oil until soft.
Add chopped basil and cheddar cheese, cover, then add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve with bread.

a682524f-8d3e-4ebd-b130-345abe2a93b4.name: Green Bean Dish with Special Sauce
a682524f-8d3e-4ebd-b130-345abe2a93b4.description: A nutritious and flavorful green bean dish with a delicious tomato-garlic sauce.
instructions: Wash the green beans thoroughly and boil them in water for 30 minutes without a lid.
Drain the cooked beans and sauté garlic in oil with tomato sauce for 3 minutes, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Pour the sauce over the beans and enjoy this nutritious snack.

d6627c4f-3575-4e0b-8af0-fa38774f9cde.name: Potato and Walnut Salad
d6627c4f-3575-4e0b-8af0-fa38774f9cde.description: A refreshing salad with potatoes, walnuts, and a tangy dressing.
instructions: Boil and chop the potatoes.
Wash the arugula leaves and let them dry.
In a bowl, gently mix arugula, chopped potatoes, and Gouda cheese, then sprinkle with chopped walnuts.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper, then pour over the salad.
Serve this dish with bread.

88e8295f-ff62-400c-9cd7-aee856cbb0ac.name: Potato with Cheese
88e8295f-ff62-400c-9cd7-aee856cbb0ac.description: Deliciously sautéed potatoes with melted cheese, served with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add grated potatoes, sauté until soft, season with salt and pepper, then add cheese and serve with tomatoes, cucumbers, and lettuce.

463f4c38-abbc-4577-9d80-5e3be5efc7d4.name: Dietary Eggplant with Kashk
463f4c38-abbc-4577-9d80-5e3be5efc7d4.description: A healthy and flavorful eggplant dish topped with kashk and walnuts.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and turmeric to taste
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion in a pan, adding turmeric and pepper.
Grill the eggplants, then add them to the pan with a little water to cook faster, stirring regularly.
In another container, heat a tablespoon of oil, add dried mint and a bit of turmeric, then mix kashk into the eggplant.
Ensure the oil does not overheat.
Serve the dish in a bowl, topping with hot mint and walnuts.

fcd24d64-f3a2-4519-98a6-e5cf17c9a2b3.name: Eggplant and Cheese Dish
fcd24d64-f3a2-4519-98a6-e5cf17c9a2b3.description: A savory baked dish with eggplant, cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Cut the eggplants into 3 cm pieces and sprinkle with salt.
Blend tomatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic until smooth.
Mix flour, eggs, and breadcrumbs until a dough forms.
Layer eggplants with sauce, basil, mozzarella, and parmesan in the dough.
Bake at 175°C for 30 minutes.
Let cool for 10 minutes before serving and spread remaining sauce on top.

c2cba375-5291-4a55-9d18-23f2e95e78ac.name: Green Bean Dish with Walnuts
c2cba375-5291-4a55-9d18-23f2e95e78ac.description: A delightful green bean dish topped with walnuts and a tangy dressing.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450°F.
Toss the cleaned green beans with olive oil and chopped onion, wrap in foil, and bake for 10 minutes.
In a bowl, mix salt, vinegar, honey, and thyme thoroughly.
Add the mixture to the baked green beans and onion, and bake for an additional 15 to 25 minutes.
Garnish with chopped walnuts and serve.

181cfe1c-8aa1-4ace-aab5-c832aff18477.name: Cooked Vegetables with Honey
181cfe1c-8aa1-4ace-aab5-c832aff18477.description: A delightful mix of steamed vegetables drizzled with honey.
instructions: Wash the ingredients and steam each separately.
Once softened, add salt and honey to taste, mix, and serve warm.

0062324f-8cfb-461a-98e3-41d184b7e482.name: Quick Vegetable Salad
0062324f-8cfb-461a-98e3-41d184b7e482.description: A refreshing and crunchy vegetable salad ready in just 5 minutes.
instructions: Wash and chop the cabbage finely.
Slice the carrots thinly and mix with cabbage and green onions.
In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper, then add to the vegetable mix.
Add vinegar, sugar, and salt, and mix thoroughly.

fe0ec91f-2ec5-4a11-98c4-9f0768a0caf0.name: Vegetable Bread
fe0ec91f-2ec5-4a11-98c4-9f0768a0caf0.description: A delightful bread infused with fresh herbs and spices.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs (dill, parsley, green onion, thyme)
instructions: Dissolve sugar in warm milk and add yeast. Cover for 5 minutes until frothy.
Mix in flour and salt until dough is sticky. Cover and let rise until doubled.
Grease a 10x30 cm rectangular mold and sprinkle with flour.
Combine dough with herbs and place in the mold. Make slashes on top and cover.
Let rise for 30 minutes in a warm place.
Preheat oven to 400°F and bake for 35 minutes. Remove from mold and slice.

e6b2bbf4-3932-4709-8651-6593b89b99f0.name: Spinach and Sausage Dish
e6b2bbf4-3932-4709-8651-6593b89b99f0.description: A creamy and savory spinach dish with sausage, perfect for a hearty meal.
instructions: Clean, wash, chop the spinach, and boil in water for 2 minutes.
Drain and let cool. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and sausage.
In another pot, melt butter and sauté flour for 2 minutes, then add milk and let it cook.
Add the spinach mixture to the cooked milk, then season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

9278c992-440c-4abf-a999-8d6f8e5db628.name: Spicy White Bean Stew
9278c992-440c-4abf-a999-8d6f8e5db628.description: A hearty stew with white beans, chicken, and a blend of spices.
instructions: Combine white beans, chicken broth, crushed garlic, and half of the chopped onion in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for three hours, adding water if needed. Sauté remaining onions in olive oil, then add to the pot with chicken and cook for another 30 minutes.
Stir in spices, then serve in a suitable dish and garnish with cheese.
